SA27n2952:24: padamidaṁ taṁ janaṁ nirdiśati yenāviṣkṛtaṁ dharmavastu,
SA27n2952:26: ayaṁ bhāvaḥ- buddhasya śikṣaṇāni svabhāvasiddhāni satyānyantareṇa na kānicid vastūni yāni buddhena prakaṭīkṛtāni ca,
SA27n2952:30: athavā tena satyānā prakaṭanamabhūt na veti viṣaye teṣāṁ satyānāmapekṣā nāsti |
SA27n2952:42: na buddhasya athavā kasyacidvā kalpanayā kṣamatayā vā tāni jāyante |
SA27n2952:43: asyāḥ śikṣaṇapaddhaterayameva viśeṣo yat paddhatiriyaṁ nāvegamūlā,
SA27n2952:45: paravarttini samaye buddhasaṁjñayābhihitaḥ asya dharmasya pravartaka ātyantikatayā jñānasāgaraṁ mamantha,
SA27n2952:46: tathā ca antardṛṣṭibalena samyak sampūrṇaṁ jñānaratnaṁ lebhe |
SA27n2952:55: api tu navatayā samakṣaṁ prakāśitamiti phalitārthaḥ |
SA27n2952:57: idam udāraṁ sarveṣu jīveṣu sāmānyam ca |
SA27n2952:65: parantu bauddhānāṁ pakṣe taccharaṇasya kaścit viśeṣo vartate yo'nyeṣu dharmeṣu hi durāpaḥ |
SA27n2952:66: bauddhadharme taccharaṇaṁ ratnatrayamiti viditaṁ yatra buddha-dhamma-saṁghānāṁ samāveśaḥ parilakṣyate |
SA27n2952:67: yataḥ buddhaḥ kadāpi īśvarapreṣito dūto nāsīt athavā nāsīt parabrahmarūpaḥ,
SA27n2952:68: pratyuta sa tadīyaḥ śiṣyagaṇaṁ iva sāmānyo jīva āsīt |
SA27n2952:69: kevalaṁ pṛthaktayā nirdiśyante tasya caritrasya mālinyamuktatā,
SA27n2952:73: ebhirguṇiḥ yuktā tadīyā svārthaśūnyā mānavasevā jagati dṛḍhaṁ pratiṣṭhitā idānīmapi rāñjīvanarasasamṛddhā saṁvṛttā ca |
SA27n2952:82: atra mahattamasya satyasya prakāśo jātaḥ avidyayā yat satyaṁ mānaveṣu aśrūtapūrvamāsīt |
SA27n2952:83: tasya satyasya āviṣkaraṇādanantaraṁ tadbodhakṣameṣu janeṣu pracāramārebhe |
SA27n2952:84: asminnarthe vartamāno dharmo hi buddhadevasya upadeśaḥ |
SA27n2952:85: sa pālidhammavinaye ullekhitaḥ yasyākṣariko'rthaḥ ādarśaśca ācāraśca |
SA27n2952:86: budddhadevasya tirobhāvāt param samyag jñānāya dammānusāribhirbuddhabhaktaiḥ samaye samaye saṁgayānābhidheyā sabhā āhūtā |
SA27n2952:87: tathā ca paravartini kāle buddhasyopadeśāḥ piṭakākhyavibhāgatraye vibhaktā abhavan yathā vinayapiṭakaṁ sūttapiṭakamabhidhammapiṭakaṁ ceti yatra,
SA27n2952:96: buddhasya upadeśānāṁ dhammābhidheyaṁ saṁkalanaṁ kevalaṁ mahattvamasya satyasya upalabdhaye mūrtimat prakāśanaṁ nāma |
SA27n2952:99: asmādidaṁ tattvaṁ samāyāti yat ratnatrayamiti padaṁ kasyāpi viṣayasya prasaṁgena dvistarīyamarthaṁ sūcayati- ekatra vigrahapustakaveṣabhūṣāṇāṁ darśanīyaṁ sparśanīyaṁ copasthāpanaṁ prasajyate |
SA27n2952:100: anyatra ca sūkṣmatarādhyātmikārthavahaṁ padamidaṁ guṇaṁ dharmaṁ sattvaṁ vā nirdiśati yatra tathākathitānāṁ trayāṇāṁ sammelanaṁ ghaṭate |
SA27n2952:101: yadyapi pūrvatane vyākhyāne nunatā āgatā tathā sthūlarūpatā dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:102: tathāpi vyākhyānamidaṁ sādhāraṇajanamānaseṣu aparihāryatāṁ vrajati yadeva adhikataramutkarṣamāpannān janān viśeṣeṇa smārayati |
SA27n2952:111: punaśca, saṁghādeśasyāstitvaṁ sādhāraṇe śiṣyasamāje buddhapadāṁkānusāriṇaṁ sāhasikaṁ vyaktivṛndaṁ nirdiśati yatra ca dharmagrantharūpī dhammaḥ sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ sukhabodhyatayā dharmamārge sopānatvena tān sarvān paricālayati |
SA27n2952:120: yataḥ, yathārthataḥ hi anubuddhabodhakaḥ buddhasadṛśśca saṁgho nāma jīvatkāle samyag jñānalābhāya prayatnavatāṁ sarveṣāṁ kṛte eva unmuktaḥ yatra na janānāṁ samājasvīkṛtā vyavahārānumoditā ca sthitiḥ ca gaṇyate |
SA27n2952:121: evaṁ kaścid balakaḥ bālikā vā kaścit sādhāraṇo bhakto vā bhikṣurvā etadarthakaḥ saṁgho bhavitumarhati tathā ca sa janaḥ viśuddhidevarūpeṇa pratyavekṣyate |
SA27n2952:136: śāsanavidhau abhijātānāṁ prabhāvo dṛśyate yatra śakyanaiḥ pratiṣṭhitā kācit sabhā babhūva |
SA27n2952:137: asyāḥ sabhāyāḥ patirāsīt śuddhodanaḥ yaḥ rājeti saṁjñayā viditaḥ |
SA27n2952:138: tasya mahiṣī āsīt māyā sirimahāmāyā vā |
SA27n2952:139: etajjanayugalamekadā vesakhākhyacāndramāsasya pūrṇimāyāṁ tithau bhārate tathā jagati viśrutatamasya tanayasya janma dadau |
SA27n2952:140: tasyāvirbhāvo babhūva kasmiṁścit kuñjakānane-māyādevyā devadahābhidheyasya svanagarasya ca kapilavatthunagarasya madhyavarttini sthale |
SA27n2952:142: sa rājatanayocitaiḥ sarvakalāvijñānarūpaiḥ mānasikaiḥ guṇaiḥ saha śārīrikaśaktisaundaryaguṇairapi upetaḥ san kṛti bhabhūva |
SA27n2952:150: tat tat śikṣaṇīyaṁ sarvaṁ parisamāpya yaśodharābhidhānāṁ kāñcinmanoramāṁ kanyāmupayeme yā rāhulanāmakasya putrasya janma dadau |
SA27n2952:152: ayameva tajjīvanasya parivarttanasya kālaḥ yadā tasya hṛdaye karuṇāyā āhvānamuttālataraṁ saṁjātam tathā ca tasya citte sarvātiśāyijñānajyotiḥ udbhāsitataraṁ saṁvṛttam |
SA27n2952:153: vaśuvadharūpayāgāt pāpasya vyaktyantaraprāptirūpabodhāt jātibhedaprathājātabhedābhedavicārāt ca manuṣyāṇāṁ yāni duḥkhāni kaṣṭāni ca jāyante taiḥ saha jarārogaśokamṛtyunirāśāsañjātāni kāyikāni mānasikāni ca duḥkhāni-yāni buddhicitte suptāni bhabhūvuḥ tāni prabuddhatāṁ jammuḥ |
SA27n2952:155: yasyottaram indriyasukhamagnajīvanayātrayā na labhyate iti bodho babhūva siddhārthasya |
SA27n2952:156: so'damyamanorathena yenakenāpi mahatā mūlyena taduttaraṁ jñātuṁ pravṛttaḥ san taduttaraṁ prāpa,
SA27n2952:157: yat svasya pareṣāṁ ca kṛte mahat sahāyakaṁ jātam |
SA27n2952:158: pareṣāṁ sāhāyyaṁ cikīrṣuḥ siddhārthaḥ prathamataḥ kiñcit sādhayituṁ yatnavān bhaviṣyati iti tenāvagatam |
SA27n2952:159: tataḥ sa indriyasukhaiḥ vṛthā kālakṣepaṁ kṛtvā duḥsāhasikena siddhāntenānupreritaḥ san jīvanarahasyasandhānāya vratī babhūva |
SA27n2952:175: evaṁ sa samyak jñānī athavā buddha iti viśrutaḥ sañjātaḥ |
SA27n2952:176: buddhatvaprāptiriyaṁ tasya janmanaḥ pañcatriṁśattame varṣ cāndramāsasya vesakhasya pūrṇimāyāṁ tithau eva saṁvṛttā babhūva |
SA27n2952:177: tataḥ prabhṛti sa cirakāṁṅkṣitaparamasatyasya sukhaṁ vibhajya sādhāraṇebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ samarpayitumātmānamutsasarja |
SA27n2952:178: buddhatvalābhāt prāk tena yādṛśī kṛcchratā svīkṛtā tādṛśīṁ kṛcchratāmaṁgīkartuṁ dhammasya māhātmyampalabdhuṁ ca samartheṣu paricitajaneṣu svecchayā dhammaṁ pracārayituṁ bhāraṁ jagrāha |
SA27n2952:191: svāsthyavantaḥ svāsthyahīnāśca- iti sarvairjanaiḥ saha tasya sambandha āsīt ye tasya vāṇīṁ niścitaṁ śroṣyanti athavā upalabdhuṁ yatiṣyante |
SA27n2952:192: tannikaṭe vahiraṁgākāraviṣayakaṁ kṛtrimacintanasaṁkrāntaṁ kimapi pārthakyaṁ nāsīt |
SA27n2952:193: tataḥ, bodhilābhāt paraṁ vā pūrvaṁ vā buddhadevasya jīvanakathā tadīyakāryebhyaḥ pṛthakbhūteti na gaṇyate |
SA27n2952:194: niḥsvārthasevāprasaṁge sahanasaṁkalpavicāraprasaṁge ca dṛṣṭāntamūlakaguṇarājitvena ubhayameva sahāyakatāṁ vrajiṣyati |
SA27n2952:202: arthāt bhāratasya grāmād grāmāntare bhramaṇakāle buddhadevaḥ sarvadā sādhāraṇānāṁ kṛṣijīvināṁ saṁsparśe sthitvā,
SA27n2952:203: tasmai pradattaṁ kamapi prakāramāhāraṁ gṛhītvā vyaktigatālāpe niratastiṣṭhati tathā ca svīyavaktavyamupasthāpayati upadeśaṁ prayacchati ca |
SA27n2952:211: atra vyaktigatacittaśānteḥ tātkṣaṇikaṁ lakṣyamapi nyūnatvena na vicāryam |
SA27n2952:218: aṁguttaranikāyasya catukkanipāte kathitebhyo buddhavacanebhyo buddhasya śikṣaṇarītiravagamyate |
SA27n2952:232: tataḥ vividhāsu avasthāsu vividhāāṁ narāṇāṁ prayojanasyānusāreṇa ācaraṇasya bahuvidhāṁ kramā vyavasthāpitāḥ |
SA27n2952:233: teṣāṁ mūlabhūtā nītiśca sannyāsiṣu ca sādhāraṇeṣu ca prayujyā |
SA27n2952:234: aśubhecchāvṛthāhaṁkārādīnapaguṇān prati pravaṇatāṁ jetuṁ kaścid bauddho dhyānayogena dayākaruṇāsnigdhasukhitāsamavṛttitānāṁ śaktimanubhūya vyavaharet |
SA27n2952:245: unnatataraṁ punarjanmāthavā jīvanaṁ kāmayamānānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte 'laukika' upadeśaḥ 'lokuttara'stu jāgatikaṁ sukhaṁ punarjanma vā atīva nagaṇyamiti manyamānānāṁ,
SA27n2952:254: parantu yathārthataḥ prayojanīyābhiprāyasādhanāya ubhāveva kāñcit samatāṁ vahataḥ |
SA27n2952:256: prathame kṣetre'śato dvitīyo ca kṣetre samagrata iti dvayo pārthakyam |
SA27n2952:257: arthāt prathame kṣetre duḥkhasya kiñjinmātramavaśiṣyate dvitīye tu duḥkhasya mūle dhvastataṁ gate paripūrṇā duḥkhanivṛttirjāyate |
SA27n2952:260: idaṁ śuddhaṁ nīvanaṁ narāṇāṁ vañcanāya neṣyate na vā teṣāṁ śraddhāyā lābhāya,
SA27n2952:262: navīnācāryarūpeṇa nūtanasaṁskārakarūpeṇa vā paricayaḥ asya nābhiprāyarūpeṇa iṣṭaḥ,
SA27n2952:264: tatsthale, viśuddhaṁ jīvanamātmasaṁyamaṁ tyāgaṁ vairāgyaṁ nirvāṇaṁ ca lakṣyīkaroti iti |
SA27n2952:273: tatra jātivarṇapadavayoliṁgarūpānumānānāṁ viśeṣo na gaṇyate-iti bhikṣavastathā sādhāraṇā janāḥ sarve buddhabhaktā suṣṭhu jānanti |
SA27n2952:287: lokāścāsan tathākathiteṣu viśvāseṣu ācaraṇeṣu ca nimagnāḥ |
SA27n2952:298: tatkāle sāmānyena yā dhāraṇā svīkṛtirvā pracalitā āsīt tasyāḥ sāmagrikaṁ cāmūlaṁ ca parivartanamasyābhiprāyatvena kīrttitam |
SA27n2952:311: ayameva niyamo yat kaścijjano gaṁgāsnānāt pāpamukto bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:313: idaṁ vacanaṁ rūpakārthena vyākhyāya buddho darśayamāsa tasya dharme kaścijjano nītinadīsnānāt pāpānmukto bhavituṁ śaknoti iti |
SA27n2952:321: - dharmopadeśasya pūrvoktaprakāradvayena buddhadevaḥ tatkāle svāmivivekānandādibhāratīyavidvajjanagaṇa iva hindudharmasya viśrutasaṁskārarūpeṇa paricitto'bhaviṣyat |
SA27n2952:322: kintu kiñcinnūtanatvavat punarvidhānārthameva bauddhadharmo yathārthataḥ nūtanadharmarūpeṇa gauravasya yaśasaśca adhikārī babhūva |
SA27n2952:339: tathā hi, jīvanasyāsmin kāle mānavajīvanaṁ nirvāṇalābhāya prakṛṣṭaḥ samaya iti bauddhadharmo manyate |
SA27n2952:342: parameśvānugrahalābhāya kalyāṇakarma kartavyamiti dhāraṇā kutrāpi nāsti |
SA27n2952:343: atraiva jātivarṇasampradāyanirviśeṣeṇa mānavādhikārāṇāṁ svādhīnatāyāśca pratiṣṭhā yuktidvārā samarthyate |
SA27n2952:344: yo jano hatyākarmāthavā cauryakarma vāparādhakarma sādhayati sa buddhena doṣīti gaṇyate |
SA27n2952:345: sa ātmānaṁ bauddhaṁ vadatu na veti viṣaye gaṇanā nāsti |
SA27n2952:346: tathā ca aparādhamūlakakarmakaraṇāt so'vaśyameva duḥkhabhāk bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:348: tadvat, yo janaḥ śubhaṁ karma karoti so'vaśyameva śubhavikākaṁ bhuṅkte |
SA27n2952:349: sa bauddho bhavatu na veti viṣayo nagaṇya eva |
SA27n2952:350: na kāpi śaktiḥ sattā vā yā sañcitaśubhaphalaprāptau bādhāṁ janayati |
SA27n2952:351: ātmabhāgyanirmāṇe ātmanirdhāraṇasya ca mānavīyasāmyasya ca etādṛśī mattarā bhāvanā nānyaiḥ kaiścittatvairudghoṣitā |
SA27n2952:361: tatra ghaṭikācatuṣṭayaṁ vyāpya kevalaṁ viśramamantareṇa avaśiṣṭaviṁśatighaṭikākālena tasya klāntivihinā niḥsvārthā ca mānavasevā abādhitā āsīt |
SA27n2952:362: asmāt kāraṇāt tasyopadeśāḥ etādṛśaṁ vividhatvaṁ viśālatvaṁ bhajante yena keṣāñcinmate,
SA27n2952:363: te upadeśā nāma caturaśītiviṣayā iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:364: te ca śīrṣatrayeṇa vibhājyante | tathā hi -
SA27n2952:372: ete bhikṣūṇāṁ sādhāraṇānāṁ śiṣyāṇāṁ kṛte upayuktāḥ |
SA27n2952:399: ye samagraviṣayāṇāṁ pāraṁ gantuṁ na śaknuvanti teṣāṁ kṛte tu buddhopadeśānāṁ saṁkṣiptatamo niṣkarṣaḥ dṛśyate bhikṣūṇāṁ uddiśya ovadapātimokkhābhidhāne mādhīyasambodhane | tathā hi -
SA27n2952:415: tatra śarīraṁ nāma dṛśyaṁ spṛśyaṁ vāhyataḥ bhautikaṁ tathā ca tulanāta āpātato vā sthāyitaraṁ vastu |
SA27n2952:416: cittaṁ tu abhautikaṁ sūkṣmaṁ vastu tathā cādṛśyamaspṛśyaṁ ca |
SA27n2952:418: kintu vinayena niyamena ca idaṁ manaḥ alpataraṁ dolāyamānaṁ tathā cādhikataraṁ dṛḍhaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:419: ata eva manaḥsaṁyamasya ātmaprabhutvasya carcāpaddhatau buddhānuśāsanānāṁ prathamaḥ kramo vidhīyate |
SA27n2952:428: teṣu pañcakaṁ sādhāraṇānāṁ bauddhānāṁ niyatācaraṇāya sambhavaparatayā nirdiśyate |
SA27n2952:431: kintu saptaviṁśatyadhikadviśatasaṁkhyakāni anuśāsanāni nītvā pātimokkhābhidhāno yo buṇastiṣṭhati sa bhikṣūṇāṁ tathā bauddhasannyāsināṁ kṛte vihitaḥ |
SA27n2952:445: madyādirūpāṇi madajanakabheṣajāni eva mohasya pradhānāni kāraṇāni |
SA27n2952:480: ete doṣāḥ sāmānyena sākalyena ca pañcānuśāsanānīti saṁjñayā paricitāḥ |
SA27n2952:481: sarveṣu janeṣu maṁgalasādhanāya nirāpattāvidhānāya ca etānyanuśāsanāni sūtrarūpeṇa viracitāni |
SA27n2952:482: teṣāṁ pālanaṁ ca na kevalaṁ bhaktipakṣe'pi tu tatsaparkitasarvajanapakṣe sukhaśāntividhāyakam |
SA27n2952:490: keṣāñcinmate eteṣāṁ pālanena netivācakaṁ phalaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:492: eteṣāṁ parityāgo'pi svataḥ siddhatattvarūpeṇa deśasya pragatiṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:493: tathā hi - hatyāpratihiṁsādiprakāravyavahāraśūnyatā prakārāntareṇa deśaṁ śāntisamṛddhimantaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:501: sa dharma itivācakaṁ karmapañcakamapi ānuṣaṁgikatayā upadiśati,
SA27n2952:502: tathā ca sadācārāṇāṁ sampūrṇāṁ sūcīṁ sthāpayati | tathā hi -
SA27n2952:540: tathā hi - abhijātatantraṁ rājatantraṁ gaṇatantram ityādi |
SA27n2952:541: tathāpi bauddhadharme praśāsanasya prasaraḥ prāguktapraśāsanādyapekṣayā vyāpakataraṁ tātparyaṁ vahati,
SA27n2952:542: yataḥ sarvāḥ śāsanasya vyavasthā deśānāṁ svakīyaprayatnāya kalpante |
SA27n2952:544: ayaṁ viṣayaḥ svapraśāsanasya saṁketaṁ karoti yacchāsanaṁ pāpajātā lajjā kukarmaphalāśaṅkā ceti dharmadvayenāvāpyate |
SA27n2952:545: pariṇāmata idaṁ jagat yathārthataḥ patanād rakṣitaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:553: kintu kevalaṁ kati narāḥ lakṣyaṁ prāpnuvanti anye tu neti yathārthaṁ tathyam |
SA27n2952:558: bhītipradāsu vipatsu samasyāsu satīṣu api karmasādhanāya bhayahīnaḥ sāhasaḥ |
SA27n2952:560: eṣā nītiḥ kasyāpi kāryasya hitāhitapakṣanirṇayasya tathā bhramāpacayadūrikaraṇasya kṣamatā |
SA27n2952:561: ete sarve guṇā manoyogasyāgrahasya codbodhanāya prasiddhāḥ |
SA27n2952:562: kintu ete prāyaśaḥ avahelitā vismṛtāśca jāyante |
SA27n2952:563: tadarthaṁ janā abhīṣṭaṁ lakṣyaṁ yātuṁ na śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:581: sambhāvanāmayasya kasyāpi janasya sambhāvanā ca bādhate |
SA27n2952:592: arthāt cauryakarmato hānito vā rakṣā vidhāya āpacchūnyasthāne dhanānāṁ sthāpanam |
SA27n2952:593: dhārmikairjanaiḥ saha saṁgatiḥ ye yathāyathaṁ sadācaraṇārthaṁ sāhāyyaṁ kariṣyanti |
SA27n2952:594: tathā ca dhanajīvanayoḥ samṛddhau niścitatvaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:595: āyānusārato vyavavyavasthā - yatra yathāyathaṁ dīrghakālīnā arthanītisammatā yojanā sūcyate |
SA27n2952:596: ebhiḥ saha vartante - bhaviṣyadarthaṁ vipatkālīnavyavahārārthaṁ vā āyāṁśaviśeṣasya sañcayaḥ,
SA27n2952:607: yatra buddhena sampannaparivāravināśakāraṇāni vivṛtāni | tathā hi -
SA27n2952:655: dhanaprayogasya yathārthamupāyā buddhena saṁketitāḥ | tathā hi -
SA27n2952:663: padārūpaṁ sāmarthyānurūpaṁ tatra dhanaṁ vibhajya dātavyam |
SA27n2952:698: tadarthaṁ gārhasthyavyāpāre arthaviṣaye ca bahuvidhāḥ samasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ vardhante dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ dharmatvena bauddhadharmaḥ dharmatvena bauddhadharmamadhikṛtya vicārāt prāgasmābhiḥ saṁkṣepeṇa kaḥ dharmaḥ,
SA27n2952:700: samājajīvane bhaktijīvane ca sa kiṁ lakṣyamabhiyāti ityādayaḥ praśnāḥ samādhānīyāḥ |
SA27n2952:703: viśeṣataḥ mānasikasya ādhyātmikasya ca sukhasya lābhāya |
SA27n2952:704: kālakrameṇa vividhastarīyavikāśamatikramya yat kauśalaṁ jñānaṁ sañcite yaśca bhāvaḥ viśvāsaḥ ca sañcitau tāni sarvāṇi cintyante'tra dharme |
SA27n2952:706: tathāpi manastattvasammatatvāt śārīratattasammatvācca narasya madhye ādimajanasya dhārā ekādikrameṇa vahati iti yathārthaṁ vacanam |
SA27n2952:707: ādimapravṛttiśīlatā sādhāraṇyena tasmin manusye na tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:708: manuṣye sabhye sati sā paścāt tyajyate |
SA27n2952:713: kintu śiśuryathā bālapariveṣṭanavasanasya madhye lālito bhavati,
SA27n2952:714: tathaiva manuṣyāḥ kadāpi na ādimapravṛttitaḥ muktobhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:715: ata eva, viśeṣato dharmasya vyāpāre sarvaprakāraiḥ sañcitaiḥ guṇajñānabhāvapratyayādibhiḥ saha narasya madhye ādimo naraḥ adhunāpi prativasati |
SA27n2952:716: evaṁ sati prācīno dharmo yādṛśa āvegamūla āsīt na tādṛśo yuktinirbharaḥ |
SA27n2952:717: tathāpi, kālāvasāne sati adhikatarābhijñatāsañcayane kṛte ca prāguktabhāvapratyayāḥ kramaśaḥ paroktādibhiḥ parivartitā bhavanti,
SA27n2952:718: yāvanna samaya āyāti yadā evaṁ prakāreṇāgataṁ jñānaṁ pravṛttyādikaṁ pariśudhya saṁpūrṇīkṛtya ca vikāśasya caramatāṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:721: ayaṁ viśvāso bhūtānāṁ tathā prākṛtikānāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ mānavīkaraṇena ajñatātmakabhayādeva sañjātaḥ |
SA27n2952:722: tathā hi - ādyo naraḥ sārvavidhabhautabalānāṁ kṛpāyā madhye ātmānaṁ paśyati sma |
SA27n2952:724: api ca, vajravidyudbhūkampajalapralayāḥ tanniyantrādhīnā na sthitāḥ |
SA27n2952:725: teṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ paścāt avaśyameva kācicchaktiḥ kaścicchaktimān vā vartate iti tasya dhāraṇā ajāyata |
SA27n2952:726: bhayaṁkareṣu vastuṣu varttamānasya kasyacijjanasya bhāvanā paravartikāle īśvarasya dhārāṇāyāṁ rūpaṁ jagrāha |
SA27n2952:727: kintu pratyekaṁ vyāpāre kārakatvena kevalamekamīśvaramādimo naraḥ nācintayat,
SA27n2952:728: parantu vahūn īśvarān so'cintayat ye pṛthivyā ekaikaṁ vibhāgamadhikurvanti paravartikāle etaddhāraṇāta ekeśvaratattvaṁ vahvīśvaratattvaṁ ceti matadvayaṁ sṛṣṭhamabhavat |
SA27n2952:731: tadā sāmagrikaśaktimatā kenacit niyantrakeṇa janena prayojanamanubhūtam |
SA27n2952:732: śāsanavyavasthāyāṁ kramaśaḥ sampūrṇarājatantramukhi paripartanaṁ dṛṣṭam - yatra rājā vā samrāṭ vā śāsakatvena pratiṣṭho'bhavat |
SA27n2952:738: ayaṁ rūpavān vyaktiveśeṣaḥ svargabhūmau viśvasya piteti abhihitaḥ |
SA27n2952:739: saḥ advitīyaparamaśaktidhararūpeṇa parameśvaraḥ san sarveṣāṁ pūjitaḥ |
SA27n2952:741: mānavīyajñānamadhikataraṁ prasāryya vyaktigatātmapratyayamūlamabhūt - tatra parameśvarasya dhāraṇa tādṛśaṁ gurutvaṁ na prāpa |
SA27n2952:742: mānavabhāgyamasahāyatvāt parameśvarādhīnaṁ vā tadicchāvaśam iti ekacchatrabhāvanā nūtanaṁ tātparyyaṁ jagrāha |
SA27n2952:743: tatra puruṣasya bhāgyaṁ divyādhīnaṁ na sthitvā mānavecchādhīnaṁ jātam |
SA27n2952:745: tathā hi - 1. āstikyavādaḥ - tatrāntarbhāvitau īśvaravādo vahvīśvaravādaśca |
SA27n2952:749: 2. nāstikyavādaḥ - kasyāpi parameśvarasaṁjñakasya pūjātra na vihitā |
SA27n2952:751: dharmo bāhyataḥ dharmasāpekṣaviśvāsācāraiḥ saṁśliṣyate kintu pradhānataḥ sa dharmaḥ sāmājikaḥ - evaṁvidyo dharmaḥ pratyekaṁ mānavasamāje sāmānyato dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:752: idānīṁ kāle pratiṣṭhiteṣu samājeṣu rājanīti-śikṣānīti-dhananītyādisammatāḥ vividhā vyavasthā antareṇāpi dharmo samagrasamājavyavasthāyāṁ gurutvavahasaṁsthārūpeṇa svīkṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:753: tathāpi dharmo na praśāsanasadṛśaḥ vyavahāraparyāyo vā |
SA27n2952:754: tatra kṣamatāsvatantrīkaraṇaṁ kṣamatāniyantraṇaṁ ca saṁśliṣṭavastutvena nirdiṣṭe |
SA27n2952:755: ayaṁ nāpi ārthanītikapratiṣṭhānena tulyaḥ yatra utpādanabhogasambhārākāṅkṣādayaḥ saṁśliṣyante |
SA27n2952:756: api cāyaṁ na parivāreṇa samānaḥ saṁbandhaḥ sthāpyate niyamyate ca |
SA27n2952:757: paścimadeśīyaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ ‘dharmo kenacit ati’ - ityanena saṁśliṣyate iti lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:758: ta‘dati’nā saha mānavasya sambandhaṁ racayati dharmaḥ |
SA27n2952:766: mahattyāḥ sabhyatāyāḥ phalatvena ca viśiṣṭatām adhikaroti |
SA27n2952:767: adhunā samayo'yamuttarāya - kiṁ nāma dharmaḥ sādhayati ?
SA27n2952:768: mānavajīvane tathā samājajīvane samagrataḥ sa kiṁ lakṣyaṁ paripūrayati ?
SA27n2952:769: samagrasamājavyavasthānirmāṇakṣetreṣu dharmaḥ khalu gurutvavahasāmājikeṣu saṁsthāneṣu anyatama iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:770: samājo nāma sāmājikānāṁ saṁsthānānāṁ gatiśīlaḥ samatāvidhāyakaḥ |
SA27n2952:771: tāni saṁsthānāni vyavahārasammatatvena vādhyatāmūlakatvena ca ādarśabhūtāni kānicit kāryāṇi sthāpayanti |
SA27n2952:772: saṁsthānānāmetanmiśraṇaṁ samagrataḥ samājavyavasthāṁ racayati - yatra pratyekaṁ bhāgaḥ anyeṣāmupari nirbharaśīlaḥ,
SA27n2952:774: tarhi tat parivartanaṁ samagrasamājavyavasthāyāṁ prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
SA27n2952:776: dharmaḥ saṁsthānatvena pariṇataṁ mānavānāṁ vyavahāramantareṇa na kaścid bhinno viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:777: samagrasamājavyavasthāyā aṁgarūpeṇa kasyacit sāmājikasaṁsthānasya kānīdvyaktāni tathā suptāni kāryāṇi santi |
SA27n2952:778: tataḥ, samagrataḥ samājavyavasthāyāṁ sāmyavidhāyakatvena kasyacid dharmīyasaṁsthānasya kāni kāni spṛṣṭāni suptāni a karyāṇi santi ?
SA27n2952:785: dharmo narebhyaḥ tat sāmarthyaṁ dadāti yena narā duradṛṣṭamabhimukhīkartuṁ samādhātuṁ ca śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:786: api ca, dharmo'smākaṁ jñānamatikramya nirdiṣṭatāṁ samarpayati,
SA27n2952:788: kintu viśeṣata ucyate yat dharmaḥ karyakṣetre sampradāyena saha vyaktiṁ samīkaroti,
SA27n2952:797: doṣarāgavijayopāyapradānena samājasya aikyaṁ sthāyitvaṁ ca vidhātuṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:800: samājaviśeṣe'yaṁ dharmaḥ vyavasthārahitātmakaṁ dhvaṁsamūlakaṁ ca prabhāvaṁ vistārayati |
SA27n2952:801: vyaktipakṣe samājapakṣe ca dharmasya avadānamitivācakaṁ netivācakaṁ vā bhavati |
SA27n2952:802: tadavadānaṁ niravacchinnamastitvaṁ rakṣati athavā avāñcchitaviṣayadūrīkaraṇāya bhūmikāṁ gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:803: tathā hi - yadā dharma indriyanigrahāya uddhatakarmapaddhatisaṁyamanāya ca upāyatvena kāryaṁ karoti,
SA27n2952:804: tadā sa dharmaḥ dhvaṁsātmakaṁ karma sādhayatītyucyate |
SA27n2952:806: pratyuta, dharmo yadā sāmājikaniyantraṇāṁ sādhayan pratiṣṭhitamūlyalakṣyāṇi paripoṣayan samājasya aikyavidhānāya sthāyitvasthāpanāya ca sahāyatāṁ vidadhāti tadā sa dharmo niravacchinnamastitvaṁ rakṣituṁ satyarthakaṁ karma sampādayati |
SA27n2952:808: sa śikṣitaḥ saṁskṛtimān sāmājikapadadhārī ca sannapi prāyeṇa kāmadveṣādibhirabhibhūto bhavati |
SA27n2952:809: api ca, tattvataḥ buddhijīvi sannapi manuṣyaḥ prakṛtyānubhavaśīlo jīvaḥ |
SA27n2952:810: sacetanamanaso rūpadvayamidaṁ manuṣyasya niyamane aṁśaṁ gṛhṇāti yadaiva duṣṭā pravṛttiḥ niyantraṇam labhate,
SA27n2952:811: tadaiva prāyeṇa dṛśyate manuṣya ātmanā bādhito'pi duṣkarmakaraṇāya cālito bhavati |
SA27n2952:812: idaṁ tathyaṁ adhaḥ prakṛtau khalīnarūpeṇa kenacid vastunā prayojanaṁ prasūte |
SA27n2952:814: yatredaṁ manuṣyamatikramya yāti tatra niyamā viracyante |
SA27n2952:816: śikṣā sarvadā sadācārasya dayāluhṛdayasya vā pratyayaṁ na nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:818: sa dharmanirapekṣaśikṣayā śikṣitaḥ san aparān janān kauśalena abhibhūtān karoti |
SA27n2952:822: dharmasya upadeśānāṁ nirmalaviśvāsena hārdikavyavahāreṇa ca vyaktau tathā samāje sthāyi sukhaṁ sthāyinī ca śāntiḥ sambhavataḥ |
SA27n2952:825: asmādeva kāraṇāt yathārthānāmā ko'pi dharmaḥ sarvadā tadanugāmināṁ mūlatvena tathā pūrvakāṁṅkṣitatvena naitikaṁ jīvanaṁ paricālayati |
SA27n2952:828: yata idaṁ parimitasusthitadaśāyā jāyate iti dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:833: te niyamā mānavamanaḥprakṛtiṁ gabhīrataraṁ praviśya sarveṣāṁ mānavānām upakārāya dharmamupadiśanti |
SA27n2952:835: tathā ca siddhāntaḥ kriyate yat dharmaḥ kevalam aihikaśikṣāyāḥ pariṇāma |
SA27n2952:837: yatra rāṣṭrīyavyavahārāropitapuruṣāpekṣayā anyaḥ kaścit puruṣaḥ śraddhāyā mahattarabodhena udbuddhaḥ bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:839: śikṣāvidaḥ arthanītividaśca tat svapne'pi na paśyanti |
SA27n2952:840: asmin vyāpāre dharmaḥ praśāntā śaktiḥ yā āñānuvartanamādiśati,
SA27n2952:843: eṣa dharmo mānavacaritrasya etāvat gabhīram praviṣṭo yat na ko'pi manuṣyasṛṣṭavyavahāravidhiḥ tadvatsamunnatiśikharaṁ gantuṁ kāmayate |
SA27n2952:844: evaṁ dharmasya sāhāyyenaiva vyavahārasūtraṁ sthāpayituṁ śakyate |
SA27n2952:845: api ca, saṁghavaddhajīvarūpeṇa manuṣyaḥ svata evāpi dharmapravaṇo jīvaḥ,
SA27n2952:847: bauddhadharmasya mūlabhūtā nītiḥ sambhavata āryasatyacatuṣṭaye lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:848: etāni satyāni viśvaprakṛteḥ mānavaprakṛtervā kenacinnirdiṣṭena bodhena saha yujyante |
SA27n2952:852: iyaṁ paddhatiḥ caturthe āryasatye aṣṭāṁgikamārgeṣu vardhate |
SA27n2952:855: ayaṁ kenacana nareṇānusṛtasya naitikasya tathādhyātmikasyānuśīlanasya mārgatvena dharmarūpaṁ bauddhatattvamupasthāpayati |
SA27n2952:856: sarve bhāratīyā dharmāḥ prāgbhāratīyakālīnasya bodhaviśeṣasya prabhutvaṁ svīkurvanti |
SA27n2952:857: vaidike vā prācīnapārasike vā vāṅmaye vidhyarthakena śabdenāyaṁ prakāśitaḥ |
SA27n2952:859: sarvāṇi vastūni sattvāni ca teṣāṁ kṛte upadiṣṭaṁ kaṁcana mārgamanusaranti anusareyurvā |
SA27n2952:860: ayaṁ mārgaḥ sattāvato viśvasya yathāyathasvabhāvanirmāṇayoḥ upari pratiṣṭhito vartate,
SA27n2952:864: samājeṣu vyaktisaṁghasya nirmāṇe vikāśe ca etādṛśasya bodhasya sambhāvyatā atiprācīnakāle avaśyameva samuditā |
SA27n2952:865: kasyāścidupajāteḥ sadasyaḥ svasya vā pareṣāṁ vā kṛte hitakarāṇi kāryāṇi nirdiṣṭairupāyaiḥ sādhayet |
SA27n2952:867: paravarttivaidikakālāt dharmarūpeṇa prakāśitāmimāṁ dhāraṇāṁ paśyāmaḥ yatra manuṣyakṛtakarmaṇāṁ pratyekaṁ rūpaṁ saṁśliṣṭamāsīt |
SA27n2952:869: ayaṁ śāstrokto viṣayaḥ buddhakālasya prāg buddhakālasya vā brāhmaṇayāgīyasāhityeṣu dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:870: yatra atisūkṣmavyāpāro'pi upadiṣṭaḥ yajñavediṣu vyavahṛtānām iṣṭakānāmākṛtiṁ saṁkhyāṁ cāpi aparityājyaḥ |
SA27n2952:872: tatra ayaṁ vyāparaḥ sarvāṇi anyakarmāṇi samāvṛtya iva yajñīyānāṁ tathā śāstroktānāmanuṣṭhānānāṁ vidhānaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:873: ayameva purohitānāṁ dharmaḥ yaiḥ yāgā niyantritā yoddhṛṇāṁ gṛhasthānāṁ śūdrāṇāṁ ca svasvadharmaḥ vyākhyātaḥ |
SA27n2952:876: api tu brāhmaṇavarṇena gṛhītasya karttavyaviṣayakasyābhimatasya vipakṣe |
SA27n2952:877: tadabhimatavema samājasya apareṣu vibhāgeṣu dharmatvena ghoṣitam brāhmaṇyadharmastadāpi bhāratavarṣasya sampūrṇapūrvaprāntam nopagataḥ,
SA27n2952:878: buddhatattvasya svālaye'pi sambhavataḥ nūtana eva virodhasya tathā pratyabhiyogasya sambhukhīno'bhavat |
SA27n2952:880: yadyapi ca brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṁlāpesu ācaraṇeṣu ca aśraddhā na dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:883: na hi ko'pi sandehāvasaraḥ yat apare ye abrāhāṇāṁ ācāryāḥ sannyāsinaśca pṛthivīṁ parityajya gatāḥ tān adhikṛtya racitāni upākhyānāni yathārthavasthāmupanyasyanti |
SA27n2952:888: śuddhasukhavādāt vastuvādāt cārabhya ātmanigrahasya caramaṁ rūpamapi tatra vaiśadyena varṇitam |
SA27n2952:889: tatkālīne boddhadharme apare dve dhāraṇe āstām - prathamataḥ karmavādaḥ,
SA27n2952:891: duḥkhapāpayoḥ cirantanavivāde ete dve eva bhāratīye prativacane |
SA27n2952:894: tarhi tat pāpāya sa parajanmani daṇḍaṁ lapsyate |
SA27n2952:895: kati tattvāni pāpaṁ doṣaṁ ca iti vācakaṁ satyamiti gṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:896: idaṁ mataṁ bauddhārhatāṁ kathābhiḥ ātmapakṣaṁ samarthayati - ye mṛtajānānāṁ bhāgyāni draṣṭuṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:897: tathā ca, ye janāsteṣāṁ bhāgyaṁ vaktum aparajagataḥ pratyāgatāḥ teṣāṁ bhāgyāni api pratyakṣīkartuṁ samarthāḥ |
SA27n2952:898: evamidaṁ jagat tadeva sthānaṁ yatra hitārthaṁ karmamārgānusaraṇaṁ prayojanīyam |
SA27n2952:902: kā vā viśvasya yathārthaṁ prakṛtiḥ, iti,
SA27n2952:905: pratidvandvisiddhācāryaiḥ prakṛtaḥ panthā āviṣkṛta iti pratyayaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
SA27n2952:907: anayaiva ca diśā asya darśanasya sthāpayituḥ mahattvaṁ tathā mūlatvaṁ parilakṣyate |
SA27n2952:908: idaṁ vivecitaṁ pracalitamatānāṁ parityāgāya saṁśodhanāya vā aitihāsike vikāśe,
SA27n2952:912: api tu sādhāraṇānāṁ janānām yo vidhiḥ prātyahikajīvane sarveṣu karttavyeṣu prayujyate |
SA27n2952:913: sannyāsikṣetre yo jano vartamāne jīvane nirvāṇarūpaṁ paramaṁ puruṣārthaṁ labdhumicchati tasya pakṣe naitikā niyamāḥ tasya dharmānuśīlanasya avaśyakartavyāṅgaviśeṣāḥ |
SA27n2952:917: buddhaśca svayaṁ pūrvatananītimārgacyutān brāhmaṇān nindan varṇitaḥ |
SA27n2952:918: upadeśadānakāle buddha uvāca - pṛthivyāṁ bahavo brahmarūpā janāstiṣṭhanti ye nūtanopadeśaṁ grahītumunmukhā āsan |
SA27n2952:919: teṣāṁ samīpe sapramāṇa aiśonmeṣaḥ sādhitaḥ yasmai teṣāṁ naitikā svabhāvā abhilaṣanti |
SA27n2952:920: api ca, cirantaradhammatvena aiśonmeṣo vastusvabhāvapakṣe sahajātaḥ |
SA27n2952:921: buddhena tadvastu punarāviṣkṛtaṁ yat prāyeṇa viluptamāsīt |
SA27n2952:923: prathamataḥ sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte vyāvahārikaṁ tathā kāryakaraṁ darśanam |
SA27n2952:925: pracalitena viśvāsena vidhinā vā sampāditāni nipuṇāni kāryāṇi ādhyātmikatayā navāṁ mātrāṁ labhante sma |
SA27n2952:926: api ca, eṣu kāryeṣu naitikaṁ tātparyaṁ pratiphalitam |
SA27n2952:927: kūṭadantena vipreṇālocanāyāṁ buddha uvāca - kaścit prācīnaḥ rājā mahāyajñaṁ karttumiyeṣa |
SA27n2952:928: pariśeṣe sa taṁ yajñaṁ kartuṁ tasya gṛhapurohitena utsāhito babhūva - yatra ṣaṇḍa-chāga-kukkuṭa-śūkarādi-prāṇivadho nābhūt,
SA27n2952:932: kintu te rodanaṁ tathā daṇḍabhayaṁ na kṛtvā teṣāṁ karmāṇi cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:933: kūṭadantaḥ papraccha - ko yāgaḥ asmāt yajñāt prasiddhataraḥ,
SA27n2952:935: buddha uvāca - dhārmikāya sannyāsine bhikṣāyā dānaṁ khalu mahān yajñaḥ |
SA27n2952:938: tasmādapi mahattaraṁ viduṣāṁ vākyeṣu pratyayaparāyaṇatvam iti |
SA27n2952:946: siṅgālakopadeśe buddhastathā varṇito yathā sa digbhāgaṣaṭkapūjanarataṁ kañcit gṛhasthaṁ dadarśa (pradhānā diśaḥ,
SA27n2952:948: sa vadati tasya pitā taṁ tatkaraṇāya ādideśa |
SA27n2952:950: kintu sa kevalamuvāca - tena prakāreṇa diśaḥ na pūjayitavyā iti |
SA27n2952:961: api ca, dhanalābhasya ṣaṭ upāyāsteṣu ca ṣaṭ vipadaḥ,
SA27n2952:964: yathārthaśiṣyaḥ pūrvāṁ diśaṁ pitarāviti manyamānaḥ pūjayati |
SA27n2952:969: ahaṁ ca gatebhyaḥ ātmabhyaśca haviḥ dāsyāmi’ iti,
SA27n2952:970: pitarau ca pañcaprakāraiḥ tasmai pratidāsyataḥ evam anyāsu dikṣu draṣṭavyam |
SA27n2952:971: ācāryeṣu kartavyaṁ sādhayitvā sa dakṣiṇāṁ diśaṁ pūjayati |
SA27n2952:972: sa patnyāṁ viśvastaḥ san tasyāśca bhavaṇena paścimāṁ diśaṁ pūjayati |
SA27n2952:975: ūrdhvadeśaṁ ca sannyāsināṁ viprāṇāṁ ca yatnena |
SA27n2952:977: kintu idaṁ sādhāraṇebhyaḥ janebhyo'pi samagrakarttavyād atidūre vartate |
SA27n2952:978: nītisammataṁ karma aihike tathā pāralaukike jīvane sukharūpāya puraskārāya kalpate |
SA27n2952:985: ayaṁ tatkṣaṇāt sukarmaṇāṁ puraskāre antimasukhānveṣaṇalakṣyādupari tamunnamayati |
SA27n2952:988: tathāpi atra kila prācīnopadeśasya punarvargīkaraṇaṁ lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:990: prathame sthare satāpannaṁ nāmakaṁ pravāhaṁ praviṣṭaḥ naraḥ bandhanatrayaṁ naśyati |
SA27n2952:993: evaṁ ca sa duḥkhātmakapunarjanmapātratāto mukto bhavati |
SA27n2952:1000: , tadavasthāyāṁ ca uparate tasmin sa sakṛt duḥkhasamutsādanāt pūrvam idaṁ jagat pratyāvartate |
SA27n2952:1001: tṛtīyataḥ, nimnastarīyabandhanapañcakaṁ vinaśya (viṣayāsattyā droheṇa ca saha prāguktatrayam)
SA27n2952:1002: , sa uccatare jagati punarjāyate - yasmāt punarāgamanasya sambhāvyatā nāsti |
SA27n2952:1004: eṣu triṣu stareṣu sukarmasañcayasya abhiprāyo na tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1006: yatra nītininditakarmasādhanāya prakṛtā pravaṇatā tirohitā bhavati |
SA27n2952:1007: viśeṣataḥ, jagati kasmaicit sthitiśīlāya rūpāya tṛṣṇā (tanhā)
SA27n2952:1008: , tāṁ prati pravaṇatāyā ucchedanam adhikaṁ gurutvapūrṇaṁ lakṣaṇam |
SA27n2952:1009: bandhanādikrameṇa vargīkṛtā vibhinnarūpā tṛṣṇā duḥkhodbhavasya duḥkhanirodhasya ca jñānena vinaṣṭiṁ yāti |
SA27n2952:1010: tataḥ caturthaḥ staraḥ - arhatāṁ staraḥ - upasthito bhavati |
SA27n2952:1011: asyāṁ daśāyāṁ daścit jano yadi itomadhye idaṁ jagat na tyajati,
SA27n2952:1012: tarhi sa svata eva asāmānyaḥ jāyate |
SA27n2952:1013: sa tṛṣṇāyā mukto bhavati - yayā sādhāraṇaḥ naraḥ kamanīyaṁ pārthivaṁ jīvanaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:1014: tataḥ tṛṣṇāmukto janaḥ hṛdayena antarjñānena ca mokṣasya bodhe vasati |
SA27n2952:1024: asya viṣayasya itihāsasammate vicāre ayameva svābhāvikaḥ praśnaḥ yat vayam vikāsaprāpte darśane kiṁ paśyāmaḥ,
SA27n2952:1025: yāthātathyena buddhopadiṣṭe darśane vā kiṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1027: tathā hi - dīghasya ādyeṣu trayodaśasutteṣu śīlākhyā nītimālā vartate |
SA27n2952:1028: iyaṁ niḥsaṁśayaṁ sampādakena saṁyujyate - yena ālocaneṣu gṛhītā |
SA27n2952:1033: ati bhāgāḥ santi ye ayatra prāyaśaḥ dṛśyante |
SA27n2952:1034: te iva sarve punaruktimūlakā anucchedā saṁyojanakavalitā iti matam |
SA27n2952:1035: tāntareṇa prācīnatamā anucchedā mūlaṁ tatvaṁ nirdidhanti - yat śiṣyaiḥ budhyate |
SA27n2952:1036: ālocaneṣu saṁvādeṣu vā anyatamasya grahaṇena idaṁ dṛśyate yat nirdiṣṭaparyāye sā śikṣā kīdṛśī āsīt,
SA27n2952:1037: tataśca prācīnopadeśasya uddhṛteḥ tathā punarnimiteḥ praceṣṭhā vicāryate |
SA27n2952:1038: vastutaḥ saṁyojanamūlakā aṁśā mūlaṁ tattvaṁ saṁśodhayituṁ na yatante |
SA27n2952:1041: eṣu saṁvādeṣu sannyāsigrahaṇaphalasutte bauddhadharmopadeśasya pūrṇatamaṁ tātparyaṁ lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:1042: ayaṁ saṁvādaḥ nṛpasya ajātasattoḥ ākhyāne praveśaṁ labhate - yaḥ virodhisampradāyaṣaṭkasya pradhānānāmanusandhānāt paraṁ buddhasyaṁ samīpamupagata iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:1043: tatra buddhasyottaraṁ bauddhasannyāsina unnatiṁ varṇayati - yatra samyag jñānalābhena saha nītibodhasya antardṛṣṭau samādheśa vibhinnāḥ paryāyā varṇitāḥ |
SA27n2952:1044: rājā buddhaṁ pṛcchati - ‘bhavān kimiha jagati sannyāsijīvanasya phalaṁ vyākhyātuṁ śaknoti ?
SA27n2952:1045: ’ kaściddāso gṛhastho vā kevalaṁ jagattyāgena jayati iti suphalaṁ nirdiśan buddhaḥ kasyacid buddhasya samudayaṁ vṛttāntaṁ gṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:1046: kaścit janaḥ tattvaṁ śrutvā buddhe viśvāsaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:1047: sa paśyati yat sa gṛhe yathāyathaṁ dhārmikaṁ jīvanaṁ voḍhuṁ na śaknoti |
SA27n2952:1051: manasvitāṁ tathā jāgarūkatāṁ labdhvā santuṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1052: eṣu vibhāgeṣu ādyasya vistṛtā vyākhyā śīlanāmake'śe labdhvā santuṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1053: eṣu vibhāgeṣu ādyasya vistṛtā vyākhyā śīlanāmake'śe dīyate,
SA27n2952:1056: prāthamikanaitikavidhīnāṁ prathame bhāge yatiḥ prāṇināṁ vadhaṁ tyajati yaṣṭiprayogaṁ churikāprayogaṁ vā na karoti,
SA27n2952:1057: dayāvaśāt sarvebhyaḥ prāṇibhyo hitāya karuṇaya vasati |
SA27n2952:1058: adattavastugrahaṇaṁ parityajya sa kevalaṁ dattaṁ vastu gṛhṇāti icchati ca,
SA27n2952:1060: vyabhicāraṁ parihāya sa sampūrṇaśuddhatāyāṁ vasati mithyātvaṁ parityajya sa satyaṁ vadati |
SA27n2952:1063: viśvastaḥ san janeṣu vāgbhraṣṭho na bhavati |
SA27n2952:1064: apavādaṁ vihāya sa tanna vadati yad ekatra tena śrutaṁ kintu anyatra kalahakāraṇam |
SA27n2952:1072: anarthakavākyaprayogaṁ na kṛtvā sa yathāyathaṁ vadati,
SA27n2952:1074: tasya vākyaṁ smṛtiyogyamudāttaṁ spaṣṭaṁ prasaṅgocitaṁ ca |
SA27n2952:1075: tataḥ sa sannyāsijīvanopayoginaḥ paravarttino bahūn niyamān anusarati |
SA27n2952:1082: sa svarṇaṁ raupyaṁ ca na gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:1086: kraye vikraye ca aṁśaṁ na gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:1087: tatra ca saṁśliṣṭaṁ kimapi duṣṭācāraṁ nāvalambate |
SA27n2952:1096: sa grāmyabhāṣaṇe grāmyakathāyāṁ ca praśrayaṁ na darśayati,
SA27n2952:1099: athavā na jihvānāṁ vañcanāmayadhāraṇāmayaṁ abhyāsaṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:1107: vastuṣu vyaktiṣu jīveṣu ca śubhalakṣaṇānāṁ vyākhyā,
SA27n2952:1114: bauddhasannyāsinā sarvaprakārendriyasukhaṁ tyaktavyamiti kāraṇāt bauddhanītiśāstraṁ sanyāsadharmīti kathyate |
SA27n2952:1116: āsu nītiṣu kevalaṁ sukhaviratau atinyūnaṁ gurutvamarpyate |
SA27n2952:1118: atra kilāparādhaḥ syāditi bodhilābhāt prāk buddhasya bhrāntatapasyāyāḥ varṇanāyāṁ dyotitam |
SA27n2952:1119: nagnasannyāsināṁ sanyāsācaraṇānāṁ pratyāvarttinī sūcī api asti |
SA27n2952:1122: tulanīyam - asmin sutte rāisa ḍebhiḍs kṛtā bhūmikā,
SA27n2952:1125: tadevādhyātmikamanuśīlanam tathā mānasikavinayanaṁ yat samyag jñānāya kalpate eṣu anyatamaṁ khalu viṣayaiśeṣe manaḥsaṁyogasyānuśīlanam yenedamekaniṣṭhatayādhikataraṁ samāhitaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1126: tathā ca śārīrikadaśāṁ yāti yadā cetanakṣetraṁ saṁkīrṇaṁ tīvraṁ ca jāyate |
SA27n2952:1127: tasmin kṣaṇe ca tat vāhyikaprabhāvebhyo vyākṛttaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1128: anena saha pāścātyagūḍhatattvasya tulanā paścāt vakṣyate |
SA27n2952:1129: bauddhasannyāsī yatra indriyapañcakādāśaṅkāmanubhavati tatraiva sa saṁyataḥ san ghaniṣṭhaṁ śarīravyāpāraṁ na lakṣayitvā ṣaṣṭhena indriyadvārā manasā indriyavrittidvāraṁ rakṣatiṁ |
SA27n2952:1130: evaṁ sa lobhāt āśāhīnatvācca rakṣito bhavati |
SA27n2952:1141: evaṁ prātyahikajīvanasya pratyekaṁ karmaṇi sa pūrṇacaitanyavān tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:1142: yathā sa yatnahīnatvāt anucitopāyena karma na karoti |
SA27n2952:1143: tadā sa santuṣṭaḥ san tena saha tasya vasanaṁ bhikṣāpātraṁ ca gṛhṇāti yathā pakṣī gṛhṇāti pakṣayugalam |
SA27n2952:1151: tataḥ bhojanāt paraṁ vyatyastapādo'tha ca daṇḍavat ekacittatayā upaviśati |
SA27n2952:1154: sa tasya cittaṁ lobhāt vidveṣāt ca muñcati,
SA27n2952:1155: prāṇināṁ maṅgalāya karuṇayā uṣitvā sa ālasyāt,
SA27n2952:1165: te vividheṣu viṣayeṣu dhyānasya paddhativaividhyāt jāyante |
SA27n2952:1167: (1) indriyaparāyaṇatā ca mandā cintā cetyābhyāṁ muktaḥ san sannyāsī saharṣasukhasya prathame paryāye vartate |
SA27n2952:1172: tasya śarīrasya na ko'pyaṁśaḥ rahasyaharṣasukhābhyāmaspṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1173: (2) punaśca, tarkānusandhānaviratau satyāṁ nirdiṣṭe lakṣye samāhitamanasā āntarikapraśāntadaśāyāṁ sa samādhijaharṣasukhayoḥ dvitīyaṁ paryāyaṁ yāti |
SA27n2952:1178: tasya śarīrasya na ko'pyaṁśaḥ anenāspṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1179: (3) punaśca, harṣe dveṣe ca samavṛttitvāt sa manasvī tathā caitanyavān san sukhānubhavaṁ karoti - eṣāvasthā samavṛttitayā manasvitayā sukhena cāvasthitiriti buddhaiḥ kathyate |
SA27n2952:1180: asmin kṣaṇe sa harṣahīnasukhena āpluto bhavati |
SA27n2952:1183: (4) punaśca, sukhaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca vihāya harṣaviṣādayoḥ tirobhāvāt prāk sa duḥkhasukhaśūnyaṁ samādheḥ caturtha paryāyaṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:1184: tatra ekacittāgatā viśuddhiḥ samavṛttitā ca tiṣṭhataḥ |
SA27n2952:1188: sannyāsī etadavadhi tasya cittaṁ hṛdayaṁ ca paripunīte |
SA27n2952:1189: tathā ca, prakṛtasatyānubhavaṁ prati cālitaḥ san yatnena vinayanaṁ nirvahati |
SA27n2952:1191: sa tasya manoyogaṁ jñānaṁ tathā antardṛṣṭiṁ prati samāhitena,
SA27n2952:1200: tasya bodho jāyate - idaṁ sākāraṁ me śarīraṁ,
SA27n2952:1208: tataḥ sa mānasaṁ śarīraṁ sraṣṭuṁ tasya manoyogaṁ prerayati |
SA27n2952:1209: asya śarīrāt sa mānasaṁ śarīraṁ sṛjati yasya ākāro'sti,
SA27n2952:1220: sa svahastābhyāṁ śaktimantaṁ candraṁ sūryaṁ ca spṛśati |
SA27n2952:1222: śucīkṛtadivyakarṇena sa dūre nikaṭe vā sarvatra divyaṁ mānuṣaṁ ca śabdaṁ śṛṇoti |
SA27n2952:1223: sa anyeṣāṁ jīvānāṁ mānasikīṁ daśāṁ boddhu śaknoti |
SA27n2952:1229: sa jānāti yat asmin sthāne sa etannāmaka etajjātikaścāsīt |
SA27n2952:1230: pratyekaṁ janami tasya etā abhijñatā abhavan,
SA27n2952:1231: jīvanakāla etādṛśa āsīditi ca sa jānāti |
SA27n2952:1232: (2) sa satvānāṁ mṛtyostathā punarjanmanaḥ jñāne'pi manaḥsaṁyogaṁ sādhayati,
SA27n2952:1233: divyayā śucīkṛtayā ca dṛṣṭyā sa narakasthān pāpinaḥ svargasthān dhārmikān ca paśyati,
SA27n2952:1234: yathā prāsādasthaḥ janaḥ tān janān paśyati ye nimnasthaṁ gṛhaṁ praviśanti,
SA27n2952:1236: (3) tataḥ sa ‘idaṁ duḥkham’ ‘idaṁ duḥkhakāraṇam’ ‘idaṁ duḥkhanirodhaḥ’ ‘idaṁ ca duḥkhanirodhamārgaḥ’ iti |
SA27n2952:1238: yadā sa evaṁ jānāti evaṁ ca paśyati,
SA27n2952:1245: kartavyaṁ kṛtam atikrāntaṁ viśvātiriktaṁ kiñcit nāsti |
SA27n2952:1246: idaṁ sāmānyataḥ svīkriyate yat adhunā yā parikalpanā dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:1247: sā vistāraṁ prāpnoti naitikadoṣāṇāṁ tathā vividhasamādhibhedānāṁ sūcyāṁ kila saṁyojanaṁ sādhitam |
SA27n2952:1248: tathāpi ya parikalpanādhunā vartate sā prācīneva dṛśyate tatra kati vikāśā na santi,
SA27n2952:1249: ye paravartinīṣu kṛtiṣu santi yathā buddhaghoṣasya visuddhamagge |
SA27n2952:1254: yataḥ te buddhena antime nirvāṇe'rjitā iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:1255: yataḥ vinayanāṅgatvena te prācīnatareṣu vivaraṇeṣu na dṛśyante,
SA27n2952:1256: te kila mūlataḥ svādhīnāstathā samādheḥ sadṛśāḥ kecit niyamā āsan |
SA27n2952:1258: ebhiḥ saha aṣṭau athavā nava lābhā api puṣṭiṁ yanti |
SA27n2952:1262: vicitraṁ pratyakṣaṁ nānubhūya saḥ ‘asīmaṁ caitya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
SA27n2952:1263: tathā ca sa caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyaṁ labdhvā tatra vasati |
SA27n2952:1264: (2) sampūrṇataḥ deśasyāsīmaṁ paryāyamatikramya saḥ ‘asīmaṁ caitanya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
SA27n2952:1265: tathā ca sa caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyaṁ labdhvā tatra vasati |
SA27n2952:1266: (3) sampūrṇataḥ caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyamatikramya sa ‘sarvaṁ śūnya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
SA27n2952:1267: tathā ca sa śūnyatvasya paryāya labdhvā tatra vasati |
SA27n2952:1268: (4) sampūrṇataḥ śūnyatvasya paryāyamatikramya sa na caitanyaṁ labhate na vā labhate'caitanyam |
SA27n2952:1270: idameva sāmānyaṁ mataṁ yat samādheranuśīlanaṁ yogadarśanādādīyate |
SA27n2952:1273: ākhyāneṣu kathyate yat buddha ālārakālāmaḥ ca rāmaputraḥ uddakaśceti ācāryayugalāt adhīte sa |
SA27n2952:1274: kintu asmābhiravagataṁ yat prathama ācāryaḥ samādhilābhāya śūnyatvasya paryāyaṁ yāvat upagataḥ dvitīya ācāryaḥ na caitanyasya na vā'caitanyasya paryāyamupagataḥ |
SA27n2952:1276: atrānumānāya na kāpi yuktistiṣṭhati yat tat ākhyānaṁ śikṣakayugalaviṣayakaṁ yathārthaṁ tathyam ullikhati |
SA27n2952:1277: tau buddhena dharmapracārāt prāk divaṁ gatau |
SA27n2952:1281: dvayorudbhavasya prasaṅge kācit sākṣāttulanā na iṣyate |
SA27n2952:1282: kintu bauddhasāhityapāṭhāt lakṣyate yat samādheranuśīlanaṁ mūlataḥ na bauddhadarśanagatam |
SA27n2952:1284: bauddhānuśīlanasya yogasya madhye sādṛśyasyādhikaro gurutvapūrṇo heturevaṁ yat dvividhe darśane pārśvāpārśvi vikaśite'bhavatām |
SA27n2952:1285: na kevalaṁ tulanā cānukṛtiśca kintu kasyāpi sampradāyasya sadasyaḥ anyaṁ sampradāyaṁ gantuṁ tathā tasya paddhatiṁ grahītuṁ samartho'bhavat sambhavataḥ pratipakṣadarśanaprabhāvāt bauddhapaddhatau asāmānyādhyātmikaśaktigrahaṇasya antarbhuktiṁ paśyāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:1288: kintu tāḥ śaktayo vidyanurūpānuśīlanasya svābhāvikyaḥ pariṇatayaḥ eva |
SA27n2952:1289: paravartibauddharacanāsu ete viṣayāḥ suspaṣṭā abhavan tatra tat saṁkrāntau dvau suvyaktau upāyau dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:1290: ekataḥ, aviśvāsināṁ dharmāntarīkaraṇāya sākṣyatvena alaukikakarmādipradarśanasya pravaṇatā jāyate |
SA27n2952:1291: yathā lakṣyate kassapatrayasya dharmāntarīkaraṇākhyāne tathā kapilāvatyunagare buddhakṛtālaukikakarmamūlakākhyāne |
SA27n2952:1292: sa prāyeṇa kasyacit śiṣyasya sāhāyyārthaṁ vāvadhānārthaṁ vātmanaḥ mānasīṁ mūrtiṁ preṣayituṁ varṇayati |
SA27n2952:1293: athavā saḥ anyeṣāṁ manogataṁ vacanaṁ paṭhati iti dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:1295: āsāṁ śaktīnāmarjanaṁ na paramapurṣārthamukhi iti anyatrāvamatam |
SA27n2952:1296: yadyapi nānāvidhā arhataḥ puruṣāḥ vibhinnamātrākrameṇa alaukikaśaktimarjayanti,
SA27n2952:1297: tathāpi buddhaḥ svayaṁ tāsāṁ śatīnāṁ prayogāya tasya śiṣyān niṣiṣedha iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:1298: kaścid abauddho'pi tasya pūrvajanmanaḥ jñānaṁ labdhuṁ śaknoti,
SA27n2952:1299: kintu upalabdheḥ jāḍyatvāt sa kevalaṁ catvāriṁśaccakrāṇi smartumarhati iti buddhaghoṣeṇoktam |
SA27n2952:1300: mahālisaṁvāde buddhaḥ divyarūpadarśanasya divyadhvaniśravaṇasya ca śaktiṁ varṇayāmāsa,
SA27n2952:1301: kintu ‘samādhyabhyāsopalabdhaye sannyāsinaḥ mahā saha dhārmikaṁ jīvanaṁ nānusaranti |
SA27n2952:1302: ’ dīghanikāye ca majjhimanikāye ca samādhyabhyāsasya pradhānaṁ sthānaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1303: kintu uccatamagūḍhadaśāpakṣatā kevalaṁ paddhatiḥ iti nanumīyate |
SA27n2952:1304: sā daśā kenāpi prakāreṇa na lakṣyībhūtā,
SA27n2952:1306: asmin jīvane eva hṛdayasya antardṛṣṭeśca muktaye sahāyikāpi |
SA27n2952:1307: ‘vipassin’ - buddhasya prathamajīvanasyākhyāne - yatra mukhyā ghaṭanāḥ gotamasya ghaṭanānāṁ samānāḥ - tasya janmani siddhādeśa dvātriṁśaccihnaiḥ tribhiḥ prasādaiḥ,
SA27n2952:1309: kintu vipasminaḥ bodhilābhe kutrāpi viśiṣṭā gūḍhā paddhatirnāsti |
SA27n2952:1311: tathā ca, pratyekasambandhāvasānajñānena dṛṣṭiśca jñānaṁ ca jāyete sma |
SA27n2952:1312: bauddhagūḍhatattvānuśīlane tatprakāreṇa adhikataraṁ sādṛśyaṁ vartate yatra bhagavatā saha milanasya lakṣyaṁ varṇyate |
SA27n2952:1313: paravartī prakāraḥ vremaṇḍamahābhāgena vyākhyātaḥ - yatra sampūrṇataḥ kyātholikadṛṣṭibhaṅgījātāni sāmānyāni vaiśiṣṭyāni pratiphalitāni |
SA27n2952:1314: sa taṁ vyāpāraṁ svabhāvajabhāvatvena varṇayati yaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratipūrvam akasmāt cetanamanaso nimne'vasthitena ādhyātmikasāmagrīgrāheṇa nirdiṣṭān prāṇān cālayati tadadhyātmaṁ vastu bahuṣu ekam,
SA27n2952:1318: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ prāyeṇa bauddhagūḍhattvena saha prayojyaḥ |
SA27n2952:1322: ḍaḥ ema. va-hana mahābhāgenocyate yat ekaśca sarvaśca sākṣāt tatkṣaṇāt ca paramatattvopalabdhaye sarvagrāsinyākāṅkṣayā gṛhyete |
SA27n2952:1324: teṣāṁ lakṣyamupagantuṁ te niyataṁ sahajadivyasambhāvanāsamūhaṁ jāgarayanti yadā bahyikasatyāt sampūrṇaviviktatayā yathārthaviśrāmadaśāyāṁ manaḥ niviśyate |
SA27n2952:1327: yatra manoyogaḥ kasmiṁścidvastuni āvaddhastiṣṭhati tatra ca āvegīyaparivarttanena saha caitanyasya saṁkīrṇatā atha ca sutīvratā sahagāminī tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1332: bauddhaḥ na kimapi vāhyikaṁ sāhāyyaṁ svīkaroti |
SA27n2952:1333: sa īśvara iti yadvastu jānāti tadapekṣayā uccataraṁ sthānaṁ sa upagata iti sa svayaṁ viśvasiti |
SA27n2952:1336: tathā ca saḥ arhataḥ daśāṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:1337: sannyāsinādhunā yā daśā prāptā saiva aparā taṭī,
SA27n2952:1338: mṛtyuvihīnā arthāt sthāyinī dhruvā vā sthitiḥ nirvāṇābhidheyā |
SA27n2952:1340: nirvāpaṇaṁ na viśeṣeṇa bauddhaḥ asya prayogaśca tathā dhāraṇayā parivartate yāṁ pratyekaṁ dharmasampradāyaḥ manuṣyasya paramapuruṣārthatvena paripoṣayati |
SA27n2952:1345: tṛṣṇāyā ākāṅkṣāyā muktaḥ vānāsaktaḥ san sannyāsī atrādhunā cātardṛṣṭyā mṛtyuvihīnāṁ śāntiṁ yāti - yaiva parivarttanarahitā nirvāṇadaśā |
SA27n2952:1346: nirvāṇaṁ vyaktiviluptiriti matasya vicāreṇa prayojanaṁ nāsti |
SA27n2952:1347: mūlagrantheṣu asya matasya samarthanaṁ na prāpyate |
SA27n2952:1348: tathāpi prakṛtārthasya pracuraṁ sākṣyaṁ vartate - iha jīvane ākāṅkṣānivṛttiḥ |
SA27n2952:1352: evaṁ saṁvāde indhanasyopari - tasyākāṅkṣā vardhate ya indhanopayogivastuṣu bhogasyānveṣaṇaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:1365: kaścana naraśca tatra kāle kāle śuṣkāṇi tṛṇāni gomayāni kāṣṭhāni ca nikṣipati,
SA27n2952:1366: tathā ca sa vṛhadagnipuñjaḥ dīrghaṁ kālaṁ tadindhanaiḥ jvalayanneva tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1367: yo jana indhanopayogivastuṣu duḥkhaṁ paśyaṁstiṣṭhati tasyākāṅkṣā viramati |
SA27n2952:1371: janmanā ca saha jarā ca mṛtyuśca na jāyate |
SA27n2952:1382: tathā ca so'gnipuñjaḥ sarvendhanānāṁ dahanāt paraṁ tadabhāvāt punaḥ na jvalati,
SA27n2952:1384: evameva yo jana indhanatulyavastuṣu durdaśaṁ cintayannāste tasyākāṅkṣāyā nivṛttirjāyate,
SA27n2952:1386: evameva sarveṣāṁ nivṛttau satyāṁ duḥkhasyāpi nivṛttiḥ sādhitā |
SA27n2952:1387: atra sūkṣmataraḥ kaścit praśno jāyate iha jīvane nirvāṇalābhāt paraṁ mṛtyau sati kiṁ bhavatīti |
SA27n2952:1388: dharmagrantheṣu vacaneṣu ca niścayenāsyottarasya sandhānam asambhavam |
SA27n2952:1390: kintu tatra tatpaddhatiṁ paśyāmaḥ yayā rītyā tadīyāḥ śiṣyāḥ tasyopadeśārthaṁ gṛhītavantaḥ |
SA27n2952:1391: olḍenavārgamahodayena saṁgṛhīteṣu anucchedeṣu ullekhārhaṁ tadeva vaiśiṣṭyam yat dharmagrantheṣu api atigurutvavahāni vacanāni buddhasya svakīyavacanatvena na gṛhyante,
SA27n2952:1393: tatra te svīyānumānānāṁ vaśyatāṁ gatā iti dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:1394: sannyāsī māluṅkyaputtaḥ buddhaṁ kati praśnān papraccheti ucyate |
SA27n2952:1395: tatra anyatamaḥ praśnaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ kaścit tathātastiṣṭhati na veti |
SA27n2952:1396: buddhaḥ taduttaraṁ na svīcakāra arthāt mṛtyoḥ paraṁ sa tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:1399: so'stitvavān na veti viṣaye sa nīrava āsīt |
SA27n2952:1403: yata idaṁ dharmīyajīvanasya suphaleṣu pravaṇatāṁ na darśayati |
SA27n2952:1411: bhagavatā idaṁ na vyākhyātamiti dṛṣṭibhaṅgī sarveṣu anucchedeṣu tadviṣayamadhikṛtya vartate |
SA27n2952:1413: etādṛgekaḥ saṁvādaḥ sannyāsinīṁ khemāṁ rājānaṁ pasenadimavalambya tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1414: sā tasya sarveṣāṁ praśnānāṁ pratyuttaraṁ dadāti ‘bhagavatā na vyākhyātamiti |
SA27n2952:1419: api te ko'pi gaṇakaḥ yo gaṅgāyā sikatāḥ gaṇayitumarhati ?
SA27n2952:1424: ’ ‘api te gaṇayitāsti yaḥ samudrasya jalaṁ parimātuṁ samarthaḥ ?
SA27n2952:1425: sa iyatparimāṇaṁ samudrajalamityevaṁ kiṁ vā vaktuṁ śaknoti ?
SA27n2952:1436: śarīrabhūtopādheḥ muktaḥ tathāgataḥ samudra iva gabhīraḥ aparimeyo'talaśca |
SA27n2952:1437: ’ idaṁ vyaktijanasya apareṣu caturṣu upādāneṣu punarāvṛttaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1438: atra tathāgatasya prasaṁge praśno'sau varṇitaḥ kintu paravartī dṛṣṭāntaḥ darśayati yat idaṁ nirvāṇaprāptasya yasya kasyāpi janasya kṣetre prayujyate |
SA27n2952:1439: ekaḥ śiṣyaḥ yamakaḥ nāstikamakaṁ racayati sma yat sa bhagavadupadiṣṭatattvam upalabdhavān |
SA27n2952:1440: tatra sannyāsī taccharīranāśāt param ‘āsavas’-muktaḥ san nāśaṁ gacchati,
SA27n2952:1443: sāriputtaḥ taṁ pṛcchati - kiṁ tathāgataḥ śarīram ?
SA27n2952:1448: athavā kiṁ sa tebhyaḥ upādānebhyaḥ vahiḥ kaścit viṣayaḥ ?
SA27n2952:1450: sāriputtaścāha - iha jīvane kaścit tathāgataḥ satyena tattvena ca na budhyate |
SA27n2952:1451: ata eva tasya ko'pyadhikāro nāsti tat vaktuṁ,
SA27n2952:1452: yat sannyāsī taccharīranāśena saha āsavasmuktaḥ san ucchidyate,
SA27n2952:1455: ucchedavirodhi suspaṣṭaṁ vacanaṁ niścayena udānagranthasya sāmpratikaṁ saṅkalanam |
SA27n2952:1480: kintu idaṁ na kaṁcana itivācakaṁ bodhaṁ sūcayati |
SA27n2952:1481: vayañca paravarttiṣu milindapraśneṣu netivācakavyākhyānasya prāvaṇyaṁ paśyāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:1482: - khandhānāṁ sampūrṇāyāṁ nivṛttau varttamānasya mūlasya nirvāpaṇena bhagavān nirvāṇaṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:1484: tasya ca nirdeśaḥ asambhavaḥ itthambhūtena vacanena |
SA27n2952:1487: kintu sa tasya tattvasya śarīre lakṣyate,
SA27n2952:1489: atra nirvāṇasya yaḥ prakāro varṇitaḥ sa ṭīkākāraiḥ sṛṣṭasya nirvāṇayugalasya pārthakyaṁ sūcayati,
SA27n2952:1490: bodhivṛkṣasyādhaḥ mṛtyāvapi ca buddhaḥ nirvāṇaṁ prāptavānitirtaivyākhyātam |
SA27n2952:1491: idaṁ kevalaṁ pūrvatanaṁ vyākhyānaṁ yat prācīnatameṣu grantheṣu nirdeśitaṁ yasmin samaye na kimapi pārthakyaṁ sūcitam |
SA27n2952:1493: paṭhāmaḥ - bodhilābhasya mārgeṣu ye teṣāṁ manāṁsi sampūrṇataḥ yathāyathaṁ vinayanena siddhāni kurvanti,
SA27n2952:1494: harṣalagnā na santaḥ te kiñcidapi na gṛhṇanti,
SA27n2952:1499: arhatvalābhe mālinyacakraparityāge ca kintu upādyavaśeṣeṇa saha varṇitaḥ (arthāt khandhasamūhaḥ-yaḥ vyaktitvena taṁ nirmāti) |
SA27n2952:1505: yadi kutrāpi itivācakaṁ vacanaṁ lakṣyate tarhi buddhānāṁ śiṣyāṇāṁ harṣonmattavacaneṣu tadvayamāśaṁsema |
SA27n2952:1506: kiṇtu ayaṁ hi sannyāsinīviṣayaka padyānāmatīva samānubhūtiśīlena vyākhyākāreṇa kṛtaḥ siddhāntaḥ |
SA27n2952:1508: itivācakaṁ vā netivācakaṁ vā kālocitaṁ paramānandaṁ pratīkṣituṁ kadāpi preritā na bhavati |
SA27n2952:1509: idaṁ bhavitumarhati yat kathaṁ te'mṛtamayaṁ mārgam - amataṁ padaṁ - nivvānaṁ jayanti,
SA27n2952:1510: spṛśanti ca iti paramānandaṁ prapañcayantaste kati daśā ullikhanti sma - yā daśā acintanīyā anirvacanīyāśca |
SA27n2952:1511: - yadā ekaḥa apare ca jīvanasya prasaṁge dhāraṇāyāṁ ca sīmitāḥ |
SA27n2952:1513: na vā deśavarttī daśāviśeṣo jāyate yo'vaśyameva gauravamayasya paramānandamayasya ca aihikajīvanasya pariṇatiṁ viracayati |
SA27n2952:1518: manuṣyāṇāṁ sāmājikamācaraṇaṁ tathā pratiṣṭhānamavaśyakaraṇīyatvena kiñcit prakāśayati yatra buddhakṛtaduḥkhaviśleṣaṇasya kendrīyo bhāvo vidyate |
SA27n2952:1520: sa tādṛśairbalairjīvati yeṣāṁ paricayastaṁ nikaṣā tamasāvṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:1522: vyaktitvena yāvanna sa svādhīnaṁ yatnaśīlo bhavati tāvat sāmājikācaraṇād vahiḥ sa jīvati,
SA27n2952:1523: ata eva saṁskṛteḥ sthapatitvena nirmātṛtvena ca sa kevalaṁ svīyanigaḍasambandhisāmājikaprakṣepaṇaṁ parikalpituṁ sraṣṭhuṁ cārhati |
SA27n2952:1524: yasmai jīvāya buddhena samyag jñānamupahṛtaṁ tamāvegatāḍitaṁ jīvamadhikṛtyāsmākaṁ bhūmikā viracyate - yāparisīmaṁ gabhīraṁ gatā tathā ca anayā sāmājikyā mātrayā sākaṁ vistṛtiṁ prāptā |
SA27n2952:1527: sācetanā tanhānāmadheyā kaṭhorā praṇodanā samājāya tajjīvanaśaīlīṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:1528: sarvatra manuṣyaḥ tasya sāṁskṛtimādarśaṁ sṛjati avadhānahīnatayeva vaṁśānukrameṇa preṣayati ca |
SA27n2952:1529: yadutpattau bālāt kṛtā pravarttanā mukhyato vartate yayā naraḥ sacetanamānasasyātinimnadeśe'vasthitebhyaḥ paryāyebhyaḥ uapahārībhūto jāyate |
SA27n2952:1530: buddhasyopadeśeṣu samājasthamanuṣyasya sampūrṇapraśnabahulacaritrasya viśleṣaṇena saha sāmājikaguṇadoṣavivecanasya viṣayā lakṣyante |
SA27n2952:1531: atra vayametaiḥ viṣayaiḥ saha sambandhitā bhavāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:1532: vayaṁ saṁskṛteḥ sraṣṭrā manuṣyeṇa saha sambandhitāḥ so'paraiḥ naraiḥ saha ādarśān sṛjati tathā ca sāmājikādānapradānasūtreṇa vaṁśaparamparayā tān preṣayati |
SA27n2952:1533: vayaṁ manuṣyasyāsyaitādṛśyā sthityā saha yuktāḥ manuṣyaḥ preṣitajīvarūpeṇa yugaśakteracetanapreṣaṇabalena vasan avaśyameva samāje tasya praśnātmakaviṣayān gṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:1534: tān viṣayānavalambya prakṛtaśaktīnāṁ mātrāṁ na jñātvaiva vibhinnaṁ karma sādhayati tathā ca tābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ saṁgrāmaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:1535: manuṣyasya saṁskṛteśca madhye vicchinnatādharmitāmadhikṛtya buddhasyopadeśeṣu yattiṣṭhati tadapekṣayā adhikataraniścitadoṣanirṇayo bhūmaṇḍalasya kutrāpi na sādhitaḥ |
SA27n2952:1538: pratyekaṁ jīvaḥ jīvanasya adhikataramaṁśaṁ vyāpya kāryakāraṇanirdeśena bhrāntipūrṇabhāvena cālito bhavati |
SA27n2952:1539: mānavavyaktitvaṁ samājikasaṁsthāna cetyanayormadhye'svastijanakavirodhasyopaśamāya eteṣūpadeśeṣu kāpi sambhāvanā pratiśrūyate |
SA27n2952:1540: vyaktistathā tasya saṁskṛtiriti dvayormadhye svabhāvajaṁ vicchinnatvaṁ buddhakṛtapradhānāviṣkāreṣu anyatamam |
SA27n2952:1542: mānavīyācaraṇasya sāmājikamādhyātmikaṁ ca yad vyākhyānaṁ tasya kṣetraṁ sarvatra mahatāṁ viduṣāṁ manāṁsi ākarṣati |
SA27n2952:1543: etat teṣu sthāneṣu saphalamākramaṇaṁ varṇayati yatrai-kadā mānavamanorājye'vidyā'dhyāsaḥ kūṭārthakathā ca spardhāśūnyatvena śasanaṁ cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:1544: anenaiva vipulaparimāṇaṁ tathyaṁ vijñāpitaṁ yena vayaṁ jānīmaḥ mānavaḥ yat karoti tat kimarthaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:1545: asya pradhāneṣu avadāneṣu anyatamaṁ nāma mānavasaṁskṛteḥ vardhamānaṁ jñānam,
SA27n2952:1546: sāmājikapratikriyāṇāṁ gahano vinyāsaḥ yo vaṁśāt vaṁśabhāraṁ preṣito bhavati sāmājikakriyāpratikriyābhireva |
SA27n2952:1548: gabhīratamasamudravāsī ko'pi janaḥ yasmin jale nirantaraṁ magnastiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:1550: tathā ca sa tadaiva prathamam ātmano'stitvamāviṣkaroti yadā kathamapi samudratalādutthāya tasya upari vṛhat parimaṇḍalaṁ draṣṭumāgacchati - ityucyate |
SA27n2952:1552: pṛthak pṛthak saṁskṛtiṁ parīkṣya sarvāsāṁ saṁskṛtīnāṁ saṁskāraśakteḥ viṣaye pūrṇataḥ nūtanaṁ pariprekṣitamasmābhiḥ labdham |
SA27n2952:1554: ata eva mānavajīvavyāpisamājasvīkṛtamādhyamamūlake'smākaṁ jñāne karmakāṇḍasya mātrā asmābhiḥ pravarttitā |
SA27n2952:1555: tathāpi, atīva nirbharayogyaṁ jñānamapi taṁ viṣayaṁ pidhātuṁ yatate yo viṣayaḥ tajjñāne na antabhūtaḥ,
SA27n2952:1556: viśeṣataḥ vahirbhūto viṣayo yadāsmākamanumānaiḥ saha asaṁvaddhastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1558: mānavavyaktitvasya sāṁskṛtikavidyāsu yā karmaviṣayakatārjitā sā sāmānyena atiśayoktipūrṇā |
SA27n2952:1559: tathā ca, sāmājikādhyātmikavyākhyānakṣetraṁ pūrvānumānaiḥ sahānanvitān praśnān vihāya ādhuniko naraḥ navenāthacāpariṇatena padārthenopeta iti varṇayati yena vicitraparihārapravṛttistathānujike kṣetre vijñānasyāpragatiḥ saṁskṛtiviṣayakakālpanikamatanirmāṇāya prasaṁgatāṁ ganturmahati |
SA27n2952:1561: atredaṁ dṛśyate yatkena prakāreṇa vyaktivargaḥ samājasya kaniṣṭhān sabhyān sādhayituṁ pratyekasamājadvāraiḥ abhijñatāṁ sañcinoti,
SA27n2952:1562: yena te vibhinnajātīyasaṁskṛteḥ prāṇavanmūrttitvena paripakvatām arjayanti |
SA27n2952:1563: pṛthivī nāma eṣāṁ vibhinnānāṁ tathā prāyeṇa dvandvavatāṁ sāmājikakarūpāṇāṁ paśupakṣisaṁgrahaśalā |
SA27n2952:1566: pālayanti tathā ca jīvanasya ativicitravān pathaḥ kulāt kulāntaraṁ preṣayanti |
SA27n2952:1567: pāścātyanṛvidyāvidāṁ mate narāḥ sāmājikīnāmavasthānāṁ vismayakaraparimaṇḍanle santoṣajanakatayā vāsaṁ kartuṁ samarthā iti pratibhāti |
SA27n2952:1568: ḍovuyānsaṁskṛtimatāṁ janānāṁ sāmājike caritre śaṁkā pratiśaṁkā ca iti dve pradhāne lakṣaṇe vartete,
SA27n2952:1569: yadā niuginideśasya paratāñcale saṁskṛteḥ madhye dayāparāyaṇatāyāstatvaṁ sṛṣṭam |
SA27n2952:1570: valideśīyajaneṣu anyamanaskatāyāstathā jīvanāt mṛdupalāyanasya bhāvaḥ sarvatra lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:1571: ‘manusānāṁ’ madhye sāṁskṛtikādarśena saha saṁgatisampannā janāḥ teṣāṁ prativeśināṁ viruddhe karkaśatamāyāṁ pratiyogitāyāṁ samarthāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ,
SA27n2952:1572: yadā vriṭiśakalambiyādeśasya koyākiutlbhāratīyāḥ teṣāṁ sampattiṁ visṛjya padaṁ jayanti |
SA27n2952:1573: āsu saṁskṛtiṣu pratyekaṁ parivartanaśīlamātrābhiḥ antarvartinīmuttejanāmāśāśūnyatāṁ ca prakāśayati,
SA27n2952:1575: kintu janāḥ prāyeṇa yat karttumucyate tadapekṣayā hatāśayā saha saṁgatiṁ sthāpayitumadhikataraṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:1576: tathā ca pratyekasaṁskṛtau vividhasāmājikabhūmikānārdubodhyaḥ jaṭilaśca vinyāsaḥ asti |
SA27n2952:1579: āsu sarvāsu saṁskṛtiṣu mukhyajīvanaśailīṁ paritaḥ dalabaddhā vibhinnatāstathādhāratāstiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1580: evañca, kathaṁprakāreṇa parivarttitadaśāyā ālokena manuṣyavyaktitvaṁ purātanasyādarśasya punardhāraṇāya rūpāntarīkaraṇāya vismayakaram upāyodbhāvanasāmarthyaṁ darśayati |
SA27n2952:1581: ebhyo nṛtattasammataviśleṣaṇebhyaḥ ayaṁ prāyeṇa durnivāraḥ siddhānto bhavati yat aparasaṁskṛtisaṁkrāntajñānaṁ sarvatra bādhyatāmūlakāsaṁgasya jayāya narebhyaḥ sāmarthyam arpayati |
SA27n2952:1582: ādhunikasamājāgamāt prāk sañcāravyavasthāyā vikiraṇaśīlābhiḥ paṁktibhiḥ saha pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ sampūrṇatamasambhāvanāprakāśāya āpekṣikatayānākulībhūtā āsīt yāḥ sambhāvanāḥ samāje svakīyajīvanaśailīkṣetre'tīva gurutvapūrṇāḥ |
SA27n2952:1583: purā jātigataṁ bhāṣāgataṁ sampradāyagataṁ ca ekākitvaṁ tathā vicchinnatvaṁ vibhinnasaṁskṛtimūlakābhiyānārthaṁ mānavajātiṁ samarthāṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:1585: adhunā viśiṣṭalakṣasṇānvitā pṛthakprakārāḥ saṁskṛtayaḥ prāṇavatāṁ vaṁśānāmabhijñatāyāṁ parasparādānapradānarūpaṁ karma kurvanti |
SA27n2952:1586: adhunā sā vicchinnatā pūrvapuruṣānukramāt tirohitā bhavati,
SA27n2952:1587: yena pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ anyāsāṁ sarvāsāṁ saṁskṛtīnāmupariṁ parasparanirbharaśīlatāsūtreṇābaddhā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1588: vayaṁ paśyāmo yat saṁskṛtimān prāṇī naraḥ svīyasaṁskṛtyā sahaiva anyābhiḥ saṁskṛtibhiḥ samamapi nūtanaṁ sambandhaṁ niścayena sthāpayati |
SA27n2952:1589: pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ adhunā avaśyameva bodhasya sahanaśīlatāyāśca mātrāmanubhavati yayā saṁskṛtiḥ adhunā avaśyameva bodhasya sahanaśīlatāyāśca mātrāmanubhavati yayā saṁskṛtiḥ jīvanaśailīmanusarttuṁ samarthā bhavati,
SA27n2952:1591: teṣu praśneṣu sahayogitāṁ karoti yaiḥ praśnaiḥ sarveṣāṁ jīvanayātrā vipadgrastā bhavati |
SA27n2952:1592: saṁskṛtiṁ tathā vyaktitvamadhikṛtya pāścātyavidyāsu kalpanāsamṛddhāḥ yā dhāraṇāḥ kriyante tā viśeṣeṇa gārḍanāra mārphiṇā varṇitāḥ |
SA27n2952:1596: yā vyaktiḥ mānavatāyā śūddhodāharaṇatvena asmākamabhyantare eva ādimapratidhvanimukharaṁ kiñcid udbhāvayati |
SA27n2952:1599: yasya viṣayamavalambya asmākaṁ yāntrikaṁ yugaṁ kiñcidvaktuṁ dvidhā karoti - manuṣyasyānyonyaprītiparāyaṇatā |
SA27n2952:1600: idaṁ ādhunikamānavasya anyatamaṁ priyaṁ kālpanikaṁ jagat |
SA27n2952:1601: adhunā tasya dṛṣṭiḥ divyanagaranirmāṇāya vijñānasya dṛṣṭiḥ |
SA27n2952:1602: eṣā iuropamahādeśasya aṣṭādaśaśatakīyadārśanikānāṁ dṛṣṭyapekṣayā na mūlataḥ svatantrā |
SA27n2952:1603: saṁskṛtimān jīvaḥ manuṣyaḥ pṛthivyāṁ sarvatra tasya praśnānāṁ samādhānāya abhinavasāṁskṛtikādarśamāviṣkartuṁ tasya sṛṣṭiśīlāṁ pratibhāṁ prakāśayati |
SA27n2952:1604: sa peṣaṇaśīlām ākāṅkṣāṁ pūrṇāṁ kartuṁ tasya karmaṇi navajīvanaśailīmāviṣkaroti sa vartamānāyāṁ śailyāmapi parivartanaṁ sādhayati yadi sā śailī tasya lābhāya sukhāya ca anupayuktā bhavet |
SA27n2952:1605: so'dhunā pṛthivyā āśleṣaratāṁ kācidabhinavāṁ saṁskṛtiṁ sraṣṭuṁ tatparaḥ jāyate,
SA27n2952:1607: eṣā svapnilāśā sāṁskṛtikī vaicitryagatātivistīrṇānuṣaṅgikaviṣayaiḥ pṛṣṭhapoṣakatāṁ prāpnoti,
SA27n2952:1610: asmākaṁ pakṣe prayojanīyāṁ karmaviṣayakatāmanāsaktiṁ ca sraṣṭuṁ asmākaṁ saṁskṛtisaṁkramaṇaṁ pāṇḍityaṁ viśvaviṣayakaṁ jñānaṁ ca sambhavataḥ na paryāptam |
SA27n2952:1611: asyāṁ daśāyāṁ samājasaṁkrāntā manastattvasammatā ca gaveṣaṇā anirdeśakaparamarthakauśalaṁ nirdiśati,
SA27n2952:1612: yat narān teṣāmabhijñatayā svādhīnasaṁlāpāya samarthān karoti |
SA27n2952:1613: pariṇāmo bhavati - sāmājikācaraṇasya vādhyatāyāṁ ca pratyuttarāṇāṁ saṁskṛtigatapravāhe ca te adhikatarasvāsthyavantaḥ bhavanti |
SA27n2952:1614: adhunā asmākaṁ manaścikitsāsti yā vyaktigatasaṁgatividhānāya sāhāyyaṁ karoti evaṁkaraṇāya sā cikitsā garvabhāvaṁ dūrīkaroti |
SA27n2952:1615: sāmājikaspṛhāyā nimnaparyāye jīvanaṁ laghu kṛtvā paśyati |
SA27n2952:1617: vayaṁ viśvāsāya yuktāḥ paśyāma yat viruddheṣu virodhaḥ ca bādhyabādhakatvasya tīkṣṇatamā dhārā ca atikathanena sahanaśīlatāṁ vrajati,
SA27n2952:1618: yena janāḥ sāmuyela vekeṭaracitanāṭakāmanyatame yathā abhinayaṁ kurvanti,
SA27n2952:1624: vijñānasya śilpakalāvidyāyāśca ete udyamāḥ saṁskṛteḥ samagraṁ parisaraṁ niyantraṇasya adhīnaṁ kartumatīvakaṭhinapraśnān pariharanti |
SA27n2952:1625: te prāyeṇa kimapi tathyaṁ na prasuvate |
SA27n2952:1626: tathā hi - kena hetunā janānāṁ pakṣe saṁskṛtisambandhīyādarśaparivartanamatīvāsambhavam ?
SA27n2952:1627: yadā prāyeṇa pratyekaṁ janaḥ paśyati yat ayameva durgatiparihārāyādvitīyaḥ panthā iti |
SA27n2952:1628: kathaṁ vā saṁskṛtiḥ parivartanāya etādṛśīṁ pratibandhakatāṁ sādhayati ?
SA27n2952:1629: kimarthaṁ vā drutasāmājikaparivarttanaṁ kasyāścit saṁskṛteḥ sabhyān nītihīnān karttuṁ prāvaṇyaṁ darśayati ?
SA27n2952:1630: kena kāraṇena janānāmantarnihitāsu dhāraṇāsu dṛṣṭibhaṅgiṣu ca parivartanaṁ prāyeṇa parvatataraṇamiva mantharam |
SA27n2952:1632: api asmābhiḥ manuṣyasya ca tasya saṁskṛteśca madhye ko'pi sambandhaḥ āviṣkṛtaḥ ?
SA27n2952:1633: ‘rījaman’kṛtaviviktajanatāviśleṣaṇaviṣayakapraśnaṁ viracayanto vayaṁ trividhaṁ sāmājikaṁ caritraṁ paśyāmaḥ yat samprati pāścātyadeśeṣu mukhyatvena lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:1634: tathā hi aitihyānugato janaḥ ya aitihyamanusṛtya sarvathācarati |
SA27n2952:1635: antarnirdeśānugāmī janaḥ yaḥ śaiśavāt prabhṛti kati saralāṇi āntarāṇi lakṣyāṇi anusṛtya karma karoti |
SA27n2952:1636: aparanirdeśānugāmī janaśca - yo'pare janā yādṛśamācaranti tādṛśamanusṛtya vyavaharati |
SA27n2952:1637: idaṁ trividhaṁ caritraṁ ekasya mūlagatasya praśnasya bhinnarūpameva |
SA27n2952:1639: sa praśnaḥjanāḥ prathamataḥ kathaṁ samarūpamācaranti yatra sāṁskṛtikāḥ ādarśā lakṣyante ?
SA27n2952:1640: kathaṁ janāḥ sarvatra dṛśyante teṣāmācaraṇānāṁ mukhyanirṇāyakatvena teṣāṁ saṁskṛtiṁ gṛhṇānāḥ ?
SA27n2952:1641: arthasya tathā paricayasya mukhatvena teṣāṁ samājasya ādarśaṁ grahītuṁ kathaṁ te pravartante ?
SA27n2952:1642: ’ kathaṁ vyavahārāṇāmādarśāḥ dalīyasadasyeṣu āvaśyakaparivartanarodhakadṛḍhagrahatvena dalīyakarmasu sāmānyatvaṁ vrajanti |
SA27n2952:1644: atra nāyamāśayaḥ yat janā yantravat teṣāṁ samājasya nirdiṣṭamādarśaṁ grahīṣyanti |
SA27n2952:1646: yadāpare teṣāṁ sāmājikasthānāni tathā driṣṭibhaṁgim anusṛtya adhikatarasahajātopāyaiḥ teṣāmādarśānāṁ parivartanaṁ kṛtvā vartante |
SA27n2952:1647: kintu saṁskṛteḥ ādarśāḥ sthūṇā iva rājante yeṣāmupari sārthakasāmājikavyavahāro nirmitaḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1650: paścimadeśīyā vidyāḥ taṁ praśnaṁ parihṛtya gacchanti yaḥ praśnaḥ - saṁskṛtiḥ janān yasya karaṇāya śikṣate kathaṁ te janāstat tat ācaranti ?
SA27n2952:1652: janāsteṣāṁ saṁskṛtyā nirdiṣṭāyāṁ sīmāyāṁ teṣāṁ vicitrāṇām ākāṅkṣāṇāṁ nivṛttiṁ sādhayanti,
SA27n2952:1653: yataḥ tā ākāṅkṣā evātra spaṣṭataḥ sāmājikatayā uddīptāstathā sāmānyīkṛtāḥ |
SA27n2952:1655: sambhavataḥ erikha phramamahodayaḥ asya mukhyasya praśnasya upari ghaniṣṭham ālokasampātaṁ cakāra yo'nyena kenacit na kṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:1656: tasya mate, ādhuniko naro na muktaḥ svayaṁśāsito vyaktiviśeṣaḥ |
SA27n2952:1657: sa upayogaṁ vivicya kālocitopāyena kāryaṁ karotīti ātmānaṁ tarkayati |
SA27n2952:1658: tathā ca sa samājāt yāṁ dhārāṁ vā bhūmikāṁ vā prāpnoti tasyā vyavahāraṁ karoti tatsaṁśliṣṭapuraskāramanusṛtya |
SA27n2952:1660: yo naraḥ tasya upakramāya parākramāya ca garvamanubhavati sa sāmājikena niyantraṇena kalpanāpekṣayā adhikaṁ kāryaṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:1661: sāmājikīṣu avasthāsu ātmānamabhiyujya naraḥ tān svabhāvān ātmīkaroti ye svabhāvāḥ taṁ karaṇīyakāryakaraṇāyānuprerayanti |
SA27n2952:1662: kintu pharmamahāśayo'pi asmākaṁ praśnaṁ spṛśanniva gacchati |
SA27n2952:1663: tasya viśleṣaṇe ācaraṇaṁ nāma sāmājikādarśasya paṭabhūmikāyāṁ mānavaprakṛteḥ gatiśīlenābhiyojanena mūlataḥ praṇālyā vāhitaṁ rūpam |
SA27n2952:1664: kintu tena na praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ - kathamayaṁ sāmājika ādarśaḥ sadṛśyām asyāṁ mānavaprakṛtau parivarttanasya pratibandhakaṁ sthāpayati - yatraikatrālokapātaḥ kṛtaḥ - yo viṣayaḥ svayaṁ samājatatvasya anyatamaspaṣṭalakṣaṇatvena upasthāpyate |
SA27n2952:1666: sāmājikīṣu avasthāsu parivartanaṁ sāmājikeṣu caritreṣu parivartanaṁ prasūte |
SA27n2952:1667: arthāt nūtaneṣu prayojaneṣu tathā udvegeṣu eko viṣayaḥ spaṣṭataro bhavati yat nedaṁ parivartanaṁ kintu saṁskṛtisammatādarśaniṣṭhavyavahāre āvaśyakalagnatā yā vyākhyānamapekṣate |
SA27n2952:1669: tatra sambhavo'yameva hetuḥ pāścātyadeśe mānavavyavahārasambandhivijñānasammatavidyāyāḥ sarve upakramāḥ cetanatayā vā anyathā vā pūrvakalpanāmiva kurvanti yat prakṛtaḥ praśnaḥ sāmājikyā bhūmikayā avasthayā ca saha vyaktīnām unnatatarasaṁgatividhānam,
SA27n2952:1672: mānavavyaktitatvasya pāścātyaśikṣārthināṁ nikaṭe sā sambhāvanā samabhavataḥ na samuditā yat ete samājikasaṁgatividhānasya praśnāḥ kevalamantime āśraye samādhānīyā yadi vayam adhikataramūlapraśnaṁ boddhuṁ śaknumaḥ - kathaṁ vyaktayaḥ dalāni ca sāmājike udyoge ācaraṇe ca mūlagataparivartanasyaḥ vipakṣe balavattaraṁ pratibandhakaṁ racayanti |
SA27n2952:1673: ayameva maulikaḥ praśnaḥ ubhayoreva - yaḥ pratiṣṭhitasāmājikamādarśaṁ rakṣituṁ vasati,
SA27n2952:1675: etāsāmādhunikīnāṁ vidyānāṁ prānteṣu kutrāpi vā sandeho jāyate yat ekaḥ gaṁbhīrataraḥ praśnaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāpekṣayā vartate eva |
SA27n2952:1676: asmin sūtre buddhaḥ saṁskṛtiniyamitamānavadaśāyā upari ālokasampātaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:1678: sa vahudūrabhramaṇakārī mānavavidyāvid bhavatu athavā bhavatu tasya lekhanyā sṛṣṭo jīvaḥ,
SA27n2952:1679: pratyakṣīkaroti kathaṁ vicitramidaṁ yat te sāmājikatayā ādiṣṭāyāṁ tathā niyantritāyāṁ pṛthivyāṁ yathā saṁlagnā,
SA27n2952:1681: yatra te mānavamukteḥ prakṛtadaśāyāḥ anusandhānāya yatante |
SA27n2952:1682: ayameva buddhasyānuyogaḥ yat mānavānāṁ kasyā api saṁskṛteḥ dehatattve svādhīnatā na dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:1683: buddhakṛtau dvau viśiṣṭau abhiyogau mānavajīvanasya sāmājikīṁ mātrāṁ niyantuṁ tathā anusandhātuṁ sahāyatvaṁ vrajataḥ |
SA27n2952:1684: ko'pi naraḥ, sa sāmājikavikāśasya yasmin kasmin api paryaye tiṣṭhatu,
SA27n2952:1688: yo jīvanasya jaivitasāmājikasthitau satataṁ karmarataḥ tiṣṭhati iti prathamo'bhiyogaḥ |
SA27n2952:1689: samāje tasyācaraṇaṁ tasyaiva jīvasyācaraṇaṁ yastacchaktibhiścālito bhavati yāḥ sāṁsārikaṁ jīvanaṁ grāhyaṁ na kurvanti |
SA27n2952:1690: tasya niścetanā preṣaṇā upāyānāṁ dīrghāyāṁ paṁktau aparaṁ na gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:1691: yairupāyaiḥ sa sāmājikīnāmākāṅkṣāṇāṁ santuṣṭaye karma karoti |
SA27n2952:1692: buddhasya dvitīyo'bhiyogo hi evam - kāryakāraṇayoḥ manoyogāt ātmanaḥ muktaye dhyānaṁ vyaktaye kevalaṁ suyogaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:1693: vyaktitvasya srotaḥ saritaḥ srota iva niyataṁ pravahati tasya mṛtyuṁ yāvat - kevalaṁ madhye madhye jñānapathena vyāhataṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1694: jñānino janā aprakṛtaṁ svabhāvaṁ dhyāyantaḥ paramārthaṁ pratyakṣamanubhavantaścāsaktibandhanāt sampūrṇata ātamano muñcanti |
SA27n2952:1696: dhyānābhyāsakāle teṣāṁ cittaṁ sthirasvacchanipānamiva sat upadravādupaplavācca sampūrṇataḥ muktaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1699: sā prakṛtiḥ tṛṣṇājanyāsthiratvāt sāmānyajñānataḥ guptā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1700: buddhakṛtoktapratyayadvayena viṣayībhūte kṣetre pṛthivyāṁ sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ sṛjyate sahyate ca |
SA27n2952:1701: naraḥ bādhyatāmūlakatvāt ajñātaparicityāṁ niyatyā niyantritaḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1702: gaṁbhīratarārthe manuṣyaḥ sāpekṣo jīvaḥ tāvat sambhavato na kalpitaṁ pābhalabhamahodayena |
SA27n2952:1703: sa sarvaṁ na jānāti kintu sarvasya jñānena tasya prayojanaṁ vidyate,
SA27n2952:1705: ekataḥ sa sāmājikajīvatvena sībhiteṣu kṣetreṣu draṣṭuṁ tathā nirdhārayituṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:1706: anyataśca, sa saṁskṛtipradatteṣu sāmājikavikalpeṣu tathā karoti |
SA27n2952:1707: sarve vyaktijanāḥ prāgvarttina uttaravarttinaścaikakaśaḥ īdṛśāstitvapravāhe viśiṣṭaṁ prakāraṁ samājaṁ racayanti yatra sāmājikā ekaikaśaḥ ekatra ca na upasthitāḥ kintu ekasminnarthe teṣu ghaniṣṭhaṁ bandhanamasti |
SA27n2952:1708: kevalaṁ samasamayattā tādṛśaṁ bandhanaṁ na sūcayati |
SA27n2952:1709: yadyapi bauddhāḥ caramatattvatvena kasyacijjanasya kasyāścid vyakteścāstitvaṁ na svīkurvanti |
SA27n2952:1710: teṣāṁ mate pratyekaṁ vyaktigatāstitvapravāho'parebhyaḥ pravāhebhyaḥ pṛthageva |
SA27n2952:1712: kintu ayaṁ pravāhaḥ nirantaramuhūrtadvayaṁ kadāpi samānaḥ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:1715: tathā ca jīvanaṁ vyāpya bhāvi astitvaṁ prati pravahanneva caliṣyati |
SA27n2952:1717: sā dhārā nirantaraṁ yāti āyāti ca |
SA27n2952:1718: prāyeṇāyaṁ pradīpaśikhayā saha upamīyate yā śikhā nirantaraṁ kampate parivartate ca |
SA27n2952:1724: hoāīṭaheḍamahodaya ekadā hārabhārḍālocanāmandire mantavyaṁ cakāra yat dravyasya dhāraṇāyāmeva sarvādhunikāmaratvasya mukhyaṁ kāraṇaṁ nihitaṁ vartate |
SA27n2952:1726: tā vaktayaḥ karmaśakteḥ sādhāraṇāt sañcayāt jīvanti - sā śaktiḥ rūpātmakaśaktirucyate |
SA27n2952:1727: vastutaḥ samānakammapravāheṇa niyamitāḥ santaḥ te sarveṣu bandhaneṣu gabhīratarabandhanena baddhāstiṣṭhanti ghaniṣṭhamekatra ca |
SA27n2952:1728: kevalaṁ jaivikaḥ sambandhastān tathā na badhnāti |
SA27n2952:1729: samānapravāhe athavāhitaḥ pūrvavartti tatra kevalaṁ jaivikaṁ pitṛtatvaṁ na gurutvaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:1730: tathā ca, tasmin kammapravāhe paravartī janaḥ santānasvarūpaḥ |
SA27n2952:1731: sa sādhāraṇataḥ vaṁśaparamparayā āgatāṁ karuṇāṁ prāptumarhati |
SA27n2952:1732: buddhamate pratyekaṁ vyaktiḥ etādṛśānāṁ meṣasadṛśānāṁ balānāṁ pālikā yairbalaiḥ tasyāḥ svīyaṁ jīvanaṁ pūrṇaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1733: mānavastasya satyaṁ sārūpyamāviṣkartuṁ varṣāṇāṁ sahasrāṇi avaśyameva vatsyati |
SA27n2952:1734: tāni balāni satataṁ sāmājikasamparkeṣu veṣāntareṇa ācchannāni tathā gūḍhāni tiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:1739: sā paristhitistasyāgamanāt prāg yathāsīt paramapi tathā tiṣṭhet |
SA27n2952:1746: pratyekaṁ sāmājikaṁ dalaṁ praṇālyā aracitānubhavaśaktiṁ cālayati |
SA27n2952:1747: tathākaraṇena ca dalaṁ sāmājikaphalavattāyāḥ kasyacidaṁśasya prāptaye vyaktiṁ samarthayati |
SA27n2952:1748: śaktyānubhūtyā ca praṇālyāḥ racanā sāmājikadalasya mūlagatādarśaṁ iti cintyate asya sāmājikaṁ bhittimūlam,
SA27n2952:1749: asyāsthīni samājāya nirdiṣṭaṁ caritraṁ tathā gatividhiṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:1750: atraiva mūlasthapārthakyabindurvirājate yena aparebhyaḥ sāmājikebhyo dalebhyaḥ pārthakyaṁ sūcyate |
SA27n2952:1751: praṇālīracanāpadenedaṁ budhyate - kasyācidākāṅkṣāṇāṁ pragatimūlā saṁkīrṇatā yāvanna yathākālaṁ ko'pi janaḥ nirdiṣṭenopāyena nirdiṣṭapreṣaṇāsantuṣṭaye icchati |
SA27n2952:1752: prayeḍamahodayaḥ ayaṁ 'visiṭajuṅ' viniyogaḥ virecaka iti kathayati |
SA27n2952:1753: saṁskṛtirasmāsu yat karoti tadeva mukhyāṁ vastupraṇālīṁ racayati athavā mārgaviśeṣaṇaṁ viśodhayati,
SA27n2952:1754: yāvanna vayam viśiṣṭaṁ saṁgītaṁ bhojyamanyat kimapi saṁsthāsammataṁ vastu vā icchāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:1755: ayameva praṇālīracanāyāḥ pariṇāmo teṣāṁ janānāṁ mastiṣkeṣu viśiṣṭhajīvanaśailī nīḍaṁ badhnāti,
SA27n2952:1757: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ jīvanasammatabhāveṣu pracchannaṁ nihito vartate |
SA27n2952:1758: tathā ca, abhyāseṣu api yaiśca santānāṁ pālitā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:1759: ayaṁ vyaktivargaṁ parivāreṣu tathā jīvanasya sampradāyagatarūpeṣu sambandhnāti |
SA27n2952:1760: ayaṁ naśvaratāvihīnaṁ sāmājikavidhiniyamitaṁ pratyekaṁ sadasyaṁ dṛḍhaṁ sajati,
SA27n2952:1761: yathā na ko'pi maulikaṁ sāmājikaṁ saṁsthānaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayitumasaṁlagnamataṁ grahītumarhati,
SA27n2952:1762: saṁkṣepataḥ yataḥ sāmājikavidheḥ parivarttanamicchan jano vā gaṇo vā svayamasya jīvitavatīṁ dehavattāṁ gṛhṇan asya maulikīṣu dhāraṇāsu tathācaraṇasyādarśeṣu apratyakṣīkṛtaṁ tātaparyaṁ sthāpayati |
SA27n2952:1763: pratiṣṭhitavidhiniyantritāni acetanāśrayasthalaṁ ca dūranikṣiptāni sūtrāṇi ca - yathā kīrkagārḍamahodayena jīvanasya saṁskṛtā śailīti ucyate kayācicchaktyā śāsati |
SA27n2952:1765: yat kayācid antārjātīyayā sāmānyayā bhāṣayā vyāhāraḥ bhrātṛvat mānavān karmakāṇḍe ādhikyena prerayati,
SA27n2952:1766: athavā saṁgītaṁ vā kalāvidyāyā anyat rūpaṁ vā,
SA27n2952:1767: saṁskṛtiṣu udārataraṁ pracāritāsu tathā vinimayena pracalitāsu samagrapṛthivyāḥ janeṣu gabhīrāṁ maitrīṁ pracariṣyati |
SA27n2952:1768: jīvanasya mūlapraṇālī saṁṣkṛtigarbhe pratyekaṁ vyaktiṁ racayati |
SA27n2952:1769: sā praṇālī kathitaśabdāpekṣayā kalārūpāntarāpekṣayā vā balavattarā jāyate |
SA27n2952:1770: tathā ca, iyaṁ buddhīyā antardṛṣṭiḥ tadviṣayabodhāya asmān sāhāyyaṁ karoti,
SA27n2952:1771: kathaṁ sādharaṇabhāṣābhāṣiṇaḥ janāḥ punaḥ punaḥ bhrātṛghātiyuddheṣu niyojitāstiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:1772: kathañca viśvasya saṁgītapriyāḥ janāḥ sarvadā teṣāṁ nimittopanatasaundaryasammelanāt pratyāgatya saṁskṛtigataṁ vibhāgaṁ vidveṣaṁ ca praviśanti |
SA27n2952:1773: yasmātte mojārṭasya cekoski ityasya vā samujjvalānuṣṭhānena kṣaṇāya āhūtā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:1775: pratyekaṁ naraśca tathā ubhayabalo jīvaḥ ekataḥ sāṁskṛtikādarśaiḥ niyantritaḥ,
SA27n2952:1779: idaṁ spaṣṭaṁ bhavati yat sa sāmājikadaśāṁ prati tasya carmaṇi ca asthisu ca asvastikarīmatha ca sambhāvanāmayīmubhayabalatāṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:1780: sāmājamātreṣu asmābhiḥ kiñcidvastu jñāyate - yatra mūlībhūta āśayo hi bhangasaṁkalpatā,
SA27n2952:1785: tatra ca nikaṭasthaṁ dūrasthaṁ vā tamasācchannāgādhamṛtyuvilam |
SA27n2952:1787: śīghrameva te āviṣkurvanti yat śiśujanā ākāṅkṣāpūraṇāpekṣayā pṛthivyā anyataraṁ lakṣyaṁ varttate |
SA27n2952:1788: tataḥ paraṁ sa jñātumarhati yat jīvanaṁ prāyaśaḥ bhagnasaṁkalpatvādapūrṇākāṅkṣātvācca krandanasya sthānam |
SA27n2952:1789: śiśuḥ kramaśaḥ tattathyena ātmānaṁ samādhātuṁ śikṣate yat janā mūlataḥ tasyākāṅkṣāpūraṇayantratvena na varttante |
SA27n2952:1792: vikhyātāgnyūpadeśe ucyate yat jīvanasya sādhāraṇīṣu daśāsu eva ā janmano mṛtyu yāvat sarvāṇi vastūni tṛṣṇāgnau ca durdamaprayojanāgnau ca vartante |
SA27n2952:1793: pratyekaṁ vyaktiḥ ghṛṇāgninā mohāgninā ca saha vasati,
SA27n2952:1803: sabhyatāyā yasmin kasminnapi paryāye ubhayabalatāyāmavaśyakaraṇīyatāyāṁ bhagnasaṁkalpatāyāṁ ca mūlagatā gācit bhītistiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:1804: sā bhītiḥ mānavajīvanasya hṛdaye satī vyākhyāṁ karoti kathamādita eva mānavakriyāsu śaktiviruddhakāryakaraṇāya tathā śakterapavyavahārāya prāvaṇyaṁ vartate |
SA27n2952:1805: manuṣyaḥ tasya sarveṣāmudyamānāṁ pādanyāsaḥ śithila iti sandigdhe |
SA27n2952:1811: sa ātmānaṁ tasya karmaṇe krīḍāyai ca sābhiniveśaṁ samarpayati - taṁ dāsīkṛtya yasya parisamāptiḥ jāyate |
SA27n2952:1812: sa cintayati yat sa kevalaṁ saphalatvenātmānaṁ prakāśayati,
SA27n2952:1813: kintu vastutaḥ taṁ kārāsthaṁ kṛtvaiva tasya sṛṣṭhirjayati |
SA27n2952:1815: parantu vastutaḥ tasya cintā jīvananiyamādhīnā jāyante |
SA27n2952:1817: taccintanaviṣayā piñjaratvena vrajanti - yadāviṣkṛtaṁ manuṣyeṇa taṁ paritaḥ yāḥ śaktayastiṣṭhanti tāsāṁ paripālāya |
SA27n2952:1819: ādimeṣu vaijñānikeṣu vā cintāyā āviṣkāreṣu evāntimaḥ śabdo vartate |
SA27n2952:1820: api ca, keciccaturā upāyāḥ santi ye manuṣyaṁ śvāsarodhakaradaśāyā muktaṁ karttumarhanti |
SA27n2952:1821: avaśeṣe sarve rabhasāt samatvena pariṇatā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:1823: atrāyaṁ hetuḥ - manuṣya ātmānametādṛśena vīryeṇābhiniveśena caiṣu praśneṣu niyojayati,
SA27n2952:1825: sa jīvanametādṛśyāṁ vismayakaryāmū aṭṭālikāyāṁ vāsayogyaṁ kartuṁ ceṣṭate iva,
SA27n2952:1826: yena sa svīyasṛṣṭitaḥ muktiṁ labdhuṁ nārhati |
SA27n2952:1827: prāyaśūnyatāpīyadivase himībhūtahimavisarpaṇapādukāyā gatiriva tasya janasya gatirjāyate |
SA27n2952:1828: yā svayaṁ ajñasya śiśoḥ jihvāyāṁ dravati - yaḥ śiśuḥ prathamaṁ himasya upari calati,
SA27n2952:1829: pratisamayaṁ manuṣyaḥ tadīyasṛṣṭiśīlaśaktiniḥsṛṣṭe nūtane pariprekṣite tathā mukhe svapiti,
SA27n2952:1831: viśeṣeṇa yadi sa taṁ svapnaṁ vāstavāyitaṁ karttuṁ śaknoti evaṁ sampūrṇataḥ prakṛtistho janaḥ yastadīyaśaktīḥ prakāśayan vasati,
SA27n2952:1836: utpannaṁ vastu ādarśo vā - yadeva bhavatu vā na bhavatu vā,
SA27n2952:1837: saḥ asaralaḥ preṣito jīva iti saralo hetuḥ |
SA27n2952:1838: sa yat karoti tasminnayaṁ balapūrvo guṇo vartate |
SA27n2952:1839: sa na kṣamo bhavati - na jñānāya,
SA27n2952:1842: evaṁ vidho jīvaḥ san tadīyavicitranaipuṇyaṁ prāyeṇa vyavaharati pratyakṣīkaraṇād viratyarthaṁ yat ayameva mārgo yatra so'sti |
SA27n2952:1843: tasya vyavahāraḥ khalu balāt sidhyati iti āviṣkārāya tasyāsti gabhīrācetanānīhā tathā bādhā |
SA27n2952:1844: kasyacidviṣayasya śikṣaṇāya janānāṁ bādho viśiṣṭeṣu kṣetreṣu vicitraḥ |
SA27n2952:1846: gacchatā kālena punaḥ yat kiñcid ghaṭiṣyate tat kenāpi ākāṅkṣaṇīyaparivartanamiti vyākhyātaṁ bhaviṣyati kintu janasyopari na kiñcit samāpatitamiveti janaḥ karma karoti |
SA27n2952:1847: sa kadāpi aniyataṁ tarkayitumarhati yat sa kṣudhāvaśāt ca indriyavṛttivaśāt ca sāmājike saṁsthāne aṁśagrahaṇaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:1848: kintu kṣudhādayaḥ na sapramāṇaṁ tasya gabhīratamāmantardṛṣṭi tathā sṛṣṭiśīlatāmupasthāpayanti,
SA27n2952:1849: tathāpi te eva tasya samīpe prāptavyasya sāmājikavinimayasya kevalā ākārāḥ |
SA27n2952:1853: ata eva sāṁskṛtikaṁ saṁsthānaṁ sāmājikaṁ cādarśaṁ prati tasya pravṛttiḥ na kadāpi sukhagamyā bhavati |
SA27n2952:1854: sa sāmājikaniyantraṇaṁ necchati tathāpi tatraiva sa jīvikānirvāhārthaṁ tat niyantraṇamatyāvaśyakamiti paśyati |
SA27n2952:1856: sa uddhāro'bhavat unmattasamājāt asusthāyāḥ saṁskṛteḥ doṣayuktajanajīvanāt ca |
SA27n2952:1857: yat jīvanaṁ dalabaddhamatha ca sarvatrajaṭilaṁ vikṛtaṁ vā vyaktitvaṁ prakāśayati,
SA27n2952:1859: buddha etādṛśājjanajīvanāntaraṁ muñcati ye pāścātya deśīyāḥ śikṣārthino'nubhavanti yat sāmājikajīvanasya adarśabhūteṣu rūpeṣu yanmūlyaṁ tasya guṇadoṣavivecane'samartha āsīt,
SA27n2952:1860: buddhakṛtā sāmājikarūpāṇāṁ viruddhe ākṣepā atīva caramā āsan |
SA27n2952:1861: adhunā vayaṁ saṁskṛteḥ vyakteśca madhye sambandhasya prakṛtau yaccintayāmastadapekṣayādhikataraṁ yāvanna jānīmaḥ,
SA27n2952:1862: tāvadayaṁ siddhāntaḥ pāścātyopajātīyasaṁskārāpekṣayā nagaṇya iti draṣṭavyam |
SA27n2952:1865: tajjāḍyaṁ vyākhyāti kathaṁ saṁskṛtayaḥ parivartanasya pakṣe dhīraṁ calanti ?
SA27n2952:1866: kathaṁ vā drutaṁ parivartanaṁ mānavaṁ nīticyutaṁ karoti ?
SA27n2952:1867: kutra vā kāṭhinyaṁ jāyate yat samagraṁ sāmājikaṁ rūpaṁ parivartanāya atīva anivārya karoti |
SA27n2952:1868: yadā vayaṁ bauddhapunarjanmavādaṁ smarāmaḥ tadedameva smartavyam - kimarthaṁ buddhaḥ purātanasāmājikasṛṣṭibhyaḥ mānavavyaktitvaṁ rakṣituṁ prārthayate sma ?
SA27n2952:1870: tadā vayaṁ smarāmo yat itihāsasya asmin yuge ādarśaṁ pradarśayata āvegapravaṇena preṣitasya jīvasya śaktiḥ samarūpapreṣitasahasrajīvānāṁ sañcitaśaktibhiḥ bhuktā bhavati |
SA27n2952:1872: asmin bauddhe pariprekṣite idameva vismayakaraṁ bhittimulaṁ,
SA27n2952:1873: yadi prabhāvagatā gabhīrāviśvāsaḥ anyaiḥ janaiḥ ākāraṁ prāpnoti,
SA27n2952:1874: tarhi asmākaṁ jīvanaṁ vyāpakaṁ vibhakteṣu janeṣu gabhīramatha ca vistṛtamupādānaṁ na bhavitumarhati,
SA27n2952:1875: vastūnāṁ samakṣaṁ idaṁ spaṣṭamiva pratibhāti yat,
SA27n2952:1876: yadi anye jīvāḥ yathā vayaṁ tathā acetanapreṣaṇayā vyavacchidyate,
SA27n2952:1877: tathā ca eṣāṁ janānāṁ svābhāvikī sāmājikī sṛṣṭiḥ akalyāṇamayī bhavati yathā asmākaṁ kadāpi vā sandehasūcakaṁ kāraṇamasti,
SA27n2952:1878: tarhi anyajīvanagataprabhāvasūcakabauddhasaṁśayaḥ susthe tathā yuktigrāhye bhittimūle sthāpitaḥ |
SA27n2952:1879: sāmājikāmarṣasya asyāṁ pravaṇatāyāṁ suṣṭhu adhikaṁ gurutvaṁ deyam yādṛśaṁ gurutvaṁ bauddhaśāstreṣu dīyate tadapekṣayāpi |
SA27n2952:1880: yataḥ ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ sambhavataḥ sāmājitavyavahārasya sandhānasamyogasūtram kevalamasmākaṁ paricitteṣu samājeṣu |
SA27n2952:1881: ata eva, ayameva sampūrṇaḥ svābhāviko vyāpāro yat sāmājikānāṁ pratiṣṭhānānāṁ tathā teṣāṁ prabhāvānāṁ kṛte,
SA27n2952:1884: svādhīnajātitvena ādhunikaśrīlaṁkāyā utthānamadhikṛtya rigins yāmālocanāṁ cakāra tatra cyate yat ayaṁ deśaḥ katiṣu viṣayeṣu sacetana āsīt |
SA27n2952:1888: ete viṣayāḥ khalu mānavasaṁghānāṁ durmocanīyāḥ sahacarāḥ ayamaviśvāsaḥ kasyacit saṁketasya upari sagauravaṁ varṇyate,
SA27n2952:1889: yaḥ saṁketaḥ reguṇe viśvaśāntibauddhamandirasya pārśve avasthite prekṣāgṛhe vaktuḥ vedikāyāḥ paścāt vartate |
SA27n2952:1890: katīnāṁ janānāṁ sahayogitāmāyāyāṁ kiñcidapūrvaṁ bhojyaṁ svargādupahṛtaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:1892: buddhena ucyate yata sarve janāḥ adhyavasāyāt sveṣāṁ muktimavaśyameva sādhayeyuḥ |
SA27n2952:1895: yathā eriṣṭaṭalaḥ paśyati manuṣyaḥ prakṛtyā rājanītiko jīvaḥ |
SA27n2952:1896: sa sāmājikādānapradānayormadhye sāmājikaṁ yogaṁ paśyati yatra tasya vāsaḥ |
SA27n2952:1899: manuṣyasya pakṣe samājabaddhatvaṁ ca nirjanatvaṁ ca ityanayormadhye kataradadhikataraṁ svābhāvikamiti viṣayo'smābhiḥ samyak na jñāyate |
SA27n2952:1901: sa dharmaḥ susthataro vikalpa upayukta āśrayaśca yatra manuṣyasya sthitirvivicyate |
SA27n2952:1902: pāścātyo naraḥ nareṇa saha parasparakarmavinimaye tathā sambandhasthāpane sarvavidhām āśāṁ poṣayati |
SA27n2952:1903: prakṛtyā saha tādṛśaṁ sambandhamapi sa paśyati |
SA27n2952:1905: bauddha dharmaḥ tādṛśīṁ mānavīyāmabhijñatāṁ nirdiśati yatra pratyekaṁ nara ekākitvaṁ bhavati,
SA27n2952:1906: yatra priyatamāya mitrāyāpi na kimapi sthānamasti |
SA27n2952:1910: ekaḥ svatantraḥ astitvapravāhaḥ-na ko'pi saṁgaḥ tasya ekākitvaṁ dūrikartumarhati |
SA27n2952:1911: theravādo bauddhadharmaḥ sarvadā asmin viṣaye viśeṣeṇa spaṣṭaṁ mataṁ poṣayati |
SA27n2952:1916: bauddhamatānusāraḥ yo jana idamāvaśyakamekākitvamāśrayatvena na gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:1920: eko janaḥ tasya ekākitve kiṁ karotīti bauddhasya pakṣe gurutvāpūrṇo viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:1921: dharmalakṣaṇakathanāya pṛṣṭaḥ san hoāiṭāheḍamahodaya idaṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:1923: na ko'pi janaḥ aparasmai janāya ādhyātmikatāyā vyavasthāṁ karoti,
SA27n2952:1925: aparo janaḥ asmin vyāpāre kiṁ karoti vā na karoti vā ityanena koapi sambandho nāsti |
SA27n2952:1926: duḥkhasya ca mṛtyośca viṣaye kīdṛśo'smākaṁ viśvāsaḥ ?
SA27n2952:1932: asmākaṁ devālayaḥ yat upadiśati tat na idam |
SA27n2952:1933: tarhi ādhyātmike unnayane ko dṛṣṭānta upadeśo vā hitakaratvena dṛśyate ?
SA27n2952:1934: bauddhā yadā vadanti nara ekaḥ sāmājiko jīvaḥ - tadā tasya ko'rthaḥ ?
SA27n2952:1937: tasya paścāt avicchinnā kāryakāraṇaparamparāsti - yatra tasya svakīyaṁ jīvanaṁ antimaṁ padamadhikaroti |
SA27n2952:1939: ata eva, asmākaṁ sambandhastena janena saha yaḥ sañcitaṁ tathā'damyaṁ karmaphalamanusṛtya saṁgrāmaṁ kariṣyati,
SA27n2952:1943: asya jīvanasya aniścitatā tathā ubhayabalatā idaṁ sākṣyaṁ vahati yat na ādhunika-iuropasya astittvavādinaḥ,
SA27n2952:1944: kintu gotamo buddhaḥ pañcaviṁśatiśakebhyaḥ prāk nūtanaṁ pariprekṣitamunmcayati smaḥ,
