SA27n2952:1948: yo yuktyapekṣayā śaktimattaraśaktibhiścālitāyā abhijñatāyā upari prathamaṁ niviḍaṁ pariprekṣitaṁ mānavasampradāyāya pradadau |
SA27n2952:1951: niṣpeṣite sati yā abhijñatā jāyate iyameva sābhijñatā,
SA27n2952:1958: asyāṁ pṛthivyāṁ janmagrahaṇāt paraṁ vayamanayā saṁkīrṇatayā niṣpeṣitā bhavāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:1959: manuṣyaḥ saṁkīrṇā praṇālī iva - yasyā madhyataḥ atītayugajīvanasya jhaṭikā garjati,
SA27n2952:1962: adhunā pracalitasya ‘eṁjāyiṭi’ iti pāścātyapadasya vyavahāramadhikṛtya kati janā vivādaṁ kartum icchanti |
SA27n2952:1963: kintu āvegatāḍitajīvasya bauddhaviśleṣaṇena idaṁ padamatīva upayuktam |
SA27n2952:1964: idaṁ padaṁ tadeva ādimatamaṁ rūpaṁ sūcayati yat anubhūtiśaktisambhāvanāpravāheṇa racite mānavavyaktitve gṛhyate |
SA27n2952:1966: asmābhiryanna jñāyate tena ācchannatāyāḥ bodhaṁ nirdiśati idaṁ padam |

SA27n2952:2245: idaṁ hitāvahamanupreraṇaṁ bhaviṣyati ānandadāyakāya puraskārāya mūlam |
SA27n2952:2247: idaṁ poṣakeṇa paravartidharmasyācaraṇāya bījatvena sevitumapi alam |
SA27n2952:2249: sa eva yathārthaṁ nirapacayaṁ bhikṣāṁ bhuṅkte |
SA27n2952:2256: , api ca, tat poṣaṇaṁ bhaviṣyati sakṛdāgāmibhikṣave,
SA27n2952:2268: kintu eṣā carcā muktyunmukhāntardṛṣṭicarcāyā nimne eva vartate |
SA27n2952:2269: kāruṇikacittamiti samastapadasya vyākhyāyāṁ ṭīkāha - 'hitasādhaneccasametasacetajīvasamparkitaṁ cittameva kāruṇikaṁ cittam |
SA27n2952:2270: punaśca, idaṁ yathārthataḥ samādhiyogena antarbhukto bhavati |
SA27n2952:2272: evamatra kāruṇikacittam samādhiparyāyabhuktaṁ sarvathāpi premakaruṇānvitaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:2273: 'krakacadṛṣṭāntasaṁvāde' gotamaḥ bhikṣuṁ moliyaphaggunamupadiṁśati yat sa kupitacittapoṣaṇaṁ na kṛtvā kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayet |
SA27n2952:2275: moliyaphaggunaḥ sannyāsinībhiḥ saha atyantaṁ saṁsaktaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
SA27n2952:2281: sa tamāha yat sannyāsinīṣu atyāsaktiḥ sannyāsināṁ pakṣe anucittāṁ |
SA27n2952:2282: ata eva yadi ko'pi janaḥ sannyāsinīnāṁ vyavahāreṣu doṣaṁ paśyati,
SA27n2952:2283: tadā sa īdṛśaṁ manobhāvaṁ poṣayet - mama cittaṁ viṣayagāmi na bhavatu |
SA27n2952:2286: mama cittaṁ kāruṇikaṁ sat sarvadā kopamuktaṁ bhaviṣyati iti |
SA27n2952:2288: buddho moliyamupadiśati yat sa samamanobhāvaṁ poṣayet yadi ko'pi tadīyaṁ doṣaṁ paśyati,
SA27n2952:2289: athavā ko'pi taṁ vā sannyāsinīḥ vā āhanti |
SA27n2952:2291: api tu parasambandhiguṇadoṣavivecanakāle sarvadā kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ lālayet |
SA27n2952:2292: saṁvādeṣu buddho gotamo vyākhyāti yat yadi ko'pi aparasya doṣaṁ saṁśodhayitumicchati,
SA27n2952:2294: tadā sa kāruṇikena hṛdayena satyaṁ vadet,
SA27n2952:2298: kathaṁ vā parasparam saṁlapet iti upadiśya punaśca sa saṁyojayāmāsa yat sarve bhikṣavaḥ sarvadā sarvaiḥ saha śāntaṁ vyavahareyuḥ |
SA27n2952:2299: madhyamamānavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat ko'pi janaḥ jātivicāraṁ na kṛtvā premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ karṣet |
SA27n2952:2301: ayamabhyāso na kevalaṁ sarveṣāṁ karttavyo'pi tu ādhyātmikamārgaparisamāptaye upayogitāṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:2302: 'kassapaṁ prati siṁhagarjanaṁ' - saṁvāde gotamo varṇayati yo bhikṣuḥ kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayati,
SA27n2952:2308: tenādarśena vyaktipakṣe prayojanamasti yadi vyaktiḥ parivrājako vā brāhmaṇo vā bhavitumicchati |
SA27n2952:2322: te viṣayāḥ kevalam arhadbhiḥ sampūrṇaṁ parityaktāḥ |
SA27n2952:2324: sā prakṛtiḥ arhatāṁ tṛptiṁ na vidadhāti |
SA27n2952:2327: phalataḥ, te na punaḥ pārthivendriyasukhenākṛṣṭā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:2328: evamanityasukhaṁ vā punarjanmano duḥkhaṁ vā tān prabhāvitān karttuṁ na śaknotiṁ |
SA27n2952:2329: īdṛśaiḥ janaiḥ sarvavidhaṁ mānasikaṁ tamastathā bhrāntaṁ mataṁ dūrīkṛtam |
SA27n2952:2330: tataḥ arhatpadasya samaparyāyaśabdaḥ khalu 'khinasavaḥ' arthāt 'yena kṣatikaraprabhāvo vinaṣṭa' iti |
SA27n2952:2331: punaśca, yadi īdṛśo janaḥ premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ karṣati,
SA27n2952:2332: tarhi sa yathārthataḥ parivrājakaḥ brāhmaṇo vā bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:2333: kramikavacaneṣu buddha āha bhikṣūn prati sukarmasādhanāt bhītiḥ na karaṇīyā,
SA27n2952:2336: sa svakīyaṁ jñānamullikhati yat tena ciraṁ yat sukarma kṛtaṁ tat ānandāya sampadyate |
SA27n2952:2337: tasyaphalaṁ caivam - sa prāktane janmani saptaparṣaiḥ kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:2339: sārvalaukike prakāśe ca vikāśe ca sapta yugāni vyāpya so'syāṁ pṛthivyāṁ na punarjātaḥ |
SA27n2952:2340: sārvalaukikaprakāśakāle sa divye jagati janmagrahaṇaṁ cakāra (ābhassara)
SA27n2952:2346: sa bahuvāraṁ sārvalaukikaḥ samrāṭ san yathādharmaṁ śāsanaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:2347: tadā sa kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ karṣati sma,
SA27n2952:2350: anyasmin saṁvāde bodhisattvasya kāruṇikaṁ tathā premamayaṁ cittamullekhārhatāṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:2352: sṛṣṭaṁ saṁkaṭamadhikṛtya vipraḥ jāṇussoṇiḥ gotamaṁ pṛcchati,
SA27n2952:2354: buddhaḥ jāṇussoṇiṁ nivedayati yat vanavāsināṁ teṣāṁ parivrājakānāṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ cittaṁ krodhānvitaṁ mālinyayuktaṁ cāsīt |
SA27n2952:2357: sa jāṇussoṇiṁ vyākhyāti yat ekadā sa svayaṁ bodhisattva āsīt |
SA27n2952:2361: kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pratyakṣīkṛtya bodhisattvaḥ kadāpi dvidhāgrastaḥ na babhūva,
SA27n2952:2362: na vā bhītaḥ na vā ātaṅkitaḥ |
SA27n2952:2363: ṭīkāyāḥ saṁyojanamevam - mama cittaṁ krodhapūrṇaṁ nāsīt asyāyamāśayahḥ 'mamaikaṁ karuṇāmayaṁ hṛdayamāsīt tasmin hṛdaye hitecchā āsīt |
SA27n2952:2367: tataḥ paraṁ gotamo'smin saṁvāde tasya samyag jñānaṁ varṇayati,
SA27n2952:2368: idamanumānaṁ yuktaṁ bhavet yat araṇye bodhisattvasya jīanamadhikṛttya eṣālocanā gotamakartṛkabodhilābhāt pūrvameva yaḥ kālastaṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:2370: athavā te tathā karttumapadiśyante iti dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2375: ṭīkāyā mate ubhayavidhaṁ cittaṁ premamayakarmasampādanāya samarthaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:2378: bhavacakrāt mahāparimuktimadhikṛtya saṁvāde dṛśyate yat guroḥ gotamād vicchedamāsannam dṛṣṭvā ānandaḥ roditumārebhe |
SA27n2952:2380: tadā gotama ānandaṁ smārayati yat tasyaiva upadeśa evam - sarvāṇi sukhakarāṇi vastūni parivartante tirobhavanti ca |
SA27n2952:2381: buddhaḥ ānandaṁ sāntvayati tadīyapremamayasevāṁ praśasya - ānanda,
SA27n2952:2382: tayā cireṇa sadaikyavataḥ sevā kriyate - premayakāyikakarmabhiḥ,
SA27n2952:2392: hitakarāṇi - ityatra tāni karmāṇi ucyante yāni maṁgalavardhanāya kriyante |
SA27n2952:2393: sukhāvahāni - ityatrāśayaḥ - karmāṇi sukhena ca harṣeṇa ca kriyante,
SA27n2952:2395: advaitāni - ayaṁ bhāvaḥ - kati janāḥ kevalamapareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ,
SA27n2952:2401: kintu sa ānanda evaṁ na vibhajya premamayakarmāṇi sampādayati sma |
SA27n2952:2402: evañca tat kṛtāni premamayakāyikakāryāṇi advaitāni saṁvṛttāni |
SA27n2952:2404: sa vivakṣati - tava premamayakāyikakāryāṇi parimāṇena atyantaṁ pracurāṇi |
SA27n2952:2407: kṣudre sāttvike jagati pracurāṇāṁ karmaṇāṁ sthānābhāvatvāt karmāṇi parimāṇaśūnyāni iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:2408: premamayavācikakarmāṇi - atra vācikakarmāṇi ityatra mukhaprakṣālanasamayaghoṣaṇādikarmāṇi sūcyante |
SA27n2952:2410: kiñca, yadi ko'pi upadeśavāṇīṁ śrutvā vadati,
SA27n2952:2413: premamayamānasikakarmāṇi ityatrāśayaḥ - yathāsamayaṁ śarīrasya yatnaṁ kṛtvā sa nibhṛte sthāne upaviśya evaṁ prakāreṇa cintayati - 'mamācāryaḥ rogāt kleśācca mukto bhavatu,
SA27n2952:2417: saṁvādeṣu idamapi likhitaṁ yat bhikṣavaḥ teṣāṁ sveṣāṁ madhye premamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmaṇāmanuśīlanaṁ cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:2423: buddhaḥ sannyāsinaḥ pṛcchati - paryāptaṁ bhikṣābhojyaṁ prāpya dugdhajalamiśraṇavadekatra sukhena sthitvā kiṁ te kuśalina iti na vā |
SA27n2952:2424: te uttaraṁ dadati yat te nāma kuśalinaḥ teṣāñca paryāptaṁ bhikṣābhojyamasti |
SA27n2952:2425: anuruddhasya netṛtve te pṛthak pṛthak buddhaṁ vadanti yat te dugdhajalamiśravaṇavat sukhena vasanti |
SA27n2952:2426: teṣāṁ mate īdṛśaiḥ satīrthaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saha vāsaḥ mahān lābha eva |
SA27n2952:2428: teṣāṁ samakṣaṁ ca parokṣam ca anuruddhaḥ anyān janān prati tadīyāṁ bhaktiṁ varṇayati - 'ahaṁ nimnarūpaṁ cintayāmi - mayā kimīdṛśānām mitrāṇāṁ sevārthaṁ mama svīyaṁ cittamutsṛṣṭam ?
SA27n2952:2429: kiñca kiṁ me jīvanaṁ teṣāṁ sevārthamiti |
SA27n2952:2430: ......mahāśayaḥ, asmākaṁ śarīrāṇi khalu pṛthak pṛthak tiṣṭhanti;
SA27n2952:2433: anuruddhasya premamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmaṇāṁ varṇanaṁ vistareṇa kathayati ṭīkā - premamayakāyikakarmāṇi - ityatra kāyikakarmāṇi kāruṇikacittatvāt kriyante,
SA27n2952:2437: apareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ kāyikavācikakarmāṇi tadaiva sambhavanti yadā ko'pi janaḥ aparaiḥ saha vasati |
SA27n2952:2438: vaiparītyaṁ sambhavati yadi janāḥ pṛthak pṛthak vasanti |
SA27n2952:2440: tathā hi - anuruddhaḥ paśyati - dau bhikṣū tena saha vasataḥ |
SA27n2952:2442: sa cintanena viraktiṁ na prakāśayati - 'kenedaṁ vyavahṛtam ? iti |
SA27n2952:2443: varam, sa tāni vastūni samuddhṛtya yathāsthānaṁ sthāpayati,
SA27n2952:2444: yathā svayaṁ sa tyajati samuddharati ca |
SA27n2952:2449: viṣṭaraṁ prayojanīyaṁ dravyaṁ ca vahiḥ tyajati |
SA27n2952:2451: tathaiva yadi sa karoti tarhi tasya premamayakāyikakāryāvalī pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ bhavet |
SA27n2952:2453: taddvayena saha madhuraṁ sukhakaraṁ ca ālapati,
SA27n2952:2454: tadā tat karma pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmeti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2455: sa yadi taddvayaṁ mitratāsulabhāya saujanyamūlakāya vā ālāpāya niyojayati,
SA27n2952:2456: tarhi api premamayaṁ vācikaṁ karma bhavet |
SA27n2952:2458: athavā tayoḥ uttaraṁ dadāti - evaṁvidhaṁ karmāpi vācikaṁ karmetyucyate |
SA27n2952:2459: kiñca, yadā dvau gurujanau anyatra gacchataḥ tayoḥ anupasthitau sa tayoh guṇān praśaṁsati - 'mama priyau bāndhavau,
SA27n2952:2460: vayovṛddhau nandiyaḥ kimbilaśca evaṁ evaṁ prakāreṇa sadācāraiḥ yuktau |
SA27n2952:2462: evaṁ vidhaṁ karma pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmeti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2463: premamayamānasikakarma tadaiva sambhavati yadā pareṣāmupasthitau vānupasthitau vā sa cintayati,
SA27n2952:2464: - mama priyau bāndhavau vayuvṛddhau nandiyaḥ kimbilacca śatrutāyā jaṭilatāyāśca muktau bhavatām |
SA27n2952:2466: mahāśaya, asmākaṁ śarīrāṇi khalu pārthakyaṁ bhajanti |
SA27n2952:2467: yataḥ śarīrāṇi godhūmacūrṇavad vā mṛttikāvadvā cūrṇībhavanti |
SA27n2952:2469: tathāpi, asmākaṁ cittāni niścayena ekatvaṁ bhajanti |
SA27n2952:2473: sarvadā aikamatyaṁ poṣayāmaḥ tadā asmākaṁ cittāni ekatvaṁ bhajanti |
SA27n2952:2475: kathaṁ te ātmanāṁ cittāni tyaktvā pareṣāṁ sevāyai niyojayanti ?
SA27n2952:2482: kintu anye na vadanti 'mama prakṣālanayogyaṁ vastramasti' iti |
SA27n2952:2485: anyeṣu ekatamenāpi prathamaghoṣaṇāyāṁ sadṛśī sahayogitā sambhavati,
SA27n2952:2493: 'siṅgālaṁ prati upadeśe' gotamaḥ gṛhasthaṁ siṅgālamupadiśati - premamayaśārīrikavācikamānasikakarmabhiḥ parivrājakān brāhmaṇān ca sevasva,
SA27n2952:2496: parivrājakā api sahānubhavānuprāṇitāḥ santaḥ pratyupakāraṁ sādhayiṣyanti |
SA27n2952:2497: ṭīkāyāmucyate vistareṇa - premamayakāyikakarmabhiḥ - ityatra kāyikakarmasu kṛteṣu vyaktiḥ yadi premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ sṛjati tarhi tāni karmāṇi premamayānīti |
SA27n2952:2498: yadā ko'pi saṁsārī evaṁ cintayan bauddhamandiraṁ gacchati,
SA27n2952:2500: ' tatra ca gatā jalapātraṁ nītvā jalaṁ siñcati,
SA27n2952:2501: bhikṣūṇāṁ padaṁ vā pṛṣṭaṁ vā saṁvāhayati - ityādīni karmāṇi premamayakāyikakarmāṇītyucyate |
SA27n2952:2502: yadā ko'pi saṁsārī paśyati - bhikṣavo bhikṣārthaṁ grāmaṁ praviśantīti,
SA27n2952:2503: sa ca vadati śraddhayā tebhyaḥ annaṁ vā dugdhaṁ vā bhojyaṁ vā dehīti,
SA27n2952:2505: kiñca, yadā sa śraddhayāntarikatayā ca dharmaṁ śṛṇoti,
SA27n2952:2506: vadati ca 'sādhūktaṁ tvayā'- tadā evaṁvidhāni karmāṇi premamayavācikakarmāṇiti kathyate |
SA27n2952:2508: 'asmākaṁ saṁsāram āśritya ye gurujanāstiṣṭhanti te śatrutvāt tathā utpātāt muktā bhavantu,
SA27n2952:2511: bhavacakrān mahāparinirvāṇasaṁvāde gotamaḥ bhikṣumupadiśati - ṣaṭ avasthāḥ santi - yābhiḥ lābho jāyate |
SA27n2952:2513: tathā hi - pareṣāṁ samakṣāṁ vā parokṣaṁ vā satīrthebhyaḥ bhikṣubhyaḥ prītiyukktakāyikavācikamānasikakarmasampādanam,
SA27n2952:2514: satīrtheṣu bhikṣuṣu bhikṣālabdhaṁ dravyaṁ vibhajya grahaṇam,
SA27n2952:2519: ṭīkāyāṁ vyākhyāyate - prītisnigdhakāyikakarmāṇi tānyeva yāni kāruṇikena hṛdayena kriyante |
SA27n2952:2520: evameva karuṇābhayamanaḥsādhyaṁ vācikaṁ karma premamayamiti kathyate |
SA27n2952:2522: asmin pāṭhe īdṛśī karmasamaṣṭiḥ sannyāsināṁ kṛte nirdiśyate |
SA27n2952:2524: karuṇāmayahṛdayenānupreritāḥ santaḥ sannyāsinaḥ yadā sadācāraṁ sādhayanti tadā tat karma prītisnigdhakāyikakarmetyucyate |
SA27n2952:2525: yadā gṛhasthā janāḥ śraddhāpradarśanārthaṁ avaśiṣṭādhāraṁ gacchanti,
SA27n2952:2528: bhikṣārthaṁ grāmamāgacchantaṁ bhikṣumālokya taṁ draṣṭuṁ gacchanti,
SA27n2952:2533: yadā sannyāsinaḥ kāruṇikacittānupreritāḥ santaḥ sada cāramupadiśanti,
SA27n2952:2540: gṛsthānāṁ prītisnigdhāvācikakarmāṇi tadaiva bhavanti yadā vadanti,
SA27n2952:2552: ' 'ādhyātmikasampradāyaṁ nimantrayāmaḥ teṣāṁ kṛte ca kaṭhinaṁ bhojyaṁ sādhayāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:2560: yadā bhikṣavaḥ pratyūṣe utthāya dehasādhanānte avaśiṣṭādhārasamīpa prakṣānārthaṁ yānti,
SA27n2952:2562: viviktasthāne upaviśya cintayanti - 'bauddhamandirasya sannyāsinaḥ sukhinaḥ bhavantu |
SA27n2952:2567: te vairāt upadravācca muktā bhavantu' tadā ityevaṁ teṣāṁ karuṇātmakamānasikakarma |
SA27n2952:2568: yadā bhikṣavaḥ paridheyavasanādinirmāṇāya navadīkṣitān sāhāyyaṁ kartuṁ gacchanti,
SA27n2952:2569: tadā tat karma pareṣāmupasthitau prītisnigdhaśārīrikakarmeti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2570: api ca, gurujanapādaprakṣālanaṁ śraddhayā abhyarthanājñāpanamityādīni karmāṇi pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ prītisnigdhadaihikakarmāṇi ityucyate |
SA27n2952:2571: yadā dīkṣiteṣu navīnā vā prācīnā vā dārumayadravyādīni vahiḥ viśṛṁkhalaṁ parityajya anyatra gacchanti,
SA27n2952:2572: tadā kaścidbhikṣuḥ tāni dravyāṇi suśṛṁkhalaṁ sthāpayati viraktiprakāśaṁ na kṛtvaiva |
SA27n2952:2573: sa manyate yat uktaṁ karma tasya svasyeva karma |
SA27n2952:2576: agraja tissa' ete śraddhāsūcakāḥ śabdāḥ pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmaṇā dyotakāḥ |
SA27n2952:2577: bauddhamandire agrajadevasya agrajatissasyānupasthitau ko'pi bhikṣuryadi evaṁ vadati - 'asmākamagrajaḥ devaḥ kutra gataḥ,
SA27n2952:2580: ' tadā eṣā uktiḥ pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ kāruṇikavācikakarmeti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2581: vayaṁ yadā prītisnigdhaiḥ locanaiḥ aparān drakṣyāmaḥ,
SA27n2952:2583: yadi cintyate 'agrajaḥ devaḥ agrajaḥ tissaḥ ca pīḍāyāḥ ca asvāsthyāt ca muktau bhavatām |
SA27n2952:2584: ' tarhi etādṛśaṁ cintanaṁ pareṣāmupasthitau premamayakarmeti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2586: iyaṁ ṭīkā varṇayati - 'kāruṇikacittānupreritāḥ santaḥ bhikṣavaḥ yadā yathāyathamācaranti tadā tat karma premamayakāyikakarmetyucyate iti |
SA27n2952:2588: theravādīvyākhyānādidamāyāti yat maṅgalamaye manasi vicitraviṣayāṇāmadbhutaṁ miśraṇaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:2589: hitasādhakaṁ kāruṇikaṁ manaḥ katibhiḥ mānasikaiḥ guṇaiḥ anvitaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:2602: ' yathāyathamācaraṇāyānupreraṇāśaktitvena vivecanā lajjā ca hitasādhakacitteṣu vartete ityucyate |
SA27n2952:2603: vivecanā ca lajjā ca snāyavikaṁ doṣaṁ na sūcayataḥ kintu upayuktavyavahārapravarttakaguṇān sūcayataḥ |
SA27n2952:2604: tatra yathākramaṁ vyavahartuḥ svīyaruciḥ athavā pareṣāṁ ruciḥ kāryaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2606: snāyavikadoṣakaraṇādvātmavidveṣādvādūre vartamānaḥ śuddhasaujanyabodhaḥ tayoranupasthiteḥ upari nirbharaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2607: yadā kaścijjana ātmavidveṣaṁ poṣayati athavā pāpavyākulatāmanubhavati,
SA27n2952:2608: tadā sa vivekena lajjayā vā śūnyaḥ jāyate |
SA27n2952:2610: yataḥ asmin samaye sa svapakṣe parapakṣe vā yathāyathaṁ hitakaraṁ kāryaṁ na karoti |
SA27n2952:2611: yataḥ upayuktanītisammatavyavahāraḥ ātmavidveṣādidoṣebhyo muktena saujanyabodhena pravartito bhavati,
SA27n2952:2612: tataḥ nītisammataṁ jñānaṁ tathācaraṇaṁ prakṣobhajakleśamantareṇa sambhavati |
SA27n2952:2613: mānasikaṁ sāmyaṁ namanīyatvaṁ laghutvamātmavidveṣādiduṣṭabhāvapariharaṇameteṣāṁ prasaṁge āgativinayamavalambya kaścijjanaḥ viśuddhavyavahāraṁ kartuṁ śikṣate |
SA27n2952:2614: vyavahāre kasyacinnarasya bhrame lakṣite bhramasvīkaraṇena ca viśuddhīkaraṇecchayā ca pratikāro vidhīyate,
SA27n2952:2617: vivekaśca lajjā ca aparahitasādhakamānasikaguṇaiḥ saha virodhaṁ na bhajataḥ |
SA27n2952:2619: karuṇayā saha sarve ete guṇāḥ viśuddhavyavahāreṇa saha virājante |
SA27n2952:2620: kintu tatra bindumātraḥ kopo'pi na tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:2624: lajjā ca mānasikasukhabodhāya samamanobhāvāya vā sampadyante |
SA27n2952:2626: evañca, sadācāraḥ karuṇayā ānandena ca saha virājate |
SA27n2952:2627: saṁvādeṣu karuṇāmayakāryāvalī samaṣṭigatabhāvena kevalaṁ dharmācaraṇakāriṇāṁ kṛte ālocyate |
SA27n2952:2628: tatra buddhaḥ ānandaḥ anuruddhaḥ kimbilaḥ nandiyaḥ ityādīnāṁ parasparasaṁvādo'sti |
SA27n2952:2629: tatra karuṇāsamṛddhakarmasampādanāya sannyāsinaḥ prati buddhasyopadeśo vartate |
SA27n2952:2631: kāruṇikakarmabhiḥ parivrājakānāṁ ca viprāṇāṁ ca sevārthaṁ siṁgalaṁ prati tasyopadeśo'sti |
SA27n2952:2632: atra hetuḥ - parivrājakāśca viprāśca sahānubhūtiśīlāḥ santaḥ tameva upakariṣyanti |
SA27n2952:2633: saṁvādeṣu ālocitānāṁ karuṇāsiktakarmaṇāṁ pradhānāḥ kartāraḥ hi bhikṣavaḥ |
SA27n2952:2634: tathāpi idamapi avaśyameva gamyate yat sādhāraṇā janā api bhikṣūṇāṁ viśuddhaṁ vyavahāraṁ tathā upadeśaṁ gṛhītvā upakṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
SA27n2952:2635: bhikṣūn prati kāruṇikakarmopadeśānāṁ kaściddoṣaḥ api dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2636: tathā hi - te sādhāraṇajanebhyaḥ kāruṇikakarmalābhāya pralubdhā bhavitumarhanti |
SA27n2952:2637: atra buddhasya kaṭhoraṁ vidhānamasti yat bhikṣavaḥ yathāyathaṁ bhikṣālabdhaṁ dravyaṁ bhuñjīran |
SA27n2952:2640: ata ea hitakarakāruṇikacittena anuprāṇitāḥ santaḥ janāḥ pramamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi kartuṁ pravattante |
SA27n2952:2641: etāni karmāṇi sampādayantaḥ abyāsakāriṇaḥ tasmin kṣaṇe eva cittānuṣaṅgaṁ sukhamanubhavanti |
SA27n2952:2645: tathā hi - 1. nirvāṇopalabdhiḥ sarvavidhasāpekṣavyāpāreṣu sthāpitā bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:2648: 4. mālinyaṁ tathā punarjanma iti sahajātā pravaṇatā dūraṁ gabhiṣyati |
SA27n2952:2652: sarvavidhasāpekṣavyāpāreṣu duḥkhabodhajāgaraṇāt sannyāsī yathā arhatpuruṣo bhaviturmahati tasya lābhāḥ jāyante |
SA27n2952:2653: 'karuṇāayakarmaṁ ityasya viśleṣaṇaṁ karoti ṭīkā -- karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ karuṇānvitasevābhiḥ,
SA27n2952:2654: yasmāt saptavidhā śikṣārthinaḥ karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ sadaikyavantaṁ sevante |
SA27n2952:2655: yena bhikṣuṇā hānikarāḥ prabhāvā vinaṣṭāḥ sa sampūrṇakāruṇikakarmabhiḥ ācāryaṁ sevate |
SA27n2952:2657: śikṣārthinaḥ vā aparejanā vā mārgābhijñatāṁ labhante |
SA27n2952:2658: tathā ca 'srotaḥpraveśinaḥ' 'sakṛdagāminaḥ' 'anāgāminaḥ' 'anāgāminaḥ' arjjanasya mārgasya viṣayamadhikṛtya jñānamarjayanti,
SA27n2952:2659: tathāpi te sampūrṇaṁ karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ guruṁ na sevante |
SA27n2952:2660: kintu sampūrṇo muktaḥ puruṣaḥ arhajjanasya sukhāsvādaṁ prāpya guruṁ karuṇāmayakarmabhi sevate |
SA27n2952:2662: tadviṣayakasampūrṇabodhāt sa punaḥ punaḥ punarjanmane ākāṅkṣāṁ dūrīkaroti |
SA27n2952:2664: tasmāt sa punareva kutrāpi āsaktiṁ na darśayati athavā tatra ghṛṇāmapi na prakāśayati |
SA27n2952:2666: ete prabhāvāḥ etāvatkālaṁ tasya citte āsan |
SA27n2952:2667: kintu teṣāṁ nāśāt sa sampūrṇaṁ nirvāṇasukhamanubhavati |
SA27n2952:2670: yā mānasikadūṣaṇāt naraṁ citaṁ muktaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2671: tathā ca, 'kṣudratarachoṭikā'viṣayikī ṭīkā vadati - yadā sannyāsī pratyakṣajñānagamyaṁ viṣayaṁ pratyakṣaṁ jānāti tadā sa premamayaṁ manaḥ poṣayati |
SA27n2952:2672: yadyapīdaṁ gabhirāntardṛṣṭidvārā - nirvāṇopalabdhidvārā prema sṛjati tathāpi sāmānyārthayuktā karuṇā asmin prasaṁge na āyāti - dhammapālena tadīyaṭīkāyāṁ viśuddhimārgaṁ vyākhyāsu viśadārthaṁ prakaṭitaḥ |
SA27n2952:2673: premakaruṇādayaḥ ye mānasikaguṇā indriyavadbhiḥ prāṇibhiḥ saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayanti te viṣayatvena na āyānti yadā dhyāninaḥ manaḥ nirvāṇaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:2674: kramikānuśāsanebhyaḥ uddhṛtasya prāguktasyānucchedasya ālocanāyām sāntardṛṣṭikaruṇāyāḥ rūpakāśritaṁ samīkaraṇaṁ sūcayati yat sadṛśabhāvāpannaḥ vyavahāraḥ kṣudratarachoṭikāṭīkāyāmasti |
SA27n2952:2675: yā paravarttinīṁ ṭīkāṁ dhammapālasyābhimatena saha saṁgatisampannāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2676: ṭīkāṁ anusṛtya kathyate yat premamayī karuṇā paryāyatraye'vatiṣṭhate |
SA27n2952:2681: saṁvādeṣūllikhitāḥ sarve karuṇāsamparkitadṛṣṭāntāḥ niḥsaṁśayaṁ vā sasaṁśayaṁ vā samādheḥ praveśaparyāyasya athavā sthāpanāūlakaparyāyasya ca śaktyā saha virājante |
SA27n2952:2682: idaṁ karuṇātmakatāyāḥ ca karuṇāyāḥca prayoge pārthakyaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2683: dvitīyāṁ mānasiīmavasthāṁ sūcayati yā karuṇāśakti dhārayati - prāthamikaparyāyāt sthāpanāparyāyaṁ yāvat |
SA27n2952:2684: kramikānuśāsaneṣu gotamaḥ bhikṣūṇupadiśati yat karuṇayā vā mānasamuktyā vā saha tulanīyaṁ na karmāpi viṣayaṁ sa paśyati |
SA27n2952:2688: gotamaḥ bhikṣūn āha - yadi te muktipradhānāṁ karuṇāṁ prati sayatnaṁ manoyogaṁ dadati,
SA27n2952:2689: tarhi krodho na jāyate athavā jātaḥ krodho'pi dūraṁ gacchati |
SA27n2952:2690: ṭīkāyāmucyate prītiḥ kathaṁ manasaḥ muktiḥ bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:2692: eṣā eva karuṇā maṅgalakāmanayā indriyavadbhiḥ jīvaiḥ sahaḥ sambandhatvāt |
SA27n2952:2693: kiñca, yataḥ sakaruṇaṁ manaḥ pratibandhakādiviruddhaguṇebhyaḥ muktaṁ bhavati,
SA27n2952:2694: tataḥ ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ manasaḥ muktiriti kathyate |
SA27n2952:2696: kruddhajanasyāpi karuṇāyāṁ sañjātāyāṁ manasaḥ muktiḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:2698: kiyatā parimāṇena iyameva karuṇā tasyāḥ prāthamikaṁ rūpamapi viṣayopayogi |
SA27n2952:2700: 'manaso muktiḥ' iti kathanena sa kevalaṁ karuṇāsthāpanāparyāyaṁ sūcayati |
SA27n2952:2702: yadi kaścijjanaḥ vipado'pareṣāmuddhārāya karaṇatvaṁ vrajati tarhi sa teṣāṁ 'muktiḥ' ityucyate |
SA27n2952:2704: evañca, yadā karuṇā yathārīti dhyānamagnatāyai kṛṣyate,
SA27n2952:2706: yataḥ krodhānmanaso muktaye karuṇāyā viśiṣṭā paṭutāsti,
SA27n2952:2717: gabhīraḥ samādhiḥ atyantamānandaḥ ceti anayoḥ miśraṇena mānasikī daśā asvābhāvikī iti dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2720: tadā etāvanniṣpeṣaṇaṁ tiṣṭhati yat paramasukhaṁ na sambhavati |
SA27n2952:2721: prāthamikanimagnatālābhāya vinayanavyāpāre sā śikṣā kriyate yatra praceṣṭāyāḥ śaktiḥ ca samādheḥ sthiratā ca ityanayoḥ madhye samatā sthāpyate |
SA27n2952:2722: phalataḥ, tīvrasya atha ca udvegamuktasya manasaḥ samādhiḥ sambhavati |
SA27n2952:2725: tatprakṛtiviśleṣaṇāya viśuddhimārge buddhaghoṣaḥ ekaṁ sundaraṁ dṛṣṭāntaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:2726: bhāratīyāḥ śalyavidaḥ jale bhāsamāneṣu padmapatreṣu śalyakriyākaraṇāya śikṣāṁ dadati |
SA27n2952:2728: atyutsāhī śikṣārthī tatpatraṁ nimagnaṁ karoti athavā tatpatraṁ sampūrṇaṁ dvidhā kṛntati |
SA27n2952:2729: bhītipravaṇastu padmapatre balasya prayogāya samartho na bhūtvā tatpatrakarttanāya vyartho bhavati |
SA27n2952:2731: sa padmapatraṁ nimagnaṁ na kṛtvāpi tatpatraṁ sampūrṇaṁ karttitumarhati |
SA27n2952:2737: ata eva paramasukhena saha muktapremāsvādaḥ durlabhaḥ |
SA27n2952:2739: samabhāvenaiva dhyānagatavastuṣu manasaḥ ca ānuṣaṁgikamānasikaviṣayāṇāṁ ca sthāpanaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2740: samādheḥ asmin paryāye idameva eṣāṁ mānasikānāṁ viṣayāṇāmapūrvaṁ vaiśiṣṭyam |
SA27n2952:2743: kiñca, āsaktiḥ sarvadā vyākulatayā saha vartate yatra vihvalatāyāḥ prāvaṇyaṁ dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2745: yata āsaktyāḥ sadāvarttamānā sahacarī vyākulatā sābhiprāyamilanasādhakalakṣyasya upalabdhaye pratibandhakatāṁ sṛjati |
SA27n2952:2751: tathāpi, manasaḥ ca mānasaviṣayāṇāṁ a dhyānamagnatāśaktirasti tataḥ,
SA27n2952:2752: manasā saha te sarve viṣayāḥ sthāpanābhidhānena viśiṣyante |
SA27n2952:2756: manomuktisādhanāya karuṇāyai vā dhyāninā puruṣeṇa avalambanīyāḥ paryāyā visuddhimagge vistareṇālocitāḥ |
SA27n2952:2758: samāsataḥ, poṣaṁ gatāyāḥ karuṇāyāḥ sāmānyīkaraṇārthaṁ tathā niviḍatāpādanārthaṁ paddhatistatra varṇitā |
SA27n2952:2762: tataḥ, sa yathā sukhī bhaviṣyatīti kāmayate,
SA27n2952:2763: tathā anye'pi kāmayante iti avabudhya sa svabhāvataḥ apareṣāṁ maṅgalaṁ kāmayate |
SA27n2952:2764: tataḥ, sa priyadharmaguruṣu anyatamāya karuṇāṁ poṣayitum ārabhate |
SA27n2952:2765: idamucyate yat abhyāsakārī tadīyagurudevasya utsāhavardhakaṁ priyaṁ vākyaṁ smṛtvā,
SA27n2952:2767: upayuktaśikṣaṇaṁ prāpya ca anāyāsenaiva tasmai karuṇārpaṇāya samartho bhavati |
SA27n2952:2768: tataḥ abhyāsakārī paryāyakrameṇa priyamitrāya karuṇārpaṇāya ceṣṭate |
SA27n2952:2770: tathā ca ceṣṭate nirapekṣajanāya ca śatrumanobhāvāpannajanāya cāpi |
SA27n2952:2771: ayamāśayaḥ - sa sarveṣu janeṣu karuṇāyā vistārāya tadīyacittaṁ sampūrṇaṁ namanīyaṁ dakṣaṁ ca sādhayati |
SA27n2952:2772: atredaṁ sambhavati yat abhyāsakārī śatrubhāvāpannaṁ janamanusmṛtya ātmani śatrutāṁ poṣaiṣyati,
SA27n2952:2774: jātavairasya anyatra sthāpanāya tathā tat sambhāvanāhrāsāya buddhaghoṣaḥ katividhān vimarśān kathayati |
SA27n2952:2779: abhyāsakārī yadi vairaṁ poṣayati tarhi sa paryavekṣate yat sa tatkṣaṇāt vidveṣamiśritaṁ mānasikaṁ duḥkhaṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:2782: tasmāt, maraṇāt paraṁ duḥkhamaya-punarjanma yathā bhavati tathā ca vyāhatā bhavati ādhyātmikasamṛddhiḥ |
SA27n2952:2784: tarhi sa svayaṁ vidveṣamiśritaānasikakaṣṭāt mukto bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:2785: kiñca, sa bhaviṣyati svalpavairasṛṣṭaye hetūn sṛjati |
SA27n2952:2788: api ca, yadyapi kaścid vairī uparyuktaiḥ sarvaiḥ upāyaiḥ abhyāsakāriṇamapakarttuṁ yāti,
SA27n2952:2789: tathāpi vairijanaṁ prati pratihiṁsā na karttavyā |
SA27n2952:2790: yataḥ kaścit janaḥ aparasya yatparimāṇamapakāramicchati tadapekṣayādhikataraṁ duḥkhaṁ sa prāpnoti,
SA27n2952:2793: naitādṛśaḥ ko'pi janaḥ yaḥ kasmiṁsicit samaye kasyāpi na mātā pitā bhaginī bhrātā vā bhavati |
SA27n2952:2795: yasmāt punarjanma asmākaṁ paścāt anirdiṣṭakālaṁ vitatya tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:2796: tasmāt adya pṛthivyāṁ na ko'pi janaḥ asti yo'smākaṁ niviḍaṁ sambandhaṁ nāgataḥ |
SA27n2952:2797: asmākaṁ mātṛrūpeṇa yā vyaktiḥ ekadā asmān tasyāḥ aṅke sthāpayitvā,
SA27n2952:2800: atha ca tāṁ prati adhunā vayaṁ śatrutāṁ poṣayāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:2801: pitṛrūpeṇāyaṁ janaḥ asmākaṁ pālanāya dīrdhaṁ kālaṁ kaṭhoraṁ śramaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:2802: asmākaṁ bhaginīrūpeṇa vā bhrātṛrūpeṇa vāyaṁ jano vividhaiḥ upāyaiḥ asmākaṁ sahāyatāṁ jagāma |
SA27n2952:2803: evam, etādṛśaṁ janaṁ prati vairaṁ na karttavyam,
SA27n2952:2804: yataḥ atīte kāle sa janaḥ asmākaṁ kṛte upakāraṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:2805: evaṁvidhābhiścintābhiḥ manaḥsaṁyogāt abhyāsakārī śatrujanaṁ prati karuṇāpoṣaṇakāle jātakrodhasyānyatra sthāpanāya paṭutaraḥ jāyate |
SA27n2952:2806: śatrutāyā vināśaṁ kṛtvā tathā kāṁścit mānasikīṁ samatā prāpya abhyāsakārī taṁ prati karuṇāṁ pālayitum agrasaro bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:2809: nirapekṣajanāya cānubhavati sā karuṇaiva asmai janāya karttavyā abhyāsakāriṇā janena |
SA27n2952:2810: evaṁ so'bhyāsakārī eteṣāṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya karuṇāsaṁkrāntāṁ tīvrāmabhijñatāmavaśyameva racayet |
SA27n2952:2811: tataśca, sa śatrujanaṁ prati karuṇāṁ nayati |
SA27n2952:2812: anena abhyāsena dhyānī puruṣasḥ svabhāvata eva sarvajīvahitecchayā karmāṇi ācarituṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:2817: tarhi tena ātmaparabhedabādhaḥ bhagnaḥ jātaḥ iti ucyate |
SA27n2952:2821: tena karuṇā gabhīrā ca ekaniṣṭhā ca bhavati |
SA27n2952:2823: tataḥ abhyāsakārī tathārīti karuṇāyāḥ parisaramāgatānāṁ jīvānāṁ saṁkhyāṁ vardhayati |
SA27n2952:2824: tathā ca sa uttarottaraṁ sārvalaukikaṁ paryāyaṁ yāvat karuṇāṁ netuṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:2825: sagotrīyavacaneṣu ātmā manibhaddaḥ gotamaṁ prati ślokaṁ vadati - manasvī janaḥ sarvadā bhāgyavān |
SA27n2952:2830: gotamaḥ prativadati - manasvī janaḥ sarvadā bhāgyavān |
SA27n2952:2834: sa hānihīnatāyāṁ nandati samagraṁ divasaṁ samagrāṁ rajanīṁ ca sa sarveṣu jīveṣu snihyati |
SA27n2952:2837: gotamasya ślokā nirdiśanti yat yo jano manasvitāyāḥ anuśīlanaṁ karoti sa vairāt na mukto bhavati |
SA27n2952:2838: kintu yo janaḥ hānihīnatāyāṁ nandati sarvadā,
SA27n2952:2839: sarveṣu jīveṣu ca snihyati sa vairānmukto jāyate |
SA27n2952:2842: sa vairāt na mukto bhaviṣyati iti ṭīkā svīkaroti |
SA27n2952:2844: ṭīkā viśliṣyati yat buddhenoccārite dvitīye padye uddiṣṭo janaḥ arhatpuruṣaḥ |
SA27n2952:2845: sa prema ca karuṇāṁ ca manasi pālayati |
SA27n2952:2848: viśuddhimārgamanusṛtya kathyate yat manasvitā sāvadhānatā vā hitakaro mānasikaḥ viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:2851: yat hitakaramānasikaviṣayāḥ ahitakaramānasikaviṣayaiḥ saha sthātuṁ na śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:2852: yadā manasvitā vā sāvadhānatā vā ityākhyaḥ hitakaro mānasiko viṣayaḥ asthāyibhāvena upasthitastiṣṭhati tadā ko'pi ahitakaro mānasiko viṣayo na tatra sthātum arhati |
SA27n2952:2854: tarhi tasya manaḥ varttamāne muhūrtte svabhāvata eva krodhānmuktaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:2855: sa hitakaramanoyuktaḥ yadā bhavati tadā sa trayodaśamānasikaguṇaiḥ anvitastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:2871: tathā hi mānasikaṁ sukhaṁ samavṛttitā ca |
SA27n2952:2875: sa bhaviṣyati kāle sadṛśīṁ hitakarīṁ pravaṇatāṁ sṛjati,
SA27n2952:2878: manasvitayā śatrutāyāḥ anyatra sthapanaṁ na paryāptam,
SA27n2952:2879: manasvī sāvadhānī vā janaḥ śatrutāyā muktaḥ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:2881: atra hetuḥ - dhyānamagnatāparyāye mānasamuktau satyāṁ sā muktiḥ alpakālaṁ manaḥ krodhamuktaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2883: yo'bhyāsakārī dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ vyāpya dakṣatayā karuṇāṁ poṣayati,
SA27n2952:2885: tathā ca, dhyānamagnatayā saha paramasukhaṁ bhuñkte |
SA27n2952:2886: api ṭīkākārāḥ gotamoktaślokasya nimnarūpāṁ vyākhyāṁ kurvanti tathā hi - vairibhāvāt yathāyathaṁ mānasamuktisādhanāya karuṇā dhyānamagnatayā poṣayitavyā |
SA27n2952:2888: yataḥ, manasvitā anyatra sthāpanena manaḥ kevalaṁ svalpakālaṁ vairāt muktaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:2889: eṣā manasvitā na vairāt santoṣāvahā muktiḥ |
SA27n2952:2890: evameva karuṇā avadamanena svalpakāmaṁ mānasamuktiṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:2891: eṣāpi vairāt santoṣāvahā muktiḥ bhavituṁ nārhati |
SA27n2952:2893: ṭīkā vyākhyāti yat prathame śloke uddiṣṭaḥ janaḥ adhunāpi 'ahaṁ manasvī vā sāvadhānī vā' iti cintayā manasvitānuśīlanaṁ karoti (saṁyuttanikāya, 1.305)
SA27n2952:2898: sa nopalabdhiṁ karoti yat kevalamanityā mānasikāḥ śārīrikāśca padārthā vartante |
SA27n2952:2899: tatra kasmiṁścidapi padārthe na cirasthāyī ātmā dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2902: sa āśābhagnaḥ sañjātavairāt na mukto bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:2906: so'nubhavati yat paramārthataḥ nityaḥ sārabhūtaḥ ca 'aham' nāsti,
SA27n2952:2907: yo'haṁ daihikabhūteṣu manasi vā sarvatra dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:2908: saḥ 'ahamasmi' ahamasmi mamansvī' - evaṁvidhayā cintayā na punaḥ baddhaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:2910: arhatpuruṣaḥ vaireṇa saha sarvavidhamānasikadūṣaṇebhyaḥ ātmānaṁ citaṁ moktumarhati |
SA27n2952:2912: sa sarvadā prema ca karuṇāṁ ca pālayitumalam |
SA27n2952:2914: krakacadṛṣṭāntasaṁvāde gotamaḥ vividhāsu avasthāsu kāruṇikacittalālanena prayojanamupadiśati |
SA27n2952:2916: buddhaḥ bhikṣūnāha yat teṣāṁ sambodhanaṁ pañcadhā bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:2922: gotamaḥ bhikṣūn jñāpayati yat yenopāyenaiva teṣāṁ sambodhanaṁ bhavatu vā na vā,
SA27n2952:2924: sa teṣāṁ vinayanaṁ viśliṣyati - asmākaṁ cittāni unmārgagāmīni na bhavantu |
SA27n2952:2929: cittagatakaruṇayā vayam āhvāyakena janena saha sambandhasya chedaṁ na kariṣyāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:2931: tena jagatā saha asmākaṁ sambandhaḥ dṛḍhaḥ bhavatu |
SA27n2952:2938: yādṛśī karuṇā bhikṣūṇāṁ tiṣṭhatu tāmeva bhiksavaḥ janāya poṣayet |
SA27n2952:2952: yadā cittaṁ dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat kṛṣṭaṁ bhavati,
SA27n2952:2953: tadā tat cittaṁ jagatparivartanaṁ karotīti kathyate |
SA27n2952:2954: idaṁ rūpamayaṁ sūkṣmajagat praviśati yadi dhyānamagnātāyāḥ prathamaparyāya - catuṣṭayaṁ vyāpya kṛṣyate |
SA27n2952:2955: athavā idaṁ rūpahīnaṁ sūkṣmataraṁ jagat praviśati yadi ādhikyena kṛṣyate |
SA27n2952:2956: anena jagatā saha anvitasya manasaḥ avasthā vistṛtāḥ |
SA27n2952:2957: yataḥ svalpakālamapi dūṣaṇaparihārāya mahat sāmarthyamasti; api ca,
SA27n2952:2964: yaḥ samādhiḥ sādhu kṛṣyate tathā dhyānamagnatāyāḥ prathame paryāye tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:2969: yataḥ asmin samaye samādhiḥ indriyatṛṣṇādimayajagataḥ sarvavidhasīmāvaddhatābhyaḥ muktaḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:2970: (ṭīkā, 2.58-89) yā iyam ākhyā dhyānamagnatāparyāyagatasamādhiṁ nirdiśati sā tatraiva paryāye karuṇānvitacittaṁ sūcayati |
SA27n2952:2971: evamasmin saṁvāde gotamo bhikṣūnupadiśati yat te dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat karuṇāṁ poṣayeyuḥ |
SA27n2952:2972: yadi te dhyānena kiyatā parimāṇena - karuṇākarṣaṇe saphalāḥ bhavanti tarhi teṣāṁ cittāni karuṇayā yujyante,
SA27n2952:2974: dhyānaparavarttisamaye te hitakaracittena saha bhārasāmyaṁ sthāpayanti tathā ca mānasikaṁ sukhaṁ vā samavṛttitvaṁ vā anubhavanti |
SA27n2952:2976: krakacadṛṣṭānte gotamaḥ kāruṇikacittasya balasya ca sthāyitvasya ca dṛṣṭāntaṁ kathayati |
SA27n2952:2977: sa bhikṣūn pṛcchati - ko janaḥ yuṣmāsu khananena vā mūtratyāgena vā pṛthivyā vināśaṁ kartuṁ samarthaḥ bhaviṣyatīti |
SA27n2952:2980: tataḥ gotamaḥ pṛthivyāḥ abhedyatā kāruṇikacittasya śaktiḥ ityanayoḥ madhye tulanāṁ pradarśayati |
SA27n2952:2981: sa bhikṣūnāha - api ko'pi bhikṣuḥ pañcasu upāyeṣu anyatamamavalambya apareṇa saha ālapet ?
SA27n2952:2983: athavā api te karuṇārdrahṛdayena aparajanena saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayet ?
SA27n2952:2984: bhikṣubhiḥ nimnoktopāyena vinayanaṁ kartavyaṁ - sarvaiḥ jīvaiḥ saha yat jagat tat sarvameva kāruṇikacittasya lakṣyasthalaṁ vidhāya vayaṁ cittena samagreṇa jagatā saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayitumalam |
SA27n2952:2985: jagadivedaṁ cittamakṣobhaṁ vairānmuktaṁ viśālaṁ vistṛtaṁ parimāṇaśūnyaṁ ca |
SA27n2952:2987: yathā ko'pi janaḥ khanitreṇa ca pātreṇa ca viśālapṛthivīvināśāya na samarthaḥ bhavati,
SA27n2952:2988: tathā pañcavidhāni vacanāni pratikūlatayā karuṇārdracittavantaṁ janaṁ abhibhavituṁ na śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:2990: pṛthivī yathā ākramaṇaṁ nirākaroti gabhīratvāt aparimeyatvāt ca,
SA27n2952:2992: tadvat, gotamaḥ bhikṣūnapadiśati yat te karuṇāṁ pālayiṣyanti |
SA27n2952:2995: ūrṇāmayakhaṇḍena gharṣaṇāt susyūtaḥ viḍalacarmapuṭaḥ karkaśaḥ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:2999: sagotrīyavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat yasmin gṛhe bahavaḥ strīlokāḥ kintu atyalpāḥ puruṣāstiṣṭhanti,
SA27n2952:3001: tadvat, yo bhikṣuḥ karuṇārūpamanomuktiṁ na sādhayati sa niścitamamānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ upadrutaḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3003: anyataśca, yasmin gṛhe bahavo narāḥ kintu atyalpā nāryyaḥ tiṣṭhanti,
SA27n2952:3004: tadgṛhaṁ sahasā dasyubhiḥ ākrāntaṁ na bhavati,
SA27n2952:3005: tathā yo bhikṣuḥ karuṇārupamanomuktiṁ sādhayati saḥ amānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ abhibhūtaḥ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:3007: saṁvādānāṁ pañcamasaṁgrahe 'karuṇāsaṁvāde' gotamaḥ bhikṣūnupadiśati kathaṁ dhyātavyamiti,
SA27n2952:3010: - lābhajanakeṣu abhyāseṣu dakṣaḥ janaḥ kiṁ kuryāt yadā sa śāntipūrṇāṁ daśāṁ jānāti ?
SA27n2952:3020: jñānī karmaṇi vivicya saṁsāriṇaścānukṛtya sa kadāpi na nīcācaraṇamācaret |
SA27n2952:3027: dīrgho'thavā viśālaḥ madhyamo hrasvaḥ sūkṣmo'sūkṣmo vā dṛśyo vā adṛśyo vā,
SA27n2952:3028: dūravarttī vā nikaṭavartī vā jīvo yo vā janiṣyate te sarve hṛdayena sukhino bhavanti |
SA27n2952:3029: ko'pi janaḥ aparaṁ janaṁ na pratārayet |
SA27n2952:3030: ko'pi janaḥ kasyāpi samīpe kutrāpi ca sammānāt garvito na bhavet |
SA27n2952:3032: krodhād vā vidveṣād vā sarvān jīvān prati asīmaṁ cittaṁ pālayet |
SA27n2952:3033: yathā mātā svīyajīvanavyayenāpi ekamātraṁ putraṁ rakṣati |
SA27n2952:3034: asīmaṁ premamayaṁ cittaṁ poṣayet bādhaṁ krodhaṁ virodhaṁ vāntareṇa samagraṁ jagat prati upari,
SA27n2952:3039: upaveśane śayane vā sa manasvitāmavalambya dṛḍhasaṁkalpo bhavet |
SA27n2952:3041: mithyāmataṁ parihāya satyamācaraṇaṁ tathā satyadṛṣṭimavalambya kāmyavastuṣu āsaktiṁ dūrikṛtya sa nūnaṁ na navagarbhaṁ gamiṣyati |
SA27n2952:3043: ṭīkāyā mate yadā bhikṣāvaḥ uktasaṁvādagataviṣayamavagatya tasya upadeśān anusaranti tathā karuṇāṁ poṣayanti tadā vighnakāriṇaḥ devāḥ kamapi vighnaṁ na sṛṣṭvā santuṣṭāḥ sukhinaḥ sahayoginaḥ sahāyakāśca bhavanti |
SA27n2952:3045: evaṁ daivaśaktīnāmabhibhavāya karuṇāyāḥ sāmarthyamasti viśākhānāmadheyasya bhikṣoḥ upākhyānenāsya matasya samarthanaṁ kriyate,
SA27n2952:3046: yasya karuṇāśīlanāt amānuṣyaḥ śaktayaḥ tasya sannidhau parasparaṁ śāntipūrṇabhāvena vasanti |
SA27n2952:3048: tāḥ śaktayo yadi karuṇānuśīlanakāribhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saha sahayogitāṁ na kurvanti,
SA27n2952:3050: saṁgotrīyavacaneṣu gotamo vadati - yadi amānuṣyaḥ śaktayaḥ karuṇārūpamanomuktisādhanakāriṇāṁ bhikṣūṇām upadravaṁ kurvanti,
SA27n2952:3053: tathāpi, abhyāsakārī bhayādvā dāsyād vā amānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭādupadravādrakṣaṇaṁ na kāmayate |
SA27n2952:3054: varaṁ bhayāsaktigarvādīn doṣān parityajya manomuktirūpakaruṇāṁ karṣati - udāttabhāvam |
SA27n2952:3057: tataḥ tasya cittaṁ sthiraṁ sāmyāpannaṁ tathā paramasukhamayaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3059: tathā ca tat cittaṁ sarvavidhamānasikavipattipratirodhakāri bhavati |
SA27n2952:3062: tathā hi - sāmānyā nārī sapavatī gotamasya pradhānā śiṣyā āsīt |
SA27n2952:3063: karuṇānuśīlanaṁ kurvatī sā karuṇayā svīyahānipratirodhāya samarthā āsīt |
SA27n2952:3065: tasyā ānugatye aviśvāsī san tasyāḥ svāmī vāṇena tāṁ antumudyato'bhavat |
SA27n2952:3066: kintu sasakhī samavatī premṇā karuṇayā ca svāminaṁ mugdhamakarot |
SA27n2952:3067: ataḥ sa īpsitaṁ vadhaṁ samāptuṁ na śaśāka |
SA27n2952:3070: sā karuṇānuśīlane nipuṇā satyapi avaśeṣe tatkṛtahānikarakāryaphalāt agnidāhena amriyata |
SA27n2952:3071: abhyāsakāriṇaḥ karuṇā aparajanamanobhāvaṁ kalyāṇābhimukhaṁ kartuṁ samarthā iti spaṣṭo dṛṣṭāntaḥ saṁvādeṣu yadyapi nāsti,
SA27n2952:3072: tathāpi karuṇāyā īdṛśī śaktirasti iti viśuddhimārge kathyate |
SA27n2952:3073: samādhaye catvāriṁśadvastuṣu anyatamasya upari yathāyathaṁ dhyātumārabhate abhyāsakārī |
SA27n2952:3075: tasmāt prak sa nimnoktopāyena karuṇāṁ pālayedityupadiśyate |
SA27n2952:3076: dhyānaviṣayaṁ gṛhītā bhikṣuḥ prathamataḥ upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭānāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ sampradāyasya sīmāṁ nirdeśet |
SA27n2952:3077: tataḥ sa teṣāṁ kṛte evaṁvidhayā cintayā karuṇāṁ pālayet - 'te sukhino bhavantu,
SA27n2952:3079: tataḥ sa grāmasthānāṁ devatānāṁ kṛte karuṇāṁ pālayet |
SA27n2952:3080: tataḥ sa netṛsthānīyānāṁ janānāmupuri karuṇāṁ poṣayet ye janāḥ tasmai khādyādiṁ dadati |
SA27n2952:3081: tataśca sarveṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ tathā jīvānāṁ kṛte karuṇānuśīlanaṁ kuryāt |
SA27n2952:3082: upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭabhikṣūṇāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā sa tasya sahacareṣu komalahṛdayatāṁ janayati |
SA27n2952:3083: te ca ekatra tena saha sukhena vasanti |
SA27n2952:3084: upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭānāṁ devatānāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā tā devatāḥ komalahṛdayāḥ satyaḥ yathāyathaṁ rakṣaṇena taṁ sampūrṇaṁ rakṣanti |
SA27n2952:3085: netṛsthānīyānāṁ grāmavāsināṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā te komalahṛdayāḥ santaḥ yathāyathaṁ sayatnaṁ tasmai āvaśyakadravyadānena sevante |
SA27n2952:3086: mānavatāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā te mānavāḥ svacchahṛdayā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:3087: tataḥ, sa yadā parivrajati tadā te na avajñāṁ pradarśayiṣyanti |
SA27n2952:3088: sarveṣu jīveṣu karuṇāyāṁ pālitāyāṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvatra nirbādhaṁ gantuṁ samartho bhavati,
SA27n2952:3095: dhyānaviṣayatvena aparaviṣayasya grahaṇāt prāk anayā rītyā abhyāsakārī karuṇāṁ khalu pālayiṣyati |
SA27n2952:3098: premakaruṇānirbharaṁ dhyānaṁ bhūmirvā mṛttikā vā yatra samādhikarṣaṇaṁ vā antardṛṣṭikarṣaṇaṁ vā kriyate |
SA27n2952:3099: samyag jñānalābhāt paramapi evaṁvidhaṁ karṣaṇam avyāhataṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3101: viśuddhimārgāt uparyuktyanucchedaḥ saṁvādeṣu vā ṭīkāsu vā kevalaṁ dṛṣṭāntaḥ yatra spaṣṭam ucyate yat karuṇāyāḥ dhyānātmakamanuśīlanaṁ sapadi sukhena aparajanamanobhāvaṁ prabhāvitaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:3102: iyaṁ śikṣā dhyānamagnatāyāṁ kṛṣṭāṁ karuṇāṁ prati asāmānyāṁ mātrāṁ prakāśayati |
SA27n2952:3110: kramikavacaneṣu gotamo vyākhyāti yat kaścid bhikṣuḥ sarpeṇa dāruṇaṁ daṣṭo'bhavat,
SA27n2952:3111: yataḥ sa karuṇārdracittena sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭhayena saha sambandhaṁ na sthāpayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:3113: 72-73) gotama āha - bhikṣuṇā karuṇārdracittena sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭayena saha samparke sthāpite sati sa na daṣṭo'bhaviṣyat |
SA27n2952:3114: evaṁ sarpadaṁśanāt ātmanāṁ rakṣaṇāya abhyāsakāriṇaḥ sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭayena saha karuṇāmayacittena samparkaṁ sthāpayet evameva cintayitvā - karuṇā me'sti virupakkānāṁ kṛte karuṇā me ca erāpatānāṁ kṛte karuṇā me'sti chavyaputtānāṁ tathā kaṇhāgotamakānāṁ kṛte |
SA27n2952:3124: sare prāṇavantaḥ jīvāḥ sare ekatra pavitrāṇi dṛśyāni paśyantu |
SA27n2952:3131: ūrṇanābhāḥ kṛkalāsā mūṣikāśca sarve parimeyā ea |
SA27n2952:3138: yadā gotama āha buddhādayaḥ aparimeyāḥ iti,
SA27n2952:3145: gotamo bhikṣūṇ pradarśayati yat karuṇāpālanaṁ dharmīyasatyavyākhyānaṁ ceti hitakarakarmadvayena te ātmānaḥ rakṣituṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:3146: hānihīnatāṁ ca parihṛtya hānikarajīvebhyo dūraṁ gatvā tiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:3147: kiñca, sagotrīyavacaneṣu gotamo bhikṣūn upadiśati yat te karuṇayātmanaḥ rakṣituṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:3148: atra mallavīrasya ca tasya śikṣārthinaḥ ca dṛṣṭānto'sti |
SA27n2952:3150: mallavīra āha ahaṁ tvāṁ lakṣyayāmi, tvaṁ ca mām |
SA27n2952:3153: anyataśca, śikṣārthī āha - ahamātmānaṁ lakṣayāmi bhavānapi ātmānaṁ lakṣayatu iti |
SA27n2952:3154: gotamo vyākhyāti yat kartā śikṣārthinaḥ paddhatiṁ saphalamanusaret |
SA27n2952:3155: tathā ca upasaṁharati yat sa kartā manasvitāsthāpanena sadṛśīṁ rītimanukuryāt |
SA27n2952:3157: bhikṣavaḥ sveṣāṁ manasvitāyāḥ unnataye parasparasahayogitāṁ kuryuḥ, yā,
SA27n2952:3160: bhikṣavaḥ teṣāṁ praśāntaiḥ manoyogaiḥ ca vyahavāraiḥ dharmīyajīvanasamparkitapuraskārāṇāmudāharaṇāni pradarśayiṣyanti |
SA27n2952:3163: ya ātmānaṁ rakṣati sa parānapi rakṣati |
SA27n2952:3164: yo vā parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣati |
SA27n2952:3175: yadi abhyāsakārī ātmānamadhikṛtya athavā parānadhikṛtya svīyacittasya yatnaṁ gṛṇhāti,
SA27n2952:3180: yo bhikṣuḥ pārthivaviṣayagatamānandaṁ parihāya pradhānadhyānavastu aharniśaṁ pālayati karṣati ca so'rhatpuruṣasya daśāṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:3185: evaṁ 'ya ātmānaṁ rakṣati sa parānapi rakṣatīti |
SA27n2952:3189: 'sasnehayatnāvasthayā' ityāsyārthaḥ prāthamikaparyāyagatasahānubhūtānandena saha snehānvitasevayā sahānubhūtasukhena ceti |
SA27n2952:3190: yaḥ parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣati |
SA27n2952:3195: tathā karaṇena sāpekṣavastuvaiśiṣṭyaṁ jñātvā arhatpurusasyāvasthāṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:3196: evaṁ 'yaḥ parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣatīti' |
SA27n2952:3201: tasmin samaye hitakarahṛdayavān janaḥ bhaviṣyati kāle arhatpuruṣatvārjanāya kāraṇāni sṛjati |
SA27n2952:3202: asya viśvastasya hitakarasya ca cittasya kārānāt sa janaḥ kartṛrūpaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ nyūnatamataḥ svarge janiṣyate |
SA27n2952:3203: evaṁ yo'bhyāsakārī svīyānuśīlanena ātmānaṁ rakṣati so'rhatpuruṣaḥ san parānapi rakṣati |
SA27n2952:3206: sahānubhūtānandaḥ ca - iti udāttabhāvatrayānuśīlanena abhyāsakārī aparān hitāvahaṁ ca pratyakṣaṁ ca prabhāvitān karoti,
SA27n2952:3208: varaṁ, yo jana etān bhāvān karṣati,
SA27n2952:3210: niṣṭhuratvāt paradoṣādoṣāt ca rakṣati iti viṣayeṣu saṁvādā gurutvamāropayanti |
SA27n2952:3211: prāgukte saṁvāde gotamaḥ varṇayati yat abhyāsakārī aparān prati tasya manobhāvamadhikṛtya dhīrataya,
SA27n2952:3215: karuṇā, prema sahānubhūtānandaḥ iti udāttabhāvatrayabodhāya antimabhāvatrayaṁ vyākhyāyate |
SA27n2952:3216: ayamāśayaḥ - dhyānamagnatāparyāye sārvalaukikapremāditvena te bhāvā gamyante |
SA27n2952:3221: ete udāttā bhāvāḥ krodhādyanaitikavācakabhāvāt abhyāsakāriṇaṁ rakṣanti |
SA27n2952:3223: yathā antardṛṣṭyā abhyāsakārī sarvavidhamānasikadūṣaṇaṁ ciraṁ parityaktumagrasaro bhavati |
SA27n2952:3224: sa tathākaraṇena sarvavidhānuṣaṅgikaduḥkhaiḥ saha punarjanamana ātmānaṁ muñcati |
SA27n2952:3226: evaṁ parān prati svīyabhāvamavalambya so'bhyāsakārī svīyacittaṁ rakṣati,
SA27n2952:3228: ayaṁ saṁvādaḥ abhyāsakāriṇāṁ dṛṣṭāntamūlakakarmasu tathā dharmīyasamṛddhisamparkitatātparye'dhikaṁ gurutvamāropayati |
SA27n2952:3229: yadyapi atra sāmājikakarmopadeśānāṁ spaṣṭa ullekho nāsti,
SA27n2952:3230: tathāpīdaṁ gamyate yat sahānubhūtisamparkitopadeśānāṁ vistṛte pariprekṣite pareṣāṁ kṛte'bhyāsakāriṇāṁ hṛdayānubhūta udvego mukhyataḥ śikṣayā karmaniṣṭhaṁ prakāśitaḥ |
SA27n2952:3231: sāmājikodvegasya ca tadānuṣaṅgikakarmaṇo madhye'nivāryaḥ sambandho'sti - iti vayamanubhavāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:3236: viśeṣeṇa sahānubhūtimūlakopadeśeṣu sāmājikodvegena saha sāmājikakarmaṇaḥ samparkaṁ paśyati |
SA27n2952:3237: sa vyaktigatakṣetre tathā sahāyakabhrātrīyakarmaṇi - yatra aparaiḥ saha abhyāsakāriṇo yogo'sti,
SA27n2952:3239: sa premakaruṇāsamparkitadhyānātmakopadeśaiḥ saha paravartiparārthamūlakakarmaṇāṁ sambandhaṁ sthāpayituṁ prayojanaṁ nānvabhavat |
SA27n2952:3241: kintu atredaṁ gamyate it īdṛśadhyānānusaraṇāya īdṛśaparārthaparakarmaṇāṁ svābhāvikī pravaṇatā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3243: ye guṇāḥ 'sahānubhūtiḥ saralākaruṇāḥ premamayakarmāṇi' - iti eṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ prasaṁge prāyeṇa nālocitaḥ |
SA27n2952:3247: kramikavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat aṣṭau lābhāḥ santi |
SA27n2952:3262: tasyopalabdhiryadi mahattarā na bhavati tarhi 'sa brāhmajagat ārohati |
SA27n2952:3264: ṭīkayā viśleṣaṇamevam - sa bhayaṅkarān svapnān na paśyati |
SA27n2952:3266: tathāpi te svapnāḥ kevalaṁ śubhāḥ svapnā eva |
SA27n2952:3275: sarpaiḥ tāḍitā athavā vivaramadhye patitā iva |
SA27n2952:3278: kaścit gauḥ daṇḍāyamānaḥ san vatsāya dugdhaṁ dadāti sma |
SA27n2952:3279: kaścit vyādhaḥ hastena kuntaṁ dhṛtvā acintayat,
SA27n2952:3281: tena kunte nikṣipte sati sa kuntaḥ goḥ śarīram āhatya punareva tālapatramiva pratyāgataḥ |
SA27n2952:3283: na vā sthāpanaparyāyagatā karuṇā; api tu,
SA27n2952:3288: kintu ete lābhāḥ svabhāvataḥ sarvāsu avasthāsu ghaṭante iti kadāpi na saṁvādeṣu vā ṭīkāsu vā uktam |
SA27n2952:3289: gotamo'pi karuṇāyāḥ sahānubhūteśca mahatīṁ śaktiṁ dhṛtvāpi śatruśūnyo nāsīt |
SA27n2952:3290: īrṣyāparāyaṇo bhrātā devadatta eva tasya pramāṇam |
SA27n2952:3291: vividhāsu daśāsu manaso śaktiḥ ca parārthaṁ tacchakteḥ kāryakāritā cetyanayoḥ madhye samānupātaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ |
SA27n2952:3292: sahānubhūtiḥ manasaḥ kayācit śaktyā saha viśeṣeṇa nānvitā bhavati |
SA27n2952:3296: eṣu sarveṣu kṣetreṣu sahānubhūtiḥ paricālikā śaktirityabhidhīyate |
SA27n2952:3299: yadyapi karuṇārūpā manomuktiḥ parebhyaḥ kīdṛśaṁ hitaṁ sādhayati sa viṣayo nālocitaḥ,
SA27n2952:3300: tathāpi idaṁ niḥsaṁśayaṁ gamyate yat karuṇākarṣaṇaṁ kasyāpi sahānubhūtiṁ niviḍāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:3304: taddoṣapratikārā yadā ekatra niḥsaṁśayaṁ prakāśyante tadā teṣu madhye pratyakṣayogo dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:3307: tāṛśaḥ sahānubhavaḥ vartamānena vā bhāvinā puraskārena na kadāpi samarthyate |
SA27n2952:3311: tathāpi, karuṇārūpamanomuktisañjālalābhāstathā taddoṣapratikārā atīva vicitrāḥ pracurāḥ ca,
SA27n2952:3312: yata uccaparyāyagatamanaḥsañjātāsāmānyalābhāya eva ātyantiko manoyogo dīyate |
SA27n2952:3313: idaṁ niḥsaṁśayamucyate yat etādṛśaṁ manobalamapi svalpasamāhitabhāvasañjātalābhān janayati |
SA27n2952:3314: uparyukte saṁvāde karuṇājātalābhān ālocya gotamaḥ karuṇāvikāśaṁ praśasyāha aparimeyakaruṇākarṣaṇaśīlasya manasvino purusya nigaḍāḥ kṣayaṁ gacchanti |
SA27n2952:3315: sa saṁsāracakrasya bhittimūlaṁ nāśaṁ yātīti paśyati |
SA27n2952:3316: yo janaḥ kevalaṁ prāṇiviśeṣāya karuṇāṁ poṣayati sa tathākanraṇena hitasampādako jāyate |
SA27n2952:3317: yo mahān puruṣaḥ sarveṣāṁ prāṇināṁ kṛte sahānubhūtiśīlo bhavati sa pracuraṁ puṇyaṁ saṁgṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:3324: kaścijjanaḥ karuṇāmayacittasya samyakpoṣaṇena yat puṇyamarjayati tasya puṇye yaḥ ṣoḍaśo bhāgastasyāpi ekaṣoḍaśabhāgaṁ puṇyaṁ te na saccinvanti |
SA27n2952:3326: yo na hanti, na vā ghātayati aparaiḥ,
SA27n2952:3329: sarveṣāṁ bhūtānāṁ kṛte yasyāsti karuṇā sa kamapi janaṁ prati vairaṁ na poṣati |
SA27n2952:3332: sa saṁsāracakrasya bhittimūlaṁ nāśaṁ yātīti pasyati |
SA27n2952:3333: ayamāśayaḥ - yo jano'rhatpuruṣasyāvasthāṁ gataḥ sa daśa nigaḍān parityajati |
SA27n2952:3336: asyā asti karuṇā yā ayavahitahetutvaṁ vajati |
SA27n2952:3338: asyārthaḥ - vidveṣaḥ tathā a vidveṣasamparkitanigaḍā vināśaṁ yānti |
SA27n2952:3340: yataḥ sa karuṇayānvitaḥ san dūṣāṇasvarūpasaṁsāracakrabhittimūlasya tathākathitaṁ nāśaṁpaśyati |
SA27n2952:3343: te nigaḍāḥ saṁsāracakreṇa saha janaṁ badhnanti |
SA27n2952:3356: vividhāsu ṭīkāsu ālocitānāṁ dūṣaṇānāṁ parityāgāya spaṣṭopāyadvayamullikhati ṭīkā |
SA27n2952:3357: tathā hi - antardṛṣṭidvārā dūṣaṇānām unmūlanena sthāyiparityāgasyopāyaḥ (samucchedappahāna)
SA27n2952:3359: prathamaṁ bhāṣyamarhatpuruṣaṁ nirdiśati avyavahitakāraṇatvena aparimeyakaruṇayā saha antardṛṣṭiṁ pālayati |
SA27n2952:3361: sa karuṇāyā upari dhyānena dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat samādhiṁ pālayitvā sthāsyati |
SA27n2952:3362: tataśca dhyānamagnadaśyāyā utthāya sa cittasya ca śarīrasya ca viśiṣṭān tathā sāmānyān guṇān praveṣṭuṁ guṇān praveṣṭuṁ tadīyaṁ sutīkṣṇaṁ cittaṁ niyojayati |
SA27n2952:3363: pariṇāme cittasya ca śarīrasya ca pratyekaṁ viṣayamasthāyinaṁ parivartanaśīlaṁ tathā anirbharayogyaṁ paryavekṣya tasya cittaṁ svabhāvataḥ tasya nirvāṇasyānusandhānaṁ karoti yat sarvavidhaṁ pārthivaṁ parivarttanaṁ tathā asthāyitvamatikramya vartate |
SA27n2952:3364: parivartanaśīlaṁ jagat tathā parivartanahīnaṁ nirvāṇamadhikṛtya gabhīrāyāmantardṛṣṭau sañjātāyāmindriyākāṅkṣādimānasikanigaḍaiḥ bandhanasya prāvaṇyaṁ dūrībhavati |
SA27n2952:3365: yāḥ sarvāḥ pratikriyāḥ ciraṁ parityaktavyāḥ tāsāṁ na samarthanaṁ karotyayaṁ navāviṣkṛtaḥ bodhaḥ |
SA27n2952:3366: dvitīyā vyākhyā saṁvāde ullikhitaṁ kamapi janaṁ viśliṣyati yasya kevalamaparimeyaṁ premāsti |
SA27n2952:3367: īdṛśo janaḥ sampūrṇaṁ kintu alpakālaṁ vidveṣamūlakasarvaviṣayebhyo muktastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3373: ' tadā sa samāhitapremṇā dūṣaṇānāmasthāyi avadamanaṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:3374: abhyāsakāriṇo dūṣaṇāni dhyānamagnadaśāyāḥ paramapi dṛṣṭigocaratāṁ gantumarhanti |
SA27n2952:3375: tathāpi premadhyānakāle dhyānamagnapuruṣaḥ tadīyadūṣaṇānāṁ samīkṛtāvadamanena saha tṛptikaraṁ paramaṁ sukhamanubhavati |
SA27n2952:3376: aparimeyapremapoṣaṇāt so'ntardṛṣṭimaktaye bhittimūlatvena īdṛśamānasikāvasthādvārā athavā īdṛśamānasikāvasthāsañjātaparamasukhabhogadvārā upakṛto bhavati |
SA27n2952:3377: kramikavacaneṣu ekādaśalābhaviṣayake'dhyāye gotamaḥ ekādaśasaṁkhyakānāṁ lābhānāmekāṁ sūcīṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:3378: yo janaḥ premarūpamanomuktiṁ sādhayati sa janaḥ tān lābhānarjayati |
SA27n2952:3379: prāguktāṣṭalābhaiḥ saha saṁyojanametat - 'sa śīghraṁ tasyaṁ cittaṁ samāhitaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:3383: niḥsandehena etat sarvalābhakāraṇāt gotamaḥ punarapi upadiśati yat cāndrāyaṇavrateṣu (uposatha)
SA27n2952:3384: mahatāmācāryāṇāṁ śiṣyāḥ sareṣāṁ bhūtānāṁ kṛte premakaruṇānvitāparimeyahṛdayavikāśāya abhyastā āsan |
SA27n2952:3388: tasmāt jīvaddaśāyāṁ prāguktabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇameva brahmasāyujyārjaāya rītiviśeṣaḥ |
SA27n2952:3390: kaścit bhikṣuḥ karuṇāsahānubhūtānandasamavṛttitānvitacittena satatamekasyāṁ diśi sattāvadbhiḥ bhūtaiḥ saha sambandhitaḥ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3391: tathā ca, dvitīyasyāṁ tṛtīyasyāṁ caturthyāṁ ca diśi,
SA27n2952:3394: sa sarvatra viśvabhūtaiḥ saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayati samabhāvena - premamayacetasā,
SA27n2952:3398: vāseṭṭha, ekaḥ śaktiśāliśaṅkhavādakaḥ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ śaknoti sma |
SA27n2952:3399: tatra parimeyaṁ karma na parimeyaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3403: punaśca, eko bhikṣuḥ ekasyāṁ diśi (yathā uttarasyām)
SA27n2952:3404: sattāvadbhiḥ bhūtaiḥ saha satataṁ samparkaṁ sthāpayati premamayacetasā |
SA27n2952:3405: tadvat, dvitīyasyāṁ tṛtīyasyāṁ caturthyāṁ ca diśi,
SA27n2952:3409: sa samabhāena sarvatraviśvabhūtaiḥ saha sambandhitastiṣṭhati - premamayacetasā - yatra cetaḥ nirākulaṁ,
SA27n2952:3413: vāseṭṭha, ekaḥ śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ kevalaṁ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ śaknoti sma |
SA27n2952:3414: tatra parimeyaṁ karma na parimeyaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3417: yadā prāguktopadeśānusārataḥ premādayaḥ kṛṣyante tadā te eva udāttā bhāvā ucyante |
SA27n2952:3419: saṁvādeṣu ādyasaṁkalanacatuṣṭāye karuṇāpremasahānubhūtānandasamavṛttitānāṁ lakṣaṇāni na kṛtāni |
SA27n2952:3420: tathāpi, ṭīkābhiḥ viśuddhimārgeṇa ca teṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ lakṣaṇāni tathā vyākhyānāni kṛtāni |
SA27n2952:3421: pratyekodāttabhāvasya spaṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāstīti kāraṇāt ekasmin bhāve upasthite apareṣāṁ bhāvānāmanupasthitirgamyate |
SA27n2952:3426: karuṇāyāḥ dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ hiṁsāpratirodhāya viśeṣeṇa phalapradam |
SA27n2952:3432: sahānubhūtānandasya dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ hi asantoṣapratirodhāya viśeṣataḥ phalapradam |
SA27n2952:3438: samavṛttitāyāḥ dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ nāma rāgapratirodhāya viśeṣataḥ phalapradam |
SA27n2952:3443: yā sacetanamanasaḥ vividhāsu daśāsu sahacaro jāyate |
SA27n2952:3445: eteṣāṁ caturṇāṁ bhāvānāṁ karma khalu janapreṣaṇamūlakam |
SA27n2952:3446: paramaṁ jyotiḥ sāraṁ dadāti - 'sarve jīvā etebhyo duḥkhādibhyo muktā bhavantu' evaṁvidhayā cintayā paraduḥkhakaṣṭadūrīkaraṇāya ākāṅkṣādaśā hi karuṇā |
SA27n2952:3447: 'sarve jīvāḥ sukhino bhavantu' evaṁvidhayā cintayā sukhahitasādhanāya ākāṅkṣādaśā hi prema |
SA27n2952:3450: idamatīva sādhu' - iti cintayā satataṁ parasukhahitasādhanecchādaśā eva sahānubhūtānandaḥ |
SA27n2952:3451: 'atītakarmaphalakāraṇādeva janasya sukhāni ca duḥkhāni ca bhavanti' iti cintayā parasukhaduḥkhaviṣayikī abhijñatā eva samavṛttitā |
SA27n2952:3452: caritracitraṇeṣu ca sārasaṁgraheṣu ca virodhābhāso dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:3453: tathā hi - prema paramaṅgalasādhanāya bhaktitvena lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:3456: tathāpi, 'sarve sukhino bhavantu' itīcchāyāṁ premṇaḥ sārarūpaṁ vartate - yatra karmapratiśrutibhāvanayā prayojanaṁ nyūnameva dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:3458: yathā - saṁvādeṣu ullikhitāḥ premakaruṇāviṣayakopadeśāḥ kevalaṁ dhyānayogena eteṣāṁ bhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ nirdiśanti |
SA27n2952:3459: ata eva, upadeśāḥ kevalaṁ 'sarve sukhino bhavantu' 'sarve duḥkhānmuktā bhavantu' evaṁvidhecchānuśīlanamāvahati |
SA27n2952:3460: premakaruṇādhyānaṁ ca pareṣāṁ kṛte ānuṣaṅgikaṁ karma cāntarā ko'pi sambandhaḥ gotamena kadāpi noccāritaḥ |
SA27n2952:3461: tathāpi idaṁ gamyate yat eteṣāṁ bhāvānāṁ karṣaṇena dhyānino janasya bhrātrīyakarmaṇāṁ prakṛtau tathā paridhau parivarttanaṁ sūcyate |
SA27n2952:3463: so'vaśyameva janahitasādhanāya gabhīraṁ vicalito bhaviṣyatītyatra na ko'pi vyaktikramaḥ |
SA27n2952:3464: premamayakarmaṇāṁ ca saralāyāḥ karuṇāśca sahānubhūteścopari ye upadeśāḥ santi,
SA27n2952:3468: eṣu upadeśeṣu gotamaḥ sāmājikakarmapreṣaṇāmupadiśati iti gamyate |
SA27n2952:3469: tatra premakaruṇāsaṁvādeṣu dharmīyajīvanasya adhikacintāmūlakabhāvasya gurutvaṁ na laghu āsīt |
SA27n2952:3470: tathāpi gautamena tannollikhitam - yadi duḥkhaṁ jāyate tarhi karuṇā mithyā bhavati |
SA27n2952:3474: 'sarve duḥkhānmuktā bhavantu' kevalamevaṁvidhā icchā karuṇāyā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3475: paraduḥkhenābhibhūtāḥ santaḥ vayaṁ parān sāhāyyaṁ na kurmmaḥ |
SA27n2952:3476: ekataḥ hṛdayahīnatā anyataśca paraduḥkhena vihvalatā anayormadhye duḥkhamantareṇa yatnasya vikalpo vartate |
SA27n2952:3477: karuṇākarṣaṇakāle jātaduḥkhadūrīkaraṇāya abhyāsakārī satataṁ sacetanaḥ syāt |
SA27n2952:3478: sa prathamataḥ atiduḥkhārtajanamadhikṛtya icchati 'sa duḥkhamukto bhavatu' iti |
SA27n2952:3481: yadi śatrujanaviṣayamadhikṛtya praśno jāyate tarhi prāyuktaṁ pratiṣedhakaṁ prayujyate |
SA27n2952:3482: karuṇā yathā udāttabhāvarūpā bhavati tathā karaṇāya abhyāsakārī karuṇāṁ samīkuryāt,
SA27n2952:3484: idamullekhārhaṁ tat pālisaṁvādeṣu ṭīkāsu ca premaśabdo yamarthaṁ sūcayati,
SA27n2952:3487: kasmiṁścit gurutvapūrṇe saṁvāde gotamaḥ yathāyathaṁ dāmpatyasamparkaṁ vyākhyāti yat svāmī tadīyāṁ striyaṁ seveta,
SA27n2952:3488: strī api tataḥ paraṁ taṁ prati sahānubhūtiśīlā bhavet |
SA27n2952:3489: udāttabhāvarūpapremakarṣaṇāya viparītaṁ liṅgaṁ prati premṇaḥ prakāśo na karttavya ityupadeśaḥ navadīkṣitebhyo dīyate,
SA27n2952:3490: yataḥ tathā kṛte prema sukhena tṛṣṇātvena pariṇataṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3492: abhyāsakārī sarvadā āsaktiparihārāya avahitaḥ syāt anyathā premavikāśo yathāyathaṁ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:3495: dhyātā prathamataḥ ātmānaṁ prati kramaśaḥ premakarṣaṇena premaparidhiṁ vistṛtaṁ karoti,
SA27n2952:3498: nirapekṣajanaṁ prati pariśeṣe ca śatrujanaṁ prati |
SA27n2952:3502: tatra sārvalaukikaṁ prema ātmaparabhedaṁ na karoti |
SA27n2952:3506: ko'pi vā yadā parasāphalyena ātmavismṛto bhavati tadā sahābubhūtānando bhithyā jāyate |
SA27n2952:3512: sahānubhūtānandakarṣaṇāya priyamitrasya gatamāgatamanāgataṁ vā sāphalyamadhikṛtya ānandakarṣaṇamārabhate |
SA27n2952:3514: tataḥ sa yathākramaṁ nirapekṣajanasya ca śatrujanasya ca sāphalyamadhikṛtya sahānubhūtānandaṁ karṣati |
SA27n2952:3515: evaṁ premakaruṇākṣetre yat kriyate tadapi ānuṣaṅgikaparyāyeṣu sa karoti |
SA27n2952:3517: kevalaṁ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ caturthe paryāye samavṛttitāyāḥ karṣaṇaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3520: yataḥ te ādyodāttabhāvatraye kiñcinmandaṁ phalaṁ paśyanti |
SA27n2952:3521: teṣu udātteṣu bhāveṣu pratyekabhāvaḥ dhyānamagnatāyā ādyeṣu triṣu paryāyeṣu anyatame paryāye kṛṣyate |
SA27n2952:3523: 'sarve janāḥ sukhino bhavantu' evaṁvidhecchāpoṣaṇena sacetanajīvakṛtāmodeṣu udvegastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3527: kiñca, ādyodāttabhāvatraye anumodanasya vā vidveṣasya vā vyāpārastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3529: premṇaḥ rakṣāvaśyameva karaṇīyā anyathā prema āsaktyā vipariṇamyate |
SA27n2952:3530: karuṇāpi yathāyathaṁ rakṣitavyā anyathā karuṇā pareṣāmavasthāsu vidveṣeṇa vā duḥkhabhāvena vā vipariṇamyate |
SA27n2952:3532: samavṛttitayā saha tulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ mandaphalatvena uktavipattayo dṛśante,
SA27n2952:3533: tathāpi samavṛttitāyāḥ evaṁvidhena upāyena rakṣayā prayojanaṁ nāsti |
SA27n2952:3537: te sarve punaśca duḥkhena api yuktāḥ |
SA27n2952:3539: dhyānamagnatāyāścaturthe paryāye samavṛttitārūpodāttabhāvena saha yaḥ samavṛttitānubhavastena saha tulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ ādyaparyāyatrayasañjātaṁ paramaṁ sukhaṁ sthūlameva dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:3540: samavṛttitā mithyā bhavati yadi tatra kevalaṁ jñānahīnatā vartete |
SA27n2952:3542: samavṛttitāyāṁ yathāyathaṁ kṛṣṭāyāṁ satyāṁ iyamupalabdhirjāyate yat anye janāsteṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ kartāraḥ |
SA27n2952:3543: evañca, teṣāmuttarakālīnā avasthā varttamānakarmaṇāṁ nītigatāṁ dṛṣṭibhaṅgīṁ prativimbiyiṣyati |
SA27n2952:3545: yadā dharmaḥ suphalāya kalpateḥ tathaiva adharmaḥ viparītaphalāya sampadyate |
SA27n2952:3547: apare janāḥ pariṇāme sveṣāṁ bhāgyāya bhāraṁ niścitameva grahīṣyanti |
SA27n2952:3548: evaṁ ca abhyāsakārī tasya bhāgyāya bhāraṁ grahīṣyati,
SA27n2952:3549: etadviṣayamadhikṛtyāvahitaḥ san dhyātā puruṣaḥ amaṅgalajanakamano- bhāvāt tathā paravyavahāragatavidveṣāt tadīyaṁ manaḥ muktaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:3550: tathā ca, sa dhyānamagnatāyāḥ caturthe paryāye hitakāriṇīṁ paksapātahīnatāṁ poṣayati |
SA27n2952:3551: samavṛttitārūpodāttabhāvakarṣaṇāt prāgeva abhyāsakārī dhyānamagnatāyāḥ tṛtīyaṁ paryāyaṁ yāvat aparodāttabhāvānāmekatamaṁ poṣayet |
SA27n2952:3553: sa samāhitadaśāyā utthāya svābhāvikanirapekṣajanaṁ ca mitraṁ ca śatruṁ ca adhikṛtya samavṛttitāṁ pālayati |
SA27n2952:3555: yadā so'nena bhāvena dhyānamagnatāyai sāgrahaṁ ceṣṭaye tadā avaśyameva caturthaṁ paryāyaṁ gacchati |
SA27n2952:3558: tāṁ prakṛtimavabudhya vayaṁ śaṅkhavādakasya prāguktāmupamāṁ pratigantuṁ śaknumaḥ |
SA27n2952:3561: evañca kaścit durbalaḥ śaṅkhavādakaḥ śaṅkhavādanakāle catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ samartho na bhavati |
SA27n2952:3563: anyataśca, śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ sarvatra dhvani vitanituṁ śaknoti kṛṣṭamanomuktidvārā (asmin prasaṁge yā karuṇā) |
SA27n2952:3565: tadā praveśaparyāyagatā karuṇā athavā sthāpanāparyāyagatā karuṇā viṣayopayoginī bhavati |
SA27n2952:3567: tadā kevalaṁ sthāpanaparyāyagatā karuṇā viṣayopayoginī bhavati |
SA27n2952:3568: yat karma ākāṅkṣāviṣaye vartate tat parimitaṁ karmetyucyate |
SA27n2952:3569: yat karma rūpayuktaviṣayakaṁ rūpahīnaviṣayakaṁ ca bhavati tat karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate |
SA27n2952:3570: parimeyakarmātikramaṇatvāt idaṁ karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate viśeṣeṇa sāmānyena ca catasṛṣu dikṣu sambandhavitānatvāt idaṁ karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate |
SA27n2952:3573: ākāṅkṣāviṣayakamadaḥ karma rūpamaye vā rūpahīne vā karmaṇi ciraṁ na tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3576: ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarma rūpamaye vā rūpahīne vā karmaṇi āśrayaṁ na paśyati |
SA27n2952:3578: kevalaṁ rūpamayaṁ vā rūpahīnameva vā karma ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarma vyāpnoti cātiśete ca |
SA27n2952:3581: mahāsamudraḥ kṣudraṁ jalāśayaṁ parābhūya ātmanaḥ avasaraṁ prāpya pratiṣṭhito bhavati |
SA27n2952:3582: idaṁ rūpamidaṁ vā rūpahīnaṁ karma ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarmaphalaṁ pārśve pakṣipati |
SA27n2952:3585: ṭīkā varṇayati yat karuṇā praveśaparyāyagatāmathavāsthāpanaparyāyagatāṁ karuṇāṁ sūcayati |
SA27n2952:3586: karuṇā samādhiparyāye dhyānamagnatāyā nimne eva athavā dhyānamagnatāparyāye |
SA27n2952:3587: yadyapi iyaṁ karuṇā saṁvādeṣu vivṛtāyāḥ karuṇāyāḥ prakṛtena prayogeṇa saha saṁgacchate,
SA27n2952:3589: tādṛśaṁ viśeṣaṇameva premṇā ca sahānubhūtānandena ca saha prayojyam |
SA27n2952:3592: yathā kaścit śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭumarhati tathaiva kaścidabhyāsakārī manomuktikarṣaṇena catasṛṣu dikṣu vartamānaiḥ jīvaiḥ saha sambandhenānvito bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:3593: yadā śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvaniṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3595: na kimapi sthānamasti yatra śabdaḥ na śrūyate |
SA27n2952:3599: mānasikīmavasthāmadhikṛtya idaṁ sagurutvaṁ smartavyaṁ yat 'ekṭibhiṭi' iti padaṁ (pāliḥ kammala,
SA27n2952:3603: 'karma' ityasya sthale 'cetanā' ityasya sthāpanena ṭīkāyāḥ sthānaṁ pariṣkṛtaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:3604: durbalena śaṅkhavādakena sṛṣṭaṁ parimeyaṁ śabdaplāvanamiva ākāṅkṣāviṣayikī cetanā parimeyā bhavati |
SA27n2952:3606: tadā manaḥ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ ādyaiḥ caturbhiḥ paryāyaiḥ yukte rūpamaye jagati tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:3607: athavā samādhigatamahattārāvasthayā saha yukte sūkṣmatare rūpahīne jagati vartate |
SA27n2952:3608: yata udāttabhāvaiḥ saha yuktā mānasikī avasthā dhyānamagnatāyā ādyeṣu caturṣu paryāyeṣu tiṣṭhati,
SA27n2952:3610: rūpamayaviṣayikī yā mānasikī avasthā tayā sahānvitā cetanā rāgādibhāvebhyaḥ sarvathā muktā bhavati,
SA27n2952:3611: ye rāgādibhāvā manaḥ badhnanti sṛjanti ca parieyatā sīmāṁ vā |
SA27n2952:3613: kiñca, udāttabhāvakarṣaṇarato'bhyāsakārī vṛddhiviśeṣeṇāthavā kramaśaḥ pratyekaṁ diśi sattāvad bhūteṣu tān vitanoti,
SA27n2952:3614: athavā sāmānyena yugapat sarvatra tān vitanoti |
SA27n2952:3616: evaṁ caitanyāgataviṣayāṇāṁ pariprekṣite abhyāsakāriṇaḥ cetanāṁ aparimeyā jāyate |
SA27n2952:3618: tadā parimeyā ākāṅkṣāviṣayikī cetanā na tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3619: samudrasya ca puṣkariṇyāśca rūpakalpam ullikhya ṭīkā 'yadeva parimeyaṁ karma tat tatra prasaṁge na tiṣṭhati' iti vacanasya aparamarthaṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:3620: yadi kaścit janaḥ tasya jīvanasya kasmiṁscit samaye udāttabhāvānāmanyatamaṁ karṣati,
SA27n2952:3621: tarhi tasya mṛtyau etadbhāvānvitacetanā sārthakatāmāyāti tathā brāhmaloke tadīyapunarjanmane kalpate |
SA27n2952:3622: tasmin samaye kimapi parimeyamākāṅkṣāviṣayagataṁ karma sārthakaṁ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:3623: evaṁ brāhmaṇyaloke punarjanmane udāttabhāvānāṁ prabhāvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
SA27n2952:3624: iyaṁ vyākhyā dhyānamagnatāyāḥ paryāye karuṇādimanomuktikarṣaṇaphalānāmantarbhāvāya śaktiśāliśaṅkhavādakasya upamāyā vāstavamavasaraṁ vitanoti |
SA27n2952:3625: saṁvādasyopasaṁhāre gotama āha yat yo naraḥ prāguktopāyena udāttabhāvacatuṣṭayaṁ karṣati,
SA27n2952:3628: brāhmaguṇasampanno'yaṁ janaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ brahmalokaṁ gacchati yadā prema,
SA27n2952:3631: samavṛttitā ca caturvidhānāmupadeśānāṁ rītimanusṛtya kṛṣyante tadā te guṇā udāttā bhāvā iti kathyate |
SA27n2952:3637: , athavā te bhāvāḥ jīvanayātrāyā utkṛṣṭā upāyāḥ |
SA27n2952:3640: evaṁ sarve catvāro bhāvā abhyāsakāriṇe hitāya bhavanti |
SA27n2952:3641: yadyapi nirdiṣṭe samaye kaścit dhyātā ekaṁ bhāvamupakārakaṁ matvā tatra gurutvamāropayitum arhati gotamaḥ karuṇābhūtakṛṣṭabhāvasya sārvikeṣu lābheṣu gurutvamāropayati,
SA27n2952:3642: yataḥ karuṇāsamṛddhakarmāṇi tathā sahānubhūtimadhikṛtya tasya sarve upadeśāḥ karuṇayā saha samparkitāḥ |
SA27n2952:3643: karuṇāyāṁ kācid vṛddhiḥ paravarttidvayaṁ sajīvīkaroti arthāt samagradharmīyajīvanasya preṣaṇāṁ ca prakāśanāṁ ca samṛdhyā bhūṣayati |
SA27n2952:3644: catvāra udattā bhāvā vā brahmavihārā vā samavṛttitāyā manastattvasammatalābhān pratibimbayanti,
SA27n2952:3647: ekasyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ teṣāṁ vikāśasya kramaḥ pradarśitaḥ |
SA27n2952:3648: pitarau tayoḥ santānānāṁ kṛte yān bhāvān anubhavataḥ taiḥ bhāvaiḥ saha udāttabhāvānāṁ tulanā kriyate |
SA27n2952:3650: tadā karuṇāmayacetasā pitarau 'kadā vā sarvāvayavānvitaṁ svāsthyavantaṁ putraṁ drakṣyāvaḥ' iti,
SA27n2952:3651: tataḥ yadāyaṁ komalaḥ śiśuḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe śete,
SA27n2952:3652: yūkamakṣikādibhiḥ daṁśanāt athavā nidrāvyāghātakāraṇāt roditi vilapati vā,
SA27n2952:3653: tadā tat śrutvā pitarau sādharaṇīṁ karuṇāmanubhavataḥ |
SA27n2952:3654: kiñca, atīva ākāṅkṣaṇīyavarṣeṣu yadā krīḍākāle śiśuḥ dhāvati athavā viśrāmaṁ labhate tadā tadālokya pitroḥ manaḥ śataṁ utkṛṣṭaviśuddhanavanītasiktatūlanirmitakomalakandukā iva komalaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3655: pitroḥ cittaṁ paritṛptaṁ cānanditaṁ ca bhavati |
SA27n2952:3657: tataḥ, yadā putraḥ tasya bhāryāyai bhūṣaṇāni dātuṁ śaknoti tathā ca svakīye gṛhe vasati,
SA27n2952:3658: tadā pitarau samavṛttisampannau santau arthāt samacittatāmavalamba cintayataḥ 'adhunā āvayoḥ putraḥ svādhinaḥ san sthātumarhati' iti |
SA27n2952:3669: , tadā sa paraduḥkhaūrīkaraṇāya anurāgarūpaṁ prema karṣati |
SA27n2952:3673: teṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ dūrībhavatu iti aicchat teṣāṁ jīvānāṁ samṛddhiṁ yadābhyāsakārī paśyati (disvā)
SA27n2952:3676: atra 'paśyati' ityasyārthaḥ - dhyātā vartamāne parasamṛdhiṁ samīkṣate athavā atītasamṛddhiṁ bhāvisamṛddhiṁ vā cintayati |
SA27n2952:3678: tasya cintā kevalaṁ vastugataviṣayeṇa sīmitā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:3679: evaṁ sahānubhūtānandakarṣaṇena abhyāsakārī pareṣāṁ kṛte saṁśliṣṭānāṁ bhāvānāṁ nirmāṇa saṁpūrayati |
SA27n2952:3683: sa nirapekṣadarśakaḥ san sarvān jīvān paryavekṣate |
SA27n2952:3685: abhyāsakārī vyaktigatalābhāya tathā manastatvasammatalābhāya udāttabhāvānāmekatamaṁ pālayitumanu preṣito bhavati |
SA27n2952:3686: sa krodhādiviṣaghnāgadatvena prāguktabhāvacatuṣṭayaṁ palayituṁ pravṛtto bhavati |
SA27n2952:3688: imamādarśaṁ punaḥ punaḥ anusṛtya abhyāsakārī pareṣāṁ kṛte ghaniṣṭhaṁ cintayituṁ pravartate tasya sāmarthyamapi samānamānasikatayā yuktaṁ jāyate |
SA27n2952:3689: idaṁ niḥsaṁśayenocyate yat dhyānena udāttabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇaṁ hitakaraṁ,
SA27n2952:3690: pareṣāṁ prakṛtāsu avasthāsu kṛtāṁ pratikriyāṁ prabhāvitāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:3694: gotamaḥ kadāpi na pratipādayati yat udāttabhāvaviṣayakāḥ caturvidhā upadeśā ekāntata tasyaiva |
SA27n2952:3695: yo janaḥ kevalam udāttabhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ karoti sa sādhu na karoti |
SA27n2952:3696: gotamaḥ spaṣṭataḥ muktaye aṣṭāṅgikamārgīyopadesaiḥ saha udāttabhāvānāṁ kevalamanuśīlanasya vaiparītyaṁ pradarśayati - - caturvidhopadeśānusāreṇa karuṇādīnāṁ kevalamanuśīlanaṁ parāṅmukhīkaraṇāya,
SA27n2952:3710: na tat citaṁ dūṣaṇamuktiṁ vā punarjanmamuktiṁ kārayitumalam |
SA27n2952:3713: kevalaṁ buddhopadiṣṭamārgānusaraṇadvārā nirvāṇalābhāt ko'pi janaḥ pariṇāme nirvāṇaśāntau punarjanma parivartanaduḥkhādibhyo muktimarjayitumalam |
SA27n2952:3715: tathāpi sarve janāḥ kaṣṭanivāraṇāya gotamasya upadeśān grahītumasamarthāḥ santaḥ tebhyaḥ palāyante |
SA27n2952:3717: tatra tu mahattamaṁ lakṣyaṁ na sādhyate |
SA27n2952:3718: ekadā, brahmaloke punarjanmagrahaṇāya udāttabhāvānuśīlanaṁ kartavyamityupadeśaḥ sāriputtena dhānañjānināmakāya viprāya pradattaḥ |
SA27n2952:3720: tatkṣaṇādeva tathā kṛtvā maraṇāt paraṁ sa punaḥ brahmaloke'jāyata |
SA27n2952:3722: apyekadā tvayā utthāya nikṛṣṭabrahmaloke pratiṣṭhito vipro dhānañjāniḥ parityaktaḥ,
SA27n2952:3725: sāriputto vyākhyāti yat tena sa brāhmaṇo brahmaloke pratiṣṭhāpito yato brahmaloko brāhmaṇebhya eva |
SA27n2952:3726: buddhasya praśno nirdiśati yat dharmācāryaḥ śiṣyasya kalyāṇārthaṁ kadāpi paritṛpto bhavituṁ nārhati |
SA27n2952:3727: ācāryo'pi nirdiṣṭe samaye yathāsādhyaṁ śiṣyaṁ pramodayet |
SA27n2952:3733: yataḥ te tataḥ yathāyathaṁ viṣaye kṛṣyante |
SA27n2952:3734: gotamo varṇayati yat sādhāraṇajanakartṛkodāttabhāvakarṣaṇaṁ ca mahata ācāryasya jñāninā śiṣyeṇodāttabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇaṁ cāntarā spaṣṭaṁ pārthakyamasti |
SA27n2952:3737: tadā sa maraṇāt paraṁ brahmaloke punareva jāyate |
SA27n2952:3741: 2.129 sarvavidhapunarjanmano muktamarhat-puruṣamantareṇa mahata ācāryasya udāttabhāvakarṣaṇarataḥ jñānī śiṣyaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ brahmaloke punaḥ janiṣyate |
SA27n2952:3742: kintu nirantarodāttabhāvānuśīlanāt sa tatra arhatpuruṣaḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:3743: tasmin jīvane samāptiṁ gate saḥ ataḥ paraṁ punaḥ na jāyate,
SA27n2952:3748: samyagjñānalābhāt paramapi gautamaḥ caturvidhānāmupadeśānāṁ paddhatimanusṛtyanirantaraṁ sarvavidhodāttabhāvacatuṣṭayasya karṣaṇaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:3750: sarvabhāvacatuṣṭayakarṣaṇe buddha āsīt dakṣa iti sarveṣāṁ nikaṭe spaṣṭamāsīt |
SA27n2952:3751: kasmiścit saṁvāde gṛhastho jīvakakomārabhacca āha - 'bhadra ! mayā śrutam brahmā karuṇayā vasatīti |
SA27n2952:3757: yata idaṁ mataṁ tiṣṭhati yat brahmaparyāyā devāḥ karuṇāṁ,
SA27n2952:3761: yataḥ sa paśyati yat gotamaḥ karuṇayā vasati |
SA27n2952:3768: te bhaviṣyati kāle udetuṁ na samarthā bhaviṣyanti |
SA27n2952:3774: gotamo jīvakaṁ jñāpayati yat lālasāghṛṇābhramadoṣaiḥ yadeva bhavatu vā na bhavatu hiṁsā,
SA27n2952:3779: evaṁ buddhaḥ sagauravaṁ jīvakaṁ kathayati yat tasya karuṇādisamudayaḥ lālasāghṛṇābhramatyāgamapekṣya sañjātaḥ |
SA27n2952:3781: gotamaḥ krodhahiṁsā'santoṣavidveṣadoṣān premādīnāṁ viparitā iti sthāpayati |
SA27n2952:3783: etaṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya yat tvayā ucyate tat yadi bhavati - jīvaka,
SA27n2952:3787: etaṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya yat tvayā ucyate tat yadi bhavati |

SA27n2952:4031: yatrāsti - imamitihāsaṁ paṭhan janaḥ mahat yaśaḥ lapsyate,
SA27n2952:4035: ata eva vitarkabhayāt idamevocyate purāṇasyetihāsasya ca madhye bhedasya rekhā na sarvadā sukhabodhyā |
SA27n2952:4037: tasya mate purātanī kathā ca varṇanā ca purāṇasya madhye tiṣṭhataḥ |
SA27n2952:4039: atharvavede katipayeṣu purāṇeṣu cāpi purāṇasyetihāsasya madhye na kimapi pārthakyaṁ pratiṣṭhitam |
SA27n2952:4041: kintu tasmin vede vratānugamanaviṣaye itihāsaśabdasya prayogaḥ dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:4042: chāndogyopaniṣadaḥ ṭīkāyā śaṁkarācārya ubhayoḥ madhye spaṣṭhaṁ pārthakyaṁ sūcayituṁ yatate sma |
SA27n2952:4043: tasya mate śatapathabrāhmaṇe ūrvaśī ca purūvāśceti dvayoḥ kathā vartate |
SA27n2952:4045: kintu jagattatvaṁ prakṛtyā paurāṇikam - yatrocyate sṛṣṭeḥ prāk anastitvamabhūt |
SA27n2952:4047: iti vastutaḥ śaṅkarācārya eva prathamaṁ dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ madhye spaṣṭaṁ pārthakyaṁ darśayituṁ ceṣṭhate sma |
SA27n2952:4048: kintu tasya mataṁ na sarvaiḥ gṛhītam |
SA27n2952:4049: mahān vaidikaḥ paṇḍitaḥ sāyaṇācāryaḥ asya prativādaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:4051: śatapathabrāhmaṇe urvaśī purūravāḥ cetyanayoḥ yā kathā dṛśyate sā paurāṇikīṁ prakṛti nirdiśati yataḥ tatra prācīnatamaṁ kiñcit vivṛtam |
SA27n2952:4053: sarvaṁ jalamayamāsīt - etādṛśī uktiḥ niścitamasyāḥ sṛṣṭeḥ aitihāsikatvaṁ darśayati |
SA27n2952:4054: evaṁ dvayoḥ prasiddhayoḥ paṇḍitayoḥ madhye parasparavirodhimatapārthakye sati purāṇetihāsayoḥ madhye bhedarekhāyāḥ prāyeṇa viluptikaranameva śreya ityasya kevalaṁ pramāṇam |
SA27n2952:4055: sargapratisargavaṁśamanvantaravaṁśānucaritayuktasya pañcalakṣaṇasya purāṇasya saṁhataṁ lakṣaṇaṁ tathā purāṇasya nirdiṣṭaṁ yugamapi purāṇānāṁ kṣetre na prayojyam,
SA27n2952:4059: pañca lakṣaṇāni api antareṇa vicitrā viṣayāḥ prāyeṇa sarveṣu purāṇeṣu dṛśyante |
SA27n2952:4065: keṣāñcinmate dvayoḥ pārthakyamākhyānasya netṛṇāṁ saṁkhyāyāḥ upari āśritya vartate |
SA27n2952:4066: yatra tetā eka eva tatra sa itihāsaḥ |
SA27n2952:4067: kintu yatra teṣāṁ saṁkhyā ekādhikā tatra tat purāṇam |
SA27n2952:4069: rājaśekhareṇa tasya kāvyamīmāṁsāyāṁ dvividha itihāsaḥ iti kathitam |
SA27n2952:4070: ekaḥ parikriyeti paricīyate yatra kevalameka eva netā,
SA27n2952:4071: anyaśca purākalpanāmedhayā yatra bahavaḥ netāraḥ santi,
SA27n2952:4072: evaṁ tasya mate rāmāyaṇaṁ parikriyāparyāyaṁ gacchati,
SA27n2952:4074: spaṣṭhataḥ rājaśekharasya mate itihāsasya paridhiḥ bindumātreṇāpi sīmitaḥ |
SA27n2952:4075: purāṇasya pañca lakṣaṇāni antareṇāpi purāṇasyānyaprakāraṁ lakṣaṇaṁ bhāgavatapurāṇe vāradvayaṁ brahmavaivartapurāṇe sakṛt eva dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:4085: yata lakṣaṇāni purāṇānāṁ kiñcit mahattvaṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ nirdiśati,
SA27n2952:4089: mūlaprakṛtau sattvarajastamasāṁ kṣubdhadaśāṁyāṁ satyāṁ trividhāhaṁsattā jāyate |
SA27n2952:4090: tataḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi pañcamukhyāni bhūtāni ca jāyante |
SA27n2952:4093: ekasmāt bījād yathā dvitīyaṁ jāyate tathā eko jīvo'nyasmān jāyate |
SA27n2952:4095: sa parameśvarasya prasādāt sṛṣṭisaṁkrāntāṁ sarvāṁ śaktiṁ dhatte |
SA27n2952:4096: vṛttirhi gurutvapūrṇaṁ vastu yena jīvaḥ prāṇasāram vibhartti |
SA27n2952:4098: asya dṛṣṭigrāhyasya jagataḥ kati bhāgā vṛtyadhīnāḥ tiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:4100: punaśca katicit vastūni śāstraniyamapālanārthaṁ tena gṛhyante |
SA27n2952:4102: sādhūnāṁ paritrāṇāya tathā duṣkṛtāṁ vināśāya īśvaraḥ vibhinneṣu yugeṣu sthāneṣu ca vahūni rūpāni dhatte |
SA27n2952:4107: nara īśvarasya pavitrāṁ līlāmanusaran tathā īśvaraṁ japan smaran mokṣaṁ labdhuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:4108: mahāpurāṇasya pañcasu lakṣaṇesu yat manvantaraṁ kathyate tadeva antaram |
SA27n2952:4109: siddhāntaśiromaṇigranthasya gaṇanāyā anusāreṇa 30672000 varṣeḥ ekaṁ manvantaraṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:4112: prāyeṇa sarvāṇi purāṇāni caturdaśamanūnāṁ nāmaviṣaye tathā padaviṣaye aikamatyaṁ svīkurvanti |
SA27n2952:4133: rājñāṁ praśastita idaṁ pratibhāti yat teṣāmatītakarmaṇāṁ,
SA27n2952:4134: varttamānakāryāṇāṁ tathā bhāviviṣayāṇāṁ gauravameva asya mukhyo'bhiprāyaḥ |
SA27n2952:4135: anyeṣāṁ purāṇānāṁ mate vaṁśaḥ na kevalaḥ rājavaṁśaḥ,
SA27n2952:4138: bhāgavatapurāṇaṁ paryavekṣate yat 'vaṁśānucaritaṁ teṣāṁ vṛttaṁ vaṁśādharāśca ye' |
SA27n2952:4140: teṣāṁ gauravamayaṁ kāryaṁ vistareṇa atra varṇitam |
SA27n2952:4141: rājagauravagāthāyāmapi punaḥ anyāni purāṇāni prasiddhānāṁ pradhānānāṁ munīnāmantarbhuktimicchanti |
SA27n2952:4142: vastutaḥ puṇyaślokānāṁ rājñāṁ vivaraṇāni niḥsandehena ādarśavādasya utpattaye smaraṇīyāni |
SA27n2952:4143: kintu asmin prasaṁge maharṣīṇāṁ gututvaṁ na kadāpi laghumūlyatvaṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:4145: kintu tasmin samaye vyāsavālmīkivaśiṣṭhādīnāṁ svalpasaṁkyākānāmavadānāni niḥsaṁśayena janānāṁ bahūni kāryāṇi saṁskurvanti |
SA27n2952:4147: iyaṁ pañcalakṣaṇasya purāṇasya pratisargeṇa saha sādṛśyamāvahati |
SA27n2952:4148: tathāpi viṣṇupurāṇe pratisargasya sthale samārthakaḥ pratisaṁhāraḥ śabdaḥ gṛhītaḥ |
SA27n2952:4149: iyaṁ saṁsthā jagataḥ sampūrṇāṁ vinaṣṭhi sūcayati |
SA27n2952:4153: siddhāntaśiromaṇeḥ viśiṣṭagaṇanayā jñāyate yat akhilo viśvaḥ 2347050947 varṣebhyaḥ paraṁ sampūrṇataḥ vināśaṁ gamiṣyati |
SA27n2952:4155: ayaṁ hetuḥ sarvadā sṛṣṭihetūn jīvitān jīvān nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:4156: te jīvā ajñatayā bhrāntyā vā kati karyāṇi sādhayanti |
SA27n2952:4157: ayaṁ ca pariṇāme anyāṁ sṛṣṭiṁ nayati |
SA27n2952:4158: vastutaḥ, viśvasya sṛṣṭeḥ vinaṣṭeśca mūlabhūto hetūḥ eṣāṁ jīvānāṁ bhāgyam |
SA27n2952:4159: ata eva te eva hetutvena tathā mūlakāraṇatvena svīkṛtāḥ |
SA27n2952:4161: yat tattvaṁ samagratvaṁ vā vyakti sṛṣṭiṁ vinaṣṭiṁ vā nayati tadeva apāśrayabodhakam |
SA27n2952:4162: ayameva brahmā paramātmā vā ayamevaikaḥ kevalaṁ dhyātavyaḥ |
SA27n2952:4163: sarvāṇi nava vaiśiṣṭyāni daśamasya puṣṭaye kalpante |
SA27n2952:4164: bhāgavatapurāṇamanusṛtya daśamasya lakṣaṇasya saṁskārāya nava vaiśiṣṭyāni savistaramālocyante |
SA27n2952:4179: tathaiva, vaṁśo'thavā vaṁśanucaritam īśānukathayā saha tulyārthakatvaṁ nayati |
SA27n2952:4180: apāśrayasya āśrayasya ca madhye kimapi pārthakyaṁ nāsti |
SA27n2952:4186: āsu catasuṣu ātyantikī saṁsthā dvitīyasūcīsthāṁ mukti nirdaśati,
SA27n2952:4188: sthānaṁ samagrasya viśvasya bhaugolikaṁ vivaraṇaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4191: evaṁ purāṇānuśīlane bhogoliko viṣayo'pi yugapat anena lakṣaṇena saha vartate |
SA27n2952:4192: poṣaṇaṁ nāma īśvarāllabdhā karuṇā athavā tallabdhaḥ prasādaḥ |
SA27n2952:4196: vināśe ca tasya īśvarasya asīmāṁ śaktiṁ boddhuṁ yatante |
SA27n2952:4198: sa duḥkhamuktaye tebhyaḥ asīmāṁ karuṇāṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4202: kintu so'pi īśvarasya cirantanānandād vañcito na babhūva |
SA27n2952:4205: utkṛṣṭasya vā akṛṣṭasya vā kṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalādeṣā icchā jāyate,
SA27n2952:4206: evamūrtiḥ īśvarasya akṛtrimāyā karuṇāyā viruddhe pratyakṣameva daṇḍāyate |
SA27n2952:4207: ūtaye narāḥ īśvareṇa saha milanasyākāṅkṣāṁ darśayituṁ vyarthā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:4208: idaṁ pūrvaṁ darśitaṁ yat brahmāṇḍapurāṇamapi purāṇasya daśa lakṣaṇāni adhikṛtya ekāṁ sūcīṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4223: evamidaṁ pratīyate yat bhāgavatapurāṇaṁ purāṇagataviṣayāṇāṁ spaṣṭāṁ dhāraṇāṁ poṣayati,
SA27n2952:4224: asya sūcī vartamānānāṁ purāṇānāṁ prāyeṇa sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni parigṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:4225: kintu arthaśāstrasya praṇetāraḥ purāṇasambandhini asmin viṣaye vistareṇa bhinnamataṁ poṣayanti |
SA27n2952:4226: kauṭilīyārthaśāstrasya jayamaṅgalaṭīkāyāṁ nimnoktaḥ śloko dṛśyate - sṛṣṭipravṛtisaṁhāradharmamokṣaprayojanam |
SA27n2952:4228: atra purāṇānāṁ gurutvapūrṇalakṣaṇatvena dharmaḥ atīva tātparyyaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:4229: niścayenātra yathārthamukhabandhāt paraṁ dharmīyā ālocanā gṛhītāḥ |
SA27n2952:4230: mantrataravarṇānāt paraṁ bhāgavatapurāṇaṁ dharmāya yathāyathaṁ manoyogaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4232: yaḥ spaṣṭataḥ dharmasya upayogitāṁ gurutvaṁ ca svīkaroti |
SA27n2952:4233: ata eva ayaṁ siddhāntaḥ na ucitaḥ yat pūrvaṁ dharmaḥ purāṇānāṁ cintāyāṁ nāntarbhūta āsīt,
SA27n2952:4234: tathā ca asya dhāraṇā kevalaṁ paravarttiyuge āgatā |
SA27n2952:4235: evaṁ bahuṣu prācīneṣu grantheṣu na kevalaṁ purāṇasya lakṣaṇaṁ karttuṁ praceṣṭā kṛtā,
SA27n2952:4236: api tu purāṇavaiśiṣṭyaṁ vyākyātuṁ prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:4238: na vā tiṣṭhantu athavā daśavaiśiṣṭyāni tiṣṭhantu vā na tiṣṭhantu - iti na praśnaḥ |
SA27n2952:4239: pañcasu vā daśasu vā lakṣaṇeṣu vistṛtā varṇanā darśayati yat tāni lakṣaṇāni kāṁścit nirdiṣṭān pāthān nirdiśanti |
SA27n2952:4241: api tu idaṁ kañcit purātanaṁ pāṭhamapi sūcayati - iti asvīkāre'nyāyo bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:4242: api ca, purāṇasaṁhitāyāḥ prayoga imaṁ viṣayaṁ draḍhayati |
SA27n2952:4243: yataḥ saṁhitā īdṛśaṁ tātparyaṁ na vahati |
SA27n2952:4244: eṣā sarvadā kartānāṁ pustakānāṁ vā saṁgrahāṇāṁ vā nirdiṣṭaṁ prasaṅgaṁ racayati |
SA27n2952:4245: nedṛśī kāciddhāraṇā athavā nedṛśaṁ kiñcillakṣaṇam itihāsasyopari prāpyate |
SA27n2952:4246: vibhinneṣu prācīneṣu śāstreṣu itastataḥ idaṁ padaṁ vyavahriyate |
SA27n2952:4247: kintu anayā rītyāsya lakṣaṇaṁ na lakṣitamatha vā vaiśiṣṭyakathanena vivṛtam,
SA27n2952:4248: purāṇaiḥ sahāsyāvicchedyo'nuṣaṅgaḥ evātra kāraṇaṁ bhavitum arhati |
SA27n2952:4249: tayoḥ atīva ghaniṣṭhaḥ saṁyogaḥ hi sambhāvyo hetuḥ athavā itihāsasya upari bhinnasya spaṣṭasya ca lakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ |
SA27n2952:4252: darśanasya purāṇasya ca madhye saṁgatiḥ atīva ghaniṣṭhāntaraṁgā ca |
SA27n2952:4253: kintu pratyekaṁ pṛthak spaṣṭaṁ ca paricayaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:4254: kintu purāṇetihāsayoḥ viṣaye etādṛśaṁ sādṛśaṁ na aṅkhyate |
SA27n2952:4255: kati paṇḍitā manyante yat purāṇamitihāsaḥ ca bhinnau viṣayau |
SA27n2952:4258: tasmin samaye kati vidvāṁsaḥ punaḥ tayorekatvamanubhavanti |
SA27n2952:4261: vitarkaṁ parihāya vayaṁ kevalaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat purāṇeṣu kalpanāyāḥ nirdiṣṭo'vasaro'sti,
SA27n2952:4263: purāṇeṣu prācīnatāyāḥ prasaṅge asmāhiḥ itomadhye kati svīkṛtāḥ prācīnā granthāḥ ullikhitāḥ tatra purāṇaṁ paricchannagranthatvena svīkṛtam |
SA27n2952:4264: eṣu prācīneṣu śāstreṣu atharvavedasaṁhitā atīva gurutvapūrṇā |
SA27n2952:4265: atraiko mantro'sti yasyāśayaḥ - ucchiṣṭājjāyate purāṇaṁ ṛgvedena,
SA27n2952:4270: sa vadati sarveṣāṁ bhūtabhautikānāmavasāne śiṣṭa urvaritaḥ paramātmā iti |
SA27n2952:4271: arthāt yadā sarvaṁ vināśaṁ yāti tadā kevalaṁ paramātmā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:4274: etāni na kasyāpi mānavasya sṛṣṭikarmāṇi athavā saṁkalanāni |
SA27n2952:4275: anyatrārthavedo varṇayati - vartamānasya jagataḥ pariprekṣite satyadraṣṭāramantareṇa na ko'pi janaḥ pūrvatanakalpasyāstitvaṁ jñātuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:4276: yo janaḥ pūrvatanakalpasya nirdiṣṭaṁ yathāyathaṁ cākāraṁ vistareṇa jānāti,
SA27n2952:4278: sa suṣṭhu purāṇānāṁ prācīnāḥ kathāḥ ākhyāyikāḥ ca jānāti |
SA27n2952:4279: evaṁ spaṣṭaṁ pratibhāti yat atharvavedasya kāle purāṇāni tathā paurāṇikāḥ aparicayasya tamasi nātiṣṭhan,
SA27n2952:4281: atharvavedasaṁhitā punaśca varṇayati - 'vrātyastomasya prasaṁge itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ gāthā,
SA27n2952:4283: yo'nena saha vistareṇa paricitaḥ sa eva itihāsasya,
SA27n2952:4287: asmin prasaṁge idaṁ smaraṇīyaṁ yat ayaṁ viśiṣṭo mantraḥ vātyastomotsavasya antarbhuktaḥ |
SA27n2952:4291: idaṁ niścayena svīkriyate yat viśvasya sūcanāyāṁ vrātyaḥ sarveṣāmagre āsīt |
SA27n2952:4292: ayaṁ vastutaḥ paramātmatatvena saha ekatvaṁ tulyatāṁ ca vrajati |
SA27n2952:4293: rudrādhyāyeṣu api vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ 'namo vrātyāya' iti |
SA27n2952:4294: vrātyaśca rudraśca abhinnau iti api sūcyate,
SA27n2952:4295: evaṁ yāthāyathyenocyate yat itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ca ṛgvedaḥ,
SA27n2952:4300: ādyeṣu triṣu sthāneṣu itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ca pṛthaktvena na prakāśete |
SA27n2952:4302: kintu avaśiṣṭe dṛṣṭānte ṛṣiḥ padayugalasya madhye pṛthaktvaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayituṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:4304: asmādasmābhiḥ jñāyate yat pariplavānuṣṭhānasya aṣṭamyāṁ rajanyāmitihāsasyāvṛttirbhavati |
SA27n2952:4306: evaṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ yuge'pi itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ceti paṁdadvayasya sattā pṛthaktvena tathā yuktatvena yugapat tiṣṭhati sma |
SA27n2952:4308: vividhānāṁ vedānāṁ pāṭhaḥ vividhaṁ phalaṁ janayati,
SA27n2952:4313: gāthā ca nārāśaṁsī ca paṭhyante kenacijjanena madhuyāgasya phalaṁ labhyate |
SA27n2952:4314: paravarttini dṛṣṭānte idamullikhyate yat kaścid vidvān pratyahaṁ vedaṁ paṭhet anuśāsanena,
SA27n2952:4321: sa yadi pratidinamidaṁ karoti tarhi sa samagrāya samājāya tathā īśvarāya paripūrṇaṁ santoṣaṁ dadāti tasmin brāhmaṇe anyatrocyate yat ṛgvedaḥ,
SA27n2952:4330: vyākhyānamanuvyākhyānaṁ ca sarvāṇi vedaiḥ saha anvitāni |
SA27n2952:4331: ko'pi janaḥ anena sārvabhaumatvaṁ paramaśaktimatvaṁ cārjayati |
SA27n2952:4333: evañca, gopathabrāhmaṇe svīkriyete purāṇānāṁ gurutvaṁ ca mahatvaṁ ca |
SA27n2952:4334: atrocyate - 'evaṁ sarve ite vedāḥ kalparahasyabrāhmaṇopaniṣaditihāsapurāṇaiḥ saha viracitāḥ |
