SA27n2952:4335: anyasmin mantre idaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ pañcavedaracanetihāsaṁ vivṛṇoti - te pañca vedā hi sarpavedaḥ,
SA27n2952:4344: asmin prasaṁge bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svaḥ janaḥ mahaḥ iti pañca mahāvyāhṛtaya ullikhyante |
SA27n2952:4349: evamatra purāṇebhyaḥ vedebhya iva sadṛśī maryādā tathā padasthitiḥ dīyate |
SA27n2952:4350: purāṇāni itihāsāśca prācīnatvaṁ pavitratvaṁ ca bhajangti iti vivicyate |
SA27n2952:4351: jaiminīyopaniṣadi ca tadbrāhmaṇe cāpi nyūnatamataḥ pañcasu sthaleṣu (3/4/1-2, 7/1/2, 7/1/4, 7/1/1, 7/7/1)
SA27n2952:4356: taittirīyāraṇyake purāṇaśabdaḥ brahmayajñaprasaṁgena punaḥ punaḥ vyavahṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:4357: yadi vayaṁ chāndogyopaniṣadi bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca vyavahṛtasya purāṇapadasya purāṇapadasya prayogaṁ tātparyaṁ ca vicārayāmaḥ,
SA27n2952:4358: tadā paśyāmo yat purāṇāni vedāḥ iva namasyatāṁ yānti |
SA27n2952:4359: purāṇānāṁ vedānāṁ ca sadṛśaṁ mūlyaṁ tathā gurutvaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:4360: yataḥ ruddhaśvāsasya muktaye sāṁdhātikyā praceṣṭayā prayojanaṁ nāsti,
SA27n2952:4361: tataḥ prakṛtyaivocyate yat vedānāṁ tathā purāṇānāṁ yoniḥ svayaṁkriyaḥ svataḥ sphūrtaśca |
SA27n2952:4362: bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadekena sundareṇa dṛṣṭāntena viṣayamimaṁ saralaṁ karttuṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:4363: tathā hi - 'sa yathā ārdrendhanāgneḥ avyāhitāt pṛthag dhūmā viniścaranti,
SA27n2952:4364: evaṁ vā are'sya mahatto bhūtasya niḥśvasitam etad yad ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo'tharvāṅgirasa itihāsapurāṇam |
SA27n2952:4365: 'iti idaṁ vākyaṁ katibhiḥ uddhṛtibhiḥ chāndogyopaniṣadā samarthitam |
SA27n2952:4369: ' 'ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda ātharvaṇaścaturtha itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamo vedānāṁ vedaḥ |
SA27n2952:4370: vastuto'nyatrāpi asyāmupaniṣadi dṛśyate yat itihāsapurāṇaṁ pañcamavedatvenānumoditam,
SA27n2952:4371: tasmai ca pavitratvasya paramaṁ padaṁ pradīyate |
SA27n2952:4372: evamidaṁ parisphuṭaṁ yat īdṛśasya purātanasya yugasya sṛṣṭikarmāṇi khalu purāṇāni |
SA27n2952:4373: etāni ca kati nītīḥ na kevalaṁ vyākurvanti,
SA27n2952:4374: api tu etāni nirdiṣṭam ākāraṁ parigṛhya janebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ praśaṁsāmākarṣanti sma |
SA27n2952:4375: sūtrasāhityasya pṛṣṭāsu purāṇāṁ gurutvaṁ tathā prācīnatvaṁ paunaḥpunyena sūcyate |
SA27n2952:4377: tathā ca āraṇyakāya upaniṣade ca yad gurutvaṁ tadeva pradīyate purāṇāya |
SA27n2952:4379: katiṣu kṣetreṣu vedādhyayanena saha itihāsasya purāṇasya ca adhyayanaṁ vihitamāsīt |
SA27n2952:4381: yaiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ itihāsasya tathā purāṇānāmiva śāstrāṇāṁ svādaḥ anubhūtaḥ,
SA27n2952:4382: te devaiśca pitṛbhiśca saha amṛtasāgare magnā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:4383: tasmin sūtre anyatra vahniśikhāprajvalanasya prasaṁge idaṁ varṇyate yat,
SA27n2952:4384: yadaivāmarāṇāṁ janānāṁ pavitreṣu karmasu itihāsasya purāṇasya ca prayogaḥ syāt sa samayaḥ śubhalakṣaṇānvita iti |
SA27n2952:4385: kintu idamavaśyameva svīkartavyaṁ yat śrautasūtreṣu purāṇaviṣayakaṁ yadvivaraṇaṁ prāpyate tanna kimapi purāṇaṁ vā purāṇasya ślokasaṁgrahaṁ vā viśeṣeṇa ullikhati |
SA27n2952:4386: asmin viṣaye āpastambadharmasūtram apūrvaṁ sthānaṁ tathā padamadhikaroti |
SA27n2952:4387: tatkāle vartamānataḥ purāṇātaḥ spaṣṭāu dvau ślokau tasya lekhakena uddhṛtau |
SA27n2952:4395: bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadaḥ upari racitāyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ śaṅkarācāryaḥ uparyuktaślokadvayasya uddhṛti dadau |
SA27n2952:4397: viṣṇupurāṇe tathā padmapurāṇe uktau ślokau dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:4404: padmapurāṇena sarvaiḥ purāṇaiḥ saha tasya paricaya āsīnnaveti praśna avāstavaḥ |
SA27n2952:4405: āpastambaḥ kintu purāṇebhya ātmana ṛṇaṁ svīcakāra - yāni tasya sammukhe prādhānyaṁ labhante sma - sa viṣaya upasaṁhāre vakṣyate |
SA27n2952:4406: api ca, tasminnāpastambadharmasūtre'nyatra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ svargatānāṁ pitṛṇāṁ prasaṁge,
SA27n2952:4407: yat te svarga jigyuḥ tathā ca viśvasya vināśaṁ yāvat tatroṣuḥ |
SA27n2952:4408: punaśca, sṛṣṭikarmaṇoḥ apariṇate prārambhe te svargasya mūlatvaṁ hetutvaṁ ca bhejire |
SA27n2952:4411: tena kālena bhaviṣyapurānasyāstitvaṁ svīkṛtaṁ tathā anumoditam |
SA27n2952:4413: yadyapi idaṁ tathyaṁ yat ayaṁ ślokaḥ vartamāne bhaviṣyapurāṇe na dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:4414: tathāpi asya prāmāṇye spardhā na jñātavyā |
SA27n2952:4415: etannāmollekhena vibhinnaśāstreṣu ye bahavaḥ ślokā uddhṛtā babhūvuḥ,
SA27n2952:4417: kimidaṁ sūcayati yat sarve śāstrakārāḥ eva bhrānti gatāḥ ?
SA27n2952:4418: evaṁ ca gautamadharmasūtre'pi vayaṁ paśyāmo yat itihāsapurāṇapadaṁ purāṇapadaṁ vā sampūrṇanibandhatvena kṣetradvaye ullikhitam |
SA27n2952:4419: prathame kṣetre gautamaḥ 'vahuśruta' - śabdasyārthaṁ vyākhyātuṁ ciceṣṭe |
SA27n2952:4420: asya śabdasya vyutpatigato'rthaḥ hi sa janaḥ yena bahu śrutaṁ tathā jñātam |
SA27n2952:4421: gautamasya mate sa eva bahuśruta iti vividyate |
SA27n2952:4422: sa janānāṁ rītiṁ prathāṁ ca samyak jānāti |
SA27n2952:4425: evaṁ bahuśrutasya yogyatāyai itihāse purāṇe ca dakṣatayā prayojanamasti |
SA27n2952:4426: anyatra gautamo manyate yat prajāsu rājñāṁ vyavahāraḥ,
SA27n2952:4432: atrāpi vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat purāṇebhyaḥ yathāyathaṁ sammānaṁ pradattam |
SA27n2952:4433: gautamaḥ spaṣṭaṁ vadati yat eṣu sarveṣu śāstreṣu ajñaḥ rājā anupayogī |
SA27n2952:4435: evamidaṁ dṛśyate yat dharmaśāstrairapi purāṇānāṁ prabhāvaḥ svīkṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:4436: anye sarve prācīnā granthā iva arthaśāstrasyopari likhitā granthā api purāṇebhyaḥ yathāyathaṁ svīkṛti dadati |
SA27n2952:4439: yataḥ, asmābhiḥ dṛśyate yat viśeṣīkṛtapadatvena purāṇapadaṁ tena arthaśāstrasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu prayuktam |
SA27n2952:4440: yadā kaścit nṛpatiḥ prakṛtakarmamārgaṁ parihāya duṣṭamārgamavalambate,
SA27n2952:4441: tadā śubhākāṅkṣiṇaḥ mantriṇaśca itihāsasya ca purāṇasya ca dṛṣṭāntaṁ darśayitvā taṁ rājānaṁ pāpamārgāt nivārayeyuḥ |
SA27n2952:4446: ata eva kauṭilyakālīnāni kati purāṇāni ca sadācārarītiprathāviṣayakāni teṣāṁ viṣayaṁ vastūni ca sādhāraṇānāṁ yathā prayojanaṁ sādhayanti tathā rājñāṁ samīpe'pi tāni hitakarāṇi eva pratibhānti |
SA27n2952:4447: anyatra dṛśyate yat purāṇānāṁ pāṭhaḥ prātyahikakarmasūcyārambhaviśeṣa iti |
SA27n2952:4448: kauṭilyo jñāpayati yat divasasya prathamārddhe nṛpaḥ gajāśvarathaśāstraviṣayakaṁ paurāṇikaṁ pāṭhaṁ paṭhet,
SA27n2952:4449: parārddhe ca sa itihāsapāṭhe ātmānaṁ niyojayet - yatra viṣāyāḥ khalu purāṇam,
SA27n2952:4455: rājānaḥ sundareṇa vetanena purāṇeṣu nipuṇān janān rājakāryeṣu niyojayeyuḥ |
SA27n2952:4456: te paurāṇikāḥ upayukteṣu kāryeṣu niyuktā bhaviṣyanti |
SA27n2952:4458: idamatīva sthūlakāyaṁ vetanaṁ yat paurāṇikebhyaḥ dīyate,
SA27n2952:4459: tat tathā gurutvabhājāṁ madhye teṣāṁ padaṁ teṣāṁ gurutvaṁ dāyitvaṁ ca sūcayati |
SA27n2952:4460: anyatra trayītipadasya tātparyaṁ vyākhyātuṁ kauṭilyo vadati - sāmaveda ṛgvedo yajurvedaśceti vedatrayaṁ trayītyucyate |
SA27n2952:4462: evaṁ kauṭilyasya kāle itihāsasya ca purāṇasya ca vedānāmiva sammānaṁ babhūva |
SA27n2952:4463: tau viṣayau atimūlyavat pāṭhatvena svīkṛti lebhāte |
SA27n2952:4464: bahudharmasaṁhitāsu api vedapāragapadasya tātparyaṁ sūcayituṁ prayatnāḥ kṛtāḥ |
SA27n2952:4466: tathā kartuṁ pravṛttāḥ etāḥ dharmasaṁhitāḥ sarvā eva eteṣāṁ purāṇānāṁ mahatvaṁ svīkurvanti |
SA27n2952:4467: vyāsasaṁhitāyāṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat vedārthaṁ boddhumicchuko jana ānuṣaṅgikavijñānaiḥ saha vedatrayasya adhyayanaṁ vināpi purāṇānāṁ sayatnamadhyayanaṁ kuryāt |
SA27n2952:4468: vyāso manyate - mīmāṁsate ca yo vedān ṣaḍbhiraṅgaiḥ savistaraiḥ |
SA27n2952:4472: atra prasaṁge idaṁ lakṣyate yat brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāśceti varṇatraya dvijātitvena paricīyate |
SA27n2952:4473: kevalaṁ prāguktavarṇatrayagatānāṁ janānāṁ śrutismṛtipurāṇoktadharmavyāpāreṣu aṁśagrahaṇasya adhikāro'sti |
SA27n2952:4474: atra vaidikāya tathā paruāṇikāya dharmāya sadṛśaṁ gauravamarpitam |
SA27n2952:4475: kenacicchiṣyeṇa vidyāyā arjanasya viṣaye uśanāsaṁhitāyāṁ dṛśyate yat ajñātakulaśīlebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ vedadharmaśāstrapurāṇasaṁkrāntā śikṣā na deyā |
SA27n2952:4476: tatrocyate - vedaṁ dharmaṁ purāṇaṁ ca tathā tattvāni nityaśaḥ |
SA27n2952:4480: tatrocyate - svādhyāyaṁ śrāvayet pitrye dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi |
SA27n2952:4483: vastutaḥ, vedagānena yat phalaṁ jāyate purāṇagānenāpi tat phalaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:4484: dharmīyānuṣṭhāneṣu sarvatra vedapāṭhena saha purāṇapāṭho'pi sadṛśaṁ gauravaṁ bhajate |
SA27n2952:4486: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṁ dharmasya ca caturdaśa ||
SA27n2952:4495: atra prasaṁge yājñavalkyasaṁhitāyāmucyate - vākovākyaṁ purāṇaṁ ca nārāśaṁsīśca gāthikāḥ |
SA27n2952:4498: karoti tṛptiṁ ca tathā pitṛṇāṁ madhusarpiṣā ||
SA27n2952:4500: punaśca lakṣyate tatra - vedātharvapurāṇāni setihāsāni śaktitaḥ |
SA27n2952:4503: vastutaḥ, te munayo jagadvyāpi yaśaḥ arjayanti,
SA27n2952:4504: yebhyaḥ sarve vedāḥ purāṇādayaśca utpatanti tathā visarpanti |
SA27n2952:4507: kumārilabhaṭṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ purāṇebhyaḥ teṣāṁ yathāyathaṁ prāpyāṁśaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4508: teṣāṁ prāmāṇyaṁ tathā prācīnatvaṁ niḥsaṁśayena svīkṛtam |
SA27n2952:4510: sa sambhavataḥ 200 tamāt khṛṣṭābdāt 300 khṛṣṭābdaṁ yāvat samaye samajāyata |
SA27n2952:4511: sa tadīyamīmāṁsāsūtraṭīkāyāṁ vibhinnayāgasambandhināṁ devānāṁ prakṛtaṁ svarūpaṁ nirdhārayituṁ yatate |
SA27n2952:4512: kasmiṁścit prasaṁge sa āha yat asmin bindau itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ caikamatyaṁ poṣayataḥ |
SA27n2952:4513: tasya mate agniprabhṛtayaḥ svargavāsinaḥ khalu devāḥ |
SA27n2952:4514: jaiminisūtrāṇāmupari likhitasya parsiddhiasya tantravārttikamiti granthasya praṇetā hi kumārilabhaṭṭaḥ |
SA27n2952:4515: sa tatra yonitvena pramāṇatvena ca hi purāṇamullikhati |
SA27n2952:4516: tasya mate purāṇeṣu itihāseṣu ca dṛṣṭānāṁ vibhinnānāṁ vṛttāntānāṁ sākṣyaṁ niścayenaiva grahītavyam |
SA27n2952:4521: pavitre sthāne sampāditaṁ karmaṁ dharmaṁ nayati,
SA27n2952:4522: kintu apavitre sthāne sampāditaṁ karma duḥkhaṁ janayati |
SA27n2952:4523: evaṁ puṇyasya ca pāpasya ca nirdhāraṇāya jagataḥ pavitrasthānānāṁ prakṛtena jñānena sampūrṇataḥ prayojanamasti |
SA27n2952:4524: brāhmaṇavarṇīyā athavā kṣatriyavarṇīyā mahānto janā kevalamanupreraṇāyāḥ api tu yathāyathaṁ pramāṇyasya hetubhūtāḥ |
SA27n2952:4525: ekasmin sthale kumārila āha yat buddhādayaḥ kecit kaliyuge āvirbhaviṣyanti iti purāṇeṣūcyate |
SA27n2952:4527: kintu bhāgyavaśāt tadipadeśaśravaṇasya janā nagaṇyā eva bhaviṣyanti |
SA27n2952:4531: idaṁ darśayati yat kumārilasyāvirbhāvādanatipūrvameva purāṇāni bauddhadarśanasya spardhāṁ gṛhītvaiva vartante sma |
SA27n2952:4532: paurāṇikavicārānusāreṇa meruparvatasya pṛṣṭhe uttarasyāṁ diśi svargastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:4533: svargapadārdhaṁ viśadīkurvan kumārilaḥ ādau tasya sthānam avadhārayituṁ ceṣṭate sma |
SA27n2952:4535: api na nakṣatrāṇāṁ grahāṇāṁ vā āśrayaḥ ?
SA27n2952:4537: api sa devalokaḥ cirantanasukhasya ādhāra iti sarve praśnāḥ kumārilenālocitāḥ |
SA27n2952:4538: idaṁ darśayati yat so'smin prasaṁge purāṇānāṁ dhāraṇābhiḥ saha niḥsandehena paricita āsīt |
SA27n2952:4539: asmākaṁ vaktavyaṁ samarthayituṁ vayaṁ tadīyayantravārttikād uddhṛtiṁ yacchāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:4540: sa āha - ' tathā svargaśabdenāpi nakṣatradeśo vā vaidikapravādapaurāṇikayājñikadarśanena ucyate ..... yadi vetihāsapurāṇopapannaṁ merupṛṣṭhamathavā anvayavyatirekābhyāṁ vibhaktaṁ kevalameva sukham |
SA27n2952:4541: anena prakāreṇaiva śaṅkarācāryo'pi tasya śārīrakabhāṣyasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu na kevalaṁ purāṇaśabdam ullikhati sma api tu purāṇānāṁ bahubhiḥ pāṭhaiḥ saha paricitaḥ āsīt |
SA27n2952:4542: yadyapi sa nāmnā na kimapi purāṇamullikhati tathāpi tasya vaktavyaṁ samarthayituṁ sa purāṇebhyaḥ ślokānām uddhṛtiṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:4543: te ślokā adyāpi vartamāneṣu purāṇeṣu prāpyante |
SA27n2952:4545: ekadā śaṅkarācāryastarkayati yat devānāṁ kiñcit sāmarthyamasti |
SA27n2952:4546: te śārīrikarūpāṇi dadhati iti mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇebhyaḥ jñāyate'smābhiḥ |
SA27n2952:4548: sarvāṇi purāṇāni viśeṣeṇa vadanti yat devānāṁ nirdiṣṭa ākāraḥ,
SA27n2952:4551: śaṅkarācārya ekadā mantavyaṁ cakāra yat brahmā ca jagacca svabhāvena pthaktvaṁ vrajataḥ |
SA27n2952:4552: sa tadīyasanatsujātīyabhāṣye muneḥ parāśarāt dvayoḥ ślokayoḥ uddhṛtiṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:4554: tathā ca idaṁ sphuṭaṁ yat śaṅkarācāryaḥ viṣṇupurāṇāt yathāśabdaṁ ślokau jagrāha,
SA27n2952:4555: yena purāṇena saha śaṅkarācāryaḥ sampūrṇataḥ paricita āsīt |
SA27n2952:4557: kiñca, tadīyabrahmasūtrabhāṣye śaṅkarācāryaḥ purāṇebhyaḥ katīnāṁ tātparyapūrṇānāṁ tathā gurutvapūṇānāṁ ślokānāmullekhaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:4559: asyollekhena utsāho jāyate yatkiñcit parivartanaṁ parigṛhyāyaṁ śloko vāyupurāṇe'pi dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:4560: brahmasūtrabhāṣyasya sa śloko'dha uddhriyate - ataśca saṁkṣepamimaṁ śṛṇudhvaṁ nārāyaṇaḥ sarvamidaṁ purāṇam |
SA27n2952:4561: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṁ saṁhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ ||
SA27n2952:4563: sa ca ghoṣayati yat duṣṭakarmaprakṛtyanusārataḥ janā vividhān narakān nīyante |
SA27n2952:4564: eteṣāṁ saptavidhānāṁ narakāṇāṁ vistṛtaṁ vivaraṇaṁ tathā citravadupasthāpanaṁ purāṇeṣu prāpyate |
SA27n2952:4565: api ca, śaṅkarācāryeṇa ālocitā viṣayā nimnarūpāḥ - tathā hi atītānāṁ bhāvināṁ ca kalpanāṁ parimāṇam brahmaṇā sṛṣṭeḥ prāk cirantanānāṁ sarvavyāpināṁ ca vedānāṁ samāgamaḥ,
SA27n2952:4567: sattvānāṁ nāmnāṁ karmaṇāṁ ca prakāśaḥ ityādayaḥ |
SA27n2952:4568: tathā kartuṁ sa vividhaiḥ purāṇaiḥ prabhāvito'bhavat,
SA27n2952:4570: śaṅkarācāryaḥ kāle kāle purāṇebhyaḥ kati vedān uddadhāra |
SA27n2952:4571: vastutaḥ sa vivṛṇoti sa viśvasṛṣṭeḥ prāk svīyakramānusārataḥ sthāvarāṇāmasthāvarāṇāṁ ca,
SA27n2952:4583: eva nāsti sandehāvasaraḥ yat etāni purāṇāni śaṅkarācāryeṇa vistareṇa paṭhitāni tathā prayuktāni |
SA27n2952:4584: atra prasaṁge purāṇānāṁ yāthārtyasya nirṇaye vātsyāyanasya vaktavyamatīva gurutvapūrṇam |
SA27n2952:4585: tasya mate ye nāma mantrabrāhmaṇarūpāṇāṁ vedānāṁ draṣṭāraḥ,
SA27n2952:4587: evaṁ vedānāmitihāsapurāṇānāṁ ca madhye samatā vartate |
SA27n2952:4588: yāvat teṣāṁ lekhakāḥ sṛṣṭikarmāṇi ca saṁśliṣyante |
SA27n2952:4589: avaśyameva teṣāṁ viṣayā vastūni vā vicitratāṁ vrajanti |
SA27n2952:4593: vātsyāyana āha ya eva mantrabrāhmaṇasya draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraśca te khalu itihāsapurāṇasya dharmaśāstrasya ceti viṣayavyavasthāpanācca yathāviṣayaṁ prāmāṇyam |
SA27n2952:4594: yajño mantrabrāhmaṇasya lokavṛttamitihāsapurāṇasya lokavyavahāravyavastāpanaṁ dharmaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:4595: nyāyasūtrabhāṣye'nyatra anusandhīyate katīnāṁ svīkṛtānāṁ granthānāṁ bhittau,
SA27n2952:4596: yat itihāsaḥ purāṇāni ca atīva prācīnatvaṁ bhajanti |
SA27n2952:4597: teṣāṁ yāthārthye na ko'pi praśnaḥ samudeti |
SA27n2952:4598: ādikāvyaṁ rāmāyaṇaṁ ekādhikaiḥ purāṇaiḥ saha tasya paricayaṁ prakaṭayati |
SA27n2952:4599: tasya kaviḥ vālmīkiḥ ekatrāha yat yoginastam purāṇaiḥ,
SA27n2952:4601: pañcarātraiḥ pratyahaṁ dhyāyanti tathā ca kratubhiḥ tam pūjayanti |
SA27n2952:4602: katiṣu sthaleṣu sumantraḥ tādṛśajanatvena varṇitaḥ yo janaḥ purāṇāni adhīte sma |
SA27n2952:4604: ata eva idameva svābhāvikaṁ yat purāṇeṣu so'bhijña āsīt |
SA27n2952:4606: tatra sa putrahīnatvāt daśarathasya mānasikī daśāṁ jānāti sma |
SA27n2952:4607: mānasikīṁ vedanāṁ dūrikartuṁ nṛpeṇa kiṁ kiṁ kṛtaṁ tadapi sumantreṇādhigatamāsīt |
SA27n2952:4608: ata eva īdṛśyāmavasthāyāṁ samāgatāyāṁ sa etā atītā ghaṭanā varṇayati |
SA27n2952:4609: kadāpi purāṇārthe kadāpi vā purātanasyārthe rāmāyaṇamiva mahābhārataṁ na punaḥ punaḥ viśeṣyatvena purāṇapadaṁ vyavaharati |
SA27n2952:4610: kintu keṣucit kṣetreṣu nirdiṣṭasāhityakarmatvena padamidaṁ prayuktam |
SA27n2952:4611: purāṇena saha mahābhāratasya paricitirāsīt tasya parokṣaṁ sākṣyaṁ mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇanāmāṁkite ślokadvaye'sti |
SA27n2952:4613: tathā kathāṁ śubhāṁ śrutvā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ |
SA27n2952:4615: mahābhārataṁ spaṣṭataḥ vāyupurāṇasya ca matsyapurāṇasya ca viṣayaiḥ caritraiśca saha paricayaṁ darśayati evam - etat te sarvamākhyātamatītānāgataṁ mayā |
SA27n2952:4617: api ca, tapasā mahatā yuktaḥ so'tha sraṣṭuṁ pracakrame ||
SA27n2952:4618: sarvāḥ prajāḥ manuḥ sākṣād yathāvat bharatarṣabha |
SA27n2952:4620: yadyapi eteṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ svalpāṁśa eva varttamāne vāyupurāṇe matsyapurāṇe ca dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:4621: tathāpi idamanasvīkāryaṁ yat mahābhāratīyasaṁśliṣṭhāṁśaracanāsamaye ukte dve purāṇe prācīnarūpaṁ gṛhītvaiva bahulaṁ pracalite āstām |
SA27n2952:4622: kenāpi prakāreṇa mahābhārataṁ purāṇānāṁ pracalitāṁ saṁkhyāṁ ajñāsīt |
SA27n2952:4623: tataḥ tat mahābhārataṁ viśeṣaṇa varṇayati purāṇāni aṣṭādaśa iti |
SA27n2952:4625: tatra auḍramāgadhīpravṛttiprayogaṁ varṇayan bharataḥ pūrvabhāratasya vahūnāṁ bhāgānāṁ nāmāni karoti |
SA27n2952:4626: tathā ca sa vadati yat ete cānye bhāgāśca purāṇeṣu kīrttitāḥ |
SA27n2952:4634: prāgāḥ prāvṛtayaścaiva yuñjanti ddhyoḍramāgadhīm anye'pi deśā ebhyo ye purāṇe samprakīrttitāḥ |
SA27n2952:4640: anena sūcyate yat purāṇāni tadā spaṣṭapurāṇajātīyasāhityakarmatvena svīkṛtāni āsan |
SA27n2952:4641: purāṇasāhityasya prācīnatvaṁ bahubhiḥ bauddhaiḥ tathā jainaiḥ granthaiḥ pratipāditam |
SA27n2952:4642: tathā hi anyatame mudrite saṁskaraṇe mahāpurāṇatvena kathitaḥ 'lalitavistaraḥ' iti granthaḥ kathayati yat bodhisattvaḥ nigamapurāṇetihāsavedavyākaraṇaprabhṛtiṣu vidyāsu atīva nipuṇa āsīt |
SA27n2952:4644: milindapañhaḥ - yatra grīkarājamināndārasya ca bauddhamunināgasenasya ca madhye saṁlāpo vidhṛta iti pratyayaḥ,
SA27n2952:4645: sa granthaḥ nṛpasya mināndārasya śikṣāgatāṁ yogyatāṁ varṇayati |
SA27n2952:4646: yathā - sa vahūni kalāśāstrāṇi vijñānāni ca jajñau - pavitramaitihyam,
SA27n2952:4652: ' anyatrāyaṁ kathayati brāhamaṇaviṣayamadhikṛtya yat brāhmaṇānāṁ ca brāhmaṇāpatyānāṁ ca vṛttiḥ ṛgvedena,
SA27n2952:4659: idaṁ vaktavyaṁ yat dvayoḥ sthalayoḥ madhye'nyatarasmin kṣetre purāṇaśabdo bahuvacanena yuktaḥ |
SA27n2952:4660: atrāyamāśayaḥ - sa śabdaḥ vidyāyāḥ śākhāṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:4663: jaināḥ saṁskṛtapurāṇānām anukaraṇena tathā ādarśena bahūni sāhityāni vyaracayan,
SA27n2952:4664: eṣu lekhakeṣu prācīnatamaḥ khalu vimalasūrināmadheyaḥ kaścit-jaino muniḥ |
SA27n2952:4666: sa ekādhikeṣu prasaṁgeṣu idaṁ purāṇamiti uvāca |
SA27n2952:4667: ravisenanāmadheyo'paro jaino lekhakaḥ 678 tame khṛṣṭābde saṁskṛtabhāṣayā padmapurānaṁ lilekha |
SA27n2952:4669: eṣāṁ granthānāṁ nāmataḥ tathā granthanibaddhaviṣayāṇāṁ prakṛtitaḥ idaṁ sphuṭaṁ pañcalakṣaṇānāṁ saṁskṛtapurāṇānāṁ viṣaye khṛṣṭābdasūcanākalpakālāt eva jainānāmavagatirāsīt |
SA27n2952:4670: evaṁ purāṇasāhityasya prakṛti ca prācīnatāṁ cādhikṛtya vedādisāhityebhyaḥ yāni tathyāni asmābhiḥ saṁgṛhyante,
SA27n2952:4672: etāni prabhavasthānāni parīkṣya dṛśyate yat khṛṣṭajanmanaḥ katipayavarṣebhyaḥ prāk eva purāṇasāhityaṁ samajāyata,
SA27n2952:4673: tathā ca tasmin purātane kāle eva ekādhikānāṁ purāṇānāmastitvamāsīt |
SA27n2952:4674: vastutaḥ, purāṇānāṁ janapriyatvaṁ tathā gurutvaṁ nāsīdadivasavyāpī,
SA27n2952:4677: api tu bahuvarṣavyāpī viṣayaḥ yena purāṇaiḥ janamānaseṣu cirasthāyī prabhāvaḥ sthāptaḥ |
SA27n2952:4684: api ca dharmadarśanādayaḥ - ete sarve viṣayāḥ purāṇānāṁ pṛṣṭheṣu upasthāpitāḥ santaḥ janānāṁ hṛdayaṁ jahruḥ |
SA27n2952:4685: ata eva sādhvidamucyate yat purāṇasāhityaṁ khalu svayaṁ prakāśakaṁ purātanamapi nūtanamamūlyaṁ prācīnabhāratīyaṁ nidhānam |
SA27n2952:4686: ------------ ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ purāṇeṣu karuṇā anubhavajanyajñānaviṣayo hi dharmaḥ |
SA27n2952:4688: yadyapi na kevalaṁ hindudharmasya api tu sarveṣāṁ dharmāṇāṁ kaścidānuṣṭhāniko viṣayo'sti,
SA27n2952:4689: tathāpi prakṛtārthena prayukto dharmo vastutaḥ mūlyajagatā saha pratyakṣaṁ sāvadhānatā |
SA27n2952:4691: te maulikamūlyamahattvapramāṇārthaṁ parokṣamārgāḥ kasyaciddeśasya saṁskṛtistaddeśīye dharme pratiphalitā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:4694: tathā hi - prācīno grīsaḥ kalāyāmanurāgī āsīt,
SA27n2952:4696: uktasabhyatādvayena saha bhāratīyasabhyatāyāstulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāmidaṁ dṛśyate yat dharmanirapekṣatāyā upari pratiṣṭhitā sabhyatā vismṛtiṁ yāti,
SA27n2952:4697: kintu bhāratīyā sabhyatā dharmarājanītyādijhañjhāsaṁkule virodhini pariveśe'pi bhayaśūnyaiva daṇḍāyamānā tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:4698: atra hetuḥ - tasyā bhittibhūmiḥ na mithyādharmanirapekṣatāyā śithile saikate sthāpitā,
SA27n2952:4701: tatra yathākramaṁ kāle kāle bahava ādhyātmikā netāra āgatāḥ |
SA27n2952:4702: te hi saṁskṛteryathārthaṁ vāhakāḥ - yatra saṁskṛtau mādhuryasya tathā satyasya samanvayaḥ sādhito bhavati |
SA27n2952:4704: satyaṁ ca jñānālokaṁ prajvalayati - sa āloko nāmādhyātmikaḥ, prabodhaḥ |
SA27n2952:4705: tatkartṛhvānaṁ na kevalaṁ jātiviśeṣāya sampradāyaviśeṣāya vā kriyate'pi tu samagramānavebhya eva |
SA27n2952:4706: teṣāṁ vāṇī tathā śikṣā na kevalaṁ samayaviśeṣe sthānaviśeṣe vā prayujyate,
SA27n2952:4707: api tu samagre viśve tathā samagre kāle |
SA27n2952:4709: evaṁ vinimayaprathāviśeṣamabhyasyati - yatra vaidikāḥ purohitā yajñe kañciddevaṁ kāṁściddevān vā āhūya pūjayanti,
SA27n2952:4710: tasmācca athavā tebhyaśca vinimayena pracuraṁ vittamicchanti |
SA27n2952:4711: tathāpi idaṁ svīkarttavyaṁ yat teṣu vyāvahārikeṣu svārthapareṣu ca kāryeṣu kācinmahatī nītirbabhūva |
SA27n2952:4712: sā khalu satyasyāthavā ṛtasya nītiḥ yat satyamācaraṇānāṁ sādhāraṇeṣu niyameṣu svayaṁ prakaṭitam |
SA27n2952:4713: ayaṁ naitiko vyāpāraḥ yaḥ prācīne dharme dṛśate - paravarttini kāle ākāraviśeṣaṁ dadhāra |
SA27n2952:4714: sa ca māhākāvyikaṁ paurāṇikaṁ ca yugamātya nirdiṣṭasāmājikādarśatvena pariṇato babhūva |
SA27n2952:4724: samājaḥ pārasparikakarmasu niyuktān sarvavidhān lokān gṛhītvā racitaḥ |
SA27n2952:4725: sa na sajātīyānāṁ savṛttīyānāṁ samamanobhāvānāṁ janānāṁ samavāyaḥ |
SA27n2952:4726: ata eva sarveṣāṁ sampradāyānāṁ savṛttīyānāṁ samamanobhāvānāṁ janānāṁ samavāyaḥ |
SA27n2952:4727: ata eva sarveṣāṁ sampradāyānāṁ sarvāsāṁ vā jātīnāṁ kṛte kati niyamā avaśyameva sthāsyanti |
SA27n2952:4728: te niyamāḥ khalu sāmājikavāhanasya samṛddhyā prayojanaṁ sādhayanti,
SA27n2952:4729: teṣu kati sarvātiśāyino vyāpārāḥ santi ye sarvebhyaḥ kañcit vyavahāraṁ kāmayante |
SA27n2952:4733: pitṛśca āhutidānam - ityādīni kāryāṇi sarvairavaśyaṁ karaṇīyāni āsan |
SA27n2952:4738: gurujanebhyaḥ sammānamityādīni karttavyāni sāmājikāstitvasya pakṣe maulikāni kāraṇāni |
SA27n2952:4739: ata eva evaṁkaraṇaṁ hi sārvalaukikaṁ karttavyam |
SA27n2952:4742: vivāhavidhipālanamete viṣayāḥ vyaktisukhāya tathā sāmājikaikyavidhānāya ca upayogino vivicyante |
SA27n2952:4745: vācā cintayā karmaṇā ca śucitāyā abhyāsaḥ |
SA27n2952:4750: ete viṣayāḥ vaidikayugāt svīkṛtāḥ sacetanatayā na cet,
SA27n2952:4753: anyadharmaḥ iti vaktuṁ bauddhadharmaḥ jainadharmaśceti sūcyate |
SA27n2952:4754: tayoḥ dharmayoḥ madhye yā mānavatā sā brāhmaṇadharme tātparyamayaṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ sthāpitavatī |
SA27n2952:4755: karmaṇi eṣā nītiḥ nirdayeṣu anuṣṭhāneṣu sūkṣmaṁ parivartanamānināya |
SA27n2952:4756: asmāt kāraṇāt paurāṇike yuge hindudharmaḥ prāyeṇa parivarttitaḥ iti parilakṣyate |
SA27n2952:4757: jātīyadharmasya koṣādhyakṣā brahmaṇā prādhānyena buddhijīviśreṇībhuktā āsan |
SA27n2952:4758: te nīravaṁ parājayaṁ na svīkurvanti sma |
SA27n2952:4759: te bauddhadharmāttathā jainadharmāt śaktimūlaṁ saṁgṛhya hindudharmaṁ balavattamaṁ cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:4760: evaṁ ca ātmotsargadānamahatvādipūrṇāni ākhyānāni ālokasaṅketā iva yugaṁ yugaṁ vyāpya hindudharmīyācaraṇamārge ālokasampātaṁ kurvanti sma |
SA27n2952:4761: gṛhasthajīvanasya vidhīn varṇayan varṇāśramadharmo vividhānāṁ karttavyakarmaṇāmupari gurutvaṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:4775: ukte viśleṣaṇe tattathasya pramāṇāya ceṣṭā kriyate yat hindudharmaḥ mūlataḥ karuṇātmako dharmaḥ |
SA27n2952:4777: ata eva yadi vayaṁ purāṇeṣu kāruṇikaṁ bhāvaṁ draṣṭuṁ ceṣṭāmahe,
SA27n2952:4778: tarhi paśyāmo yat sa bhāvaḥ prācīnatamaparyāyebhyaḥ eva sammukhaṁ krameṇāgataḥ |
SA27n2952:4780: anyathā karuṇāvirahito dharmo na kadāpi yugaparīkṣātaḥ jīvituṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:4781: karuṇāyā ālokaḥ viśṛṁkhaleṣu upākhyāneṣu purāvṛtteṣu ca aspaṣṭatāṁ dūrīkaroti |
SA27n2952:4782: sā karuṇā paryavekṣakasya dṛṣṭau svayaṁ prakāśate,
SA27n2952:4784: tathā ca pramāṇaṁ karoti yat śāśvato hindudharmaḥ pradhānataḥ mahān tathā udāraḥ |
SA27n2952:4785: purāṇānāṁ sthānam purāṇasāhityaṁ dharmīyakalpaviṣayatvenābhidhīyate tatra dharmanirapekṣaviṣayāḥ santi |
SA27n2952:4786: kintu tasya prasthānaṁ vedāpekṣayā na nyūnatāṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:4788: tarhi purāṇāni sādhāraṇānāṁ janānā dhanāni nikaṭātmīyarūpāṇi |
SA27n2952:4791: yat sāhityaṁ yugaṁ yugaṁ vyāpya gāthāsu kathāsu ca rakṣitamāsīt |
SA27n2952:4792: etāḥ gāthāḥ kathā ākhyāyikāśca vistṛte sāhitye sthānamadhikurvanti sma |
SA27n2952:4794: idamullekhyaṁ yat purāṇasaṁkalanasya kālo ya eva vā bhavatu vā na bhavatu,
SA27n2952:4795: purāṇagataṁ pṛthak pṛthak ākhyānaṁ sambhavataḥ vaidikayugasya pratyūṣe eva samajāyata |
SA27n2952:4796: dharmīyaṁ sāmājikaṁ rājanītikaṁ matamadhikṛtya sañjātamākhyānamantareṇāpi naitikaviṣayam avalmbya yadākhyānaṁ tam tātkālikaṁ naitikaṁ niyamaṁ dyotayati |
SA27n2952:4800: sa viṣayaḥ kevalaṁ dharmīyaṁ vyāpāraṁ gocarībhūtaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:4801: prācīnagranthapāṭhāt idaṁ parisphuṭaṁ yat prācīne bhārate pradhānato dve mukhye aitihye pracalite āstām |
SA27n2952:4802: tathā hi - brāhmaṇyaitihyaṁ ca kṣātraitihyaṁ ca |
SA27n2952:4806: vaidikasāhityamathavā brāhmaṇyaitihāṁ prācīnayugasya dharmīyacintākarmabhiḥ upakāraṁ na karoti,
SA27n2952:4807: kintu purāṇeṣu itihāseṣu ca prativimbitaṁ kṣatraitihyaṁ dharmanirapekṣapariveśaviṣayaka bhāvaracanāyai asmān sahāyatāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:4808: tathāpi, ubhayoḥ aitihyayoḥ viśleṣaṇaṁ pārśvāparśvi saṁśliṣṭe citre samagratāmānayati |
SA27n2952:4809: ubhayoraikyaṁ vānaikyaṁ vā na kimapi vastu |
SA27n2952:4814: adṛśyaṁ sūtramiva etat prāvaṇyaṁ dharmīyamadharmīyaṁ ca samagraṁ bhāratīyaṁ cintanaṁ ca viśvasanaṁ ca praviśati |
SA27n2952:4815: api ca, tīrthayātrābheṣajavidyāprāyaścittādīnāṁ sampūrṇataḥ bhinnānāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ prabhāvo'sti karuṇātmakaviśvajanaprītivyāpāre |
SA27n2952:4820: yataḥ mānavajāteḥ maṅgalaṁ vyaktīnāṁ sāmagrikaṁ maṅgalam vinā na kiñcidvastu |
SA27n2952:4822: yadyapi kati kathā yathārtha eva atīvaprācīnāḥ |
SA27n2952:4823: tāni purāṇāni sādhāraṇaiḥ janaiḥ saha antaraṅgaṁ vastunīva asminnapi kāle kāle parivartanaṁ sañjātam |
SA27n2952:4826: parivartanaśīlakālasya ākāṅkṣāṇāṁ jñānāya tathā grahaṇāya asyodāratāsīt |
SA27n2952:4827: jīvanabalasya pramāṇāya kasyacit prāṇavataḥ samājasya avaśyameva pravāhasya tathā parivartanasya śaktiḥ sthāsyati |
SA27n2952:4828: dharmapravāhaḥ sarvadā vibhinnayugadhārānusaraṇena tasya gatimārge parivarttanaṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:4830: evañca, purāṇāni spaṣṭhataḥ vividhānāṁ yugānāmānukūlyaṁ parigṛhya vibhinnānāṁ devānāṁ janapriyatvaṁ darśayanti |
SA27n2952:4831: brāhmaṇyaitihyamanusṛtya atharvavede ca bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca yathā likhitaṁ tathā dṛśyate yat vedānāmiva purāṇānāmapi pavitramūlatvamasti |
SA27n2952:4832: atharvaveda āha yat yajubhiḥ saha yajñaśeṣāt ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṁsi purāṇāni ca jāyante sma |
SA27n2952:4833: anyataśca, bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad vedetihāsapurāṇādīnāṁ prabhavaṁ mahābhūtasya śvāsatvena varṇayati |
SA27n2952:4835: tathāpi purāṇānāṁ pavitratve dve mate eva aikamatyaṁ dhārayataḥ |
SA27n2952:4837: purāṇeṣu pañca lakṣaṇani santi iti vidhīyate |
SA27n2952:4838: tathā hi - sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṁśo manvantarāṇi ca |
SA27n2952:4854: kalpakathāsu ca yā yāgānāṁ madhyataḥ āgacchati - ākhyānaiścopākhyānairgāthābhiḥ kalpahoktibhiḥ |
SA27n2952:4882: tathāpi uktāni aṣṭādaśapurāṇi atīva gurutvapūrṇāni iti vivecanā |
SA27n2952:4883: kadācidvā vā etāni purāṇāni tridhā vibhājyantetathā hi - sāttvikam,
SA27n2952:4888: īdṛśaṁ vargīkaraṇaṁ svasampradāyāya gurutvaṁ dātuṁ sampradāyaviśeṣeṇa kṛtam |
SA27n2952:4891: kenacana svatantreṇa upāyena hindudharmasya varṇanaṁ khalu purāṇānāmabhiprāyaḥ |
SA27n2952:4892: vedeṣu upaniṣatsu ca yat kārkaśyena varṇitaṁ purāṇeṣu tat ākhyānādibhiḥ kathyate - yena prakāreṇa saralatamaṁ manaḥ purāṇānāṁ viśuddhāḥ vāṇīṁ grahītumarhati |
SA27n2952:4893: atra śāstroktakriyā api saralīkṛtayā rītyā varṇitāḥ |
SA27n2952:4896: api ca, anekadevavādī dharmaḥ iva vaidiko dharmaḥ prakṛttyā sahiṣṇureva |
SA27n2952:4897: asmāt kāraṇāt vividheṣu devaviṣayeṣu pariṇāmataḥ samīkaraṇaṁ jātam |
SA27n2952:4899: sa paryāyaḥ sampūrṇataḥ śāstroktakriyāsu magna āsīt |
SA27n2952:4900: janapriyatārjanāya kasyaciddharmasya pakṣe saralena tathā samena tattvena,
SA27n2952:4904: asmin kṣetre brāhmaṇānāṁ tathā upaniṣadāṁ vyarthatā avaidikacintādhārāsu parokṣamutsāhaṁ sañcāritamakarot |
SA27n2952:4905: yāścintādhārāḥ krameṇa kintu niścayena mukhyatvamarjayanti sma |
SA27n2952:4906: itomadhye upaniṣadbhiḥ sṛṣtānāmanukūlāvasthānāṁ suyogaṁ prāpya bauddhāḥ jaināścetyādayo'vaidikā dharmā vedānāṁ prāmāṇyaṁ na svīkṛtya drutaṁ vistāraṁ labhante sma |
SA27n2952:4910: tasminneva samaye te durvalāṇi vstūni paryaharan |
SA27n2952:4911: eteṣāmavaidikānāṁ dharmīyāṇāṁ vyāpārāṇāmastitvaṁ yadyapi citaṁ na rakṣitam,
SA27n2952:4912: tathāpi te samagrahindudharmasya sāmānyabhāvadhārāyāṁ pracuraṁ prabhāvamasthāpayan |
SA27n2952:4915: tathā hi - pūrvavartī dharmaḥ kaṭhorastathā manāṅniṣṭhuro'pi āsīt |
SA27n2952:4916: kintu paravarttī dharmaḥ namanīyataraḥ sañjātaḥ - yatra bhinnamatānāṁ vivecanāyā avasara āsīt |
SA27n2952:4917: ayaṁ daṇḍaṁ yathā dadāti tathaiva daṇḍanivāraṇasyopāyam api vadati |
SA27n2952:4919: eṣā hi karuṇā vyarthatāṁ durvalatāṁ ca svīkṛtyāpi sanmārgaṁ na parityajati |
SA27n2952:4922: ye vyāpārāḥ vaidikadharmāpekṣayā mahattarā udāratarā eva |
SA27n2952:4926: ayaṁ dharmaḥ purāṇānāṁ jñānasāgarādutthāya yadyapi āpātadṛṣṭyā prācīnaṁ dharmamanukaroti tathāpi sa dharmaḥ praśānta udāraśca |
SA27n2952:4928: kintu teṣu kācidādarśagatā dig vartate yā satyaṁ mithyā vā darśayati,
SA27n2952:4934: jīvanapraśnaḥ samādhīyate - ākhyānairupākhyanaiśca purāṇameteṣāṁ saralatamaṁ mārgaṁ darśayati |
SA27n2952:4935: idaṁ vismayena upplikhyate yat purāṇāni anena mārgeṇa vividhatattveṣu,
SA27n2952:4937: jīvanācaraṇaviṣāyakeṣu vaidikeṣu avaidikeṣu mateṣu milanaṁ racayanti |
SA27n2952:4940: jñānakarmabhaktitatveṣu ca jīvanavyavahāraviṣayakeṣu vaidikeṣu avaidikeṣu ca mateṣu purāṇasādhitasamanvayaḥ hindusamājasya sarveṣu stareṣu prabhāvaṁ pranoti sma |
SA27n2952:4941: tasya pariṇāmataḥ eva vartamānakāle prāyeṇa sarveṣāṁ hindūnāṁ jīvanaṁ suvinyastaṁ sañjātaṁ yatra bhinnakālīyānāṁ bhinnadharmīyāṇāṁ bhinnānāṁ bhāvānāmabhyāsānāṁ ca asamāntarālasamatayā parasparasaṁgranthanaṁ kṛtam |
SA27n2952:4942: vidyāsthānebhyo dūre vasati īdṛśo'śikṣito hindurapi purāṇakathitadārśanikasatye sampūrṇataḥ ajñatāṁ na poṣayati |
SA27n2952:4946: itthaṁbhūtavyāpārasya hetutvena idameva kathyate yat mahākāvyāni purāṇāni ca hindūnāṁ jīvane'tīva gurutvapūrṇabhūmikayābhinayanti dvisahasravarṣādhikaṁ samayaṁ vyāpya |
SA27n2952:4947: tāni kamapi kalahaṁ na kṛtvaiva sādhāraṇebhyo janebhyaḥ maharṣiṇāṁ jñānamaparyanti sma |
SA27n2952:4948: eteṣāṁ sāhityānāṁ lekhakāḥ pratyekaṁ janaṁ vivicya tasya sāmājike tathā dharmīye jīvane kalyāṇakaramupadeśaṁ dattavantaḥ |
SA27n2952:4949: etaiḥ sāhityaiḥ unnato mūlyabodhastathā naitiko niyamaḥ vyāvahārikeṇa jñānena yuktastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:4950: ayaṁ mānavacaritrasya katicit truṭīḥ yathā gṛṇāti tathaiva tāsāmatikramāyāpi upāyaṁ darśayati,
SA27n2952:4951: samagrato mānavajātīnāmevaṁvidhe grahaṇe eva pavitragrantheṣu prativimbitasya mānavikasya vyāpārasya mūlaṁ pramāṇamasti |
SA27n2952:4962: kṣamāyāśca vismṛteśca pravṛttiḥ kasyacijjanasya tadīyasahacarāṇāṁ ca jīvanaṁ yathopayuktaṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:4963: eṣā vāṇī dhruvakavat eteṣu janapriyeṣu sāhityeṣu bahubhirākhyānairupākhyānaiśca punaḥ punaḥ samarpyate |
SA27n2952:4964: bhrama eva mānavadharmasatathāpi bhramasaṁśodhanāya yaḥ prayatnaḥ sa eva mānavaṁ mahāmānavaparyāyaṁ nayati |
SA27n2952:4965: sa samayaḥ samāgato yadā purāṇeṣu itihāsegru ca racitānāṁ devākhyānānāṁ ca purāvṛttānāṁ ca punarvyākhyānairna prayojanamasti |
SA27n2952:4967: atra paurāṇikasāhitye vivṛtasya hindudharmasya kāruṇikadharmatvena viśleṣaṇāya kācit praceṣṭā kriyate |
SA27n2952:4968: yatra prathāstathā ācārā na pradhānāḥ kintu mahattā tathā karuṇā prakṛtātmatvena pratiṣṭhitā |
SA27n2952:4971: yatra sāmpradāyikānāṁ cintanānāṁ tathā viśvāsānāṁ vibhinnā dhārā militāḥ sañjātāḥ |
SA27n2952:4973: tathāpi tatra ekā dārśanikī bhūmikā antarnihitā satī sarvāṇi maulikāni satyāni prakṛte pariprekṣite samarthayate sma |
SA27n2952:4982: śiṣyaṁ prati ācāryasya pravṛttirathavā ācāryaṁ prati śiṣyasya karttavyatā,
SA27n2952:4991: vahvyaḥ kathā āpātadṛṣṭyā saralā dhamīyavarṇahīnā iva pratibhānti,
SA27n2952:4992: kintu sūkṣmaṁ paryavekṣeṇa pramāṇīkaroti yat etāsu kathāsu kācit karuṇātmikā cintā virājate |
SA27n2952:4993: idaṁ satyaṁ yat purāṇeṣu dharmīyo bhāvo vartate |
SA27n2952:4994: asmāt kāraṇāt ākhyānabhāgeṣu guṇasya mahatī bhūmikāsti |
SA27n2952:4997: bhaktirnāmāpara āvego yo bahuṣu vyāpareṣu lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:5008: bahūni upākhyānāni imaṁ bhaktijamāvegaṁ goraveṇa anvitaṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:5011: kintu bhakto yadā kasmaicidātmānaṁ samarpayati tadā kiñcit pratyuttaramavaśyameva sthāsyati |
SA27n2952:5013: kevalaṁ jyeṣṭhānāṁ gurujanānāṁ cānandaḥ paryāpta iti gaṇyate |
SA27n2952:5014: ya ānanda ihaloke paraloke ca saubhāgyopabhogāya kalpate |
SA27n2952:5016: prakṛti yajñaḥ kadāpi na vṛthā yāti - etādṛśī śikṣā eva purāvṛttebhyo jāyate |
SA27n2952:5017: atra bhaktisambandhinaḥ kati utkṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi |
SA27n2952:5021: svāminaṁ prati janmāntaravyāpini svārthahīne vyavahāre gurutvamāropayanti |
SA27n2952:5024: tasya patnī śaivyātīva puṇyavatī dharmaparāyaṇā ca āsīt |
SA27n2952:5026: ekadā yadā tau prātyahikagaṅgāsnānāt pratyāgacchataḥ sma tadā pathi ekaṁ pāpinaṁ janamapaśyatām |
SA27n2952:5027: vratakāle tena rājñā pāpinā saha vārtālāpaḥ kṛtaḥ iti hetoḥ parajanmani tasya kukkuratvena janma abhūt |
SA27n2952:5030: tayā kukkuraviśeṣamanusandhāya pūrvajanmasu tasya jīvanāni smaryyante sma |
SA27n2952:5031: evaṁ katiṣu janmasu gateṣu sa rājño janakasya putratvena janmagrahaṇaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5032: tadā rājakanyayā saha tasya vivāho babhūva |
SA27n2952:5034: vibhinnanimnajanmagrahaṇaṁ kurvate svāmine rājakanyāyā adhyavasāyastathā janmānukrameṇa svābhidarśanodyamaḥ vismayakaraḥ vyāpāraḥ |
SA27n2952:5039: tasya saubhāgyamevedaṁ yat tasya patnī mahatī satī tasya jīvanāya cintayati sma |
SA27n2952:5043: pathivipreṇāpamānitaḥ kaścinmunistaṁ vipramaśapat sūryodayena sahaiva tasya mṛtyurbhaviṣyatīti |
SA27n2952:5044: satītvasyaitādṛśīśaktiryat sā patnī sūryodayena saha svāmino mṛtyuṁ ruṇaddhi mma yataḥ sā ca kadāpi svāmino mṛtyuṁ na kāmayate |
SA27n2952:5045: yatastasya svāmī kāyena manasā ca asusthastataḥ svāmino'nyāye ca duṣṭe ca vyavahāre tasyāḥ ko'pi abhiyogo nāsti |
SA27n2952:5046: ākhyānasyāsya pariṇāme sa vipraḥ anasūyāyā hastakṣepāt devānāmānukūlyaṁ labdhvā rogamuktaḥ sañjātaḥ |
SA27n2952:5048: pratiṣṭhāpurasya nṛpateḥ surasenasya putratvenaikaḥ sarpa āsīt |
SA27n2952:5049: rājñā tathā rājapatnyā viṣayo'yaṁ gupta āsīt |
SA27n2952:5050: upayukte vayasi sa sarpo vivāhaṁ kartumicchati sma |
SA27n2952:5051: guptaviṣayaṁ nonmucya pūrvadeśīyarājakanyayā bhogavatyā saha tasya vivāho vyavasthito'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5052: vivāhāt paraṁ bhogavatī tasyāḥ svāminaḥ prakṛtaṁ paricayaṁ jñātumarhati sma |
SA27n2952:5054: parantu sā taṁ sevate sma yathā ekā strī kuryāt |
SA27n2952:5055: anena mahattvena sā ekāṁ śaktiṁ prāptavatī yayā tau svāmī ca strī ca pūrvajanmavṛttāntaṁ smartuṁ śekatuḥ |
SA27n2952:5056: sarpeṇa smṛtaṁ pūrvajanmani sa kaścicchivānucara āsīditi |
SA27n2952:5059: pavitraṁ sthānaṁ gatvā śivasyārādhanāyai sa bhogavatyānuruddho babhūva |
SA27n2952:5060: śivasya vareṇa sa svābhāvikaṁ jīvanaṁ pratiprāpnoti sma |
SA27n2952:5061: vayaṁ sadā tarkayāmo yat prācīnavyavahāravidhiḥ strījanebhya etādṛśīṁ svārthaśūnyatāmaicchat |
SA27n2952:5063: tathāpi bahuṣu upākhyāneṣu dṛśyate yat svāminaḥ yathārthataḥ teṣāṁ bhaktihīnābhyaḥ guṇahīnābhyaḥ patnībhyaḥ hitāya ceṣṭāmakurvan |
SA27n2952:5064: tebhyaḥ upākhyānebhya idamāyāti yat sadṛḍhapremabandhanena snehena gabhīrabāyitvajñānena ca atīva prayojanamasti dāmpatyajīvane |
SA27n2952:5066: tasmin premaṇi prakṛtā tayāvatiṣṭhate - yā karuṇāyāḥ paridhau vartate |
SA27n2952:5067: sūryasya tahtā tadīyapatnyāḥ saṁjñāyā upākhyāne asyopākhyānasyojjvalo dṛṣṭānto dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:5071: sūryasya dāruṇaṁ tejaḥ soḍhumakṣamā satī chāyānāmnīṁ ātmanaḥ pratikṛtiṁ sṛṣṭvānyatrāgacchat |
SA27n2952:5072: sā vikalparūpā saṁjñāyāḥ putrān prati viṣamaṁ vyavaharat |
SA27n2952:5073: tadā sūryaḥ aśvasya chadyaveṣaṁ dhṛtvā saṁjñānusandhānāyottarakurudeśaṁ jagāma,
SA27n2952:5074: yataḥ tasmin samaye saṁjñā aśvāyā veṣaṁ dadhāra |
SA27n2952:5075: mūlataḥ sa tasya patnyai ātmanaḥ tejaḥ parityaktuṁ sammata āsīt |
SA27n2952:5076: eṣā daśā yadyapi yantrāṇā- dāyikā tathāpi sa saṁjñāyai soḍhuṁ kṛtasaṁkalpa āsīt |
SA27n2952:5080: kintu tathā na kṛtvā sa patnyā saha sukhena vāsāya duḥkhajanakasaṁgati sthāpayati sma |
SA27n2952:5083: idaṁ pratīyate yat te dve mahile atīva avaśyatāṁ jāte |
SA27n2952:5086: yathā te dve mahile atīva avaśyatāṁ jāte |
SA27n2952:5091: kintu kaśyapasya pratyāgamane āsanne sati te kukārye lipte'bhavatām |
SA27n2952:5096: pratyāgataḥ kaśyapaḥ sarvaṁ śrutvā patnīpakṣasamarthanāya śivaṁ stavaiḥ santuṣya svīyapatnīyugalaṁ hāni vinaiva pratyāpnoti sma |
SA27n2952:5097: tathāpi aśodhyatvāt kadruḥ punarapi brāhmaṇān prati upahasya anyat pāpaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5100: etadupākhyānaṁ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat kena prakāreṇa kaśyapena patnīdoṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA27n2952:5102: yadyapi te dve pāpakarmaṇi lipte āstām |
SA27n2952:5105: tatra sa muniḥ tadīyakutsitāṁ strīṁ tapobalena sundarīṁ kṛtavān |
SA27n2952:5108: kintu rājani bahulāyāḥ kimapi prema nāsīt |
SA27n2952:5110: tathāpi rājā kimapi na manyate sma |
SA27n2952:5111: ekadā bahulā samagraṁ śiṣṭatvamatikrabhya paripūrṇāyāṁ rājasabhāyāṁ rājānamapamānitaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5112: tadā rājā kruddhaḥ san patnīṁ bahulāṁ vanaṁ prerayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5113: itomadhye kaścid vipra āgatya bahulāyā apaharaṇasya sandeśaṁ nivedayati sma |
SA27n2952:5116: yathākramaṁ so'vagato'bhavat yat bahulā sarparājyaṁ nītā'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5118: rājā tadīyapatnīvirāgāt mukto bhavituṁ prāguktasya viprasya sahāyatayā bahulāṁ gṛhamāṇītavān |
SA27n2952:5120: rājñī bahulā tanmūkatvamuktaye sarparājakanyāṁ sahāyatāṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5121: vipro yajñabalena rājakanyāyā vākśakteḥ punaruddhāraṁ kṛtavān |
SA27n2952:5122: idamupākhyānam ucchṛṅkhalāyāṁ patnyāṁ svāminaḥ yat prema tasyodāharaṇatvenopanyastam |
SA27n2952:5123: bahuṣu purāṇeṣu pitṛbhakterdṛṣṭāntatvena yayāteḥ purośca upākhyānaṁ prasiddham |
SA27n2952:5124: idaṁ pratīyate yat asyopākhyānasya cittākarṣakatvāt prācīne kāle eva bahulaṁ pracāraṁ labhamānaṁ prāyeṇa sarveṣu purāṇeṣu svīyasthānamadhicakāra |
SA27n2952:5125: vṛddho'pi yayātiḥ sukhabhogaiḥ na santuṣṭa āsīt |
SA27n2952:5126: ata eva sa jarārpaṇena putreṣu anyatamasya yauvanaṁ prāptumaicchat |
SA27n2952:5127: ekaikaśaḥ sarve putrā tat dātuṁ sammatā na babhūvuḥ |
SA27n2952:5128: kintu kaniṣṭhaḥ putraḥ puruḥ jarāgrahaṇena pitre ātmanaḥ yauvanaṁ samarpitavān |
SA27n2952:5129: tataḥ tṛptaḥ san yayātiḥ purave tadīyayauvanaṁ samarpya,
SA27n2952:5133: tatra pramatiputraḥ sumatiḥ gandharvakṛtabandhanadaśātaḥ tasya pitaramamuñcat |
SA27n2952:5134: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe ekasminnupākhyāne gurave śiṣyasya udvego varṇitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5137: ekadā sa śāntināmakāya śiṣyāya agnestattvāvadhānabhāraṁ pradāya anyatra gataḥ |
SA27n2952:5139: anena guruḥ kruddho bhaviṣyati iti cintayitvā śāntiratīva bhīto'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5140: sa jānāti sma yat gurostathākathitakopāt kāpi muktirnāsti |
SA27n2952:5143: śāntiḥ prathamaṁ varaṁ prārthayate sma - yajñīyo'gniḥ prajvalito bhavatu iti |
SA27n2952:5144: tataḥ gurave ekaṁ putraṁ sa icchati sma |
SA27n2952:5146: munau pratyāgate sa ātmanaḥ svabhāve kiñcit parivartanamupalabdhavān |
SA27n2952:5147: tataḥ asya kāraṇam anusandhāya sarvaṁ jñātumaśaknot |
SA27n2952:5148: idam upākhyānaṁ na kevalaṁ śiṣyasya svārthaśūnyatāṁ darśayati3,
SA27n2952:5149: api tu gurau tasya sāmagrikīṁ bhaktiṁ pramāṇīkaroti |
SA27n2952:5150: yayā bhaktyā sa guroḥ doṣān agaṇayitvā guruḥ yathā ākāṅkṣitaṁ vastu prāpnoti tathā karoti ||
SA27n2952:5151: prācīnā granthā mānavasya devasya madhye niviḍa naikaṭyaṁ paryavekṣante |
SA27n2952:5152: idaṁ satyaṁ yat devā lābhapradeṣu padeṣu pratiṣṭhitā āsan |
SA27n2952:5154: deveṣu martyeṣu ca avicchinno yoga āsīt |
SA27n2952:5155: sarvatra vayaṁ 'paśyāmaḥ yat sadaiva narakamapi devam ekaniṣṭhayāhnayati,
SA27n2952:5160: sa dadāti - ātmanaḥ kleśe satyapi sa dadāti |
SA27n2952:5161: devāḥ kadāpi dayācintanād viratā na bhavanti,
SA27n2952:5162: kadāpi guṇasya ca doṣasya samatāṁ na cintayanti,
SA27n2952:5163: kadāpi vā na lābhasya hānervā gaṇanāṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:5164: ata eva ca kadāpi vā dātā labdhakṣayo bhavati |
SA27n2952:5166: tasya bhūmiṁ vā svargaṁ vā hārayati |
SA27n2952:5167: api ca, tasya araṇyādaraṇāntare bhramaṇasya kāraṇaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:5168: tathāpi devā adhikavaradānād viratā na bhavanti |
SA27n2952:5169: te martyebhyo hitāya praśnātītaṁ kalyāṇaṁ sādhayanti |
SA27n2952:5170: anena varadānena gabhīrā prītiḥ karuṇā nimnatarajīvebhya eva iti sūcyate |
SA27n2952:5171: kadāpi vāvaśyameva īdṛśī svārthaśūnyā prītiḥ yugapat anurāgeṇa vā bhaktyā vā puraskṛtā bhavati,
SA27n2952:5174: sarvāṇi trīṇi ākhyānāni vividheṣu purāṇeṣu dṛśyante yatra paramadevatvena bhagavān nārāyaṇo varṇyate |
SA27n2952:5176: kintu sa prathamādārabhya nārāyaṇasya bhakta āsīt |
SA27n2952:5177: tasya pitā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tadīyaṁ daityasulabhaṁ vyavahāraṁ vijñāya prahlādaṁ tannivāraṇāya sarvathāceṣṭhata |
SA27n2952:5180: tathā ca sa tasya ārādhyadevasya kṛpayā sarvatra vipadaḥ mukto'bavat |
SA27n2952:5181: avaśeṣe nārāyaṇaḥ tasya atyācārāt sṛṣṭiṁ rakṣituṁ hiraṇyakaśipuṁ jaghān |
SA27n2952:5182: prahlāda-jīvanavivaraṇaṁ bhakte viṣṇoḥ niyataṁ tathā dṛśyam avadhānaṁ darśayati |
SA27n2952:5184: tatra viṣṇuḥ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat sampūrṇā nirbharatā kadāpi niṣphalatāṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:5186: sa vimātrā āhataḥ san viṣṇusamīpaṁ gataḥ |
SA27n2952:5187: etāvadeva tasya apamānamāsīt yat svīyamūlyapramāṇāya sa durlabhaṁ kiñcit labdhuṁ dṛḍhapratijño'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5188: tataḥ sa gṛhasya sukhaṁ parityajya tasya ajñātasya anusandhānaṁ kartumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5190: te ādita eva samyak panthānaṁ darśayanti sma |
SA27n2952:5191: dhruva ekaniṣṭhatayā saralatayā ca sarvāsāṁ vipadāṁ madhyataḥ paribhramati sma |
SA27n2952:5192: sa sarvavidavipada uttīrṇaḥ san sūkṣmābhiniveśena paramaṁ lakṣyamupagataḥ |
SA27n2952:5193: viṣṇurāvirbhūtaḥ san tasmai apūrvamalaukikaṁ varaṁ dadau,
SA27n2952:5195: yatra parityaktaḥ śiśuḥ sarvaśaktimataḥ viṣṇoḥ pakṣacchāyāmāśrayam alabhata |
SA27n2952:5196: arthāt ajñaḥ śiśurapi tena parameṇa devena nāvahelito bhavati |
SA27n2952:5197: sa āśvāsadānena taṁ rakṣati īpsitena vastunā ca upaharati |
SA27n2952:5198: valerupākhyānamapi sarvaiḥ jñāyate tathā vividheṣu purāṇeṣu dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:5199: daityaḥ sannapi valiratīva dhārmikaḥ ca viṣṇoḥ paramo bhaktaśca āsīt |
SA27n2952:5201: devāsteṣāṁ priyāṁ bhūmiṁ pratyāptuṁ viṣṇusamīpaṁ gatāḥ |
SA27n2952:5202: viṣṇuḥ aditeḥ putratvena vāmanaḥ san avatīrṇo bhabhūva |
SA27n2952:5203: valiḥ sarvebhyaḥ prārthibhyaḥ vastūni dadāti sma |
SA27n2952:5208: tathāpi valiḥ svargasya tathā svīyajīvanasya vinimayenāpi svasaṁkalpena baddha āsīt |
SA27n2952:5211: tṛtīye pāde nābhimūlād vahiḥ prakāśite sati sa taṁ pādaṁ sthāpayitumaicchat |
SA27n2952:5217: bhaktaḥ sarvaṁ jñātvāpi paścātpado na bhavati |
SA27n2952:5218: vividhānāṁ devānāṁ mahattāṁ mahānubhavatāṁ cādhikṛtya pracurāṇi ākhyānāni santi |
SA27n2952:5222: idaṁ varṇayati yat - yamaḥ kayościdvṛddhayoḥ pitroḥ mṛtaṁ putramānetuṁ gataḥ |
SA27n2952:5223: kintu tayoḥ duḥkhaparimāṇaṁ dṛṣṭvā sa tatputraṁ netuṁ na śaśāka |
SA27n2952:5224: tataḥ sa mānavajāteḥ duḥkhaṁ dūrīkartuṁ tapasyārthaṁ vahirgataḥ |
SA27n2952:5228: kintu idamāyāti yat sa na tṛptaḥ,
SA27n2952:5232: sa mahādevasya bhaktamānetuṁ gataḥ kintu sa ānetuṁ na śaśāka |
SA27n2952:5233: mahādevaḥ tasya bhaktaṁ na kevalaṁ rakṣitavān api tu yamopadravasya samāptiṁ sādhayituṁ yamaṁ jaghāna |
SA27n2952:5235: kintu yamaḥ mahādevasya bhaktān mṛtyubhayaṁ na darśayiṣyati iti kṛtvā svīkṛtiṁ gṛhītavān |
SA27n2952:5237: tathāpi śivo vaktumicchati yat sa yena kena prakāreṇa tasya prakṛtaṁ bhaktaṁ rakṣiṣyati |
SA27n2952:5238: idaṁ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat bhagavān tadīyabhaktānāṁ doṣaṁ draṣṭuṁ sarvadāndhastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:5239: viṣṇupurāṇe ca bhāgavatapurāṇe ca bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya vividhāni kāryāṇi vistareṇa varṇyante |
SA27n2952:5240: sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ madhye sa bahūni mahattvapūrṇāni kāryāṇyakarot |
SA27n2952:5243: kintu tatrāpi sa karuṇāṁ darśayati sma |
SA27n2952:5245: ṭa yathā nirāpadaṁ samudraṁ gantuṁ śaknuvanti kṛṣṇaḥ tādṛśīṁ vyavasthā cakāra |
SA27n2952:5246: kṣamāyāstathā dayāyā īdṛśī pravaṇatā deveṣu atīva sādhāraṇī |
SA27n2952:5247: yo visamaḥ śatruḥ trāṇaṁ prārthayate athavā anuśocanayā nato bhavati,
SA27n2952:5249: asmin prasaṁge mahādevabhya cāndhakārasurasya ca madhye saṁgrāmasya ākhyānamavaśyamevollekhanīyam |
SA27n2952:5250: ayamasuro na kevalaṁ duvṛttaḥ api tu pārvatī prati āsaktipurṇāṁ dṛṣṭiṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:5251: pārvatī kenāpi prakāreṇa tasya duṣṭahastagrāhāt rakṣāṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:5252: kinti andhakena saha śivasya dāruṇaṁ yuddhamabhavat |
SA27n2952:5253: avaśeṣe avaśyambhāvinaṁ parājayaṁ dṛṣṭvā andhakaḥ śivāt trāṇamaicchat |
SA27n2952:5255: kintu śivassya śūlena viddhaḥ sannandhaka sarvapāpebhyo mukto'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5256: evaṁ pavitrīkṛta ātmā san sa paramaṁ sukhaṁ prāptavān |
SA27n2952:5257: śivaḥ sarvadā dayārdracitto deva ityasmākaṁ dhāraṇā |
SA27n2952:5259: tathā ca bhaktāya tadākāṅkṣitaṁ sarvaṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:5263: avaśeṣe bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ kauśalena devā durdaśāyā muktā abhavan |
SA27n2952:5265: śivaḥ krodhavaśāt tasya jaṭāsu gaṅgāmābaddhāṁ kṛtavān |
SA27n2952:5268: śivaḥ tasyopari dayāṁ pradarśya gaṅgāṁ muktāṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5270: brahmapurāṇasya 169 tame'dhyāye anyadujjvalamākhyānamasti yatra bhaktāya mahādevasya trāṇasya pravṛttiḥ varṇyate |
SA27n2952:5271: nimnavaṁśīyo vyādho bhillaḥ atīva rītirahitenopāyena mahādevaṁ pūjayati |
SA27n2952:5272: mahādevasya yaṁ vigrahaṁ sa pūjayati sa vigrahaḥ vedābhidhānasya viprasya |
SA27n2952:5273: vedasyānupasthitau bhillastatrāgatyāpakvaiḥ māṁsaiśca anyairvastubhiśca priyaṁ devaṁ mahādevam arcayati |
SA27n2952:5275: ekadā lukkāyitaḥ san vedaḥ bhillaṁ tathā kurvantamapaśyat |
SA27n2952:5280: idaṁ darśayati yat pṛṣṭhapoṣakasya devasya trāṇātmikā prakṛtiḥ kiyatparyantaṁ gantumarhati |
SA27n2952:5281: idaṁ varṇayati yat kati pretā atīva gṛṇārhaṁ pāpaṁ cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:5284: kintu viṣṇubhakto'sau vipraḥ priyasya devasya nāma kartumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5287: yataḥ sarve te bhagavantaṁ pratyakṣīkartuṁ śekuḥ |
SA27n2952:5288: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat satsaṁsargaḥ sarveṣāmupakārāya bhavati |
SA27n2952:5290: ātmaviṣayālocanāyāmasyollekho nāprāsaṁgiko bhavati yat purāṇeṣu atṛptebhya ātmabhyaḥ dayā atīva sādhāraṇo vyāpāraḥ |
SA27n2952:5293: anyatama upāya ucyate - uccasthānaviśeṣe pradīpāḥ sthāpyante yathā bhramaṇaratāṁ pretātmānaḥ tān anāyāsena draṣṭuṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:5294: dayā dayā hi aparo mahānāvegaḥ yena dātuḥ gauravaṁ vardhate |
SA27n2952:5295: ayaṁ mahānāvegaḥ purāṇeṣu sarvatra pratiphalito bhavati |
SA27n2952:5299: sarvamidaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat dayāsrotasvinī sarvadā vahati |
SA27n2952:5300: kāle kāle dānamayogyāya dīyate'thavā varasyāpaprayogo bhavati |
SA27n2952:5305: mokṣa eva teṣāṁ paramaḥ puruṣārthaḥ kintu te janahitāya kāryaṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:5308: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat tapasyayā teṣāmātmānaḥ pavitrībhavanti |
SA27n2952:5310: svārthaśūnyatā athavā kasyacidātmanaḥ samagre viśve prakṣepaḥ tapasyāyā mukhyo viṣayaḥ,
SA27n2952:5311: sa eva tasya mārgasya śeṣamupagacchati so'pareṣāṁ sukhaṁ tathā duḥkham ātmana eveti anubhavati |
SA27n2952:5315: ucyate yat ekadā muniḥ kaṇvaḥ gaṅgāyāśca kṣudhāyāśca santoṣaṁ vidadhāti sma |
SA27n2952:5317: dve eva tasmai munaye varaṁ dātumaicchatām |
SA27n2952:5318: sa ātmanaḥ kṛte na kimapi kāmayate sma |
SA27n2952:5319: kintu svīyasantānāya varaṁ prārthayate yat tadīyajātyantargatā sarve janāḥ kṣudhārttā na bhaveyuriti |
SA27n2952:5321: sa ātmanaḥ saubhāgyaṁ samagrāya jagate unmīlitaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5322: sa prārthayate - yadi ko'pi kṣudhāmarcayati so'vaśyameva kṣudhāyā mukto bhavediti |
SA27n2952:5325: atrocyate yat hariścandro varuṇasya vareṇa tasya putraṁ prāptavān |
SA27n2952:5326: sa varuṇasamīpe saṁkalpaṁ kṛtavān yat sa navajātena putreṇa saha yañaṁ sampādayiṣyati |
SA27n2952:5327: kintu samaye tasminnāgate sa punaḥ punaḥ kālaṁ hartumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5328: avaśeṣeḥ devaḥ kruddhaḥ san rājñe hitāya caraābhisandhi jñāpayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5329: rājā tadā kaitavamāśrityāvadat kiṁ kartavyamiti tena na jñāyate |
SA27n2952:5330: yadā kaścit tamupadideśa yat kasyacijjanasya putraṁ krītvā svīyaputrasya vinimayena tena putreṇa yajñaṁ kuryāt,
SA27n2952:5333: api ca tasya aparau dvau putrau āstām |
SA27n2952:5334: kintu vastutaḥ śunaḥśepho yajñe utsargīkṛto nābhavat |
SA27n2952:5335: idaṁ sūcayati yat niṣṭhurayajñavyavasthā dhṛṇārhācāreṇa yatheṣṭaṁ pratyākhyātā'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5339: kevalaṁ gabhīrā karuṇā daridrāya nirdṣāya ca bālakāyānubhūyate |
SA27n2952:5341: etayā karuṇayā devaḥ tasya rakṣāyai anuprerito'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5343: yataḥ, tasya pitā pāralaukikavipadaḥ rakṣārthaṁ jyeṣṭhaputramaicchat |
SA27n2952:5344: tasya mātā priyatamatvāt kaniṣṭhaputraṁ na tyajati sma |
SA27n2952:5345: asmin samaye yaṁ rājā rakṣet tameva kāmayate sma |
SA27n2952:5346: ata eva bālakasyāsyāśrayatvena na ko'pi āsīt |
SA27n2952:5350: atra dṛśyate yat na kevalaṁ devānāṁ sādhūnāmunnatajanmanāṁ narāṇāṁ vā karuṇātmakaṁ caritramasti,
SA27n2952:5355: tatra ekaḥ pecaka ekaśca kapotaḥ santānādibhiḥ śa prativasataḥ sma |
SA27n2952:5358: dvayoḥ vihagayoḥ dve bhārye yuddhaṁ naicchatām |
SA27n2952:5359: te agniṁ ca yamaṁ ca āhvayataḥ sma,
SA27n2952:5360: yataḥ tau devau parivārayugalasya adhiṣṭhātārau devau |
SA27n2952:5362: kintu parivāradvayasya vihagāḥ śatrutvāvasānamantareṇā na kimapi vastu kāmayante sma |
SA27n2952:5364: mahākāvyeṣu purāṇeṣu ca vaśiṣṭhaḥ viśvāmitraśceti munidvayamatīva vikhyātam |
SA27n2952:5366: muniḥ viśvāmitra janmanā kṣatriyaḥ kintu tapasyayā brāmhaṇo'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5367: idaṁ tasya ekaniṣṭhaṁ śaktimayaṁ ca caritra pramāṇīkaroti |
SA27n2952:5369: dvau munī jagataḥ upakārāya prabhūtaṁ cakratuḥ |
SA27n2952:5374: ekadā rājñā daivāt sūryakanyā tapatī dṛṣṭā |
SA27n2952:5376: sa kanyāyāḥ paricayaṁ na vijñāyaiva durdaśāgrasto babhūva |
SA27n2952:5377: vaśiṣṭhaḥ tasya avasthāṁ samupalabhyāgraṇīḥ san sauradeśaṁ guṇaṁ praśyati |
SA27n2952:5378: kintu atra śiṣyasya doṣaṁ jñātvāpi guruḥ tathā ceṣṭate yathā śiṣya īpsitaṁ vastu prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:5384: anyathā sa tasyā duḥkhasya hetuḥ bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:5385: ananyopāyā sarasvatī vaśiṣṭhasamīpaṁ gatvā sarvaṁ nivedayati sma |
SA27n2952:5387: sa sarasvatyai anumatiṁ dadau viśvāmitrasamīpaṁ māṁ nayeti |
SA27n2952:5389: kintu sa muniḥ taṁ hantumupayuktasyāstrasya sandhānaṁ kartumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5390: srasvatī vaśiṣṭhaṁ niṣṭhurasya muneḥ hastagrahāt muktaye anyatra nayati sma |
SA27n2952:5392: bahukālaṁ vyāpya udvegāt paraṁ sarasvatī asyā daśyāyāḥ muktā abhavat |
SA27n2952:5393: muneḥ vaśiṣṭasya pakṣe viśvāmitrasya duṣṭecchāparipūraṇena kimapi prayojanaṁ nāsīt |
SA27n2952:5396: kintu sa sarasvatyā upari dayāṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5397: tasyai hitāya sa yajñaṁ kartumudyataḥ babhūva |
SA27n2952:5398: anyataśca sarasvatī vaśiṣṭhaṁ rakṣituṁ munikopamupekṣya yathāśakti ceṣṭase sma |
SA27n2952:5401: ekadā kururājaḥ kiñcit karttumaicchat yena saḥ akṣayayaśaso'dhikārī bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:5402: ataḥ sa śaivaṣaṇḍasya yamamahiṣasya ca sāhāyyena svarṇamayena halena bhūmikarṣaṇaṁ kartumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5403: kautuhalī san indraḥ sandeśaṁ jñātuṁ tatra gataḥ |
SA27n2952:5404: rājā indramuvāca yat sa dharmasatyadānakṣamāpavitratādīnāṁ bījāni vaptumicchati |
SA27n2952:5405: pṛṣṭaḥ san so'vadat yat tasya dehe tāni bījāni santi |
SA27n2952:5406: viṣṇustaṁ parīkṣituṁ tatra gatvā bījāni ayācata |
SA27n2952:5411: tataḥ bhagavān santuṣṭaḥ san āśīrvādaṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:5412: nṛpatiḥ nijāya na kimapi yācate sma,
SA27n2952:5414: sa kevalamicchati - adaḥ sthānaṁ pavitraṁ bhavatu,
SA27n2952:5415: yo janaḥ tatra yajñaṁ kariṣyati sa mokṣaṁ prānotu iti |
SA27n2952:5417: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat manuṣyacaritraṁ samunnataṁ bhavitumarhati yatra svārthaparatā sāmpūrṇyena tirohitā bhavati |
SA27n2952:5418: mānavānāṁ maṅgalāya ātmana eṣa utkarṣaḥ satyameva ullekhārhaḥ |
SA27n2952:5419: īdṛśāni bahūni upākhyānāni santi yatra hetuśūnyā dayā varṇyate |
SA27n2952:5421: kathayati yat ṛṣiḥ aurvaḥ bāhurājasya yaḥ putro'jāta āsīt tasya jīvanaṁ rakṣati sma |
SA27n2952:5422: yadā rājñī garbhavarī āsīt tadā kācīt sapatnī īrṣyāparāyaṇā satī viṣaṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:5424: evaṁ saptasu varṣeṣu atikrānteṣu yadā nṛpatiḥ mṛtyulokaṁ gataḥ rājñī ca ātmahananāya udyatā'bhavat,
SA27n2952:5425: tadā muniḥ aurvaḥ ajātasya putrasya kṛte duḥkhamanubhabhūva,
SA27n2952:5426: yaḥ putraḥ mānavānāṁ maṅgalāya saugbhāgyamānetuṁ śakṣyati |
SA27n2952:5427: ata eva muniḥ agraṇīḥ san ātma hananāt rājñī nivārayati sma |
SA27n2952:5434: tatrocyate yat pavamānaḥ kañcid dvimukhaṁ vihagaṁ tanmokṣāya gadādharatīrthasya pavitra sthānamānināya |
SA27n2952:5437: sa kevalaṁ hitāyaiva hitaṁ sādhayati sma |
SA27n2952:5443: tasmin kāle tasya śvaśrū api aparaṁ putraṁ prāptumaicchat |
SA27n2952:5444: tataḥ muniḥ caruṁ kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak aṁśaṁ satyavatyai tathā śvaśrūmātre dadau |
SA27n2952:5445: durbhāgyāt satyavatī śvaśrūbhāgamakhādat śvaśrūśca satyavatyāḥ tat vijñāya muniḥ satyavatīṁ jñāpayati yat sā etādṛśaṁ durvṛttaṁ putraṁ prāpsyati yo mātaramapi hantumarhati |
SA27n2952:5446: tat śrutvā satyavatī atīva duḥkhitā jātā |
SA27n2952:5447: sā svāminaṁ tathā na śāsanāya anururodha |
SA27n2952:5448: atabhāgyāyāṁ bālikāyāṁ dayayā abhiśāpasya parimārjanaṁ kṛtavān |
SA27n2952:5449: na putro'pi tu pautra īdṛśo bhaviṣyati iti |
SA27n2952:5450: patnyāḥ mahāyaśūnyāṁ durdaśāṁ vilokya muniḥ vyathitaḥ san svaśaktimanyatra prayuyoja |
SA27n2952:5453: ayaṁ hi so'nubhavo yatra naraḥ tasya karttavyaṁ niṣṭhayā sādhayati,
SA27n2952:5456: idaṁ nirdiśati prakṛtigatamaudāryyaṁ mahattvaṁ mahānubhavatvaṁ vā |
SA27n2952:5457: anekānyākhyānāni purāṇeṣu santi yāni pramāṇīkurvanti yat evaṁvidha āvegaḥ paurāṇike kāle'pi uccasthānamalaṁcakāra |
SA27n2952:5458: ayaṁ khalu prakṛtasya mānavasya atigurutvapūrṇaguṇatvena vivecitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5459: atrāpi śuddhamūlyabodhaḥ pratiphalito bhavati yo bodhaḥ sarvathā sarvadā praśaṁsitaḥ,
SA27n2952:5463: tayā udbuddhaḥ san abhiśaptānāṁ pūrvapuruṣānāṁ muktaye kaṭhorāṁ tapasyāṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5464: sa yathārthataḥ gaṅgānayanāya svargaṁ tathā marttaṁ vicalitamakarot |
SA27n2952:5465: tena sarvadhāni duḥkhāni kaṣṭāni ca anubhūtāni |
SA27n2952:5466: kadāpi vimūḍhaḥ kadāpi vā nirāśaḥ sa jātaḥ |
SA27n2952:5468: atra sutīvro'bhiniveśo dṛśyate manobalamapi yena sa sārthakatayā bhūṣitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5471: ekadā kapotī kenacinniṣṭhureṇa vyādhyena dhṛtā abhavat |
SA27n2952:5472: sa vyādhaḥ samagrāṁ rajanīṁ vyāpya tasmin tarau āsīt yatra vihagāḥ kulāyaṁ nirmāya vasanti |
SA27n2952:5473: naktaṁ sahacarīṁ kapotīṁ na prāpya karuṇaṁ roditumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5474: tat śrutvā kapotī ātmano'stitvaṁ taṁ jñāpayati sma |
SA27n2952:5475: tadā kapotaḥ tasyā muktaye kṛtodyamo babhūva |
SA27n2952:5477: api sa, sā vyādhasya karma samarthayāñcakre |
SA27n2952:5479: tadarthaṁ sa doṣī iti na parigaṇyate |
SA27n2952:5480: punaśca sā kapotam āha vyādho'yamatithitvena pūjayitavyaḥ |
SA27n2952:5482: carame paryāye kapotaḥ vyādhasya bhojanāya ātmānutiṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:5483: samagraṁ vyāpāraṁ vilokya vyādhaḥ nirvāk tathā vimūḍhaḥ jātaḥ |
SA27n2952:5484: tataḥ vyādhaḥ svīyaṁ caritraṁ dhigiti manyamānaḥ anuśocitumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5487: yataḥ, tasmin vayasi api tādṛśo vyavahāraḥ na svābhāvikaḥ |
SA27n2952:5489: pariṇāme prakṛtaḥ putraḥ śunaḥśephaḥ manasā pitaraṁ na tatyāja |
SA27n2952:5491: kintu putraḥ tadavagatya pitre duḥkhamanubhūya dharmīyaṁ vrataṁ jagrāha yena tasya pitā svargaṁ gantuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:5492: etadapekṣayā api ko'pi mahattaro dṛṣṭāntaḥ kartavyabodhasya sāmānyakaruṇābodhasya cāsti kim ?
SA27n2952:5493: snehaḥ asmābhiḥ pūrvamālocitaṁ yat karuṇāśabdaḥ vahvarthadyotakaḥ |
SA27n2952:5505: ata eva īdṛśasya vargīkaraṇasya artho nāsti |
SA27n2952:5507: tripārśvakāce sūryaraśmiḥ saptadhā prativimbito yathā bhavati tathaiva karuṇāśabdasya viśleṣaṇaṁ bahudhā bhavati |
SA27n2952:5508: ata eva prāguktaṁ vargīkaraṇaṁ na prakṛtamapitu ālocanāsukaratvāt kriyate |
SA27n2952:5509: bhavatu, snehaviṣayakāni kati ākhyānānāni athaḥ varṇyante |
SA27n2952:5510: saubharimuneḥ kathā apakṣapātaśca snehaśceti āvegadvayaṁ varṇayati |
SA27n2952:5511: sa muniḥ kasyacit matsyasya tṛptaṁ jīvanaṁ vilokya gārhasthyajīvanamupalabdhumiyeṣa |
SA27n2952:5512: tataḥ sa māndhātuḥ rājñaḥ samīpamāgatya tasya pañcāśatkanyakāsu anyatamayā saha vivāhaṁ kartumicchāṁ prakāśayati sma |
SA27n2952:5513: kintu rājā tādṛśāya vṛddhāya janāya kanyāṁ pradātuṁ naicchat |
SA27n2952:5515: yataḥ sa kopaḥ tasmai tathā tasya parivārāya hāniṁ nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:5516: ubhayasaṁkaṭanivāraṇāya muniḥ eṣiṣyati sā kanyā muninā abhyarthitā bhaviṣyati |
SA27n2952:5517: atra muniḥ mānavacaritrasya gabhīrāmantardṛṣṭiṁ darśayati sma |
SA27n2952:5518: sa ātmānamatīva yuvānaṁ tathā sundaraṁ cakāra yaṁ vilokya sarvāḥ kanyāḥ taṁ muni patitvena prāptuṁ sakāmāḥ babhūvuḥ |
SA27n2952:5519: pariṇayāt paraṁ munirasau apūrvapakṣapātaśūnyatayā tāḥ sarvāḥ draṣṭumārebhe |
SA27n2952:5520: tathā ca muniḥ tā atīva sukhīniḥ akarot |
SA27n2952:5521: yadā tāsāṁ pitā jñātumaicchat tadā sarvāḥ kanyā avadan yat tāsāṁ patiḥ tābhiḥ saha karvadā kālaṁ yāpayati |
SA27n2952:5522: samagre sāhitye īdṛśasya samavyavahārasya tulanā nāsti |
SA27n2952:5525: tārakāsurasya vadhāt paraṁ kārttikeyaḥ surāṅganābhiḥ saha anandamanubhavan kālaṁ yāpayati sma |
SA27n2952:5526: tat śrutvā pārvatī vastutaḥ vicalitā abhavat |
SA27n2952:5527: putrasya prāptavayaskatvāt jananyāḥ karau baddhau āstām |
SA27n2952:5528: sā putraṁ tiraskṛtuṁ mārayituṁ vā na śaknoti |
SA27n2952:5529: kintu nindanīyaṁ tādṛśaṁ karma sarvathā nivāraṇīyam |
SA27n2952:5530: tataḥ pārvatīṁ svīyavyaktitvaṁ dvidhā vibhājya ekamaṁśaṁ surāṅgāsu sthāpayati sma |
SA27n2952:5531: tataḥ paraṁ kārttikeyo yadā yayāciddevāṅganayā saha krīḍituṁ gataḥ,
SA27n2952:5532: tadā saḥ tasmāmaṅganāyāṁ mātuḥ chāyāṁ dṛṣṭvā krīḍituṁ na śaśāṁkia |
SA27n2952:5533: ekā mātā na kadāpi duṣṭakarmarate putre snigyati,
SA27n2952:5536: gauravāt putrasya patanamidaṁ mātaraṁ pārvatī sutarāṁ vyathitāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:5537: tataḥ sā vicakṣaṇatayā ca saphalavyāpāratayā ca svīyakāryasiddhi cakāra |
SA27n2952:5538: etādṛśī śikṣāpraṇālī gurośca śiṣyasya ca madhye,
SA27n2952:5539: athavā bhagavataśca bhaktasya ca madhye na durlabhā |
SA27n2952:5542: tadumākhyānaṁ bhagavantaṁ viṣṇuṁ ca tadīyaṁ bhaktaṁ garuḍaṁ cādhikṛtya vartate |
SA27n2952:5544: sa ādiṣṭaḥ sannapi ekaṁ sarpaṁ na mumoca |
SA27n2952:5545: tadā viṣṇuḥ tadīyapadanamanena garuḍāya śikṣāṁ dadau |
SA27n2952:5546: īdṛśāni karmāṇi na saṁśodhanāya api tu kasyacit ātmāna unnataye eva |
SA27n2952:5553: api ca pṛkprāṇasya janasya duḥkhāni kasyāpi nijaduḥkhānīva pratibhānti |
SA27n2952:5554: ekena upāyenāyaṁ vibhinnajaneṣu sthitaṁ vāhyikaṁ pratibandhakaṁ dūrīkaroti |
SA27n2952:5555: samagre paurāṇike sāhitye sahānubhavasambandhino bahavo dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi |
SA27n2952:5556: mahattvasya sampūrṇā dhāraṇā katipayeṣu viṣayeṣu vartate |
SA27n2952:5557: anyatamo viṣayaḥ khalu aparebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ anubhūtaḥ sahānubhavaḥ |
SA27n2952:5558: brahmapurāṇasya 35 tame'dhyāye ekā asādhāraṇī kathā vartate |
SA27n2952:5559: sā paritvena mahādevasya prāptaye umāyāḥ tapasyāmadhikṛtya janapriyā kathā |
SA27n2952:5560: tapasaḥ samāpteḥ paraṁ sā īpsitaṁ vastu prāptavatī |
SA27n2952:5562: kintu prasthānasamaye sa umāyā yogyatāṁ parīkṣitumiyeṣa,
SA27n2952:5563: yata umā viśvajananyāḥ padam adhikartuṁ gacchati |
SA27n2952:5565: sa bālako yadā hrade snāti sma tadā sa kenacit kumbhīreṇa ākrānto bhavati |
SA27n2952:5567: sā bālakasya muktaye kumbhīraṁ prārthayate sma |
SA27n2952:5568: kintu kumbhīraḥ umākṛtatapaḥphalasya vinimayena bālakaṁ muktuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:5570: ayamatīva kaṭhoraḥ siddhāntaḥ tathāpi umā bālakasya muktaye svīyatapaḥphalaṁ dātuṁ saṁkalpaṁ kṛtavatī |
SA27n2952:5571: tathākaraṇena sā pramāṇīkaroti na kevalaṁ mahādeve tasyā ānugatyaṁ api tu sarvakālīyeṣu sarveṣu janeṣu |
SA27n2952:5572: mātuḥ yayā yogyatayā prayojanaṁ sā yogyatā pārvattyā asti |
SA27n2952:5574: tadā tasyāḥ svīyaṁ sukha kadāpi na vivecanātvaṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:5576: tādṛśyā mātuḥ sahānubhāvaḥ snehaḥ trāṇātmikā prakṛtiḥ ca kāle kāle parikṣyante |
SA27n2952:5577: bahunā mūlyena yat sukhaṁ tayārjitaṁ sampūrṇājñātabālakāyāpi sā tat sukhaṁ tatyāja |
SA27n2952:5578: uktapurāṇasya catuḥsaptatitame'dhyāye gaṅgāvataraṇavṛttānte kiñcit vyāvartitaṁ rupamasti |
SA27n2952:5579: atra mahāghaṭanāyāḥ mukhakartṛtvena bhagīratho na varṇitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5580: kintu gautamo muniḥ avagantuṁ śaśāka yat pārvatī sapatnyā gaṅgāyāḥ kṛte mānasikīṁ yantraṇāmanubhavati,
SA27n2952:5581: vastutaḥ sā eva mahādevasya priyatamā patnī tadarthaṁ sā tīvramīrṣyāparāyaṇā jātā |
SA27n2952:5582: pārvatyā yā mānasikī yantrāṇā tasyāḥ kaṣṭaṁ laghayituṁ gautamo'graṇīḥ babhūva,
SA27n2952:5583: gaṅgā mahādevasya pārvatyāśca ghaniṣṭhasamparkāt vicyutā bhavati |
SA27n2952:5584: tataḥ tena gaṅgāyā martte avataraṇāya prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:5587: ekadā dhārmiko nṛpatiḥ bharataḥ śāvakaprasavasamaye mṛtyugatāṁ hariṇīṁ dadarśa |
SA27n2952:5588: tadā rājā mātṛhīnāya śāvakāya tīvraṁ sahānubhavamanubhūya taṁ śāvakaṁ pālayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5589: tataḥ tasmin mṛge atīva snehāt tapasyāyai tasya ko'pi manoyogo nāsīt |
SA27n2952:5590: mṛtyukāle'pi tasya manasi kevalaṁ hariṇagatā cintā āsīt |
SA27n2952:5591: asmāt kāraṇāt parajanmani mṛgarūpeṇa tasya janma abhavat |
SA27n2952:5592: pariṇāme sa vikhyāto jaḍo bharataḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
SA27n2952:5593: asyākhyānasya prakṛtavastubinduḥ hi nṛpatiḥ sahānubhavasya kāraṇāt tadīyamamūlyaṁ dharmaṁ parityaktumapi itastataḥ na cakāra iti |
SA27n2952:5594: kṣamā kṣamā sahanaśīlatā ca dharmasyātmatvena pratiṣṭhite |
SA27n2952:5597: mukhyeṣu gaṇeṣu saṁgatisthāpanasya ca grahaṇasya ca nītiḥ pradhānatamābhavet |
SA27n2952:5598: niḥsaṁśayaṁ vayaṁ vaktuṁ śaknumo yat kṣamā hi hindudharmasya kendrīyā viśiṣṭhatā |
SA27n2952:5599: sapariṇāmā abhiśāpāḥ kāryataḥ pramāṇīkurvanti yat daurbalyādayo doṣāḥ sarvadā tuchāḥ,
SA27n2952:5600: kintu teṣāṁ jayo'vahelane grahaṇe ca dharmasya mahattamaṁ rūpaṁ nihitaṁ vartate |
SA27n2952:5605: ātmotkarṣasya ceṣṭā ca atīva gurutvaṁ vahanti |
SA27n2952:5607: vayañca punaḥ punaḥ paśyāmaḥ yat abhiśaptā vismarati,
SA27n2952:5610: idaṁ kadāpi samagraṁ phalaṁ na naśyati |
SA27n2952:5611: yataḥ niyamānuvarttitayā kimapi karma vyarthaṁ na bhavati,
SA27n2952:5612: kintu āghātaṁ hrasayituṁ ko'pi upāyaḥ sarvadā lakṣyate |
SA27n2952:5613: yasminnākhyāne'bhiśāpo'sti pratyekaṁ tadākhyānaṁ īdṛśabhāvasya udāharaṇaṁ bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:5616: prāyeṇa sarveṣu purāṇeṣu idamākhyānamasti yatra lajjākaryāṁ paristhitau indrasya caritramaṅkitam |
SA27n2952:5618: prakṛtaṁ kathāyogamalpaśaḥ parityaja kathayati yat abhiśāpādhānāt paramupalebhe yat tasya pakṣe jagataḥ sammukhībhavanaṁ na sambhavati |
SA27n2952:5620: gautamastat kṣaṇād devarājakṛtamahāpāpaṁ vismṛtya abhiśāpahrāsāya upāyamupadideśa |
SA27n2952:5622: tadyathā pāṭhakasya cittaṁ dūramapasārayati tathā taccittaṁ dravīkaroti |
SA27n2952:5625: gṛhe'sthiratayā sā svīyaputraṁ gālavasya muneḥ prayatne sthāpayitvā pṛthivīṁ draṣṭuṁ vahirgatā |
SA27n2952:5627: katiṣu varṣeṣu gacchatsu asau putraḥ prāptavayaskaḥ san pṛthivīṁ draṣṭuṁ vahirgataḥ |
SA27n2952:5628: daivacakreṇa mātuśca putrasya ca parasparasammilanaṁ jātam |
SA27n2952:5634: mātā ca putraśca parasparaparicayaṁ jñātuṁ śekatuḥ |
SA27n2952:5635: tato yat ghaṭitaṁ tat atīva sāṁdhātikaṁ marmasparśi ca |
SA27n2952:5637: kintu muniḥ gālavaḥ tayoḥ daśāṁ dṛṣṭvā sahānubhavena vyathitaḥ san mātaraṁ putraṁ ca kāraṇaṁ darśayitvā mūrkhajanocitakarmakaraṇāt nivāyarayan tayoḥ kṛte mānasikīṁ śāntiṁ vidadhāti sma |
SA27n2952:5638: brahmapurāṇasya 170 tame'dhyāye maṇikuṇḍalaṁ tasya mitra gautamaṁ cādhikṛtyāparamākhyānamasti yatra kṣamāsaṁkrānta durlabhabhāvo vartate |
SA27n2952:5640: kintu tasya bandhuḥ maṇikuṇḍalaḥ dhārmika āsīt |
SA27n2952:5647: vibhīṣaṇastaṁ dṛṣṭvā gandhamādanaparvatāt hanumatā ānītasya oṣadhaiḥ prayogeṇa taṁ rogamuktaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5648: tasya kṛpayā maṇikuṇḍalaḥ pūrvavat samṛdhamān jātaḥ |
SA27n2952:5649: asmin paryāye maṇikuṇḍalaḥ prathame mitraṁ gautamaṁ sasmāra |
SA27n2952:5650: dīrghānusandhānāt paraṁ sa durdaśāgrastaṁ gautamaṁ dadarśa |
SA27n2952:5651: maṇikuṇḍalaḥ taṁ gṛhamānīya svīyaṁ saubhāgyabhāgaṁ tasmai dadau,
SA27n2952:5653: udāratā udāratā hi aparo mahān āvegaḥ |
SA27n2952:5654: eṣā balavattareṇa janena durbalāya janāya poṣito'nubhūtiḥ |
SA27n2952:5655: iyamullekhārhā yataḥ balavattaro jano durbalasya durdaśāmupekṣituṁ śaknoti,
SA27n2952:5656: kintu antarnihitayā karuṇayā sa durbalasya viṣayaṁ gṛhṇāti,
SA27n2952:5657: tadarthaṁ ca saṁgrāmaṁ karoti athavā nyūnatamataḥ tasya duḥkhaṁ sāmānyenānubhavati |
SA27n2952:5661: te mṛtamekaṁ kukkuramantareṇa na kimapi āninyuḥ |
SA27n2952:5662: viśvāmitraḥ prāptena māṁsena yāgaṁ sampādayituṁ kṛtasaṁkalpo babhūva |
SA27n2952:5664: tatkṣaṇāt imaṁ viṣayamavagatya indraḥ aprītikaraṁ tadyāgaṁ roddhuṁ tanmāṁsamapahṛtya tasya sthale madhubhāṇḍamekaṁ pratisthāpayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5667: sa śiṣyebhyaḥ adravaṁ vastu iyeṣa kintu bhāṇḍaparimitamadhu na khādyam |
SA27n2952:5668: indraḥ viśvāmitarsya pravṛttimavalokyātīva bhītaḥ san tasya santoṣaṁ vidhātuṁ tatkṣaṇāt jalīyameghān preṣayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5670: dadhīceḥ muneḥ mahāntaṁ yāgamadhikṛtya purākālādevātīva vikhyātā kathā pracalitāsīt |
SA27n2952:5671: sa svīyapatnīṁ yajñe utsasarja yena vajranāmakamatīva śaktiśāli astraṁ tadasthibhiḥ nirmitaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:5675: atra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat daityānāṁ viruddhe saphalasamarodyogāt paramastrāṇi niṣprayojanānīti matvā devāḥ sarvāṇi astrāṇi nyāsatvena dadhīcisakāśe sthāpayāmāsuḥ |
SA27n2952:5676: tasya patnī lopāmudrā idaṁ na samarthayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:5679: pariśeṣe, dadhīciḥ divyāstrāṇāṁ samanvitaprabhāvaśeṣaṁ svīyaśarīre aṅgīkaruṁ saṁkalpaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5680: kintu yasmin muhūrtte sa idaṁ cakāra tasminneva kāle devāstatra astrāṇi netumāvirbabhūvuḥ |
SA27n2952:5681: ananyopāyo dadhīciḥ svīyaṁ śarīraṁ dātumudyato'bhavat yena nūtanāni astrāṇi nirmitāni bhaviṣyanti |
SA27n2952:5684: vindhyaparvatasya ca muneragastyasya ca madhye saṁghāto'tīva suparicitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5685: kintu vāmanapurāṇasya aṣṭādaśādhyāye varṇitasyākhyānasya kaścid bhedo'sti |
SA27n2952:5687: atra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat vindhyaparvatasyāṁśaviśeṣaḥ sauragatipathe yathāmyathamavatiṣṭhate |
SA27n2952:5689: sa vṛddho janaḥ san vindhyaṁ jagāma |
SA27n2952:5696: yataḥ sa gurutvahīnāya vṛddhāya janāya dṛḍhapadasthiti tatyāja |
SA27n2952:5698: nṛpatiḥ śaryātiḥ madhucchandasa ṛṣeḥ patnyāḥ premṇaḥ gabhīratāṁ parīkṣitumiyeṣa |
SA27n2952:5699: ata eva sa janaśrutiṁ vyatanot yat nṛpaśca ṛṣiścobhau paralokaṁ gataviti |
SA27n2952:5700: tadaiva mahiṣī janaśruteḥ satyatāṁ parīkṣituṁ vyavasthāṁ jagrāha |
SA27n2952:5701: kintu ṛṣeḥ patnī hṛdayavidārakaṁ sandeśaṁ śrutvā śokena mṛtyulokaṁ gatā |
SA27n2952:5702: evaṁ kapaṭaparisthityāṁ samutpannāyāṁ rājā ṛṣeḥ patnīṁ pratyānetumagniṁ praviveśa |
SA27n2952:5703: tataḥ madhucchandāḥ sarvamavagatya nṛpateḥ ātmotsargaṁ smṛtvā śuśoca |
SA27n2952:5704: sa sūryaṁ pūjayitvā rājānaṁ divyena mahimnā saha punarjīvitaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:5705: asyākhyānasya svārghaśūnyā mānasikī udāratā asmānākarṣati yayānupretaḥ san janaḥ parasmai ātmotsargaṁ kartumapi dvidhā na karoti |
SA27n2952:5706: purākāle prajābhyo hitāya nṛpatinā jīvanamutsargīkriyate iti dhāraṇā pracalitāsīt |
SA27n2952:5708: kintu sāmānyena rājānaḥ sarveṣāmupari prajākāmanāpūraṇāya sarvadā udārāḥ bhavanti |
SA27n2952:5711: tadā sa muneḥ medhasa āśrame kañcit kālamuvāsa |
SA27n2952:5712: kintu tasya manaḥ sarvadā prāktyaktānāṁ samitrāṇāṁ prajānāṁ kṛte udvignatāṁ bavrāja |
SA27n2952:5714: vaiśyenoktaṁ yat sa tasya duṣṭaparivāreṇa vitāḍita eveti |
SA27n2952:5718: prāguktālocanā viśālasaṁkhyakeṣu ākhyāneṣu ca purāvṛtteṣu ca kevalaṁ svalpasaṁkhyāni ākhyānāni purāvṛttāni ca sammukhabhāgavānayati |
SA27n2952:5720: kintu idaṁ niḥsandehena pradarśayituṁ tathā pratiṣṭhāpayitumalaṁ yat purāṇānāṁ yuge hindudharmaḥ karuṇātmako dharma āsīt |
SA27n2952:5722: kintu idamapi smaraṇīyaṁ yat kasmīścid dharme eṣā mahattākasmānnotthāyāyāti |
SA27n2952:5723: idaṁ satyaṁ yat hindudharmastasmāddhāraṇāyugādeva bahusahasravarṣsavyāpi- vividhaparyāyāṇāṁ madhyena āgamyātropasthitaḥ |
SA27n2952:5724: tena vāhyikānāṁ prabhāvāṇāṁ bahavo guṇā ātmanyaṅgīkṛtāḥ |
SA27n2952:5726: prācīnavaidika dharmasya ātmagato bhāvo yadyapi āpātadṛṣṭyā ādimastathāpi tatra mūlasūtratvena mahānubhavatā cintāyā udāratā cāstām |
SA27n2952:5727: tathā ca yathāyatahaṁ paścādbhūmyā saha paravartī hindudharmaḥ prakṛtkaruṇātkamadharmatvena prakāśito'bhavat |
SA27n2952:5728: yadyapi karuṇātkamabhāvapramāṇāyātra ākhyānāni upākhyānāni ca prayujyante,
SA27n2952:5729: tathāpi purāṇeṣu dānadharmādayaḥ prāsaṁgikaviṣayāḥ parasparaṁ bhāvaṁ vahanti |
SA27n2952:5730: dānasyārtho na kevalaṁ brāhmaṇebhyo dānamapitu dānaṁparitaḥ vikṣiptā mahānubhavatā vividharūpatvena sarvatra vartate |
SA27n2952:5735: idamullekhārhaṁ yat sarvadā īdṛśāni dānamūlāni karmāṇi aparicitadaridrebhya ātmabhyaḥ kriyante ye ātmānaḥ teṣāṁ pāpāya duḥkhāyante |
SA27n2952:5736: anyataśca prāyaścitakriyā idaṁ tathyaṁ kathayati yat anuśocanayā sarvāṇi pāpāni kṣamārhatāṁ yānti |
SA27n2952:5739: ata eva vayamanāyāsena siddhāntaṁ kartumalam yat prakṛtamahato dharmasya karuṇāvahanītiṣu pratiṣṭhito hindusamājaḥ cirantanamūlyādarśasya pratiphalanaṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:5740: paurāṇikanītibodhasyopari daṇḍāyamāno hindudharmaḥ jagatastathā vyaktigatasamājasya sukhāya samṛddhaye ca upayoginaḥ sarvān viṣayānāliṅgya svādhiṇaḥ sanneva vartate |
SA27n2952:5741: eṣu viṣayeṣu dharmo yathā tiṣṭhati tathā tasya prayogo'pi vidyate |
SA27n2952:5744: purāṇamālā vyaktigataucityena saha sādhāraṇadharmasya ekatrīkaraṇasya saphalāṁ praceṣṭāṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:5745: ādye vartante kati śiṣṭācārasamparkitā guṇāstathā gadguṇabhūṣitāni karmāṇi,
SA27n2952:5747: aparasya kṣetre vyaktigatasīmāṁ nātikramya ādyasya vyāvahārikī dig vartate |
SA27n2952:5748: tatra vyaktiḥ jātigataṁ spaṣṭaṁ vaiśiṣtya nirdiśati |
SA27n2952:5750: vedasamparkite sāhitye api tat mūlaṁ dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:5751: tat sāhityaṁ kālānukrameṇa purāṇānāṁ madhyataḥ janapriyarūpatvena viśeṣitaṁ saṁvṛttam |
SA27n2952:5754: vaidike sāhitye tasya sasammānaḥ tathā sagaurava ullekho'sti |
SA27n2952:5755: purāṇānāṁ tathā bauddhaśāstrāṇāṁ varttamāne prāptaḥ pāṭho hi miśraṇaviśeṣaḥ,
SA27n2952:5757: ekaḥ pāṭhaḥ aparasya pāṭhasyopari prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
SA27n2952:5758: purāṇānāṁ viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa bauddhaśāstrīyavidhīnāṁ samarthanaṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:5759: purāṇeṣu ca bauddhaśāstreṣu ca sannyāsinā tathā gārhastyajanena karaṇīyāni yāni karmāṇi nirvahaṇīyāḥ ca ye bhārāḥ ucyante teṣāṁ sarveṣāṁ madhye bhāvagataṁ sādṛśyaṁ prāyeṇa dṛśyate,
SA27n2952:5761: āvegaiḥ viśuddhīkṛtā yāḥ svābhāvikyastathā komalāḥ pravṛttayaḥ mānuṣeṣu santi tāsāmupari karttavyāni vidhīyante |
SA27n2952:5762: kintu sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte tāni karttavyāni namanīyatarāṇi,
SA27n2952:5763: na tādṛśāni sannyāsināṁ vā yogināṁ vā kṛte |
SA27n2952:5764: manuṣye ātmīyatābodho duḥkhagrastamaparaṁ janaṁ prati dayāyai kalpate |
SA27n2952:5765: eṣā dayā manuṣyaṁ sāhāyyakāriṇaṁ ca dayārdraṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:5767: sampādanīyatvena vihitānāṁ karttavyānāṁ mūlameva eṣā karuṇā |
SA27n2952:5773: paurāṇikadarśanasya abhiprāyo hi dayā tathā karuṇā |
SA27n2952:5775: bauddhadarśanasya viśleṣaṇāya darśanasaṁśliṣṭāni kati maulāni tathyāni sayatnaviśleṣaṇīyatāṁ vrajanti |
SA27n2952:5776: tathā hi - bauddhadarśanasya dve bhittibhūmī - mahāprajñā mahākaruṇā ca |
SA27n2952:5778: yataḥ buddhito jāyate tṛṣṇā tathā adhyāsasampannaṁ vastutatvam |
SA27n2952:5779: kevalaṁ karuṇāmūlā śuddhā cintā jñānāya kalpate |
SA27n2952:5787: kevalaṁ vidyā samyak jñānaṁ vā tasya upari prabhutvaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:5791: aniścitā ca eṣā vidyā indriyaiḥ pratyakṣībhūtāyāmahaṁsattāyāṁ vasati yatra ātmanaḥ ca aparavastūnāṁ ca madhye parthakyaṁ pratiphalitaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:5792: yadi pārthakyabhūmikā nāpasaret tarhi utthānaṁ ca jāgaraṇaṁ ca na sambhavataḥ |
SA27n2952:5794: ata eva bauddhadarśane eṣa bodhirhi sandhānaśabdaḥ |
SA27n2952:5795: eṣa bodhiḥ khalu ekatvasya bodho jāgaraṇaṁ vā |
SA27n2952:5797: prajñayā athavā paramajñānena saha karmamūlakaḥ sambandho'sti karuṇāyāḥ |
SA27n2952:5798: yataḥ ātmatyāgaḥ prakṛtāṁ karuṇāṁ prakāśayati yatra svārthahīnasevāyāḥ bhāvo vidyate |
SA27n2952:5799: praṇālīviśeṣeṇa jīvane paricālite sati idaṁ jñānaṁ labhyate |
SA27n2952:5800: tat jñānaṁ tathākathitaiḥ yajñakriyādyanuṣṭhānaiḥ na prāpyate,
SA27n2952:5801: api tu prāpyate duḥsthamānavasevayā sacetano bhavituṁ naraḥ prātyahikajīvanasya abhijñatāṁ labheta |
SA27n2952:5805: yadāparasya kaṣṭaṁ nijakaṣṭamivānubhūyate tadā ekatvabodhena pareṣāṁ bodho dūraṁ gacchati |
SA27n2952:5811: sa sānandaghaṭanāpravāhena vāhitaḥ san sāmyabodhenānuprerito bhavati |
SA27n2952:5812: muktaye vā karuṇātmakaprajñālābhāya vā bauddhānāṁ lakṣyaṁ bhavati vyaktigatamanuśīlanam |
SA27n2952:5817: atra dravyapadena prāṇavanto jīvā api sūcyante |
SA27n2952:5818: ātmanā kaścidalakṣaṇo'dvitīyaḥ svatantro'vināśī aparivarttanīyaḥ padārthaḥ budhyate |
SA27n2952:5820: sa svīkaroti yat naraḥ sammukhaṁ gacchet,
SA27n2952:5822: asya pravṛttiḥ bauddhikī pravṛttiḥ yā sākṣyapramāṇaiḥ āptapuruṣaiḥ ca pratiṣṭhitā |
SA27n2952:5823: sa evāptapuruṣo yo vastutaḥ tena pathā gatavān tathā ca abhijñatāmarjitavān |
SA27n2952:5824: kevalam eṣā mahatī abhijñatā - naro yathā mahān bhavati,
SA27n2952:5829: abhijñatā manuṣyaṁ sāvadhānaṁ sacetanaṁ sampūrṇaṁ ca karoti |
SA27n2952:5837: bauddhadarśane sampūrṇatāṁ prati pravṛttiḥ mādhyamena śūnyā |
SA27n2952:5838: asyārthaḥ niyamavarttino mumukṣujanasyātra karma viṣayakamādhyamena prayojanaṁ nāsti |
SA27n2952:5839: athavā anupreraṇādāyinā kenāpi āvegenāpi nāsti prayojanam |
SA27n2952:5847: abhidhammapiṭakam iti yeṣāmāpātadṛṣṭyartho bhavati manaḥ samīkṣāṇamiti |
SA27n2952:5849: sa āha yat sa tasyādarśasya upalabdhaye tadīyatattvamupadiśati |
SA27n2952:5865: jīvanayāpanāya bauddhavyavahāravidhiḥ pañcalakṣaṇātmakaḥ - 1. paśuvadhāt ca jīvātyācārāt ca viratiḥ |
SA27n2952:5870: yata idaṁ kasmaiciddevāya vā paramadevāya vā brahmaṇe vā bhāgyasya samarpaṇaṁ na svīkaroti |
SA27n2952:5871: idaṁ darśanaṁ na dharmīyam kintu prāyeṇa sāmājikam |
SA27n2952:5872: bauddhasaṁskṛtiviśleṣaṇāya samājaṁ prati buddhasya yā dhāraṇāsīt tasyā viśleṣaṇam asmābhirvidheyam |
SA27n2952:5873: samāje vyaktijanasya pratibandhakatā buddhena viśeṣeṇa jñāyate |
SA27n2952:5874: yataḥ sāmājiko janaḥ svādhīnatayā na ālapati,
SA27n2952:5877: kintu naraḥ sāmājikabandhanarūpaṁ idaṁ balaṁ sampūrṇaṁ vismarati |
SA27n2952:5878: aparadeśīyajanaiḥ saha kasyaciddeśasya janānām anyonyamiśraṇena saṁskṛtigate ādarśe vibhinnatā jāyate |
SA27n2952:5880: kintu amiśrā śuddhā saṁskṛtiḥ buddhāya rocate |
SA27n2952:5888: sā kāmanā paritṛptaye naraṁ sastupāśaiḥ badhnāti |
SA27n2952:5890: karuṇāmayo buddhaḥ mānavajātimuccaiḥ āhūya kathayati etatpralophanaviṣaye sacetanā bhavateti bauddhaṁ darśanamekākinaṁ janaṁ prati gurutvamāropayati |
SA27n2952:5892: yaḥ svayaṁ nirvāṇāya yatate - yo bauddhaśikṣāyai upayuktaḥ tamapi sagurutvam avalokayati bauddhadarśanam |
SA27n2952:5895: purāṇānāṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ tathā vaidikasāhityena sākaṁ teṣāṁ sādharmyaṁ vivicya uktamatadvayaṁ pratiṣṭhāpyate |
SA27n2952:5896: vaidikasaṁhitāyāṁ yeṣāṁ mūlamasti teṣāṁ purāṇānāṁ bhāratīyasamājadharmasamparkitasaṁskṛtyādarśanirmāṇakṣetre mahān prabhāvo'sti |
SA27n2952:5897: ṛcāmiva purāṇānāmapi sadṛśaṁ mūlamasti iti atharvavede,
SA27n2952:5904: vaidikasāhitye itihāsapurāṇāni ekatra ca pṛthak ca ullikhyante |
SA27n2952:5905: api ca anyeṣu prācīneṣu ca pavitreṣu ca saṁskṛtasāhityeṣu purāṇāni svīkriyante tathā gṛhyante |
SA27n2952:5906: uparita idamāyāti yat purāṇaṁ cetihāsaśca sambhavataḥ samārthaṁ na vahataḥ,
SA27n2952:5907: tathāpi katiṣu saṁskṛtagrantheṣu taryoḥ ghaniṣṭhasamparkatvāt ekasmādanyasya pṛthaktā na anāyāsena nirmīyate |
SA27n2952:5911: kauṭilyasya mate sāṁsārikagandhaśūnyāni upākhyānāni nāma purāṇāni kintu dharmaśāstraṁ tathārthaśāstramitihāsaḥ |
SA27n2952:5912: śatapathabrāhmaṇe kathākāreṇa jagadabhivyaktiprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ kintu tatra itihāsāśritā pravaṇatā dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:5916: saṁhitākāravaṁśakramasūcī ca pramāṇīkurvanti yat purāṇeṣu itihāsasya lakṣaṇamasti |
SA27n2952:5917: api ca, bhāgavatapurāṇe sargapratisargādīnāṁ jīvatattvagataṁ viśleṣaṇaṁ tathā poṣaṇaṁ vistṛtatarabhāvena ullikhyate |
SA27n2952:5920: koṣakāraiśca ṭīkākāraiḥ ca lakṣitā bahavo viṣayāḥ purāṇeṣu itihāsatvasya nirṇayāya paryāptaṁ pramāṇaṁ darśayanti |
SA27n2952:5921: bhāgavatapurāṇe likhiteṣu daśalakṣaṇeṣu poṣaṇaṁ cotiśca saviśeṣaṁ lakṣaṇīyatāṁ vrajataḥ |
SA27n2952:5922: poṣaṇaṁ nāma sarvaśaktigataḥ prāpto'nugrahaḥ athavā prāptā karuṇā |
SA27n2952:5923: prāṇinaḥ boddhuṁ śaknuvanti yat īśvarasya apārā karuṇāsti yā prāṇināṁ duḥkhāt muktiṁ sādhayati |
SA27n2952:5924: naraḥ sambhavataḥ kramaśaḥ guṇamimaṁ manasā gṛhṇāti |
SA27n2952:5929: purāṇāni upadiśanti yat gṛhasthānāṁ manasi 'dayā' syāt 'kṣāntiḥ' syāt |
SA27n2952:5930: purāṇeṣu śāstroktakriyāṇāṁ tathā purāvṛttānāṁ madhye yat bahiraṅgaṁ rūpaṁ tatra ānuṣṭhānikatā vā aviśvāsyatā vā prāyeṇa dṛśyate;
SA27n2952:5931: vāstavatā laukikatā vā tatra nyūnatayā vartate |
SA27n2952:5933: te upadeśā nāma sādhāraṇajanajīvanayāpanāya vyavahāravidhaya eva,
SA27n2952:5941: kintu tasya antarnihitā nītirhi tat satyaṁ pravṛttīnāmutkarṣaṁ vidadhāti,
SA27n2952:5942: mānavacaritrasyonnatiṁ karoti - yena kṣaṇasthāyī mānavasyāvegaḥ duḥkhārtānāṁ kṛte gabhīrakaruṇānubhavena bhūṣito bhavitumarhati |
SA27n2952:5943: bauddhaśāstreṣu api aṁśaviśeṣo gṛhasthajanān prati mahataḥ sannyāsino gautamabuddhasyopadeśavacanaiḥ paripūrṇaḥ |
SA27n2952:5944: 'siṅgalopadeśasaṁvāde' gautamo gṛhasthaṁ siṅgalamupadiśati - parivrājakebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaśca dvārodghāṭanena snigdhaiḥ kāyikaiḥ vācikaiḥ mānasikaiśca karmabhiḥ sevasveti |
SA27n2952:5947: jīvanacakrānmahāmukteḥ prasaṁge gotamaḥ sannyāsina upadiśati 'nirvāṇamupagantuṁ paryāyaṣaṭkamastīti |
SA27n2952:5949: prītiḥ muktabhāvena guptabhāvena vā satīrthopāsakānām kṛte kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi,
SA27n2952:5952: ete viṣayā duḥkhaṁ dūrīkariṣyanti ityatra viśvāsaḥ |
SA27n2952:5953: atra karuṇādiḥ kendrabhūtā yāṁ parita ete sarve viṣayāḥ paribhramanti |
SA27n2952:5954: gṛhasthā api asmāt niyamād vahirna tiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:5955: yadā kaścit sannyāsī karuṇātmakacittacālitaḥ san yathāyathāmācarati,
SA27n2952:5957: yathāyathaṁ vyavahārāya sannyāsinaḥ manasi karuṇāyāstathā niṣṭhāyā yugapadupasthitiḥ tasya susthaṁ cittaṁ nirdhaśati |
SA27n2952:5958: tasya mana eva susthaṁ yaḥ vicitrahetusattvādapi aparamāvṛṇoti athavā aparasyopari prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
SA27n2952:5962: purāṇeṣu anyatamaṁ gurutvapūrṇaṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ khalu dharmaḥ |
SA27n2952:5964: kauṭilyasyārthaśāstrasya ṭīkāyāṁ jayamaṅgalaṁ idaṁ satyaṁ vicārayati |
SA27n2952:5965: bauddhaśāstre'pi upadiśyate yat prema āsaktivihīnaṁ bhavet |
SA27n2952:5971: premakaruṇāsahānubhavajānandādīnāmāsaktovihīnāmutkṛṣṭaguṇānām anuśīlanaṁ dhyānodyamasya na kevalaṁ lakṣyaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:5974: atharvavedaḥ - prācīnatamo dharmagranthaḥ - purāṇānāṁ prācīnatvasya vidagdhaṁ sākṣyaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:5975: atharvavedīyādekasmāt mantrāt idamanumānaṁ bhavati yat purāṇāni ṛcā sāmna yajusāṁ copāṅttvena vivicyante |
SA27n2952:5977: brāhmaṇeṣu vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ purāṇetihāsayoḥ sahāvasthānasya prasaṁgam |
SA27n2952:5981: (taittirīye āraṇyake chāndogyopaniṣadi bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca purāṇapadasyollekho dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:5984: samakālīne purāṇe dṛṣṭau dvau ślokau prāguktasūtre uddhṛtau |
SA27n2952:5988: viṣṇupurāṇena cāpi ślokayugalamuddhṛtaṁ yatra yogikṛtasannyāsatvasya praśaṁsā kriyate |
SA27n2952:5989: prakṛto yogī kīdṛśo bhavediti vistareṇa bauddhaśāstreṣu api varṇyate |
SA27n2952:5990: tatrocyate yat yo dhyānaniṣṭho janaḥ yathārthato yogī bhaviṣyati,
SA27n2952:5995: pātañjaladarśane kriyāyoge ṣaṭ vā sapta vā paryāyā ullikhitāḥ |
SA27n2952:5998: prema-sahānubhūta-harṣa-karuṇā-samacittatotkṛṣṭabhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ brāhmaviśve maraṇāt paraṁ punarjanmane bhavanti iti bauddhadarśanasya matam |
SA27n2952:5999: kintu tatra jīvanakālāvasānātparam īdṛśānuśīlanakārī kṣudhārtapretatvena kṣudhārtajīvatvena punareva janma labhate |
SA27n2952:6000: kintu ye dhyānaniṣṭhā janāḥ kartsnyena punarjanmanaḥ muktāḥ,
SA27n2952:6002: te'pi brāhme jagati maraṇāt paraṁ punarjanma labhante |
SA27n2952:6003: ye tu jīvanasya samāpti yāvat anuśīlanaratāstiṣṭhanti,
SA27n2952:6005: yadā īdṛśā dhyāninaḥ puruṣā upalabdhistrotasā vahanti,
SA27n2952:6007: te sāṁsārikaṁ viṣayaṁ sthāyinaṁ na manyante |
SA27n2952:6012: arthāt pārthive prasaṁge te kārtsnyena nirapekṣā bhavanti |
SA27n2952:6013: bṛhadāraṇyake cānyāsu upaniṣatsu ca karmaphalasyollekhaḥ asti |
SA27n2952:6015: pāpināṁ kṛte kati narakāḥ santi yatra dvau kākau pāpinaḥ pīḍayanti |
SA27n2952:6016: vividhā daṇḍāśca vividhānāṁ pāpināṁ kṛte varṇitāstiṣṭhanti |
SA27n2952:6017: mākraṇḍeyapurāṇe naciketasa ākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat naciketasā asthāyitvāt svargavāsaḥ parityaktaḥ |
SA27n2952:6018: sadṛśo vṛttāntaḥ prāpyate āpastambadharmasūtrāt ca bhaviṣyapurāṇācca |
