SA27n2952:6019: tathā hi - svargatāḥ sannyāsinaḥ viśvavināśaṁ yāvat svarge vasanti |
SA27n2952:6021: evaṁ cedamanumātuṁ śakyate yat bhaviṣyapurāṇaṁ sambhavataḥ āpastambasya samaye varttamānamāsīt |
SA27n2952:6024: vyāsasaṁhitāyā mate vedānāṁ ca purāṇānāṁ ca madhye'nyonyasambandho'sti |
SA27n2952:6025: antyeṣṭikriyānuṣṭhāne nimantritebhyaḥ viprebhyaḥ vedapāṭhena saha purāṇapāṭhaṁ nirdiśati manuḥ |
SA27n2952:6026: jaiminisūtrāṇāmupari tantravārtikanāmadheyo yo granthaḥ kumārilabhaṭṭena racitaḥ sa granthaḥ purāṇaprāmāṇyaṁ svīkaroti |
SA27n2952:6027: kumārilabhaṭṭasya mate buddhaścānye ca kaliyuge janma gṛhītvā dharmasya nāśaṁ kariṣyanti iti purāṇeṣu varṇyate |
SA27n2952:6028: evañcedamanumīyate yat bhārate varṣe bauddhadharmeṇa dṛḍhapadasthiteḥ grahaṇāt pūrvameva purāṇāni rājante sma |
SA27n2952:6029: devā dehadhāriṇa iti sarveṣu purāṇeṣu viśeṣeṇa dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:6030: yoginaḥ purāṇopadiṣṭamārgeṇa bhagavantaṁ dhyāyanti iti rāmāyaṇasya mahākaviḥ vālmīkiḥ paśyati |
SA27n2952:6031: idamanumīyate yat mahābhāratasya sthāne sthāne abhinnarūpaiḥ purāṇānāmullekho'sti |
SA27n2952:6032: sambhavataḥ tatra purāṇapadaṁ mithyāprayuktam athavā purāṇaśabdena kila purātanaṁ kiñciddharmaśāstramullikhyate |
SA27n2952:6033: buddhajñānaśikṣāvarṇanaratāḥ kati bauddhā jaināśca granthāḥ purāṇanāma ullikhanti |
SA27n2952:6034: buddho vividheṣu śāstreṣu vidyāsu vā nipuṇa āsīt |
SA27n2952:6035: evañca purāṇeṣu api tasya vidagdhatā āsīt |
SA27n2952:6036: jainalekhakā api paurāṇikīṁ śaīilīmanusṛtya kāvyādīni racitavantaḥ |
SA27n2952:6037: jainaḥ vimalasūriḥ paricitaḥ prācīnatamaḥ lekhakaḥ 'pauma-cariya' nāmakaṁ granthaṁ khṛṣṭīyaprathamaśatake racitavān,
SA27n2952:6039: ata eva siddhāntaḥ kriyate yat purāṇasya rūpaṁ yadeva bhavatu,
SA27n2952:6043: bauddhadharmaḥ paurāṇikadarśanena saha pārśvāpārśvi vahamāna āsīt |
SA27n2952:6046: tatra hetuḥ - bauddhatatve ca paurāṇikatatve ca bahuvidhaṁ samāñjasamasti,
SA27n2952:6052: yadi kṣaṇamapi karuṇānubhūyate tarhi tadapi tasya yogyatāyā paricayaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:6053: bauddho bhikṣuḥ nārīsaṅgaṁ tathā nārīpradattaṁ bhojyaṁ parityajediti buddhasyopadeśaḥ |
SA27n2952:6054: asya niyamasya vyatikrame sati narake punarjanma eva pratiphalaṁ bhavati |
SA27n2952:6056: na kāyikasukhāya api tu saphalaṁ dharmīyajīvanayāpanārthaṁ tathā jīvanadhāraṇārtham |
SA27n2952:6057: etadapi bhikṣuṇā cintanīyaṁ tādṛśo bhogo yathā dātuḥ lābhāya bhavediti |
SA27n2952:6058: buddha āha yat anāyāsaśvasanaṁ tadaiva sambhavati yadā bhikṣuḥ tadīyahṛdaye premabhūmi karṣati |
SA27n2952:6063: anubhave siddhāntagrahaṇe sajñānavastugrahaṇe ca karuṇāṁ poṣayitumarhanti |
SA27n2952:6064: evaṁ dharmīyaniyamādipālanasamaye bhikṣuḥ karuṇāmayahṛdayadhāraṇāya samartho bhavati |
SA27n2952:6065: punaśca, buddha āha yat karuṇāmayabhikṣave ya upahāraṁ dadāti sa tasmāt lābhaṁ nikṛṣya nayati |
SA27n2952:6066: na kevalaṁ paurāṇike jagati api tu bauddhasaṁsāre api sarvatra dānaparāyaṇatāyāḥ mahānubhavatāyāśca bhāvavāyuḥ vahati |
SA27n2952:6070: tairekaṁ mṛtaṁ kukkuramantareṇa na kimapi ānītam |
SA27n2952:6071: viśvāmitraḥ prāptamāṁsena yāgaṁ kartuṁ kṛtasaṁkalpo babhūva |
SA27n2952:6073: śīghraṁ devarājaḥ tat śrutvā tannindanīyakarma yena na bhavati tadarthaṁ mṛtakukkurasya māṁsamapahṛtya tasya sthale ekaṁ madhubhāṇḍaṁ sthāpayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:6074: asmin vyāpāre viśvamitraḥ kruddhaḥ san indramabhiśaptuṁ udyato babhūva |
SA27n2952:6075: tatkhādyaparimāṇaṁ viśvāmitrasya śiṣyāṇāṁ kṛte paryāptaṁ nāsīt |
SA27n2952:6076: tataḥ indro bhītaḥ san viśvāmitrasya tṛptaye tatkṣaṇāt varṣukameghān preṣayāmāsa |
SA27n2952:6080: vayaṁ brahmapurāṇasya 138 tame'dhyāye nṛpateḥ śaryāterākhyānaṁ paṭhamaḥ |
SA27n2952:6081: sa nṛpaḥ śaryātiḥ ṛṣermadhucchandasaḥ bhāryāyāḥ premno gabhīratāṁ parīkṣitumaicchat |
SA27n2952:6082: tadarthaṁ rājā ṛṣiścobhau paralokaṁ gatau iti janaśrutiḥ tena pracāritā |
SA27n2952:6083: tatkṣaṇāt rājamahiṣī janaśrutiṁ parīkṣituṁ vyavasthāṁ jagrāha |
SA27n2952:6084: kintu munipatnī patimṛtyusaṁdeśenātīvaśokārtā satī ātmavisarjanaṁ cakāra |
SA27n2952:6086: sa munipatnyāḥ jīvanaṁ pratyānetuṁ vahniṁ viveśa |
SA27n2952:6089: kintu dānadharmo'pi purāṇavihitācaraṇavidhiṣu eko gurutvapūrṇo viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:6090: dānasya kṣetraṁ na saṁkīrṇam - na kevalaṁ viprebhyo dānamapi tu sarvavidhasāmājikakarmāṇi atra antarbhūtāni |
SA27n2952:6094: prāyaścittakaraṇena sarvapāpamuktirbhavati iti paurāṇikavidhiḥ purāṇasyodāratāṁ sūcayati |
SA27n2952:6095: yato dharmo janajīvanasya sarvān vibhāgān śāsti,
SA27n2952:6096: tato dharmārjanasya bodhaḥ manuṣyahṛdayaṁ praviśya manuṣyamudāraṁ karuṇāmayaṁ ca kartumanuprerayati |
SA27n2952:6098: purāṇata eva 'vasudhaiva kuṭumbakam' itivat udāratā jāyate |
SA27n2952:6099: bauddhaśāstrasya mate yo mumukṣuḥ karuṇātmakaṁ manaḥ puṣṇāti sa yathārthaśuddhadharmīyajīvanaṁ yāpayati iti ucyate |
SA27n2952:6101: gotamaḥ mohyaphaggunaṁ sannyāsinamupadiśati yat sa kruddhacittasya sthale kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ poṣayet |
SA27n2952:6102: nijasyāthavā parasya guṇadoṣayoḥ vivecane sarve bhikṣavaḥ kāruṇikāḥ syuḥ iti buddhasya upadeśaḥ |
SA27n2952:6104: 'kassapaṁ prati siṁhasya garjanam' ityatra parivrājakebhyaḥ karuṇāyāḥ hānikaraprabhāvāt muktasyopari gurutvaṁ sthāpayati |
SA27n2952:6105: buddha āha prakṛtaḥ kāruṇiko jano'raṇye vanyajantubhiḥ ākramaṇasya bhayāt muktastiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:6106: vāci, cintāyāṁ karmaṇi ca yo janaḥ karuṇāṁ poṣayati sa janaḥ gotamaṁ prati anuruddhasya vāci vigrahaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:6107: anuruddha āha bhaktiyuktaṁ tathā utsargīkṛtaṁ jīvanaṁ kīdṛśaṁ bhavet iti |
SA27n2952:6108: sādhāraṇagārhasthyajīvane gotamo dampatyoḥ aikyaṁ tathā sāmañjasyamupadiśati |
SA27n2952:6111: tathā ca bhāryāpi patye sahānubhūtiśīlā bhavet |
SA27n2952:6112: premaparidhivistārāya dhyānina upadiśyante yat te prathamataḥ ātmasu,
SA27n2952:6117: paurāṇikadṛṣṭiprasūtā cintātra nimnarūpā - bhaktipadasya bahuvidhā diśaḥ santi,
SA27n2952:6121: purāṇeṣu bahuvidhāni nītyākhyānāni bhaktidayākartavyatākaruṇādīnāṁ bhāvānāmupari ālokapātaṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:6125: viṣṇupurāṇe śatadhanuṣaḥ svāminaḥ kṛte bhāryāyāḥ śaivyāyāḥ dhīratāyāstathā bhakteḥ dṛṣṭāntaṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ |
SA27n2952:6130: brahmāṇḍapurāṇasyānyākhyāne vinatākadrusvāminaḥ kaśyapasya caritre apūrvā prītistathā dayā dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:6131: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe ekamākhyānamasti yatra pitre yayāteye putrasya puroḥ ādarśabhaktiḥ varṇyate |
SA27n2952:6132: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe'pi ekasminnākhyāne ādarśaśiṣyasya paricayo labhyate yatra śānteḥ karttavyaparāyaṇatā tathā lobhahīnatā aṅkitā |
SA27n2952:6133: tena svasmai varasya prārthanā na kṛtā |
SA27n2952:6134: kartavyabodhāt sa varaṁ na prārthayate sma |
SA27n2952:6135: ayaṁ hi gurau bhakteḥ ādarśaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
SA27n2952:6138: īśvare nārāyaṇe bhaktyā vā dṛḍhaviśvāsena vā asya pratirodhaḥ sambhavapara āsīt |
SA27n2952:6140: balirājasyākhyānevayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat baleḥ dṛḍhabhaktyā vāmanarūpasya viṣṇoḥ api dīptiḥ mahattā ca mlānatāṁ gacchataḥ |
SA27n2952:6141: kṣamāyāstathādayāyārīdṛśaṁ prāvaṇyaṁ deveṣu punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:6143: athavā anuśocanāṁ karoti tatkṣaṇāt sa kṣamāṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:6144: mahādevasyāndhakāsurasya cākhyānamatra smaraṇīyaṁ yatra andhakāsuraḥ mahādevasyānugrahaṁ lebhe |
SA27n2952:6145: vāyupurāṇagatabhillavyādhākhyāne bhaktestathā niṣṭhāyā bhāvaḥ nimnajanmanaḥ dāsavṛtteśca bādhāṁ jayati sma |
SA27n2952:6146: purāṇakārāḥ svargatānāmatṛptānāṁ pretātmanāṁ kṛte'pi dayāṁ prakāśayanti |
SA27n2952:6147: narake duḥkhabhogināmuddhārāya vibhinnā upāyāḥ purāṇakāraiḥ vyavasthāpitāḥ |
SA27n2952:6148: yadyapi te narakavāsinaḥ pṛthivyāṁ vāsasya samaye bahuvidhapāpakarmāṇi akurvan |
SA27n2952:6149: bauddhaśāstre idamucyate yat karuṇātmake viśuddhe citte viśvāsaḥ,
SA27n2952:6160: arthāt yo naraḥ tasya manasi prema ca karuṇāṁ ca puṣṇāti sa nirvāṇaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:6161: atra premapadasya karuṇāpadasya vā svatantro'rtho'sti - atra karuṇā na āvegasambhūtaḥ bhāvaḥ,
SA27n2952:6169: yadā cittaṁ gabhīrasamādhau magnaṁ tiṣṭhati tadā taccitaṁ svabhāvataḥ eva ākāṅkṣāmuktaṁ nirāsaktaṁ ca jāyate |
SA27n2952:6171: yadi ko'pyādhyātmiko mumukṣuḥ kaṁcijjanaṁ prati śatrutāṁ poṣayati tarhi evaṁvidhā daśā duḥsahā |
SA27n2952:6173: tādṛśaṁ cittaṁ sujaneṣu anyeṣu janeṣu prabhāvaṁ vistārayati |
SA27n2952:6174: tathākaraṇena tasya ādhyātmikī unnatiḥ vyāhatā bhavati |
SA27n2952:6177: jātīyo dharmaḥ vastutaḥ samājadhārakaḥ jīvanavāhakasya viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:6178: sahakāriśaktitvena dharmaḥ samājaṁ tathā jīvanaṁ panthānaṁ darśayati,
SA27n2952:6180: bauddheṣu paurāṇikeṣu ca śāstreṣu niyamaniṣṭhajīvanayāpanāya upadeśā lipibaddhāḥ santi |
SA27n2952:6182: viśeṣataḥ dharmasya yājñiko'thavānuṣṭhāniko'śaḥ kasyāpi samājasya sampradāyasya ca paricayaṁ vahati |
SA27n2952:6184: sa dharmaḥ kasyāpi pradeśasya deśasya vā jāti ca saṁskṛtiṁ ca racayati |
SA27n2952:6187: vedānāṁ saṁhitābhāgeṣu vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat prākṛtikaśaktiṣu devatvasya āropitaḥ tvāt vaidiko dharmaḥ tadā prāthamike paryāye evāsīt |
SA27n2952:6197: upaniṣatsu ca ityādiṣu vaidikasāhityeṣu nītibodhaḥ pratiphalitaḥ |
SA27n2952:6201: evañca samyagātmīyatābodhaḥ dayāṁ ca prātiveśisulabhamanobhāvaṁ ca sṛjati |
SA27n2952:6202: eṣā dayā tathā karttavyā adhamaprāṇināṁ kṛte'pyanubhūyate |
SA27n2952:6211: apareṣāṁ yathā hānirna bhavati tādṛśīcchā ca |
SA27n2952:6212: jīvanasya ca dharmasya ca kṣetre sadācārā upakaraṇaviśeṣāḥ |
SA27n2952:6214: jainadharme bauddhadharme ca ahiṁsāmūlo yo dharmaḥ sa vivecanīyamātrayā hindudharmaṁ prabhāvitaṁ karoti |
SA27n2952:6217: kintu sā cintā janapriyopāyena ākhyānādimādhyamena pracāritā bhavati |
SA27n2952:6220: purāṇairvidhṛtā vibhinnā devatāḥ sādhāraṇajīvanopayogivividhāśākāṅkṣāvidhāyinyaḥ iti kāraṇāt tā priyā devātāḥ sañjātāḥ |
SA27n2952:6222: sukhabodhyabhāṣayā likhitvāt paurāṇikī vāṇī sudūrasthānīyajanagaṇakarṇasamūhamapi praviśati |
SA27n2952:6223: karuṇātmako mahān guṇaḥ api tatra viśiṣṭaṁ gurutvaṁ prāpnoti |
SA27n2952:6224: ayaṁ viṣayaḥ kathopakathādibhiḥ tiryak prativimbito bhavati,
SA27n2952:6232: prāguktabhāveṣu anyatamenānuprāṇitāḥ santa upāsakāsteṣāmīpsitānāṁ devatānāṁ prasādalābhārthamāhvānaṁ kurvanti |
SA27n2952:6235: idaṁ japtā devatāḥprati yujyate yā devatāḥ karuṇārūpamūrtisatyaḥ |
SA27n2952:6236: bauddhadarśanasya mate sannyāsinaḥ kṣetre karuṇāyāḥ paridhiḥ avaśyameva vistṛto bhavet |
SA27n2952:6237: yadi tasya ko'pi śatrurbhavati tarhi taṁ pratyapi sannyāsī karuṇāparāyaṇo bhavet |
SA27n2952:6238: īdṛśaḥ sannyāsī nirvāṇamārgeṇa gacchan sarvavidhapratibandhakebhyaḥ mukto bhavati |
SA27n2952:6240: idaṁ kevalaṁ hānihīnatāyāmānandānubhavaḥ tathā sarvasmai prītiriti hitāya śatrutāṁ dūrīkaroti |
SA27n2952:6242: manasaḥ evaṁvidhāyāṁ daśāyāṁ na kāpi virodhinī śaktiḥ tamapakartuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:6243: ata eva īdṛśyāṁ daśāyāṁ sannyāsinaḥ pakṣe,
SA27n2952:6244: unnatirodhipāpacintādamanāya mānasikyā śaktyā prayojanaṁ na bhavati |
SA27n2952:6245: viśuddhadaśāmupagatasya viśuddhacittasya sannyāsinaḥ unmārgagamanasambhāvanā sampūrṇatayā dūraṁ gacchati |
SA27n2952:6246: tadā sannyāsī dhyānamagnastiṣṭhatu vā svābhāvikadaśāgatastiṣṭhatu vā iti na ko'pi viṣayaḥ |
SA27n2952:6247: etādṛśaḥ sannyāsī sarvadā karuṇāmayaśca premamayaśca tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:6248: sahanaśīlaṁ karuṇātmakaṁ cittaṁ pratikūladaśāyāṁ pratikriyāṁ na karoti |
SA27n2952:6249: vibhnaśūnyadhyānāya jitendriyāḥ sannyāsinaḥ nyūnatamanamanīyavastubhiḥ santuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ iti gotamasyopadeśaḥ |
SA27n2952:6250: aparisīmapremamayacittānuśīlanaṁ teṣaṁ karttavyam sādhvidaṁ jñātaṁ yat paurāṇikā ṛṣayaḥ jīvikāvyāpāre vā jīvanayāpanavyāpāre vā atīva namanīyā āsan |
SA27n2952:6251: te āśramajīvanopayoginyūnatamavastubhiḥ kālaṁ yāpayituṁ śaknuvanti sma |
SA27n2952:6252: teṣāṁ citteṣu dayānubhūtiḥ karuṇānubhūtiḥ vā prācuryeṇāsīt |
SA27n2952:6253: ayaṁ mahān āvegaḥ purāṇānāṁ sarvatra prativimbitaḥ |
SA27n2952:6256: vipadaśca tān muñcanti - iti tathyaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat dayādhārā dānadhārā vā teṣu sarvadā sakriyāsīt |
SA27n2952:6257: etadapi ghaṭate yat kadāpi vā vararūpaḥ karuṇānubhavaḥ ayogyeṣu api vastuṣu vistāraṁ yāti |
SA27n2952:6262: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat tapasyā teṣāṁ cittaṁ viśuddhīkaroti |
SA27n2952:6263: tathākaraṇena ca te kārtsnyena svārthaparatāmuktā jāyante |
SA27n2952:6265: ya eva etallakṣyamupagacchati sa ātmaupamyena apareṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ vā sukhaṁ vā anubhavati |
SA27n2952:6266: purāṇāni khalu etaddhāvānuprāṇitaiḥ purāvṛttaiḥ bāhulyena paripūrṇāni |
SA27n2952:6268: sa sarveṣāṁ kṣunnivṛttaye varāya prārthanā cakāra |
SA27n2952:6271: yajñīyabalirūpasya bālakasya sahāyahīnā daśā varuṇasya manasi sahānubhūti tathā karuṇāṁ jāgarayati sma |
SA27n2952:6274: varāhapurāṇasya 125 tame'dhyāye kasmiṁścidupākhyāne kapotasya pecakasya ca bhāryāyugalaṁ sādhāraṇakalyāṇāya iṣṭān devān āhvayati sma |
SA27n2952:6276: evañca purāṇeṣu bahavo dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi yatra tyāgamahānubhavatākaruṇāsahānubhavādīnāṁ tejomayo bhāvo vidyate |
SA27n2952:6277: bauddhaśāstre yathā likhitaṁ tathā dṛśyate yat gautamo navadīkṣitān sannyāsina upadiśati yat sannyāsina utthānavicaraṇopaveśanādisamaye samādhyanuśīlanāya dṛḍhasaṁkalpā bhaveyuḥ |
SA27n2952:6278: tathā ca te yadi upadeśānanusṛtya karma kurvanti,
SA27n2952:6282: tena abhyāsakārī yasmāt kasmādapi ākramaṇāt avamānād vā rakṣaṇāya śaktimarjayati |
SA27n2952:6283: kiñca, upāsanālaye sannyāsinaḥ ekatra śāntaṁ śātuṁ śaknuvanti |
SA27n2952:6284: yataḥ, hṛdayeṣu karuṇānuśīlanatvāt teṣāṁ hṛdayāni komalāni bhavanti |
SA27n2952:6285: tathā ca ekaḥ aparasya uttamaḥ sahacaraḥ bhavati |
SA27n2952:6287: tathāpi nirvāṇalābhāt paramapi bhūmikāvasthānatvādeva pramaparimalaḥ pareṣāṁ hitāya avaśiṣṭo vartate |
SA27n2952:6290: yaḥ sannyāsī pārthiva sukhaṁ jahāti sa eva prakṛtaḥ sannyāsī |
SA27n2952:6292: gautamasya mate abhyāsakārī hṛdayena dhīratāhiṁsākaruṇākomalatābhāvānuśīlanena ātmani hṛdaye sahanaśīlatāṁ poṣayati |
SA27n2952:6294: abhyāsakārī yadā sampūrṇaṁ gūḍhadhyānamagnastiṣṭhati tadā guṇatrayamatīva śaktipūrṇaṁ tathā phalapradam |
SA27n2952:6295: asmin paryāye abhyāsakārī sarvavidhaduṣṭakarmacintābhyo mukto bhavati,
SA27n2952:6297: yathārthataḥ asmin paryāye abhyāsakāriṇo manaḥ muktaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:6301: uktaprasaṁge parārthaparatā gautamasya upadeśeṣu na sūcyate,
SA27n2952:6302: tathāpi idaṁ niścitaṁ yat gūḍhadhyānamīdṛśaguṇāya sampadyate |
SA27n2952:6306: purāṇeṣu ayaṁ guṇaḥ na kevalaṁ sādhūnāṁ citteṣu api tu nimnaprāṇināṁ hṛdayeṣu vartate |
SA27n2952:6307: karttavyabodhena saha ātithyādisevā sarveṣāṁ hindūnāṁ sādhāraṇaguṇatvena vivicyate |
SA27n2952:6312: pūrvapuruṣāṇāṁ muktaye bhagīrathasya sahanaśīlatā tathā dhīratā svārthaśūnyasevāyāḥ karttavyabodhasya ca ādarśaṁ sthāpayati |
SA27n2952:6313: atra sādhusulabhe dayā ca karuṇā ca vartete |
SA27n2952:6315: avarajīvānāṁ hṛdayeṣu api kartavyabodhaḥ karuṇābhāvaśca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ praveśaṁ labhete |
SA27n2952:6316: sā ghaṭanā atīva vismayāvahā ca marmasparśinī ca yadā vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ - yo vyādhaḥ vihagamithunaṁ pāśabaddhamakarot tasyaiva kṣudhāyai puruṣo vihagaḥ ātmāhūtiṁ dātumudyato'bhavat |
SA27n2952:6317: samagravyāpāramavalokya sa niṣādo nirvāk tathā āścaryānvito'bhavat |
SA27n2952:6318: asmin paryāye sādhāraṇānāmapi janānāmīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇa eva |
SA27n2952:6320: yo bhikṣuḥ sādhuḥ arthāt yasya cittaṁ sampūrṇaṁ muktaṁ sa kati guṇānarjayati |
SA27n2952:6324: na ko'pi naraḥ vā paśuḥ vā tamapakartuṁ śaknoti,
SA27n2952:6327: sa paramopalabdhiṁ vinaiva maraṇāt paraṁ brahmapadaṁ labhate |
SA27n2952:6328: sarvopari, sahānubhūtiḥ karuṇā ceti guṇadvayaṁ dūḍhadhyānena saha samparkitam,
SA27n2952:6330: yasyātmopalabdhiḥ sañjātā sa bhavacakrāt punarjanmmo vā muktaḥ |
SA27n2952:6331: asya paryāyasya lābhāya karuṇā hi avyavahito hetuḥ,
SA27n2952:6335: kintu abhyāsakārī yadā tapasyāyāṁ kramaśaḥ unnatiṁ sādhayati tadā tasya hṛdaye karuṇābhāvo jāyate |
SA27n2952:6336: antime paryāye'rthāt nirvāṇasya paryāye sannyāsī sāmpūrṇyena niṣkāmo bhavati |
SA27n2952:6337: jāgatikasya vastusamūhasya kṣaṇikatāyāṁ tathā asāratāyāṁ sa sacetano jāyate |
SA27n2952:6338: asmin samaye abhyāsakārī pratikūladṛśyaghaṭanācaritrādiṣu pratikriyāṁ na karoti |
SA27n2952:6339: yo janmasūtreṇa asīmaṁ prema labhate'thavā yasya premamayaṁ hṛdayamasti sa svalpakālena duṣṭamanobhāvaṁ niyantuṁ śaknoti |
SA27n2952:6342: cāndrāyaṇavratadineṣu mahātmanaḥ guroḥ śiṣyā manasi sarveṣāṁ jīvānāṁ kṛte premakaruṇāmayaṁ hṛdayaṁ poṣayanti |
SA27n2952:6344: manasa īdṛgdaśāyāṁ manaḥ kartsnyena mālinyamuktaṁ tiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:6350: karuṇāyā dhyātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ kṣatikarapariveśe pratikriyākaraṇāya viśeṣeṇa phalapradam |
SA27n2952:6351: premṇo dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ krodhaṁ pratihataṁ kartuṁ viśeṣata upayogi |
SA27n2952:6352: samavṛttitāyāḥ dhyātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ tṛṣṇāyā viruddhe pratikriyākaraṇāya viśeṣeṇa prayojanatvaṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:6357: atra karuṇā duḥkhārtatāyāḥ kṛpāyāśca vicchinnā bhavet |
SA27n2952:6358: arthāt dhyātā puruṣaḥ kadāpi na paraduḥkheṣu kṛpānubhavenānupreritaḥ bhavet,
SA27n2952:6359: yena sa paraduḥkhaṁ vā parakaṣṭaṁ dūrīkartumagrasaro bhavati |
SA27n2952:6360: dhyātuḥ pakṣe karuṇāyā ayaṁ bhāvaḥ satataṁ svābhāviko bhavet yainānupreritaḥ san sannyāsī apareṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ dūrīkartumāgacchati |
SA27n2952:6361: dhyātuḥ svābhāvikī pravṛttiḥ prāyeṇa rakṣayituḥ pravṛttiriva bhavet |
SA27n2952:6363: te kadāpi kutrāpi vā svābhāvikapravṛttiviruddhaṁ karma nākurvan |
SA27n2952:6365: tayā te'dbhutaṁ karma kartuṁ samarthā āsan |
SA27n2952:6366: tathāpi te tacchakteḥ apaprayogaṁ na cakruḥ |
SA27n2952:6369: snehaḥ eva tebhyo janasevāyai preraṇāṁ dadāti |
SA27n2952:6370: svecchā tiṣṭhatu vā na tiṣṭhatu vā te karuṇātmakapravṛttivaśāt janahitakaraṁ kāryaṁ sādhayanti |
SA27n2952:6371: muneḥ saubhareḥ ākhyāne snehabhāvaṁ sahānubhūtiśca nirdiśyete |
SA27n2952:6372: taddvayaprabhāvāt sa svayaṁ sundarataruṇarūpaṁ dhṛtvā pakṣapātahīnavyavahāreṇa sarvāsāṁ bhāryāṇāṁ tṛptiṁ vidhadhāti sma |
SA27n2952:6373: skandapurāṇasya kasmiṁścidākhyāne putrāya kārttikeyāya pārvatyāḥ apūrvamātṛsneho'smābhiḥ dṛśyate |
SA27n2952:6374: viṣṇupurāṇe vayaṁ paśyāmo yat kena prakāreṇa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ snehāt garuḍasyācaraṇaṁ svābhāvikamakarot |
SA27n2952:6377: karuṇā ca tadaiva nirdoṣatvaṁ vrajanti yadā dhyātā nirvāṇamārgasya caturthaṁ paryāyamaupagacchati |
SA27n2952:6378: asmin paryāye samavṛttitā dhyātuḥ pakṣe atīva vāstaviko vyāpāraḥ |
SA27n2952:6384: bauddhaśāstre upadeśo dīyate yat ācāryasyopadeśaiḥ dhyātāraḥ teṣāmindriyāṇāṁ śaktiṁ vardhayiṣyanti |
SA27n2952:6387: kintu yadā dhyātā dhyānayogena antardṛṣṭeḥ upari sthāpyate tadā krodhatṛṣṇādivirodhibhāvā svata eva dūraṁ gacchanti |
SA27n2952:6389: yadyapi bauddhaśāstreṣu navadīkṣitānāṁ kṛte tanmayī praceṣṭā upadiśyate,
SA27n2952:6390: tathāpi teṣāṁ pakṣe manmayī upalabdhiḥ api upayogitvaṁ vrajati |
SA27n2952:6391: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ sampūrṇaṁ navadīkṣitasya mānasikīṁ sthitiṁ tathā jīvanaṁ prati tasya manobhāvamapekṣate |
SA27n2952:6393: sattāsu manaḥsthāpane tathā manaḥpoṣaṇe karuṇābhāvasya antarbhuktistiṣṭhati |
SA27n2952:6394: asya bhāvasya siddhau ānandamayaḥ rasa āvirbhāvati |
SA27n2952:6395: antardṛṣṭiṁ vinā sthāpanaṁ poṣaṇaṁ tathā ānandānubhavanamiti sahāvasthitamānasikakarmatrayaṁ manasi apṛthaktvena avibhājanīyatvenānubhūyate |
SA27n2952:6396: antardṛṣṭau satyāṁ mānasikavyāpāratrayamadaḥ pṛthak pṛthak prakāśate,
SA27n2952:6399: yadā etattrayaṁ dhyānayogena samanvitabhāvena prativimbitaṁ bhavati tadā sthirapariveśasya kṣaṇikatā,
SA27n2952:6402: sarve viṣayāstadā duḥkhamayāḥ kaṣṭamayāḥ svatantrāḥ śūnyamayā iva yoginaḥ nikaṭe pratibhānti |
SA27n2952:6403: asmin paryāye svārthaśūnyaḥ san yogī sampūrṇāṁ muktimicchati |
SA27n2952:6412: kintu ṛṣīṇāṁ kṣetreṣu svata eva tādṛśī'pekṣikatā phalavatī na bhavati,
SA27n2952:6415: tathā ca te teṣāṁ pṛthagastitvaṁ vismaranti |
SA27n2952:6416: phalaśrutau te sarvābhiḥ sattābhiḥ saha ātmamatāṁ svīkṛtya aparānubhūtaṁ duḥkhaṁ nijavadanubhavanti |
SA27n2952:6418: tatra kumbhīrākrāntabālakaṁ prati śivabhāryāyā umāyāḥ sahānubhūtiḥ karuṇā ca prativimbite |
SA27n2952:6419: rājarṣīṇā bharatenāpi avarajīvān prati karuṇā kṛtā |
SA27n2952:6421: abhiyojanasya bhāvāt kṣamānubhavo jāyate - yā kṣamā aparādhinaṁ janamuddiśya kriyate |
SA27n2952:6422: purāṇeṣu ṛṣibhiḥ aparādhinaṁ prati dayāyāstathā kṣamāyāḥ pradarśanamadhikṛtya vṛttāntā bāhulyena dṛśyante |
SA27n2952:6423: purāṇānāmākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmo yat kaścidṛṣiḥ karuṇāvaśāt uccāritamabhiśāpamapanayati |
SA27n2952:6424: kūrmapurāṇe kasmiṁścidākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmo yat muninā gautamena uccāritaśāpasambhūtadaṇḍasya hrāsaḥ kṛtaḥ |
SA27n2952:6425: evaṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ - vaidikasya tathā paurāṇikasya darśanasya mataiḥ saha bauddhadarśanasya matānāṁ niviḍaṁ sānnidhyaṁ vartate |
SA27n2952:6427: ubhayordarśanayormadhye asmin cāritrike sambandhe sati hindubhiḥ daśāvatāreṣu anyatamāvatāratvena buddhadevaḥ svīkṛtaḥ iti | ----------
